1.title: Storyline Choices

11.content:
From who's point of view shall this story be told? Whoever is the main character of the story, it will be the other girl who will begin to grow...

Christy:

A cute, 10 year old with shoulder length, dark blonde hair. She is thin, about 80 lbs. and only about 4'9". A happy kid, her mother will be going out for the night and hires their neighbor to come over to look after Elfie for the evening.

Elfie:

Christy's next door neighbor, an 18 year old teen with long, lighter blonde hair. She stands 5'11" with heathy D-cup breasts and a trim figure. Weighing around 150 lbs, she's beautiful, athletic, and has everyone believing she's an innocent and trustworthy young woman.

*********************************

First started by Panther (3) and the next chapter comes mostly from Mary Moves in by Sally Reynolds (long inactive site that I saved the story from)
11.title: A Baby-Sitting Gig

111.content:
Elfie played the proper babysitter and waited patiently while the mother handed out instructions “Now you be very good for Elfie” said Sarah as she kissed her little daughter. Turning to the young baby-sitter she said “I should be back about 10, you two have fun!” With that she turned and walked to the car. Calling back, Sarah held up her cellphone and added “Number on the fridge!”

“Let’s go inside.” , said Christy as she watched her mother drive away. “Come on, I want to show you my room.”, she said smiling back at Mary sweetly.

Elfie grinned down at her as a dutiful babysitter and quietly ordered “Wave to your mother.”

“Come on!” Christy demanded emphatically, grabbing the young woman’s hand and pulling on it.

Elfie allowed her charge to do so through the large double doors and until the girl tried to pull her upstairs “Kitchen!” she ordered, stopping the momentum and pulling the girl in the opposite direction.

“Hey careful!” little Christy protested as she stumbled through her own home.

Elfie shoved open the kitchen door and yanked Christy around “Fridge!” she demanded “And phone!”

“There!” Christy pointed angrily “And there!”

Elfie tugged on the girl’s arm and slapped the hand “That’ll teach you proper respect.” she scolded “Now, I want you in your room. Door shut! MARCH!”

“Fine” Christy answered sweetly, looking cowed “One condition. You have to see my room.”

Elfie weighed her options and gave a half-nod. She followed the girl through the house. She had to admit Christy’s room was a beautiful little room. Just right for a little girl to play out her fantasies. It was filled with books, pictures, stuffed animals, dolls and a large, very beautiful doll house. Elfie found herself drawn immediately to the wonderful little house. Peering inside she marveled at the exquisite furnishings and the attention to detail. Not a cheap plastic mass produced item, this house was a work of art. It was like a real house rendered in miniature, a perfect reconstruction fit for any museum. “Oh, Christy this house is so beautiful!”, she said unable to help herself. She’d forgotten her promise to call her boyfriend. “It looks nice enough for someone to really live in. Wouldn’t it be fun to have a real live person living in your house?”

Elfie looked over at Christy who was now sitting on her bed. The girl was smiling oddly at Elfie. After a moment Christy replied, “Would I ever!”

Elfie continued to admire the little house dolls as the girl slipped from the bed and walked toward her. Elfie frowned when the little girl pushed her bedroom door shut. Quite suddenly, for some reason, she didn’t feel as though she was in charge anymore. But that was silly. Elfie considered the fact that she was a foot taller and nearly double Christy’s weight. She pushed her nervousness aside “Look Christy” she said “Sorry about earlier, I really am. We just got off wrong.”

“OH it’s no big deal.” Christy replied softly. She accepted Elfie’s hand in apology and looking up into the baby-sitter’s eyes said, “You know you’re so small, I bet you could live in my house.”

Elfie giggled a little nervously at the child’s steady, serious gaze. “I really think I’m just a little too big that.”,

Christy said finally. “Well, let’s just try to pretend that you are LITTLER....”

Elfie’s heart was racing and her head was swimming. She seemed unable to tear her eyes from the girl’s hypnotic gaze. Which, much to her alarm seemed to have turned into black and green swirling whirlpools. She began to feel her body changing. There was an odd, almost giddy sensation of floating. Elfie had been looking slightly down at the cute little girl but now it seemed that they were looking eye to eye. No, now she was looking up at the girl. She was confused and excited by the strange sensation as Emily and the room began to slowly expand before her eyes. The top of her head was now even with the young girl’s chin and still she continued to grow, right before her eyes. Looking down at her hands Elfie could see that they were now much smaller than Christy’s. It was as if her own hands were those of a child being held by an adult. She raised her eyes to find that she was now looking straight into the child’s crisp, white cotton blouse. Christy towered over her now. Suddenly Elfie realized that Christy wasn’t growing, it was she who was shrinking! Elfie guessed that she was just under four feet tall by now and still dwindling.

“Isn’t this fun?”, smiled the giant Christy looking down at her midget baby-sitter. “ I’ve always wanted a little sister, now you’re just the perfect size. And soooo cute!” With that she released Elfie’s hands and the shrinking abruptly stopped. Christy now took Elfie’s small face in her soft young hand and gently caressed the little cheek with her thumb. Elfie looked around nervously at the room and the young girl before her. Both of which seemed to have suddenly grown quite large in the last few minutes. Christy was thrilled at the sight of the small, blond woman standing before her. Stooping slightly she lifted Elfie by the arms and sat down in a chair. Effortlessly she pulled her now diminutive baby-sitter into her lap. With her left arm holding Elfie in place she began to squeeze and pet the dainty young woman seated on her thighs.

Eventually Elfie’s head cleared and she began to return to her senses. “This can’t be real.”, she stammered. “It must be some kind of a dream!”

Christy giggled at the high pitch that Elfie’s voice had acquired with her reduced stature. “It’s certainly a dream come true for me!”, said Christy as she hugged little Elfie to her chest.

Suddenly panicked by the strange situation Elfie sprang from Christy’s lap and scurried to the center of the room. Looking side to side, the reduced babysitter fled toward…
111.title: Elfie In Charge

1111.content:
Christy in Charge

"Hey! Where do you think you’re going?!!!”, shouted Christy as she pursued the magically miniaturized Elfie. Christy began to giggle as she chased the frightened young woman around the room.

Elfie was now just over three feet high and no match for the girl especially in her own room. Though, she did try. She faked toward the door (the obvious choice) Then threw herself toward the window. Unfortunately, that didn’t work either. She ran around a desk nearly her height. This went on until Elfie tried to scramble over the bed. She cried out as she felt Christy grab one of her comparatively tiny ankles.

“YIIPPEE!!” Christy squealed in delight as she pulled Elfie toward her. She crawled onto the bed and climbed onto Elfie, quickly straddling her.

Trapped by the huge 10 year old Elfie twisted onto her back just as Christy settled down across her small hips, pinning her arms helplessly at her sides. She exhausted herself trying to get free.

Christy wanted to see Elfie’s little face, so she allowed her to turn. She smiled down at the small struggling woman for a few moments. She liked the feel of the miniature baby-sitter wiggling and squirming between her legs. This was going to be a great test of her abilities. And so much fun, too.

To the petite Elfie it seemed that she had an eight foot kid sitting on her stomach. She could feel the soft fuzzy argyle socks that covered the strong calves that were pinning her arms. Christy’s short skirt was stretched tight between her muscular thighs just a just inches above her cute, dimpled knees.

Elfie could see the innocent white cotton panties in the shadows under the little skirt. Elfie gasped in alarm as Christy leaned forward slowly and planted a soft kiss on her cheek. Elfie was beginning to panic now. She knew that she was completely at the mercy of a child easily twice her size. “P..P..please...”, Elfie sputtered.

Christy looked down into Elfie’s soft brown eyes and whispered, “I love it when you beg like that!” She gave a playful/evil look and then dug her fingers mercilessly into Elfie’s defenseless ribs.

The tickling fingers soon had the tiny young woman shrieking with laughter and gasping for air. “No! No! Please stop!”, she screamed as the giant continued relentlessly.

Reaching behind her with one hand Christy tickled Elfie’s flailing legs as well. She loved having her former babysitter at her mercy. For over a minute the room rang with Christy’s giggles and Elfie’s high-pitched shrieks and helpless laughter.

“Oh, FUCK! I can’t stand anymore!”, Elfie screamed at last.

Raising to her knees Christy dragged her giggling victim from beneath her. She’d been hoping for something like this. Seating herself on the edge of the bed she wrestled the little baby-sitter across her knees and pinned both slender arms in the middle of her back with one hand. “That! Was a very, very bad word to say Baby Sister! You are a very naughty little girl!” With that she brought her free hand down sharply on Elfie’s defenseless bottom.

“Ooooooowww!!!”, Elfie yelped with a combination of pain, surprise and humiliation.

Again and again Christy’s hand clapped down hard on Elfie’s firm little buttocks. For years the young girl had dreamed of giving a grown woman a spanking and at last she had her chance. Christy was in a state of heavenly bliss as she dispatched justice to Elfie’s petite posterior.

After a dozen swats Elfie was nearly in tears. “Christy! Please stop! That’s enough!”, she pleaded.

Christy paused, “Enough? We’ve barely started.” Giggling, she lifted the hem of Elfie’s sun dress and tucked it under the little arms. Elfie’s small buttocks had turned a very pleasant soft pink shade under Christy’s hand. “No wonder grown-ups seemed to enjoy giving spankings” the girl mused as she ran her hand over the soft, warm, little mounds covered by the most delicate lace panties she had ever seen.

Elfie sobbed softly and twitched as Christy gently rubbed and patted her tender bottom. Terror filled her every time the roaming hand actually left her flesh. The three foot teen caught her breath caught sharply when she felt Christy’s fingers pinch and stretch the edge of the panty over one of her little nates. A moment later she let out a high-pitched, little “Ouch!” , as Christy let the elastic snap back sharply against Elfie’s tender tush.

“It’s so soft!” Christy chuckled as her fingers roamed Elfie’s cute little hinny. She could just tell the shrunken teen was relaxing. Her task was barely half done and already Christy was beginning to think of little Elfie as her property. Now all she needed was to get the busty shrinkee to verbally agree. She hoped that would be soon, her palm was beginning to sting.

Elfie’s crying eased to faint sobbing “Let me up, Christy.” She pleaded “Please! Let me up.”

“Your little nates are so nice.” Said Christy, ignoring the request and continuing her gentle exploration. One little curvy cheek, then the other. The back of her hand swept across Elfie’s soft flesh, then her fingers trailed back the other way. Christy would also gently pinch it as she went. Finally she answered “Ahh…
1111.title: Christy in Charge

11112.content:
Elfie cringed while the mini-giantess fingers roamed her abused rear. Christy’s assault had left her flesh super sensitive. She couldn’t help emitting a whimpering “P-pl-pUHleaseeeeee!”

“Welll.l.lll.ll since you put it that wayyyyyy!” Christy drawled out in a wickedly playful tone. She took a deep breath and once again began to methodically swat Elfie’s defenseless panty clad bottom and the back of her now naked thighs. She dished out a rapid string slaps that were so fast the echoes of the impacts overlaid each other.

Elfie kicked her legs and twisted desperately as she tried to free herself from the child’s grip. Her poor bottom was stinging fiercely and her breathing was becoming very ragged now as she sobbed and gasped between pleas for mercy. At last Christy paused once more. “Christy...let me go now.”, she sobbed. “You can’t… treat me like …this, I’m your ba…by-sitter!”

“You were my baby-sitter when you were big, now you’re my baby sister and you’ve been very naughty.”, Christy responded, coolly. Again, she stroked the curve of her prisoner’s rear. Smiling at feeling of the soft silky panties. They were so much softer at their reduced size. The smile turned to a smirk as she imagined how much softer they would get at the final stage. Her musings were rather rudely interrupted.

Elfie lost her temper again “Just let me go! You little bitch!”, she screamed, angrily. Suddenly her face was shoved back down.

SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT!
Elfie instantly regretted her fit of temper and choice of words.

“Mommy doesn’t let us say that word either”, Christy announced, “Now you’re really gonna get it!”

SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT!

Elfie gasped in shock and alarm as she felt Christy lift the waist band of her panties and pull them down to her knees. The cool air brushing over her burning bottom brought her some slight relief but only for a moment. Elfie’s head was spinning. She could not imagine how she could be in this predicament. It defied all comprehension, how she, a grow woman could be reduced to the size of a four year old and draped across the knees of a child that she was supposed to be baby-sitting. Worse yet it seemed that this torturous spanking was about to be continued on her bare behind!

SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT!

Christy paused and regarded Elfie’s small buttocks. They had the hot, red glow of a well-spanked bottom. Soon Elfie would be ready to Promise. She drew back her hand and brought it down hard on Elfie’s naked left cheek. A single hard, ringing stroke. The little woman squealed and kicked as Christy raised her hand once more. This time the blow landed squarely on the little right buttock. Christy liked the way that Elfie’s bottom quivered and shook with each spank. Elfie’s flesh felt so soft and smooth, even compared to Christy’s palm. The feeling of control and power over this miniature grown-up made Christy want even more. She redoubled her efforts, spanking the small, red bottom before her as hard as she could. She was eager for the moment when she would be able to bind Elfie to her will.

SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT! SWAT!

For Elfie the bad dream of shrinking to the size of a small child had become the nightmare of a humiliating and painful bare-bottom spanking at the hands of a young girl. Despite her desperate struggles to free herself, she was helpless against Christy’s powerful grip. The sting of the spanking was becoming too much for her to bear. In desperation she began to plead with Christy once more. “Christy! Ouch! Please! Ouch! No more! Ooooowwww!!! I’m sorry! Oh! ... “

Christy paused. A grin that would have terrified Elfie split her lips “Do you promise to be good?” <Swat!> This one not quite a pat, but no where near as hard.

“Yes!!! I p-p-puh-romise!” poor little Elife whimpered.

“Do you promise to behave?” demanded her abuser. <Smack!>

“Aaaaawwww!” Elfie sobbed “Y-yuh-y-yes!”

“Do you promise to obey my Commands?” demanded Christy, harshly.

“W-w-w-what?” Elfie sobbed.

<Whack!> <Smack!> <Swat!> <Swat!> <Swat!> <Swat!>

Christy dished out still another series. In actuality, the youngster was quite pleased. She was certain that last had broken the half-sized teenager’s resistance.

“Yes! Yes! Yes! YESSSSSS!!! I PROMISSSSSSEEEE!!!” Elfie squealed.

Christy stopped. She remembered blushing wildly when her mother told her how to complete the spell. However, now that she’d spent quite a bit of time touching Elfie’s rear, it was really quite appealing to close the deal. ‘And she’s mine now, so why not?’ the young girl thought. Out loud, she said “Very well, this should make you feel better.”

Elfie blushed crimson as she felt Christy lean forward and plant a soft kiss on the burning skin of her left buttock. She couldn’t see the soft glow that lit up the spot where Christy’s lips contacted her abused rear. Astonishingly the pain of her tortured behind did seem to diminish as soon as the girl’s lips touched her delicate derriere. As Christy released her Elfie staggered on wobbly little legs and hastily pulled up her panties, then squealed and danced around the room comically as this sent a new wave of searing pain across her ravished rear. Elfie stood staring back at the smiling girl and rubbed her abused bottom for several seconds before she bolted for the door.

For her part, Christy was seriously considering planting another kiss on that little bobbling derriere “Where do you think you’re going?’, she called after Elfie.

“I’m getting out here! Right now!”, Elfie called back as she struggled with the large door knob.
11112.title: Elfie's Resistance

choices: Christy then proceeds to give her captive another violent spanking session!
Cristy then pins Elfie underneath her bare foot and forces her to kiss it!
111121.content:
Elfie struggled desperately in her attempt to escape, but to no avail. She quickly realized that the door, her only way out of this little girl's prison of a bedroom, was locked! She was trembling with fear now. Trying to escape had surely angered her captress, and she knew that a painful punishment was imminent. Elfie immediately turned around and stared in terror at the massive form of Christy.

"Oh wow, Elfie! Did you really think that I would be dumb enough to leave you with a usable escape route? You belong to me now! Just accept it!"

"Please Christy! I'm sorry for trying to escape! Please don't hurt me anymore!"

"You've been a bad girl, Elfie! You should know better than to try and escape your master! I think you need another punishment to get that through your head!"
111121.title: No escape!

choices: Elfie lightly kisses one of Christy's feet and that is all
1111212.content:
Elfie has her back to the door as the tall young girl approaches her.

"Christy, I don't want to play this game any more....please just return me to normal," sobs Elfie.

Christy is nearly two feet taller than Elfie now since Elfie is only three feet tall. Christy ignores her pleas and reaches down for the shrunk teenager. Christy moves Elfie away from the door then pushes the small girl down onto the carpet. Elfie stumbles backwards and falls down on her sore rear end. Christy stands over Elfie and lifts her right foot into the air. She then quickly brings it down and plants it down onto Elfie's stomach. Elfie is instantly forced down onto her back as the child presses down firmly with her foot.

"Since you don't want to listen to me, we are going to have to go through another punishment," explains Christy. Elfie struggles underneath Christy's large foot, but can't budge it an inch. "Stop Christy! You're too heavy!" cries Elfie.

Christy loves seeing Elfie trapped down on the floor and it only excites her even more. She then decides to make the situation even worse for her babysitter. Christy closes her eyes for a moment and envisions Elfie becoming even smaller. A few seconds later, Elfie starts shrinking again.

"No more Christy! Stop please!" cries out Elfie.

Elfie watches as Christy's large barefoot starts growing even larger. It slowly spreads out and begins to cover more and more of Elfie's body as she shrinks down even smaller. Elfie shrieks as Christy's thick toes head right for her face. Christy then stops shrinking her babysitter, now leaving her at just a foot and a half tall. Christy slides her foot further up Elfie's body and plants her toes onto her babysitter's face.

"Now, I want you to kiss my feet or this will contiue," booms Christy.

Elfie desperatly wants this nightmare to be over and has no choice but to do what the giant girl wants. Elfie sits up a little and grabs onto Christy's big toe. She gives it several kisses along with the toe next to it. She then looks up between Christy's toes to see if she is satisfied.

"That was very nice of you Elfie. I am glad you like kissing my big foot," teases Christy. Christy applies less pressure down on Elfie, but still keeps her pinned down. Elfie can now breath much better so she begins to calm down. Lucky for Elfie, Christy's feet are quite clean and really don't smell at all. Her skin is very smooth all over and Elfie notices this. She then finds her hands lightly holding onto the giant foot.

"This is so unreal....just look how big she is now! Her foot is absolutely huge now," thinks Elfie as she waits to be freed.

"Okay, I want to to do one more thing then we will stop the punishment. I am going to let you up then I want you to kiss the top of each of my feet. I want you down on your knees when you do it," orders Christy. Elfie nods her head up and down so Christy finally lifts her foot off her. Elfie slowly stands up and discovers she is only knee high to Christy now. Elfie gulps hard and gets on her knees in front of Christy's feet. She can't believe how large they look and it is frightening to know that she is small enough to be stepped on now. Next,

111122.content:
Elfie yanked on the doorknob with all the strength her reduced height could offer. To her great satisfaction, it opened. She thought it odd that her tormentor didn’t jump up in pursuit.

“BE STILL.” Christy commanded, in just the way her mother taught her. The girl grinned as her order took hold. She rose and sauntered calmly across the room toward the motionless Elfie.

Elfie couldn’t tell how, but as soon as Christy had uttered the command Elfie found that her muscles would no longer obey her will. She stood frozen, only able to watch, with both hands on the knob as Christy calmly walked up. The half-sized teen couldn’t even move her eyes. Soon, all she could see was the electric blue of her giant charge’s shirt, and a strip of bare flesh where Christy’s shirt didn’t quite meet her shorts. Elfie was denied even the release of screaming.

“Now comes the best part.” Said Christy, happily, as she stood over her former babysitter. She reached out and gently fluffed the beautifully yellowish hair atop Elfie’s head. Then she brushed her little face, and noticed tears. Tilting the unmoving head up with a single finger, Christy smiled gently and then scooped up the pint-size baby-sitter in her arms. “I’m sorry.” She apologized “But, the spanking was necessary. You’ll understand soon.”

Elfie wanted to cringe as the girl fondled her cheek. Then she felt huge hands under her arms, and her feet left floor. All of Elfie’s senses were working perfectly as she saw herself, in a full length mirror, carried across the room. She could see the girl’s face, which gave no sign of even the slightest strain. The least pleasant part of the trip was the hand supporting her still pained butt. Moments later, she was stretched out on the table.

Christy enjoyed carrying the mini-teen. At first, the young girl held Elfie under her little knees. But, pretty quickly, her left hand made its way under the knee–length dress and caressed the silky material that covered Elfie’s firm globes. This was a new interest for the preteen. One she didn’t quite understand yet. Arriving at her desk, Christy gave Elfie a tender kiss on the temple, laid her across it and carefully straightened Elfie’s garments. She smirked and informed her “Time for the final step, baby sitter.”

Elfie watched, helplessly, unable to make even the smallest movement as Christy’s huge hands tugged on her clothes. She feared something would rip and she would really be in trouble. Adding to her confused worry, Elfie watched as a one-foot ruler was placed on the desk beside the helpless young woman. And, her captress stepped back, closed her eyes and took a series of slow deep breaths.

After composing herself for a few moments Christy stepped up to the desk. Placing one hand on the top of Elfie’s head and the other on the bottom of her feet she began to chant softly to herself. All the while her gaze never wavered from the small, blond woman on the table. Her hands maintained the same gentle pressure on Elfie’s head and feet.

Soon Elfie felt the strange, familiar feeling return. This time it was stronger than before. Christy seemed to be growing beside her now. The very room was expanding all around her. The walls and ceiling retreated from her and surface of the table seemed to be spreading in all directions beneath her. She knew that she was shrinking again. Her heart was pounding with the sensation that was to her as thrilling as it was terrifying. A few minutes later the sensation finally stopped.

Christy closed her eyes for a few moments and took several deep breaths. The process had obviously required considerable effort and concentration. Once she had sufficiently recovered Christy returned her attention to the now doll-size Elfie lying on her table. For a few moments she gazed affectionately at the adorable tiny blonde in her short summer dress, soft knee socks and suede clogs.

Elfie, still frozen and helpless, could do nothing but watch and wait anxiously as now truly gigantic eyes studied her. She could easily follow as their movements roamed up and down her body.

“Hmm…should I unfreeze you?” Christy wondered as she held her hand directly over littler Elfie.

A huge hand filled Elfie’s very limited vision. All she could do was look straight up. She couldn’t even swallow nervously as various nightmare images filled her mind.
111122.title: Christy's Power

choices: .   "I should show you your new home."
1111221.content:
The hand withdrew, but Elfie hardly got in a mental sigh as it was almost immediately replaced by a looming billboard of a face.

Christy brought her face close to the shrunken teen and whispered, “Action.”.

Suddenly Elfie found herself able to move once more. She scrambled out from under Christy’s face. Elfie cringed when, because of the closeness, her knee scraped the giant chin. She staggered to her feet and looked about wildly. Everything seemed all distorted.

“How do you like your new size?”, said Christy. She grinned, reached past the much reduced and grabbed something.

Elfie turned her head to find that Christy was now holding the ruler --on end-- beside her. At a glance she could easily see that she was now about the same size as the one foot rule.

“Oh, no!”, she squeaked, “What have you done to me!”

“I’ve decided to let you be the real life dolly who lives in my little house. Won’t that be fun!” With that Christy wrapped her free hand around the stunned doll woman’s waist and carried her to the bed.

Frightened by suddenly finding herself being swept through the air, high above the floor Elfie struggled and squirmed in Christy’s hand. All the strength in her tiny body was no match for the child’s powerful fingers. Her legs were dangling freely below Christy’s hand, and she kicked wildly as she was whisked through the air. “Christy! I’m frightened! Please put me down!”, she called as the young giantess bore her across the room.

Christy was very pleased with the high peeping sound of Elfie’s little doll voice. She also liked the feeling of the warm, firm, little body wiggling and squirming in the palm of her hand. The look of concern on the beautiful little doll’s face and the long, slender legs flailing the air made her feel very strong and something else. For such a young girl, this aroused a curious feeling—a feeling that she had only recently come to recognize. Mischievously, she said “Down? You want down?? I can do that!”

A small shriek escaped Elfie as she suddenly felt Christy’s hand open and she dropped what seemed like several feet. Her cry of panic was cut short as she fell onto one of Christy’s soft, downy pillows. To little Elfie it was like falling onto a stunt man’s air cushion. Even from that small height Elfie sunk a deeply into the soft, yielding mound.

Christy giggled at Elfie’s antics as the miniature baby-sitter struggled to free herself from the pillow. She threw herself onto the bed, to enjoy a closer look.

The surface was so soft and yielding that she wasn’t able to climb up over it. It was a bit like watching a small child struggling out of a large bean bag chair. As she strove to escape the downy prison, Elfie’s short summer dress rode up to expose her lace panties and tiny, rosy buttocks once more.

Christy felt a powerful urge to play with the babysitter’s little mounds. The young girl paused, wondering at the strange feeling. Shrugging, she decided to indulge herself and reached out. But that was when Elfie finally managed to crawl free of the pillow and onto the comforter.

The diminutive Elfie still wobbled awkwardly as her clogs sunk deeply into the thick comforter. Elfie scowled angrily at the huge child stretched out on the bed. Puffing both from the irritation of the big child’s amusement and the effort of extricating herself from the pillow, she began to smooth her clothes and arrange her hair in an effort to preserve some small shred of her dignity. “Very funny...”, muttered Elfie under her breath.

“Come on! Run!!” Jen urged. On cement, Jason could skate better than he could walk. Not so in a forest. He was, just barely, keeping up with the cheerleader. The pair felt earthquake-like shakes, then a foot thumped down in front of them. They crashed into it and fell flat on their backs.

Sara carefully sat Indian-style, surrounding her toys in a prison of flesh. “Well, super-boobies woulda been fun. I think she woulda loved you, cutie” she said “Maybe I’ll find her again.” Her fingers closed on Jen’s waist and lifted the tiny cheerleader to her face.

“Let me go, you big bully!” she screamed.

For a moment Sara just looks at the girl in her hand, then pokes a finger on Jen’s chest. “There’s a definite difference” she says “I remember when I didn’t have anything there. Don’t worry, yours will grow in another year or so.”

“You think so?” was out of Jen’s mouth before she realized it.

Sara smirked “Well, you never know” she said “Besides, some boys don’t like’em big. Some boys are into asses”

“Put…me down…please” Jen pleaded nervously.

Y’know, I’ve got a pretty good idea what boys like. I could check you out” Sara said with a little excitement in her voice. “You’re off to a good start in that cheerleader outfit”

Jen struggled against the giant fingers, but it was useless. “N-no thanks” she replied. “Just let me go!”

“Ohhh…noo” Sara replied suggestively. She began petting Jen’s legs. “They’re real soft” Sara observed

The probing fingers made Jen very uncomfortable “HEY!” she screamed indignantly when it went under her skirt

“Mmmmm” Sara sighed pleasurably as she rubbed the little girl’s panty covered crotch “Is yours still hairless?” she asked her toy.
“Pick on someone your own size!!!” Jason yelled. The field hock star had removed his skates, so he threw one at Sara. It bounced off the huge girl’s arm.

Sara found this very funny. She thought of a little kitten attacking a ball of yarn “Ain’t that adorable!” she cooed “Skater boy protecting his wittle girlfwend!”

“Uhhh…ok…I guess” Jason replied “You just let her go…ok”

Sara decided this could be fun “What’s your name, skater boy?” she asked.

“Jason” the Blefescuian star replied “Now turn her loose”

Sara swiped at him with one finger, nearly knocking him over “Why should I do that?”

“Because---“ he started, but it ended in a shrug.

Sara laughed lightly and said “You really can’t make me do anything, can you?”

“She’s a kid” Jason pointed out “Please?”

Sara thought for a moment and said “Well, maybe, if you do something for me”

“Umm…what?” the Blefescuian asked.

“Welllll….let’s seeeee” Sara said thoughtfully. The boy had backed away from her finger. So she followed him wherever he went “Well, for starters you may as well stop trying to move. Its not like you can go anywhere anyway”

Jason gulped and asked “Ulp…ahh…Are you going to touch me?”

“Of course I am…silly toy” Sara replied with a laugh “You’re too cute not to!”

Jason’s heart felt like it would pound right out of his chest, he was so nervous. He’d been called cute by girls before, but never a TOY. He stopped moving and allowed the girl’s finger to touch him. It didn’t feel bad, kind of like when he went to the zoo and an elephant petted him. “A-A-alright” he said after a couple of minutes “Will you let her go now?”

“Tell you what, cutie” Sara said, she’d really enjoyed touching him “If you take off your shirt, I’ll put your girlfriend down”

Jason looked up at the giant girl and asked, “That’s it? That’s all I have to do?”

“Sure, skater boy, that’s it” she replied. If anyone who knew the pre-teen saw that smile, they would know that things weren’t going to work out exactly the way Jason expects. “Off with it” she insisted

Jason didn’t think much of being shirtless, really. So he shed the uniform top and shoulder pads easily “Ok, I did what you wanted.” He said as if it was a big deal “Now you said you’d put her down”

“Of course I will” Sara replied. Licking her lips “After all, I can’t hold Jen and play with you at the same time. Now can I?”

Hearing that, Jason stumbled backward, right in into the bend in Sara’s knee. He’d somewhat forgotten that he was already trapped.

Sara pinned him there with her arm and, looking back at Jen said “Now, little girl, you watch closely and you’ll learn a lot” She set Jen on the ground and pinned the Lilliputian between the bottoms of her feet.”

“HEY!! YOU LIED!!” Jason protested loudly. “We agreed you would let her go!!”

Sara gave him a confused look and said “No, I promised to put my other toy down. I kept my word. Right now, since I already checked out a girl before, I’d rather play with you anyway Jason.”

“Err…huh…WHA” Jason panicked “I never agreed to that!!”

Sara just plucked him from the fold of her knee and began touching the tiny boy’s chest “My boyfriend, Timmy ---I mean he’s my size--- likes to have his nipples. How about you?” she asked

“Stop that!” Jason demanded “This wasn’t part of the deal!!”

“I never asked your permission” Sara pointed out. And she resumed touching Jason.

Jason wanted to escape the probing finger but, looking down, he saw that he was at least ten feet off the ground. He kicked his legs futilely. The giant girl trapped his leg between her thumb and finger and she relentlessly tickled his foot. “No...please…stop…please…don’t do that…stop…heheeheeheehehe…don’t”

Sara giggled at the whole thing. The boy’s struggles were fun. She even let him push her fingers away a little. “I’m not hurting your boyfriend” she replied to the trapped girl “Just having fun” She stopped playing with the tiny boy and spun him around.

“Yipes!!” Jason squealed. His sides were pinched between fingers and thumb. Their grip was like steel.

This was just too much fun for Sara. Never in her life had she imagined Little People. She was never going to be tall by her own standards. Wendy had stopped getting taller two years ago, she just kept growing. Although she currently was six inches taller than Timmy, he would eventually tower over her. “See, little girl, he’s just fine.” She said playfully “He just has too many clothes on, don’cha think!”

“I dunno” Jen said, blushing. She turned her face away. That was all she could do since her arms were trapped by the huge feet

Sara found that interesting “Well, bye-bye to the other skate” she said, tossing it away.

“HEY!! Give that back!!!” Jason protested

Sara twisted her wrist so he faced her again and laughed “You threw one. I just threw the other”

“Well I wan’em back!” Jason yelled.

Ignoring the tiny boy, Sara asked “So, you’re a cheerleader, huh?”

Jen nodded

“Ever peak on the boys?”

Jen blushed and nodded

Sara grinned wickedly and asked “Ever see little Jason, here?”

“Uh-uh” the little cheerleader denied “He’s from Blefescu and I’m from Lilliput”

Sara didn’t know the difference, both were just words to her “Curious?” she asked.

Jen mutely shook her head.

“Well, I am” said Sara “I’ve never seen a nude boy. A nude girl, yeah”

Jason figured he was in trouble when the huge girl started talking to the Lilliputian cheerleader, so he wasn’t much surprised when the fingers assaulted him again. “Leave my pants alone!” he complained

“Oh, come on” Sara pouted at the tiny boy’s objections. She was totally amused by the leg vs. finger battle that was going on. She even kept it fair, using only two fingers.

Jason quickly began to tire. Swinging his legs around like he was, with nothing to push on and no way to rest was exhausting. One of the huge fingers hooked onto his waistband and started pulling. It was just a fingernail, Jason knew, but the only way he managed to get his pants free was by stuffing his hands under it and prying his pants off of the thing. KRRTTZZTZZTZZZTTTT he heard and felt.

Unfortunately for the Blefescuian hockey star, so did Sara “Oooppss!!” she commented, laughingly “I think something ripped”

Not at all angry at the tiny boy’s show of temper, Sara replied “Now don’t have a fit. Honestly, its only fair. I’ve been sitting here in my birthday suit all this time”

And despite Jason’s best efforts his pants were soon being pulled off his body

That was when they heard a loud snap come from the forest.
1312122211.title: An Interruption

13121222112.content:
“TIMMY!!” Sara squealed happily “This is great! I can’t believe it! You got wash overboard too, huh? I’m so glad you’re here!! You won’t believe it!....” she’d been rambling. Then she tilted her head curiously “Wait a sec…” she said “…Uhh…how did you get here anyway?”

Blushing, he replied “I…ahh…snuck aboard. I…that is…missed you” He eagerly bent down to hug her, but stopped “You’re n-n-naked” he observed

“Me and Wendy were on deck getting tans” she answered “That storm tossed us over. I don’t remember how, but when I woke up, I had no clothes and I was tied down. These little people are a bit pervie.”

Timmy’s eyes widened “Little people!?” he questioned.

“Yep” Sara replied “Look, ain’t he cute?”

Timmy frowned at the little boy in Sara’s fingers “Yeh cute” he replied. “Look, do you know where we are?”

“Uh-uh” replied Sara, shaking her head “I had a girl before, she got away. She said it was something like Bef Q.”

“That’s Blefescu!!” Jason yelled. He was proud of his country and offended that the giant girl couldn’t pronounce it correctly.
Sara shrugged “Eh! Whatever!” She looked back at her friend and said “There’s lots of these living dolls all over the place”

“I don’t like him much” said Timmy, as Jason was held up to his eyes “Stop staring at her, Twerp!”

For an instant, the Blefescuian was furious “HEY! I—“

“TIMMY!” Sara exclaimed as the tiny boy was snatched from her hand. She quickly grabbed his wrist. A look at her friend’s angry face told her what was wrong “Timmy, you don’t need to be jealous.” She continued “These are just toys. We can both play with them”

“I AM NOT A TOY!” Jason protested.

Little Jen, practically forgotten, trapped between Sara’s feet just screamed. To someone her size, it was a blood-curdling sound. To the huge creatures that had captured her, it was amusing.

“Ahh!” said Sara, on remembering her. She leaned forward and, using thumb and forefinger, plucked the doll-sized girl into the air “See, here’s another. One for you and one for me” she offered.
Timmy’s face took on a sneaky look as he asked “There’s more on this island aren’t there?”

“HmmMmm” Sara replied, grinning “Hundreds at least. There was this girl that freed me when I was tied down. I think she thought I’d do whatever she told me to.”

Jen was casually handed over to the huge boy. For a brief moment, she touched hands with Jason before she turned to meet her fate “P-pl-please don’t h-hurt me, s-sir” she pleaded, looking up at Timmy.

“Cool! She talks too!” Timmy commented. “And she’s real soft”

Sara nodded happily, pleased with the change in her friend’s attitude “Why don’t we… uhh… practice on them? Then we can try new stuff on each other” she offered suggestively.

“Sounds like fun” he admitted. The more the tiny girl wriggled around, the more he became interested ‘practicing’ as Sara had put it. “I guess I was being silly” Timmy said “Though, she doesn’t have as good a figure as you do.”

Sara couldn’t quite keep a blush from her cheeks “Aww…that’s sweet” she said. Taking Timmy’s hand, she pressed it against one of her breasts, then kissed it. “I think we’d just have to be gentle.” She cautioned “They do look fragile”

“O-ok” he said, stuttering a little. Even after the past month, Timmy was still feeling a little overwhelmed with the change in his friend.. They must be boyfriend and girlfriend now. But, still, like now, here she was sitting there STARK NAKED! And she’d just pressed his hand to her soft breast. At first, he’d been very jealous of that little midget. Now, somehow, Sara had put a twist on it that made him eager to join in. Of course, if Sara didn’t mind the girl, the why should the boy bother him. And that little cheerleader in his hands…..yumm!!

Timmy brought the tiny girl up to his face and said “You’re cute.”

“Thank you!” Jen replied, sounding quite Ungrateful. A giant finger stroked her hair and she hit it, yelling ‘STOP THAT!”

Timmy glanced over at Sara, he couldn’t tell what she was doing to the little boy. But her amused look promised a good time. The attack on his finger drew his full attention. “Owwww…that hurrrrt” he fake-whined “You’re like a naughty pet. No biting the hand that **giggle** is holding you.”

“I’m not a pet!” the Liliputian protested “I’m a person! And stop touching me!”

Sara stopped toying with Jason for a moment and commented “I got some good ideas already, Timmy. And, god, yours still has her clothes on!”

“Well…I..that is…” the boy stuttered, shyly. “Wouldn’t it be rude?”

Sara rolled her eyes “Timmy Timmy Timmy” she said, patting his knee. “Do you ask your GI Joe his permission to change his uniform?”

“Uh…no.” he replied. “When you put it that way…”

Jen panicked at that turn of conversation. She had no idea what a GI Joe was, but she could tell just by the look on the giant boy’s face that he had been convinced by the giant girl. Jen clamped her arms around her waist and declared “Don’t even think about it!”

“You’re right, Sara.” He replied, confirming little Jen’s worst fears. It didn’t even occur to Timmy to think of Jen’s action as a problem. Jen had flopped down in the giant boy’s palm as her skirt was pulled free. Now, she was quite determined to get out of the hand. Or, at least, get into a position to talk to her captor. And get your hand…finger…whatever OFF MY BUTT!!!”

Jen squirmed and wiggled in the huge hand, trying to free herself. But the giant was relentless, he just kept doing it. Finally, all Jen could do was lay there and endure.

“OK, toy-girl.” Timmy finally said “You can have your skirt back.”

Jen found herself on the ground again. She felt distinctly uneasy being between the huge boy’s legs. “Right! So where is it?” she demanded.

“OH! Over there.” Answered Timmy with a chuckle “Hanging on that little tree.”

Jen backed up, refusing to look anywhere else but at his face. “And…I can…just go…get it?” she asked, hesitantly.

“Uh-huh” he replied “It’s not like you’re getting away.”

At that moment, Sara interjected “Oh…we’ll let you go…sooner or later…when we find someone else to play with.”

“I like your ass.” Timmy said, smiling down at her.

Jen backed out of the circle of legs. She didn’t want to turn around and expose her rear to the giant’s oogling. Looking around, she made her way to the indicated tree. And quickly discovered a problem. Jen was under five Liliputian feet tall and her skirt was hanging from a tree branch that was over six feet off the ground. In spite of her obvious disadvantage, Jen shot Timmy a dirty look and snarled “Now what!!?”

“Dunno.” The amused giant giggled. Unhelpfully, he suggested “Jump?”

With little choice but to try, Jen did so.

“Hey-hehe! Toy-girl, I like the way you bounce!” Timmy laughed

Jen crossed her arms and glared at the giant.

Having had his fun, Timmy leaned over and pushed the branch with one finger lowering the skirt into Jen’s reach.

As she stretched to grab her clothing, Jen….

After a few hours Ellen woke up feeling a little tired. She looked around and saw a deserted beach; She took her time to stand as she still felt a little dizzy, but after a while she sat on her knees.
As she paid more attention to her surroundings, she noticed that there was something odd about the place, but couldn’t quite put what was wrong.
She felt a little thirsty, but then she noticed that a little river with crystalline waters was not far from her. She stood up and approached the river. After she has satisfied her thirst, she began to think what to do next

“Where the hell am I?” she wondered aloud to herself.
It was obvious she was not in the Caribbean anymore as the weather was not infernally hot, and the area didn’t look tropical.

"I need to find help”. She thought and stared at the river “I’m sure if I fallow the river I will find someone”
then she began to make her way to the mainland.
“Hmm that’s odd” Ellen thought as she noticed something for the first time

She had noticed that the trees were mostly pines, firs and other trees that definitely did not belong in the Caribbean, but what she found odd was their small size.
The area was heavily forested, and she could see in the distance a snow covered mountain range.
After about ten minutes of walking along the river she came to the edge of the forest and then saw something funny
"What's a doll house doing in this area" she thought as she saw a small building not far from her.

As she was about to step out of the forest, something else caught her attention. a "toy" car was approaching the doll house.

"There has to be someone really close" she thought as she knew remote controls had to be operated not far from the toy cars.

But then the car stoped and out of it came what appeared to be a very small person.

Ellen's eyes widened in surprise "What the hell?" she said. She stood there, shocked for about 5 seconds, then everything began to make sense
"The small shark, the trees, the house, the car, the little road" she quickly thought.

Being an impulsive person, Ellen stepped out of the forest and began to run, a smile on her lips

17 year old Jason has just gotten to his parent’s country house for the weekend. Although he lived on the city, he enjoyed spending time away from all the noise.
He was halfway between his car and the entrance of the house, when a strange noise made him turn around. Even if it was a moonless night, Jason Face paled as he saw a giant figure running in his direction.
At first he froze, then his first instinct was to run to his car, but he calculated that by the time he got there and started the car it would be to late, so he ran to his house

As he ran, he looked over his shoulder when he heard the footsteps getting closer and closer. His feet clashed into something and he fell to the ground

Jason looked up and saw a hand approaching. He rose and started running again. He heard what sounded like a girl’s giggle. He reached the door and began to open it. In that second that he stopped the hand reached him, grabbing him by the jacket and Jason felt a tug. He let go off his jacket and closed the door

Ellen was a little disappointed when the little person discovered her and started running towards the house so she sped up determined to catch it. She got close enough to realize it was a blond haired boy, probably in his late teen. The little person fell and Ellen knelt down to grab him, but he managed to stand up and escape her hand just in time.
Ellen couldn't help but giggle as she watched the teen running away. As the blond teen reached the door, She tried again. Her fingers got a hold of his jacket and pulled, but the boy managed to take off his jacked and entered the house. "Not fair" Ellen said with amusement

She went to her hands and knees to take a better look inside the house, and saw the boy running frantically inside

“Come out” she called with a friendly tone “I just want to talk”
Ellen saw him stop and look out at her. “He is very handsome” she thought to herself
She smiled at the blond boy, but he just moved away from the window.

As Jason ran, he heard the giant voice asking him to come out. He looked at the front window and for the first time saw who his attacker was. The giant had the appearance of a 13th year old girl. She had dark brown hair and brown eyes in a pretty face. The face was so big that it filled most of the view from the front window. He paid no more attention to her and ran to a room where the phone was. He called 911 and screamed “Help” when the operator answered.

“What’s the emergency” the operator asked in a calm voice

"T-there's a-a- g-g-giant chasing me!" Jason yelled. "CALL THE ARMY!!!"

"We're tracing this call" came an annoyed voice "Little boys could go to jail for making false emergencies"

“This is no joke” he screamed, but at that moment he looked out at the window of the room and his face paled as he saw the smiling face of the giant looking at him
“Hi” she said, and before he had time to react, her hand pushed the widow open and grabbed him

Ellen took out her hand and brought him close to her face to take a better look
“Let me go” he screamed in a panic, while trying to break free from her grip

Ellen’s eyes were filled with wonder. His body felt so soft in her hand and his squeaky little voice made her giggle
She smiled, with what she hoped was her best friendly smile, and asked “What’s your name sweetie?”

The boy replied, not hiding how scared he was “J..jason…P..please, d..don’t hurt me”
Ellen didn’t reply at first, as she was still mesmerized but her wonderful new discovery
“So soft” she whispered as her free hand caressed the head of the boy.

She finally realized that the poor boy was on the verge of panic
“Awww are you scared of the big bad giant??” she coed as she hold him tenderly against her check.

“Let me go” he said with despair as he tried to break free from her hold

His struggles only made her giggle
“Aren’t you the most adorable thing I have ever seen” she added as she continued to cuddle him despite his efforts to break free

In his dream there weren’t any giants. He slept on, unaware that he was in a hand again.

“I think I’ll take a walk around the back yard.” Juliana said. “I’ve got an idea, how about you come with me, Scotty.” She paused for a moment, petting his arm with a fingertip. “Glad you agree.” She added. “Oh, but you’ve got no clothes on. Is that a problem?” Again, she paused, this time she snuck a finger between her Earthling’s legs. Again, her sleeping toy said nothing so she headed downstairs and went out the back door.

Scott was jolted awake as the giant girl skipped around her back yard. **Bounce** “Ouch!” **Thud** “Ooooff” **Bounce** “Ugg” It wasn’t a fun way to be woken up.

“Go-ood mor-or-ning, Sc-otty” Juliana sang as she continued bouncing around. Juliana’s house was above average size. But, the back yard was huge. And there were no fences. She could just roam around forever. She slowed to a walk and smiled down at the boy she held. Her fingers began brushing his little body. Not really in a sexy way, just petting him. “So, did you have fun with Molly last night?” she asked

Scott tried to twist himself free, but her slender fingers held firm “More like she had fun with me!” he said angrily.

“Same thing.” Juliana replied with a giggle “So, what’d she do with you?”

Scott didn’t reply.

Juliana switched him from one hand to the other, now exposing his bare back and butt to her gaze “Now don’t be naughty.” She scolded him. “Tell mummy everything, or else mummy pank.”

“OK! OK!” Scott yelled fearfully. He waved his arms and kicked his legs, desperate to defend himself in some way. He screamed when he felt the impact of a finger on one of his ass cheeks. But, it actually didn’t hurt.

Juliana laughed at the little boy’s reaction. She switched hands again, so that he was facing her “Aww, I sorry.” She cooed “But, you must do what I say.”

“I know.” He replied, feeling defeated “What do you want me to say?”

Juliana grinned and asked “Well, what was the first thing she did to you?”

“I was asleep.” He replied “The first thing I remember is feeling something touching my back. I guess it musta been her. Then when I rolled over I couldn’t get comfortable. It was because I’d rolled on her hand.”

Juliana couldn’t help it, she interrupted the story laughing “OH! She musta loved that!”

“Yay’ Scott replied tonelessly.

That only amused Juliana more. She laughed harder. Unfortunately, as a result, she wasn’t watching where she was going and walked smack into a tree. She fell backwards and hit her head. She emitted a soft grunt and blacked out.

“Whoaaaaa!” Scott yelled during the entire three seconds of the giant girl’s fall. Her arm bounced off the ground. It was sheer luck that the back of her hand absorbed the impact. He took another wild ride as the hand rebounded and impacted with her chest. The hand rebounded again, but only a little. It settled back down again. He felt a little sorry for her, but this was an opportunity too good to pass up.

Scott grunted and groaned at the effort. If the hand had landed on the ground, it probably would’ve been easier to escape. With the palm up, he could’ve just pushed through the giant fingers. As it was Juliana’s fingers were curled under and her hand rested on her chest. As Scott struggled he had to deal with his nude body continuously dragging the giant girl’s skin. It was almost as bad as having her ‘play’ with him.

As time went by, he got more desperate. At first, he’d gone slowly, enduring the contact. He’d hoped she wouldn’t wake up, so he didn’t make any sudden movements. Just as he was almost free, the hand twitched. Scott was pissed. He punched the girl’s chest, and waited for her to start playing with him again. But, nothing happened.

Scott was finally free. Naked. But, free. Standing on her chest, he could see that she was still breathing. He could also tell that her chest was rising and falling. He was glad she wasn’t hurt. Juliana was very pretty. And, sleeping like she was, she seemed quite nice. Scott shook himself. He HAD TO get away from her NOW!

“Idiot!!” he scolded himself, as he made his way down her side. As a starting point, he made his way around the monstrous tree. This would, at least, get him out of Juliana’s sight. Then he would plan his next move. “My next move!” he laughed at himself “I’m a foot tall toy on a planet full of giants! What am I gonna do? Take over!”

“Some kid played with me, and I couldn’t stop her…or him. Sounds familiar.” A voice said.

Scott nearly jumped out of his skin. Days of being surrounded by giants. Getting picked up, getting looked down on. And…other things…He’d learned to look up. This time no one was extending their hand to grab him.

Again, the voice spoke “Hello? Over here.”

“Where?” he asked.

In response, he was tapped on his shoulder.

“Ahh!!” Scott squeaked. Turning, he still looked up.

“Now try looking straight ahead” the voice suggested.

Scott was looking at a woman. A normal sized one. She was a bit taller than him. But, considering the last few days, she looked tiny. He approached her, speechlessly “Who’re you?” he asked.

“I’m Clarissa. We’d better get away before that girl wakes up.” The woman said. She had dirty blond hair and an athletic figure. She extended a hand and said “Well, come on. That is, unless you want to stay with her.”

Scott shook his head and said “No way! Let’s go!” That was when he remembered his nudity.

“You’re hardly the first pet I’ve rescued.” Clarissa said lightly “I’ll get you into hiding. Then we’ll get you some clothes.”

“Can I go home?” Scott asked. He covered his groin.

“We’ll talk about that later.” Clarissa said, firmly “Time to go! Now!”

With little choice, Scott followed her.

144312211122121222.content:
Scott and Clarissa avoided a number of dangers on their way. Scott was amazed how she could sense something coming miles away.

“Duck!” she ordered.

Scott barely landed on the ground when he heard a squeal of agony. Something heavy landed on him. He rolled out from under it and screamed “Gahhh! A bird!”

“Small one.” Clarissa said with a shrug. She walked over to it. Kicked it over and yanked an arrow out of its eye. She wiped it off and slipped it up her sleeve.

Scott just goggled at the woman. His mouth dropped “Uhhh… wha’tha…how’d’u.” He completely forgot he was still naked.

“Its my job.” She said gruffly “We still have a ways to go.”

Continuing along, Scott just managed to get out a yelp before she tossed him into a ditch. “What the fuck did you do that for BITCH!” he screamed.

“SHADDUP!!” Clarissa yelled back and pointed “You see those two bikes?! If it weren’t for me you’d be nothing but a stain in one of those grooves!!”

Scott looked and saw the retreating backs of two young boys. They couldn’t have been more than six. They were still using training wheels. “Oh. Right. Sorry.” He said lamely.

“Now, listen to me you little twit!” she growled. She grabbed a handful of Scott’s hair and yanked it cruelly “Right! New rules! You will do what I say! If I tell you to jump, don’t even ask how high. Your feet leave the ground before I finish the word! Clear?!”

Scott gulped and nodded.

Clarissa glared at him and said “Good! Disagree with me, or even hesitate when I give you an order and I’ll tie you up and take you back to your girlfriend. I’m sure she misses her plaything!”

“Yes ma’am” he said meekly.

About an hour later, Clarissa called a stop. There was a ruined baseball batting helmet laying at the edge of a small stream. She held open the crack for Scott and said “We’ll be safe in here until dusk.”

“So…err…how long have you been doing this?” he asked, hesitantly.

For a moment, she didn’t speak. Then, finally she sighed “Look about earlier, I’m sorry for blowing up at you. I’ve been on this world for a long time. There’s some clothes in here. They might not fit but its better than nothing, right?”

“Yeh” Scott blushed. He gratefully took what reminded him of a karate uniform. The legs and sleeves were too long on him. He struggled to roll them up so his hands and feet would be exposed. He just managed to get his feet out when the clothes went wild. “HOLY GOD! HELP!!” he screamed

Clarissa merely shrugged in amusement. She operated controls on a hand-held device and when she was finished Scott was helpless. Ignoring Scott’s struggles, she tested the knots until she was satisfied. “Some of you, I almost feel for.” She said, coldly, as she stood over him. She kicked him in his stomach, and concluded “Then, someone like you comes along and I really enjoy my work.”

“What (cough) do you mean?” asked Scott as he struggled to breathe.

Clarissa pressed another button on her device and ignored him, until there was a tap on the helmet. “Greetings Master” she simpered as the helmet rose.

“And what have you for me this time, my pretty?” the giant man asked.

Clarissa ran over to Scott and pulled him to his feet. Looking up at the giant, she shoved him forward. “Are you pleased?” she asked.

“You’ve done well, girl.” He said. He stuck one finger between Scott’s arms and lifted him into the air. The knotted arms held.

Scott kicked his legs and yelled “LEMME GO!”

“Feisty one, isn’t he?” the giant asked “Well, I’ll make sure you get your cut, of course. Who does he belong to?”

Clarissa laid her pad in his other hand and called up a picture of an unconscious Juliana. “She wasn’t watching where she was going.” Clarissa explained “Walked right into a tree and dropped her toy. Good thing I was there to find him.”

“Yes indeed” the giant replied “Can’t have you Earthers roaming all around causing mischief. Best to keep you in your place as our children’s toys.”

Clarissa nodded obediently and said “Of course.”

“You’ve been working almost two weeks straight.” The giant said. He scooped Clarissa into his hand and rubbed his thumb between her legs. “Davey misses his toy.”

The giant’s son was 16, stupid, fat, and smelled bad. It was even worse for an Earthling. Clarissa preferred being out catching escapees. “I would rather be working, Master.” She said “Rule breakers must be caught and returned to their owners.”

“Nevertheless,” the giant interrupted “It’s time for a break. You’ll collect enough to buy your way home, soon. I’m sure Davey will be disappointed, but I’ll find him another girl.”

Clarissa gave a happy smile as giant finger probed her body “Whatever you say, Master.” She said.

“Time to go, Earthies” the giant announced. He replaced the batting helmet in its spot and carried them off. In his car, he put them both in a box on the seat next to him and started the car.

In the box, Scott gave his captor a nasty look and said “Looks like I’m not the only plaything around here, huh?”

“At least I’ll go home!” Clarissa snapped. She kicked him again and Scott gagged.

A few minutes later, the male giant walks into his pet store carrying the two tiny earthlings, and he gently places Clarissa on his desk for safekeeping. The tiny, beautiful 16-year-old traitor sits down on some soft miniature furniture, waiting for her giant to return. The one thing she is not going to miss when she returns to Earth is her memories of this world. She knew tiny humans could be sent back to Earth, but it rarely happens, and by law, all their memories while they are here on this would have to be erased completely from their minds. She really liked that idea. What some of the giants did to her almost made her vomit. Clarissa first arrived on this world when she was 9-years-old. Even at her young age, she was a strikingly beautiful girl. She sold for a lot, and she was sold to her current owner’s fat son who had her for almost 7 years. The giant boy was around 8 years old at the time, and the things he did to Clarissa, the things he put inside of her, the humiliation of ether being forced to stand there naked at his school, or being forced to have sex with other earthlings, or other nonhuman creatures for their enjoyment enraged her. She even got pregnant once, but they took her baby away from her. Yes, she sure would enjoy leaving this hell world.

The giant gently puts the clean tiny white boy into a glass cage, and closes the door. The giant looks down and smiles wickedly at him. Scott gets nervous, and immediately cups both of his hands around his nearly hairless crotch. He turns around to see a few other humans, all of whom are completely naked just like him, and apparently freshly abducted. However, these humans are not strangers to him. Standing before Scott is his gorgeous 12-year-old girl friend Emily. They are a year and a half apart in age. Emily stands a few inches shorter than Scott, and neither one of them are virgins. They have both been sexually active for a month now. Emily has long, curly, strawberry blond hair, blue eyes, and she has smooth, lightly tanned skin. She has perky C cup breasts, a slender body, with curvy hips, and she has a fantastic ass. Her crotch area is nearly hairless, and like Scott, she too is completely naked. As she stands there with one arm wrapped around her large breasts, and her one free hand over her nearly hairless crotch, she sees him, smiles, drops her arms, and runs over to him, giving him a hug, followed by a passionate kiss. They hear the giant laughing thunderously, and he says to them, “Fantastic! A tiny couple of breeding age such as you both will fetch me a lot of money, a lot. Yes, I will sell you both together. Now get some rest, because in a few hours someone new will own you two. I hope you two don’t mind having sex in front of giants.”

The giant leaves while laughing, and he turns off the lights, except for the dim emergency lights overhead. The tiny white couple looks around at the other people in the cage with them, and Scott sees…

choices: Juliana's happy to get him back
1443122111221212222.content:
Scott endured the car ride, spending most of his time glaring at the evil woman. The giants he could understand. He had lied to the blond-haired girl last night. He did enjoy Barbie dolls. Scott just never thought he’d become one. Then again, he wondered if the government didn’t choose people to be sent here based on the way they treated dolls. Scott had never damaged one, but Molly had basically been right. Scott did have a couple of Barbies. What he didn’t understand was what could make her turn against her own kind. Scott felt totally betrayed by her.
“Well, we’re here.” The giant man announced. The car jerked to a halt, he got out, opened the passenger side door and scooped up the box

Scott was thrown against one side of the box, then he slid from one end to the other. “WHOA! OWW! Ouch!” he complained as it finally settled.

“Pathetic!” Clarissa commented. She made no effort to help the boy. “You’re really gonna hafta get used to being bounced around.” Somehow not only was she standing, but even in the same spot.

“Yeah, well, three days ago I was on Earth and didn’t have to worry about giants!” Scott shot back.

Clarissa crossed her arms and said “Well, as soon as I’ve got enough, I’m going home.”

“When the time is right.” Came the giant’s voice. He set the box down.

Scott managed to get to his feet, even though they were still tied up in the pant legs. He imagined he looked pretty silly “What’re you gonna do with me?” he asked.

“Well, boy, the procedure is put your face on lostearthlings.guv.” The giant replied. “Then wait to see if your owner will pay the recovery fee. If not, you’ll be auctioned off.”

Scott was again lifted and hung from his tied up sleeves. He wasn’t sure which was worse, these stupid clothes or being naked. “Lemme go!” he yelled, indignantly. He kicked his feet wildly, but all that did was cause him to swing around.

“Now, smile for the camera.” The giant sneered.

Scott twisted his head away and said “NO! Screw you!”

“Care to do the honors, girl?” the giant ordered Clarissa.

That was an order the little bounty hunter didn’t mind. She smiled and said “My pleasure.”

“Yikes!!” Scott squealed as he fell from three times his height. The giant had just pushed him off his finger. Scott landed with a thud, and before he could recover, the evil woman yanked him to his feet and locked him in a full-nelson.

The giant snapped the picture, turned to his computer and uploaded the picture. Then he logged on and Scott’s face appeared on the website. The giant then added a picture of Juliana, lying flat on her back. Finally a small caption underneath read >This little guy got lost and wants to see his owner again<

“Gross!” Scott complained “And let me go!”

Without releasing her grip, Clarissa smacked the back of Scott’s head and said “Shut up!”

“Oh, let him go.” The giant ordered dismissively “Besides, someone might get jealous.”

Feeling her shiver against him, Scott sniggered despite the pain of the hold “Yeah, some great fighter you are.”

“Here’s some free advice, twerp.” Said Clarissa “Go back to your girlfriend and behave. You’ll live longer.” She released him and smacked him across the head.

Before Scott could recover, a booming voice asked “Where is she, Dad?”

“Good to see you, too, son.” The giant snapped.

“Sorry!” the new voice said, petulantly. “So, wha’d’ja catch? Another girl?”

The giant shook his head “Not this time. But he rates a fair bonus, take a look.”

“Uhhh-uuuhh” Scott shivered when he saw the face. Naturally, giant, but really unpleasant. Definitely two chins, probably three. Scott couldn’t keep a look of distaste off his face.

“My friends call me Davey” the giant teenager said “Puny Earthers call me god.”

Scott didn’t say anything. He just laid there, staring up at the monster.

“Even for an Earther, you’re pathetic.” Davey insulted him. He pushed Scott over with one of his meaty fingers and laughed. “Can’t even defend yourself against a girl.”

Scott, immaturely and a little foolishly, stuck his tongue out at the giant boy.

“You little shit!” Davey said. He slapped Scott to the ground and pinned him there by pressing his thumb on Scott’s chest. “I could crush you to dust” he snarled

Slapping his son on the back of the head, the giant said “Kill him and you’ll pay me the bounty!”

“Yes father” Davey gritted out. He held is thumb in place for another second then suddenly lifted it.

Scott panted heavily trying to suck in air. Quite suddenly, he missed Juliana.

“You better hope you sell well!” the fat giant said, nastily.

Scott cringed in terror. That made Davey laugh. Scott happened to glance over at what was now a very quiet Clarissa.

“You like her, twerp?” Davey asked. “You think she’s hot?”

Scott shook his head and said “No! She’s the worst! She makes money off the misery of others!”

“Well, I like her.” The giant replied. With that, he moved a hand to Clarissa and stroked her side. “She’s fun to play with.”

Clarissa took on a simpering expression and rubbed her head on the giant’s hand. She asked “Would Master like to undress me, or should I?”

“You can do it, this time.” Davey allowed “But don’t forget my favorite part.”

Looking ashamed, the little bounty hunter looked at her feet and muttered “Please Master, not in front of him.”

“Now! Toy!” he demanded “Or I’ll just rip your clothes off your little body!”

Backing away, she blubbered “Please Master, no Master, please. These are my work clothes.”

“Then say it!” Davey ordered. “And make sure he hears it!”

Clarissa could only nod helplessly “Yes Master.” She said “Master likes it when I sit on his big hard penis and he spurts in my tiny holes.”

“Well, get to it, then.” He said.

Scott, despite himself, found it exciting to watch his enemy strip. A smirk appeared on his face as he realized she had it as bad as he did. If not worse.

“I’m ready” she said, standing there naked. A look of distaste crossed her face as the giant boy approached her. She turned it into a smile.

Davey’s fat fingers wrapped around Clarissa’s body and lifted her. He gave Scott a superior look and said “Now we’re going to my room.”

“Brrrr” Scott shivered in disgust as he vanished through the door. He was left alone with nothing to do for the next several hours. He couldn’t help but be bored. But, then again, at least no one was doing anything to him. He fell asleep, to be awoken later by the giant man.

“Let’s go.” He ordered Scott “Your owner is here to collect you.”

After the day he had, the Earth boy was actually glad to hear that. He never wanted to see the giant man, his son, or the bounty hunter again. Juliana walked into the room and Scott smiled at her.

Juliana went for the table Scott was standing on, but the giant man snatched him off it first. “HEY!” she complained.

“Now, now, young lady.” The man said “You know the rules. Finders fee, first. Then you can have your toy back.”

Scott was being held very unpleasantly. The giant’s grip was too tight and his thumb was pressed into Scott’s neck. “THAT HURTS!!” he yelled. He pushed at the giant digit, but it didn’t move.

“Stop hurting him, sir.” Juliana pleaded.

Patting her on the shoulder, the hunter laughed “No harm done, kiddo. Besides, doesn’t he deserve a bit of punishment?”

“Just return my daughter’s property.” Juliana’s mom said. She handed the man a $50. At the same time, she pulled her daughter back away. The Bounty Hunter gave her the creeps.

He tossed Scott at the girl and took the money. “I’ll just log the return and you can be on your way.” He said.

“YEEEAAAHHHHHH!!!!” Scott screamed as he tumbled head over foot in the air. It couldn’t’ve lasted more than 2 seconds, he knew. But it felt like an eternity. Then, the flight ended as quickly as it began. He landed in a pair of outstretched hands and fingers wrapped around him. He sighed with relief and said “Nice catch.”

Juliana giggled at the remark and said “Thanks.” She brought Scott to her face and inspected him closely “You’re not hurt, are you?”

“Been better.” Scott grumbled.

Davey entered the room at that moment. He was holding a naked Clarissa. He asked “Who’re you?”

“I’m Juliana, Scott belongs to me.” She replied

Davey laughed “Oh..ohh…So you’re the one that owns the little wimp!”

“Huh?”

Scott cringed when Davey reached a hand out toward him “Don’t touch me!” he shouted.

“How long have you had her?” Juliana asked. She was fascinated by the little girl.

Davey grinned. Though young, he thought she was cute. He wondered if she might want to be friends, or more. He hoped for more. After all, she obviously played with her Earther. “You wanna hold her?” he offered

“Sure!” Juliana replied enthusiastically. She patted Scott’s head one last time for good measure and extended her hand.

“You’re real cute.” The heavy boy said

Juliana giggled as she wrapped her fingers around the Earth girl. She lifted her for closer inspection. “Wow! Will I get boobs like those someday?” She said excitedly.

“I don’t think you need them.” Said Davey “You’re cute just like you are.” He touched the ends of the smaller girl’s hair.

Juliana didn’t react to the touch. Instead, bringing the hand holding Scott up to the same level, she pointed one finger out and touched the little girl’s breast. “It’s so soft.” She breathed

“Heh!” Scott snorted “And here you made fun of me. How you like amusing fatboy?”

Clarissa reached out and slapped him across the face. “Brat!” she growled.

“NO fighting, you two!” Juliana scolded “What’s with you anyway?”

Scott had had hours to think of something and was ready. He pointed at her and exclaimed “She kidnapped me when you got knocked out!!”

“Aww! That’s alright, Scotty.” She replied. She kissed his whole face then licked him. “It’s fine you tried to escape. Really. We expect it at first. But, really, you’re a foot tall. Where you gonna go?”

Scott gagged and spluttered at the saliva attack “YUCK!” he exclaimed. Instinctively, he struggled to get free. He pushed and pulled at the huge fingers. But, of course, there was no escape from the 10-year old’s fist.

“Why does he fight so much?” asked Davey. “How’s he expect to get away from you when he’s even too weak to fight Clarissa, here.”

Juliana shrugged “Dunno” she replied. “Hey, check this out!” She had a wicked grin. She put both her hands together, pressing the Earthlings into each other. “Go ahead, Scotty!” she said “Give’er a kiss!”

“You touch me and you’ll spit teeth!” Clarissa threatened.

Scott ignored the threat and did so. He also grabbed one of her boobs and twisted it.

“That is enough, I think.” Mom said “Come along, Juliana. Give the girl back and let’s go.”

Juliana pouted and said “Ok, Mommy. But do you think we could buy her, too. She’s cute. Maybe I could give her to Ashley. She likes girls, I think.”

“Sorry, lil’miss.” The giant bounty hunter said “Clarissa isn’t for sale. She’s one of my most valuable assets. Worth quite a bit of money.”

Shrugging, Juliana lifted the Earth girl to her face and licked her. “Okay, then. Maybe I’ll see you around, Davey.” She said as she returned Clarissa. After they left the bounty hunter’s place, and got in the car. Juliana asked “Can we stop at McDonalds on the way home? I’m hungry.”
