Mom replied "..Good idea, dear. We'll get dinner for everyone."

“So…McDonalds, huh?” asked Scott. It was the first normal thing that he’d heard of since his kidnapping.

Driving the car, Mom frowned and ordered “Hold him up here, Jules.”

“Yes, Mommy.” The young girl replied. She nudged Scott around in her lap then grabbed him from behind.

Scott kicked his legs as he was lifted across the giant car and over to Juliana’s mother

Keeping most of her attention on the road, she spared half an eye and said “I’m sure that bounty hunter told you about what happens to Earthers that don’t get reclaimed. Keep that in mind in the future.”

“But I wasn’t running a---” Scott began

“Do not interrupt me!” the giant woman snapped. She flicked one of Scott’s legs with a finger causing him to cry out. “Be warned!”

Juliana whined “Mom! Be careful! You hurt him! Aww…poor Scotty!” She pulled her pet away from her mother and began petting him.

“I’m fine!” Scott grumbled “Can’t ya stop touching me even for a minute?”

Mom laughed at the protest “And you should also remember that you’re just a plaything now. So you may as well get used to it.” The car parked and she added “Alright young lady, out you get. I’ll need help carrying the food.”

“Yes ma’am.” She replied. Juliana unhooked her seatbelt and got out of the car. “Do you think this one has Earthie food?”

Scott was amazed. The place looked like any McDonald’s he had ever seen. The same arches, the same smells, even the same color uniforms on the cashiers. Forgetting his situation for an instant, he said “God I’m starved. I’d love a Big Mac…hmm…fries…and a large chocolate shake…hmmmmmm!!”

“I don’t think so … (giggle)” observed Juliana “You’re silly! Why, a large would be bigger than you!” She pushed the restaurant door with her hip and got in line behind her mother.

Scott looked up at his captor and rolled his eyes “Damn stupid, bloody, size jokes!” he complained

“Uhhh….hhhummmm” sighed Juliana a couple of minutes later. The line wasn’t advancing nearly as fast as she would have wanted. Naturally, she wasn’t really bored. She amused herself by fiddling with Scotty.

From behind her, Juliana was tapped on the shoulder. “Hey, he’s a real cutie. He reminds me of one from my 7th grade class.”

“Thanks.” Replied Juliana as she turned. She found herself facing a teenage girl. “Yeah, my sister brought him all the way from Earth. He’s my birthday present.”

The teenager smiled broadly, displaying a perfect row of teeth “Wow! You must be rich!” she exclaimed “Would you---that is---do you think I could hold him for a minute?”

“Ok” Juliana answered and extended the hand holding Scott.

The Earth boy, who had been busy trying to keep giant fingers away from his privates, was shocked by the sudden turn of events. Without so much as a ‘by your leave’ a new set of hands suddenly held him. They were much darker than what he’d gotten used to. Looking into the new face, he emitted a sharp squeak and exclaimed “Vonnie!”

She was a beautiful black girl, who to Scott’s eyes, looked exactly like a girl in his class that he had a crush on. The one difference that he noticed a moment later was the much more full chest. “Well, you’re a lively one.” She observed. “Been a while since I seen an actual Earthie. Let alone held one.”

“Ahh…err…” Scott mumbled. Juliana’s petting and stroking, though not intentionally sexy and half aroused him. This giantess, so similar to someone that he liked, had completely turned him on. His hard-on was pushing against the insides of the fingers that were wrapped around him.

“So, you’re really from Earth, huh?” the black girl asked.

Scott wondered if she even noticed. He answered “Yeah.”

“The ones who were born here are kind of boring.” She said “You Earthies are much more lively. He try to escape yet?”

Juliana nodded, and suddenly she felt uneasy with the stranger holding her property. “Nah, he wouldn’t do that.” She lied “Umm…we’re next.” And she held out her hand to reclaim Scott.

The black girl…

Her long fingers gently wrapped around Scott's body, each one of them was almost as long as he was tall. It only then hit him how tiny he actually was compared to Mia. Once she had secured him against the palm of her hand, she lifted Scott off the table and towards her smiling face.

"You are so cute little guy." There was a grinding sound that caused him to look down and see that her other hand was unzipping her jumpsuit and revealing the amazing, mountainous breasts he'd been caught staring at before. After a moment Scott looked back up into Mia's eyes to see her smirking knowingly. he'd been caught.

"You like them? it's okay, I'm glad you do. Here, take a closer look." she lowered her hand until he was level with her cleavage, Scott could smell her perfume. Something that smelled like lilacs. it probably wasn't lilacs, because she was an alien after all, but it was close enough.

His reverie was broken as the giant teenager started walking towards a her-sized chair in the corner, with a contented sigh she lowered her humoungous and lithe form onto the upholstery and raised Scott back up to her face. "Okay you, we need to have a little talk. Or rather, I need to tell you how things are, and you need to listen." Her tone was light and playful, but there was definitely an undertone of command there. She was in charge and she wasn't going to let Scott forget it.

"wha... what do you mean?" He replied nervously, his body began to shake uncontrollably. What was she going to do with him?

"Hey, easy there tiny, I'm not going to hurt you, relax." She brought her empty hand up behind Scott and began to lightly stroke his back with her fingers in a calming way. Surprisingly, it worked. Scott begin to feel calmer almost immediately.

"There. That's better." She smiles warmly, but didn't stop caressing his back. "Now, here's the deal little guy. Obviously you've realized that I'm not from earth. I'm from another planet, one that's very far from here, and I've taken you aboard my ship."

"I... had grasped that, yes." Scott said warily.

Mia smiled and ruffled the hair on his head gently, chuckling at the tiny teen. "Well good, that means you haven't gone into shock." Her smile faded slightly and she bit her lip. Was she nervous? "What you might not have realized is, I don't have any intention of returning you home."

Scott's head snapped around to face his captor "WHAT?! But... I have a home! I have a life I need to get back to!" He suddenly felt calustrophobic, even in the massive space of her ship. He began to struggle mindlessly like an animal to escape her grip.

"Whoa! Easy there Scott, I don't want to drop you!" She gave him a gentle but firm squeeze, which snapped him out of his atavistic response. "Look." She said with a sigh, "I understand how you feel, but... well... The fact of the matter is, I bought you."

"Bought me? but..." Scott was confused, to say the least.

"Alright, let me back up and give you a little history. Centuries ago, when my ancestors already controlled an interstellar empire and yours had just figured out fire.... an exploratory force from my race discovered that little blue ball of yours."

Scott's eyes widened and his mouth fell open, but Mia continued with her tale.

"You primative little hut dwellers worshipped them as gods. A tradition we might have to revive hmm?" She smiled fondly and fluffed his hair again. "Anyway, after your people began to develop culturally, we were content to let you govern yourselves, but we kept a close eye on you. I mean, if for no other reason than that the extraordinary physical similarities between our races merited study. However, we still maintain control over your world as far as the rest of the galaxy is concerned. Whether anybody on your world knows it or not, Earth has been part of our Empire for as long as your civilization has existed."

To say that Scott was shocked was beyond an understatement. He felt llike everything in the universe had been inverted. "I... I..." he muttered "You said I'd been bought?"


Mia smiled, gently, reassuringly. "Yes. We do own your planet, after all... and everything on it. Including you. Your people... well, you make good pets. I decided I wanted one so... I paid the fees, and I chose you."

her fingers returned and resumed caressing Scott, or rather... petting him, he realized with a shock. She'd actually been petting him. Like an animal. he began to breath hard, not wanting to believe that any of this was actually happening.

"Now, Scott." Mia kept her voice soft and soothing "You have to understand. There isn't a choice here. We've already left your solar system, and even if you escaped from me, there's no possible way you could pilot this ship to get back. But, I promise, I'm not going to harm you, I will take care of you, and if you let it... I think you'll find that being my little toy isn't so bad." She smiled devilishly and before he could protest he found himself wedged up to his shoulders in her cleaveage.

Her skin was soft and warm, he could feel the steady drumbeat pulse of her heartbeat, and hear her deep inhalations in her lungs, which sounded like the ocean breeze on the beach. And the lilac smell surrounded him again.

Scott thought about it carefully. What would he gain by fighting? She was right, there was no way he'd be able to fly the ship- even if he got away from her. Not only did he have no idea how to work the controls... The thing was twice the size of his school! And anyway, what did he really have to look forward to back at home? School, going to college to study some stupid subject (and get buried in student loans and debt) and then working for the next forty years, followed by a retirement where he sat around feeling his body decay around him... and then death. But... With Mia he had the opportunity to visit an alien world, maybe more than one! And... well, she was beautiful, and she was being really nice to him (despite the fact she now "owned" him, anyway...)

With a determined nod, Scott made up his mind.

She had long black hair that had been streaked with blue, green and purple stripes. Her lips, which were pulled into a huge grin, were a dark purple. Her eyes, wide and bright with excitement were almond shaped and a startling cobalt blue. At first Scott suspected cosmetics were responsible for these colorations, until he remembered he was dealing with an alien race, so he really couldn't assume anything like that.


"Well, looks like he's awake. No wonder, I suppose." Scott glanced up to see Mia beaming down at him. "Scott, this is my best friend Zara." Zara reached out to him with her index finger, the tip of which was the size of his head, and with a fingernail painted black. This much he could tell was makeup, because it was slightly chipped. Scott reached out and grasped the fingertip in his hand.

"Hello Zara, my name is Scott, I'm... uh, Mia's pet."

These words caused Zara to break out in another fit of giggles. "Oh, he's so well trained."

Mia chuckled, quaking her bosom slightly. "Actually, I didn't have to train him at all. He's just really obedient." She leaned in conspiratorily and stage-whispered into her friends ear, although Scott could tell she intended him to hear it. "I think he just likes my boobs."

"Deliah, this is Scott." Mia said "Scott, this Deliah, my little doll." Deliah stepped right up to him, reached out with a tiny smirk on her face, and grabbed his crotch. A bolt of shock ran through Scott's body at her touch.

Deliah turned towards Mia, her hand still on Scott's crotch. "he is the wild one, Mistress?"

"Yes, he is. However, you might want to let him go. He's not quite used to everything yet. Besides..." Her smile turned mischevious. "I get him first."

"Of course mistress." She released his jewels and backed away.

"Don't worry about her Scott, she was born here. She doesn't understand the boundary issues you earth boys have." She lowered her hand and gathered the two of them into it, and raised them to her face. "Come on the you two."
1443222.title: That Mia has decided to show him to her best fr...

14432221.content:
Mia gathered her pets and deposited Scott into his place in her cleaveage and raised Deliah up onto her shoulder. "Thanks for petsitting while I was gone Zara.

"Oh no problem. Bring them by again soon. Sapphire gets lonely." The two giantesses embraced and this time Scott was conscious enough to appreciate the experience, and the fact that while Zara's assets weren't quite as impressive as Mia's, they were nothing to sneeze at either.

"Call me later okay?" The perky giantess turned her startling blue eyes on Scott. "You be good for her okay little Scott? And maybe after your "New Toy" status has worn off, Mia will let you come play with me for awhile hmm?" She flashed him a wicked grin.

Mia rolled her eyes. "Anyway we'll see you later." With that she zipped herself up again, plunging Scott into darkness and began to walk back to her own home. It wasn't long before the zipper was once again opened and Scott was lifted from his perch and placed next to Deliah on what looked like a dresser. On top of this dresser was what looked like a giant terrarium, only instead of plastic plants and rocks, it was carpeted and had a couple of fluffy looking mats. He also realized that the enclosure had been split in half by a divider.

"Welcome to your new home Scotty!" Mia gushed as she grasped Deliah around the waist and lifted set her inside one half of the enclosure. The smaller girl stretched herself luxuriously and then flopped down onto the mat on her side of the tank for a nap.

"I'm going to be living in there?"

"Well, only when you're sleeping or I'm not around, otherwise you'll pretty much have the run of the place as long as you behave."

"oh."

"However, it's not bed time for you yet!" She reached out and wrapped her soft fingers around him, lifting him off her dresser and carrying him over to her bed. "I haven't had a chance to really play with my new toy!" She sat down on her bed and leaned back against her pillows, idly stroking Scott's hair as she smiled down at him. "You have just been amazing today Scott. Why if I didn't know any better, I'd have sworn you'd been bred on this planet and fully obedience trained." Her smile turned wistful. "In a way it's too bad. Sometimes it can be fun showing a wild born human who's boss."

Scott blinked, then got a wicked smile on his face that Mia didn't notice. Without warning he began to violently struggle in her grip. "You can't do this to me! Let me go you GIANT!"

For a second a hurt look flashed across Mia's face. "Scott what are you...?" But then she caught on and it was replaced by a mischeivious grin. She tightened her grip on Scott just enough to prevent him from moving. "You seem to be forgetting who's in charge around here little one. I think I need to teach you a lesson!" Her grip tightened just a little bit.

"I don't think so!" Scott yelled before leaning forward and biting Mia's knuckle as hard as he could. "Ouch!" The giantess teen yelled, dropping Scott onto the bed between her legs. The bite hadn't really hurt, in fact it had been barely felt, but she had her role to play too.

For a second Scott lay dazed from the fall, but then he was up and running down the length of her bed. "Oh no you don't!" Mia reached out and seized Scott's ankle and quickly raised him, dangling upside down, to her face.

"Bite me will you? Well two can play at that game." Without further warning Scott found himself dangling over her open mouth, and then dropped onto her soft wet tongue with a splat. Her jaws snapped shut behind him, sealing him in moist warm darkness.

At first Scott was going to continue with his defiant farce, until her deft tongue began to undulate between his legs and he found his cries for release cut off by a groan of pleasure. He laid along the length of her tongue, which was only slightly longer than his body and enjoyed the way her tastebuds felt against his skin. Without thinking he found himself embracing her tongue and grinding his hips into it like a lover, his own tongue darting out to taste her saliva, her moans of pleasure vibrating down his spine.

finally after several minutes, he spasmed violently and then fell limp in her mouth. With a giggle Mia pushed him through her pursed lips and into the palm of her hand. "See? I told you it can be fun when tiny huans struggle" Scott was too exhausted to reply.

"Aww did I wear my little toy out? That's okay. It's your first night, you'll get used to it. In the meantime, I think you need to lay down for awhile. With a gentle smile, she pressed him into her soft lips, then lowered him down onto the mat on his side of the terrarium, where he fell into a deep and gratified sleep.
14432221.title: Time to go home

144322211.content:
The next morning Scott was awoken from his sleep when Mia tried to gently gather him into her palm.

"uh? wassgonon?" He muttered groggily.

"oops. Sorry cutie. I was trying to pick you up without waking you."

"What are you doing Mia?" Scott wondered, looking up at his owner's smiling face as she lifted him through the top of the enclosure he'd been sleeping in.

"Well... you and I need to take a little trip." Mia said evasively, ruffling Scott's hair with the tip of her finger, and carrying him out of the bedroom and through the attached hallway.

"Is Deliah coming?" Scott wonders, still half asleep.

"No." Mia picked something up off a table as she sailed past it, and then pushed open another door. "She doesn't need to go with us, so she'll just hang out here. We'll only be gone a few hours." She raised her other hand up and Scott could finally see what she'd picked up. It looked like... well, to Scott it looked like somebody had taken a backyard shed and put a giant handle on it, but he was getting better at translating things into the perspective of his new giant home and he realized what it was.

"Aw c'mon Mia, you know I'm not going to go anywhere, I don't really need a carrying crate do I?" She started and looked down at him surprised.

"How did you...? Nevermind... Scott it's not that I don't trust you, but it's the law. Whenever you leave the house, you gotta be in a carrier. technically we should have used it yesterday too, but..." She popped open the gate and with a resigned sigh he climbed inside.

She opened the door and stepped outside and Scott got his first good look at an alien planet. He was somewhat relieved to see that it wasn't *too* alien. The sky was blue, although a shade darker than the sky of Earth, there were trees, although the leaves were a bit more teal than "forest" green. He even saw a squirrel... a golden furred squirrel, with twin almost prehensile tails... but it was close. Scott wondered at the lack of cars, until he glanced up at the sky and realized all the traffic was well above the tree line.

"Where are we going Mia?" Scott called up as she turned and began walking down the sidewalk.

"Oh we're just going... for a walk. It's a nice day out. And I could use the excercise."

Scott could tell she was being evasive, but decided he wasn't going to get any answers out of her, so he gave up. He sat down at the gate of his carrier and watched the world outside go by. After about a ten minute walk, Scott noticed they had entered a downtown area full of buildings, Mia turned and walked towards the entrance of one of these. There was a sign above the door, but Scott discovered he couldn't read the language.
144322211.title: the next day

choices: One of the other Animals gets loose
1443222112.content:
Mia pushed open the door and entered what looked like a office with a receptionist sitting behind a desk. She was a woman who looked to be in her early thirties, with long dark hair and wire framed glasses. Mia stepped up to the desk.

"hello Mia, here to see Dr. Kezwic?"

"Yes. I'm here for a check up for my little pet here." Mia raised the carrier so the receptionist could see inside. Scott found himself looking into her brilliant green eyes and smiling face.

"oh. He's a cute one." The receptionist said with a laugh. She checked her computer screen. "If you'll just have a seat over there, the doctor will be right with you hon."

Mia thanked her and went to have a seat in the waiting area, placing the carrier on her lap. there were about half a dozen other people in the waiting room, each with a cage or an animal nearby. With a sick feeling in his stomach, Scott realized where they were.

"Mia! You brought me to a VET??"

"Well yeah. You need to have a checkup within two days of arriving planetside. Where else am I supposed to get that done?"

"Gee, I dunno. A hospital?"

"Don't be silly Scotty, hospitals aren't trained to handle humans. You're too small. Now just relax, it's not going to be a big deal." Setting his carrier down on the floor by her feet, She reached over and picked up a magazine off the table in the center of the room and began to read.

With a sigh, Scott turned back to the grate and found himself face to face with a monster!

"AH! Mia help!"

"Relax Scotty, it's just a keiflar. You're safe in that carrier and anyway, they're herbivores" The creature looked like a black and orange striped german shepard with purple eyes and slit pupils like a cat's. It sniffed at him curiously, then gave a bored yawn (which let Scott see its flat herbivore teeth, and a throat that was more than big enough to swallow him whole, whatever Mia said.) and then laid down to sleep. The hand of the middle aged man sitting next to Mia reached down to scratch the beast behind the ear.

minutes passed by and Scott watched the various creatures and their owners leave and be replaced. Seemed like this particular vet's office did pretty good business. His mind began to wander, suddenly there was a drumbeat tap on the top of his carrier, he looked out and realized that Mia had rested her sandaled foot on the top of his carrier and was tapping idly.
1443222112.title: Every Pet's Worst Nightmare!

14432221122.content:
Finally: "Mia? The doctor is ready for you now."

Scott fell on his back as the carrier was lifted. They walked into a sterile examinatio room. Mia set the carrier down on the steel table and opened the carrier. Scott climbed out, happy to be free of it, but apprehensive over what was to happen next.

The door on the opposite end of the room opened and yet another giant walked into Scott's life.

She was tall, even for a giant. She was probably three inches taller than Mia was and that was without the additional two inches afforded her by the heels on her shoes. Her hair was long and blonde, her eyes an ice blue and surrounded by black framed glasses. She was dressed in black pants, a powder blue sweater and a white lab coat; none of which did absolutely anything to hide the figure underneath them. Her heels clacked on the tile floor as she crossed over to the examination table, carrying a pen and a data tablet in hand.

"Good morning Mia, how are we doing today?" She asked with a brisk smile on her face.

"Fine, thank you Dr. Kezwic." Mia responded.

The doctor had reached the exam table and loomed over Scott, he found himself looking straight up at her, and couldn't see her face beyond her breasts, which were hanging above him, as if threatening to fall on him at any moment.

She set the tablet down on the table and leaned over to read it, "Now then, it says you're here for the standard human importation examination, correct?"

"Yes." The doctor nodded and made a notation.

"Excellent. Let's just get some information down then. What's the little guy's name?"

"My name's Scott" Scott had backed up a little so he could see the doctor's face, but she either didn't hear him, or was choosing to ignore him.

"His name is Scott, Doctor." The doctor blinked and filled in another blank with a disapproving frown on her face.

"Okay then. When did you make planetfall with him?" Mia spouted off a string of numbers that didn't make any sense to Scott, but they evidently meant something to Dr. Kezwic, because she noted them down on her form with a nod.

"Excellent. And I assume he's been properly quarantined from other humans since then?"

Mia flushed red. "Y-Yes, of course" She stammered, looking away guiltily. The doctor took note of that look, and the disaproving frown was back. She surveyed Mia over the rims of her glasses. "Mia. You know better than that!"

Mia's head hung and she shifted from side to side looking like a student caught cheating on a test. "I know! I'm sorry."

The Doctor sighed and shook her head. "I'll overlook it this time, but you keep an eye on the humans he's had contact with and bring them to me the moment any of them show signs of sickness. No telling what germs he might be carrying."

"Hey!" Scott grumbled, offended. But, again, the Doctor continued to ignore him.

"Okay, first thing's first, Would you go get me the gel please?" Mia nodded and went to grab something out of a nearby cabinet. Meanwhile the doctor decided to finally turn her attention on Scott. He turned to find her looking down on him with a patient smile as she donned a pair of blue skintight latex gloves. She placed her hand down on the table, palm up and began to make chirping and clicking noises at him while twitching her fingers. "C'mere boy, c'mon!"

Scott got the hint and climbed obediently into her hand. He was rewarded with a bright smile. "That's a good boy. Aren't you a sweet little thing?" She tussled his hair with the pinky of her other hand, and carried him over to a basin in the corner that had been filled with warm water. She gently lowered him into the water, which came up to about waist height on him.

"Here's the gel, doctor"

"Thank you Mia." The doctor took the tube Mia offered her and squeezed a small dollop of the green gel inside onto the tip of her finger. While supporting Scott in the water with the other hand, she began to gently massage the gel into every inch of his body.

When the gel made contact with water, it sent a pleasant tingling sensation through his body, like he was sitting in a tub of Alka-seltzer. Her giant finger scrubbed his body thoroughly. It was hard to tell since his body was alive with sensation, but he was pretty sure he orgasmed onto her finger at least once, but if either of the giant women noticed anything they didn't mention it.

In fact they were barely paying attention to him as it was, he realized. They were having a conversation far above his head.

"By the way Mia, I was wondering if you'd be able to take an afternoon shift later this week. Orto needs to go out of town for a family thing."

"Yeah I can probably do that. I owe him one anyway." Mia responded, scratching the back of her head in thought.

"Excellent. Looks like we're all set here." The doctor rinsed her fingers off in the water, then gently scooped and poured some over Scott's body to rinse the gel's residue off of him as well.
14432221122.title: "The Doctor will see you now!"

144322211222.content:
Scott was carried back over to the examination table and set atop it's steel surface. Meanwhile, the doctor turned her attention to the data tablet."Okay, Anti-parasite scrub- Done!" She made a mark on the screen, and Scott realized that he'd just been flea-dipped.

The Doctor reached over to a magnifying lens on a retractable arm bolted to the table and settled the lens over his body. Looking up through the lens he saw the somewhat disturbing sight of her already huge eye becoming enormous and distorted.

Her hands gathered Scott up and began to poke and prod his body, bending his limbs squeezing his torso. He figured she was being as gentle as she could be but, it still wasn't terribly comfortable, especially under her artificially enhanced gaze. Looking up into a pupil that was half the size of his body was... disturbing. Every so often one hand would leave to make a notation on her tablet.

"What we've got here is a male, approximately two to three years old. Good musculature... no obvious deformities... reflexive responses seem good... reproductive system appears to be in working order." Scott saw her smirk magnified x10 through the lens.

Wait... did she say "two to three years old?"

The prodding ceased and Scott was replaced onto the tabletop. "Well Mia," The doctor said, walking over to a cabinet on the wall near the door. "It looks like you've got a good one. I don't forsee any medical problems for a few years provided he gets regular exercise." she took something out of the cabinet, some kind of tool that Scott didn't really have a name for. "But of course, you already know all about that."

"well, I like to think I know a thing or two about Humans" Mia responded, with a smirk of her own, stroking Scott's backside fondly.

"Well, we just have to take care of his chip and vaccination and you can be on your way." The doctor returned to the table carrying the too Scott had seen earlier, but even after seeing it up close, he had no frame of reference to describe it.

"wait... vaccina- you mean shots?!"

"You'll be fine Scott. Just a little pinch." Mia smiled reassuringly as she deftly rolled Scott onto his stomach and kept him pinned that way with the thumb and forefinger of each hand. He felt something cold and metallic settle over his shoulders, neck and upper arms. it felt like he was being put into some kind of stockade. He didn't have long to dwell on this because soon he heard a whoosh sound, like an airgun being fired. This was followed by a sharp simultaneous pain between his shoulder blades and in each upper arm. After a second the device was lifted off him and he was allowed to stand again.

"And that's that." The doctor said brusquely. She handed Mia the data tablet and pen she'd been using. "If you'll just sign and date here, initial here and put a thumbprint here, he'll be all registered. The tracking chip should be online in a few hours."

Mia handed the tablet back, then gathered Scott up and deposited him in the carrier once again. "Thank you doctor."

"Of course have a good day and we'll see you later." Dr. Kezwic Smiled as Mia left the examination room. She walked over to the receptionists desk to sign a few more forms and exchange pleasentries with the giantess who was sitting there now, and then headed out the door.

Once they were clear of the Vet's office, Scott crawled over to the gate of the carrier. "Mia?"

"Yes hon?"

"Do you work there?"

Mia smiled proudly. "Yes, I'm a certified vetrinary assistant. Dr. Kezwic is my primary supervisor.

"So why didn't you just do the examination yourself?"

"because I'm not qualified. Oh, I know how to do all the things that she did, but you know how it is, if you don't have the Paper, it doesn't legally count."

"Right. Hey, What did she mean when she said I was around two years old?" Mia stopped walking and raised the carrier so she could look into it.

"Well, that's how old you are, silly." She looked confused for a moment, until sudden understanding shown in her eyes. "Oh wait, I understand now... That's how old you are here. One year here is about... hmm... let me see.." Her face screwed up as she did the math in her head. "About six and a half years on your planet. Give or take a bit."

"Oh. So that means you're like three then, right?"

Mia giggled. "No silly. I'm fifteen." She lowered the carrier again, denying Scott a chance to comment on this further, and forcing him to contemplate the implications alone.

Mia resumed walking, she decided it was too nice a day to head straight home, and she wanted to give Scott a chance to see some more of his new home. Coming to a cross roads she decides to

145332222332.content: I'm surprised that no one has yet suggested a line based solely on Xena: Warrior Princess. How about it?
145332222332.title: Xena Maybe

1453322223321.content: So, will a Xena character grow or shrink?
1453322223321.title: Which Way?

1453322223321111.content: Wild she be good or evil?
1453322223321111.title: Final Intro Choice

14533222233211112.content:
The day thus far has, for a change, been largely uneventful for Xena and Gabrielle. They have been riding all morning, and through some of the afternoon, through territory that was new to them. They have been scouting the land, largely on a tip that there were people in distress. The source was mysterious, anonymous, and somewhat shady, but it sounded credible enough. They didn't realize that they were riding into a trap.
This tip was a trick by Ares. At this point, he was willing to do almost anything to make Xena his queen. This was going to be his boldest trick yet. He made sure that they were to ride by a certain pond that he has "blessed", which, in theory, would make her power hungry. He would watch it all play out while hidden behind a nearby bush.
It would be no time before Ares heard the sound of hooves on the ground and conversation between the princess and the bard. He waited patiently until the horses got close enough, at which point he let out an indecipherable sound that spooked both horses. While Gabrielle was able to keep her grip, Xena wasn't able to hold on tightly, falling into the pond. Gabrielle dismounted when she saw her go down, but Xena quickly surfaced.
Everything seemed alright until Xena started to feel something changing about her. While she was able to stand on the bottom initially, she noticed that she was starting to see it get farther away. The same was starting to apply to Gabrielle and the horses. It then occurred to her that she was growing.
How much would she grow?
14533222233211112.title: The Pool of Ares

choices: Xena heads to the nearest town
Gabrielle decides to grow with her
145332222332111123.content:
Xena was initially stunned when she noticed that she started growing. She kept staring at her bard, as though in a trance. She eventually got just enough wits about her to step out of the water, startling the horses. It was apparently the horses that seemed to snap her back into reality, causing her to notice that her growth had finally stopped. Studying her surroundings, she judged her height to be about 50 feet tall.
Gabrielle, for her part, was stunned even more by the situation. She marveled that Xena had grown seemingly out of nowhere. She was surprised that her outfit and weapons grew with her. In the moment, she was simultaneously scared and aroused, tipping to the former once she saw Xena's smirk on her face.
Xena, once she had taken in her surroundings, puts her hands on her hips and starts laughing maniacally. With her size, her thinking had changed drastically. She was reverting back to her evil ways, and she was loving it.
"Gabrielle, you're missing a great experience," Xena boomed down. "Now, not even the tallest giants can stop me. Not even the gods can stop me! I can rule the whole world!"
145332222332111123.title: 50 Feet of Xena

choices: She just stomps her way in
1453322223321111232.content:
Xena all but ignores Gabrielle when she decides what she wants to do. She practically steps over her and the horses as she starts walking the way they had just come, knowing that a village wasn't too far away.
"Xena! Stop!" Gabrielle shouts as she tries to follow and catch up with her. She barely got five steps before a cage made of logs surrounded her and the horses seemingly out of nowhere.
At this point, with Xena a suitable distance away, Ares shows up in front of the bard with a wicked smile.
"Oh, Gabrielle," Ares says. "How long did you think that she would suppress her true nature?"
"You!" Gabrielle shouts angrily. "You're going to pay for this!"
"I hope so," Ares responds with an entirely different meaning.
"Just wait until I get out of here!"
"I would rather not," Ares says as he turns around and disappears, laughing.
Some time later, a mischieviously giddy Xena is getting close to the village. Upon seeing it in the distance, she tries to think of a way to announce her presence.
1453322223321111232.title: Backtrack and Bewilder

14533222233211112321.content:
After some thinking, Xena decides to keep it simple at the moment. With an evil smirk and her hands on her hips, she walks up to the village.
It didn't take long for the villagers to notice the titanic warrior approaching them. Most of them come out on the street, nervously awaiting her next move. While this was not their first brush with a giant, they never knew what to expect.
Xena looks down at the villagers and chuckles lightly as she raises her foot and slams it on a nearby house, crushing it instantly. This sets off the people, who scatter in all directions in a blind panic.
"This is going to be so much fun," she says with a degree of evil in her voice. She looks around and slams a foot down on a fleeing crowd, crushing them to a pulp. She then sees people run into a big shelter, so she rips off the roof and grabs some of them, crushing them in her hands. She then kicks down the rest of the building, flattening everyone inside.
As she makes short order of the village, Ares watches her from a hiding spot, smiling as he was watching his plan start to come to fruition.
14533222233211112321.title: Her Presence

145332222332111123211.content:
While Xena already decimated much of the population of the village, she still wasn't satisfied. She feels the need to finish off the entire thing in order to assert her dominance.
She looks around and sees that some people are trying to hide in their own homes. Needless to say, she feels that it is her duty to conquer the area. She stands to her full height again and lifts her foot, slamming it down on an occupied house, killing all inside. She then slowly steps on the one next door.
"You can run, but you can't hide," she taunts as she keeps stepping on houses, sometimes feeling the occupants flatten under her shoes. She also flattens the various businesses in the area, even those that were empty. She was determined to leave everything around in ruins.
It took a little longer than she thought, but she eventually succeeded in leveling the whole village. Once she did, she looks at her handiwork and laughs maniacally with her hands on her hips.
"I almost forgot how good it felt to be the conqueror," Xena says. "I love having this edge. If only Ares could see me now."
145332222332111123211.title: Ghost Town

1453322223321111232111.content:
"You know what?" Xena rhetorically asks herself. "I think I'll do just that. I'm going to Olympus. Everyone better watch out for Xena!" Hearing this remark, Ares smirks and decides to meet her there and disappears.
Xena then keeps following the road. She knows how long it will take to get to Olympus, and she didn't want to waste any time with anything other than destruction and conquest.
At least, that was the thought until she found that the prospect of total conquest aroused her now. Unable and unwilling to control herself, she walks into the woods. She lifts the bottom of her outfit and starts rubbing herself uncontrollably.
"Oh, yes," she said in the heat of the moment. "Yes! I'm now unstoppable! I defy anyone to try!" It was with that thought that she quickly comes to orgasm, letting her juices flow all over with a loud moan, knowing that it would be heard for a long distance.
When she comes down from her high, she smiles at all of the possibilities ahead of her. "Yes, I'm really going to enjoy this."
With a smirk, Xena withdraws her hand and looks around. In the distance, she sees...
1453322223321111232111.title: Down the Road

14533222233211112321114.content:
As she was looking through the trees, which were not much bigger than she, Xena saw a sight that made her lick her lips in anticipation. She saw what appears to be a major city placed next to a natural harbor, separated from the sea by a channel that seems to only fit one ship at a time. The people were using the harbor as a port, and it seems to be very bustling at this point.
"Olympus can wait," she says to herself as quietly as she can. "I can bring this kingdom to its knees and rule over it with an iron fist. Then everyone can worship me instead."
After checking to see if her weapons grew with her, which they did, she jumps out of the tree, doing her backflips and war cry before landing in the city, crushing a building on the way down. She grabs her chakram and throws it at the cliffs lining the channel, hitting both of them squarely before it came back to her. She smiles evily as she watches the cliffs collapse, blocking the channel and sinking a ship trying to get out.
With her hands on her hips, she looks at the fleeing crowds and laughs. She then lifts her boot and slams it down on another building. She then walks into the street and starts going after the crowds, stepping on anyone not fast enough to get out of the way. She goes through crowds and building on her way to the port.
While she knows that the ships now have no way out, she still goes to the harbor. She makes sure to plow through any building containing any sort of supplies at all so no one in the kingdom can get the cargo. Once the buildings are destroyed, she pulls out her oversized sword, slashing it through every ship docked at the port so they can sink. She even wades into the water and slashes any ship in the harbor.
Once every ship was scuttled, she sheathes her sword and get back on shore. Looking at her handiwork makes her frisky beyond words.
14533222233211112321114.title: Port of Princess

145332222332111123211142.content:
Xena looks back at the city, a big chunk of which is now in ruins. She was never content with leaving anything standing or leaving any survivors, and her newfound size and power only amplified this.
"Oh, you all have no clue what you're in for," she says as she lifts her boot and slams it on another building. "This never gets old. Too bad you all will never know."
She then sees a group of people on the outskirts, trying to escape. Reaching into the harbor, she pulls out half of one ship and throws it at the crowd. She smiles as she watches it land directly on them, crushing them.
Going back to the task at hand, she starts plowing through the various buildings, taking care not to leave anything standing. Even when she sees a temple in the city, which is waist high to her, she can't resist shoving it down, watching it topple to the ground, landing on both worshipers and fleeing crowds.
It takes her until dusk, but she finally levels the entire city. She takes care to leave no building standing, no ship sailing, no survivor standing. In this instant, she feels something primal come over her. Unable to hold back, she pounds her chest and yells in victory.
145332222332111123211142.title: No Quarter Taken

1453322223321111232111421.content:
As she watches the sun setting, she knows that she should find a place to sleep, even if such things for a woman of her size was rare. However, the events of the day have made her restless. The return of her bloodlust combined with her newfound power has made her anxious to conquer as much as she can.
It was with this in mind that she decides to make a move on the central government. She figures that it is the perfect time to move, given that the darkness and the forest in between would provide a great cover and the perfect element of surprise.
With her fun here done, she immediately starts to move. Seeing a well-worn road out of the city, she decides to follow it directly.
Along the way, she was starting to fantasize about becoming the queen of this kingdom. She could subject the rulers to her every whim. She could lead the army into battle, her size giving them the advantage. She could literally crush any dissent. She could have monuments made exclusively for and to her.
As she was thinking of all of this, she sees someone wandering around the woods that night. She decides to take a closer look and sees...
1453322223321111232111421.title: The Cover of Night

14533222233211112321114211.content:
Xena looks behind her and smiles. She knows who is coming even before she can get a good look. She would recognize the sound of the hooves anywhere. She looks directly at the coming rider with her hands on her hips and a smile on her lips.
"Well, if it isn't my bard," Xena taunts. "I'm surprised that it took you so long to catch up with me."
"I was imprisoned," Gabrielle says as she stops and dismounts. "I was freed by a survivor from your first town."
"I'm not surprised," Xena says. "How were you imprisoned?"
"Ares imprisoned me," Gabrielle says. "Ares is the one behind this."
"Well, he finally did something right," Xena says.
"He has been wishing for you to do this," Gabrielle says. "He thinks he can win you like this. He thinks that being an unstoppable war machine will be his opening with you."
Xena chuckles lightly as she shakes her head. "I bet he can't wait for me to get to Olympus."
"Xena! This isn't you! This isn't the woman I know! The woman I know wants to atone for her past, not add on to it!"
Xena looks at her and thinks about it.
14533222233211112321114211.title: Catching Up

choices: She gets a bite to eat
145332222332111123211142111.content:
Xena looks down at Gabrielle and smiles, bending over and grabbing her. Even though Gabrielle is squirming in her hand, Xena brings her up to her face.
"Now, you listen to me," Xena says. "I'll take care of Ares and the rest of the Olympians in due course. For now, I've never been so powerful in my life, not even in my younger days. I'm the most powerful person on the planet, and I'm going to use it."
"But what about the innocents you have killed like this?" Gabrielle asks.
"There's no such thing," Xena sneers as she tucks Gabrielle in her cleavage and faces her forward. "Enjoy the show. I know you're enjoying the spot."
With a now scared bard in her cleavage, Xena turns in the direction of the center of government again and starts marching that direction.
"This is going to be fun," she says as she walks in the dark through the woods.
145332222332111123211142111.title: Taking a Ride

1453322223321111232111421111.content:
Xena walks through most of the night, taking full advantage of the cover of the forest. While there was little between the port and the capital, she did have some fun by crushing a few random travelers en route despite Gabrielle's pleas to Xena and her warnings to the victims.
As the dawn starts to crack over the horizon, both of them start to see the outline of a major city. This makes Gabrielle very nervous, but it makes Xena quite giddy.
"Take a look, Gabrielle," Xena says as quietly as she can. "This is about to be ours. This is only going to be the beginning."
"Xena, I ask you one more time to reconsider," Gabrielle says. "You can do so much good with your power."
"But where's the fun in good?" Xena asks. "Especially when you can have some power when I move on?"
This gets the attention of the bard. "Say what?"
"Well," Xena says. "I plan on conquering every piece of land I can find and consolidating it under my rule. However, I can give you a little piece of kingdom to be a Prime Minister. You can get some degree of autonomy as long as you answer to me."
Gabrielle starts to mull it over.
1453322223321111232111421111.title: Offer At Dawn

14533222233211112321114211111.content:
As Xena waits for Gabrielle's answer, she looks upon the city. Seeing everything, she determines that it's light enough for her to see what she is doing, but just dark enough for the people not to see her coming. It was at this point that she pulls her bard out of her cleavage and sets her on the ground.
"Wait here," Xena says to her. "I have some business to do."
Gabrielle can't help but look up in shock as Xena stands to her full height and jumps into the air. She does her usual cry and summersault before landing on her feet in the center of the city.
Not wanting to waste any time, Xena lifts her foot and slams it on a building. She then mule kicks over another nearby building. She steps on a few more buildings before she finally notices some people coming out to check the noise.
Xena roars loudly at the people, forcing them to run in all directions. Plowing through other buildings, she has no trouble tracking down much of the population, slamming her feet on many of them.
When she gets to the capital building, most of the survivors raise a white flag, hoping for some mercy and an acceptance of surrender.
14533222233211112321114211111.title: Capital Punishment

Victor Wilhelm Jackson is an unusually strange, well-educated, greedy, and cruel man. Victor speaks perfect English with a heavy German accent, he looks African American with milk chocolate colored skin, and he has a thick black beard with white streaks in it. He is fifty-seven years old, he wears glasses, he is partially bald, and he has an average, yet healthy looking body. He has a doctorate in biology, and he used to teach at Atoms State University. However, his career ended when he got caught selling rare artifacts, artwork, and sometimes-rare animals on the black-market. He spent two years in federal prison for that offense. He is the now the current owner of the Carnival of Evil Circus. His carnival has everything, clowns, freaks of nature apes and other unusual animals as well. There are several tents in his circus when everything is set up. He is not only the owner of the circus, but he also acts as the part-time announcer, and he is the circus magician too.


Victor is presently sitting at his desk in his personal RV trailer that also acts as his office. There are several dozen of these RV’s and trucks in this circus. The circus is presently parked near a large college town. As Victor sits behind his desk, he worries about the bills that are starting to accumulate. They are not a threat to his business yet, but in a few years that could change. Deciding that he needs a break, Victor grabs a nearly empty dark colored book bag, and goes outside for a walk to clear his mind. He sometimes collects things as he goes for his walks and that is why he has the nearly empty book bag with him.


As he walks down a side street, he sees a weird looking light in the starry night sky. Curious, he makes a decision to investigate. Several minutes later, he arrives at the location, but sees nothing unusual, except for an odd looking, silver ray gun resting in the green grass. He picks it up, looks it over, and notices how strange everything looks on it. It looks like something from Star Trek or Star Wars. He also sees two settings, R and S. The gun can translate writing from one language to another.


Believing this is nothing more than some kind of toy, and a waste of his time, he starts to play with it out of frustration. He points the gun at a tree, fires it, and zap, the thirty-foot tree is now less than a foot tall. Stunned, he looks over the gun to notice it is set on S. He places the setting on R, fires it again and it restores the tree to normal size. He plays around with the gun a bit, shrinking and restoring several things, like empty cars, park benches, a street sign, even a few stray dogs, squirrels, birds, and cats, always restoring them afterward. Then an idea crosses his wicked mind, “What would happen if he shrank some people?”


It is 7:05 PM on this late October’s evening. Victor decides to walk back to his circus that is set up about a mile and a half away. Hidden by the night, and the lack of proper street lighting, he sees several tempting human subjects to shrink.

Victor saw a Mercedes driving down the street slowly, almost as if the driver was lost.

"I can help them find where they're going," Victor thought to himself, and aimed the ray gun at the car. The Mercedes appeared to vanish, but quickly caught Victor's attention again as it had stopped dead in it's tracks. A 17 foot long car reduced to a little more than half a foot long.

As Victor walked up to the car, he noticed all four doors open, and four tiny, confused inhabitants step out. He placed a foot on either side of the car, and all four of the tiny men looked up in disbelief.

"Hello tiny ones. You appear lost. Maybe I can help?"

Victor reached down, easily grabbing the two men on the driver's side of the car, his enormous hand covering their tiny bodies. He reached down with his other hand and grabbed the other two, who appeared to be frozen in fear. He opened his right hand, revealing the two tiny men, and opened his left, allowing the other two tiny men's to fall into the right hand with their friends.

"Tiny white men like yourself should be more careful when you're out this late at night, you never know who might run into. Luckily, I was here."

Victor reached into his pocked, and removed his cigarette tin.

"Now, to place you somewhere safe."

He clicked open the tin, and slid the four men into it.

"Let me make a little more room," Victor laughed. He removed one of the three remaining cigarettes, noticing the men were barely half of it's size. "We'll talk more in a bit."

Victor closed the tin and placed it back into his pocked. He made sure the ray gun was secure in his jacket, and lit his cigarette. As it dangled from his lips, smoke slowly rolled out of his nose and over his beard. He walked a little faster than usual, anxious to get back to his trailer at the circus.

Victor removed his carnival gear, leaving him in only his boxers and a tight, white wife-beater. He had put a little gut on in his old age, but was still in better than average shape for a 57 year old man. Victor slowly opened the tin, and the four minuscule men stood up.

"Hello again tiny ones. Welcome to my humble abode." Victor reached down for one of the cigarettes, and the tiny men scurried about the tin.

"Now, now, little ones," Victor said, placing the menthol between his lips, "there is nothing to be afraid of." Victor lit the cigarette, and reached down, plucking one of the men out of the tin. The little man fit easily between Victor's thumb and forefinger, over half of his body covered by the digits. Victor brought the tiny man close to his face.

"Tell me little one," Victor said, the cigarette bobbing up and down as his lips moved, "what is your name?"

"M..M..Mike..." the little man shouted.

"Well, Mike, from now on you will be the liaison between me and you friends. I'm afraid at your tiny size, I won't be able to hear you too well, so I'll lift you up when I need to hear from you."

1552213233331.title: Tiny Cheerleaders and Gymnasts.

choices: A Growing Girl's Got To Eat...
Allergies, What Are You Going to Do?
1552213233332.content:
We’ve got the scientific hunger, similar to the one for the boys with the starring girl being the same age of eight years. Allison, a little bit taller than most girls her age, with short boyishly cut blonde hair and brown eyes. She’s the very definition of tomboy and does her best to try and emulate her big brother whom she adores to the point of questionability. Her tale starts the day after a school field trip to the local science center gone wrong, where a small gas leak had struck the visiting students of her entire class. So far, there haven’t been any side effects but the dawn has only begun to break and breakfast is the most important meal of the day…

Last, and certainly not least, we’ve got the appetite hunger. Simple put, when puberty begins to hit preteen Tiffany, it hits her hard in the stomach. With an appetite unlike any she has ever had before, one that she will try her hardest to ignore though others, particularly her younger siblings, will take notice of and try to rectify whether she likes it or not though Tiffany might give in to her hunger long before any helping/forceful hands become necessary. Being an aspiring cheerleader, Tiffany is quite the looker with red hair and stunning green eyes, and though she tries her best to avoid extra portions, she’s got a small bit of pudgy around her waist though she’s still stick thin everywhere else. But she can hardly be blamed for it really, when her family lives above and owns the local sweetshop.

There’s the “allergic reaction” category where our girl is strictly forbidden from dining on anything that’s remotely considered as junk food. Cookies, candies, ice cream, even the treasured cake is a forbidden treat for six-year-old Lisa, a blue-eyed girl with long brown hair. Under the watchful eyes of her older cousin, who strangely does not share the same allergy as her, at a friend’s birthday party, he becomes lax in his duties and fails to notice her sneaking a slice of cake. Need I also mention that the friend’s birthday cake is first served in the center of a massive food court, before it moves on to a candy-themed, and heavily stocked, amusement park?
1552213233332.title: Open slot one, for future use?

choices: Just your sister grabbing a bowl of cereal.
A disaster, wrappers and empty boxes everywhere and in the center: Allison
Nothing but an empty kitchen and an absent younger sister!
15522132333321.content:
“Allison! You’ve got to stop!”

“I’m sorry bro! Bu-But I’m—”

GROWL!

“I’m just so HUNGRY!”

RING!

The sound of the house phone ringing awoke you from your rather foreboding dream. What kind of dream it was, you couldn’t immediately recall given that the loud ringing of the phone startled you enough to send you falling to the floor. Uttering a few choice words under your breath, you get to your feet and shuffle out of your bedroom and into the hallway. You pick up the phone with a gruff, “Hello?”

“Good morning is this the Fisher residence?”

“Yeah it is and if this is a telemarketer so help me—”

“Oh, forgive me, this is Mrs. Kirsten, I’m Allison’s homeroom teacher at the Academy for Aspiring Young Ladies. I’m calling about the… incident… at the Science Center.”

“The incident…” You say, feeling that familiar rush of brotherly rage coursing through your veins. Sleep addled though you may be, you distinctly recall the reason why your little sister got to out a day early for spring break. “The gas leak you mean? The one that idiot tour guide assured was perfectly harmless and there wouldn’t be anything to worry about?”

“Ah, yes…” said Mrs. Kirsten at least had the good graces to sound embarrassed. “I apologize for the delay but the people at the Science Center were adamant in wanting to know if the parents of the visiting children have reported any… strange symptoms.”

“Strange as in…?” you ask, glancing over your shoulder and looking down the long hallway to your sister’s room. Did she leave her door open?

“Oh, well, a few parents called about their children having an inexplicably large appetite, some seeming quite starved despite eating well over three times their normal portions at dinner, and so on. Of course most of them weren’t really able to hold in that much food for long but it was quite troubling for their parents…”

“I see…” You mutter, “And has anything been done for those kids then?”

“Oh yes, the Science Center has asked that any children reporting such symptoms be brought in for a quick checkup.”

“Huh, well that’s good at least…” You grumbled, still quite sore that anything had happened at all at a supposedly “safe” school field trip before spring vacation.

“So I gather that Allison is alright? No strange symptoms of any kind?”

You shake your head, trying to clear the last of the cobwebs free, but that damned feeling of dread refuses to budge from the pit of your stomach… But like heck you’d trust your little sister with those crazies at the Science Center. “No, everything’s fine.”

“Oh, thank goodness,” Mrs. Kirsten said with a relieved sigh, “But do feel free to call the school number if you should notice anything. I’m afraid that though the children have the week off for springtime vacation we’re busy as bees over here.”

It hits you then, like a punch in the gut, the dream… But was it just that, a dream?

“Yeah, I’ll do that. Thank you.” You quickly hang up the phone and race for the stairs and take them two at a time, leaping over the final four and sliding into the kitchen where you see—
15522132333321.title: Science! Delicious, Magical Science!

choices: A few minutes later, with Allison at home…
An hour later, with you at work…
155221323333211.content:
Allison looked up and smiled delightfully, “Hey big bro!”

You smile and shake your head ruefully at your sister. Once again, she dressed in clothes that she had “mistakenly” thought to be her own. Mistaken insomuch that her attire consisted of a t-shirt several sizes too big for her and sporting his high schools’ name across the chest and a pair of shorts that went well below her knees. Though your mother might believe otherwise, there was no way that Allison wasn’t a tomboy with her insistent need to pilfer his clothes and claim them as her own rather than wear anything that she deemed as being “girly”.

“Good morning, Alley. Making yourself breakfast I see.”

Indeed she was though it was the simplest breakfast known to mankind. A bowl and the gallon of milk, freshly bought and still shut tight, sat on the small dining room table adjacent to the kitchen. Allison was standing in the kitchen proper, one bare feet sticking out for balance as she stood on her tiptoes upon the linoleum floor as she struggled to lean up and reach a box of her favorite cereal.

“Here you go, short stuff,” you chuckle, reaching over and grabbing the cereal for her as well as one of your own box. Frankly, you didn’t have the stomach for any of that artificial crap unlike your kid sister and other children her age.

Her cheeks puff out and she sticks her tongue out at you with a loud proclamation, “I’m not short! I’m the tallest girl in my class!”

“Tall for an eight year old maybe but—” Your eyes catch the clock and the time, “Oh Jesus, I’m gonna be late for work!”

You rush out of the kitchen and start to get ready even as Allison shouts after you, “But I thought you had taken the week off to spend with me while mom and dad are gone?!”

“I did, Allie!” You shout back, tossing clothes aside to find your uniform. “But I didn’t expect you to get out a day early!”

“Does that mean I have to go with you to work?!”

You wince at that idea. Not that you didn’t trust your kid sister at your workplace but… well, there was a reason why there was a phrase involving kids and candy stores… Not that you thought your sister would steal but you didn’t trust your co-workers not to give her more than a fair share of “samples” again. Once was bad enough.

“Sorry kiddo but no! Look’s like you’re just going to have the house all to yourself for the day!”

“Is that alright?” You hear her shout around a mouthful of cereal. “Mom and dad won’t get mad?”

Not if they don’t find out… You think to yourself as you race back to the dining room. Allison is sitting at the table, eating through a bowl of cereal like no tomorrow. That trepid feeling returns but you ignore it and ruffle her blonde hair. “I’ll only be at work until early this afternoon at the latest, alright? Lock the door behind me and don’t open it for anyone, alright? If something happens you call me and I’ll be back with bells on.”

“Can I eat in front of the TV?”

You chuckle. That’s your sister, always with the right priorities. “Sure, just try not to eat us out of house and home okay, short stuff?”

You kiss Allison on the forehead and she shoves at you with a disgusted but blushing face as you race to the front door. You pause for a moment and glance back down the hall. For a moment you could have sworn that the milk gallon was over two-thirds empty… Your eye catches the clock and all thoughts of half-empty milk jugs are summarily tossed aside as you race for your car and head off towards work.
155221323333211.title: Just your sister grabbing a bowl of cereal.

choices: “If I keep eating, I’ll get bigger and bigger…”
“I…! I got to call big bro!”
Allison's phone rings, who can it be?
1552213233332111.content:
“Oof… that was a big breakfast…” Allison leaned back on the chair, one hand rubbing her tummy and the other pushing aside the thoroughly licked clean bowl, knocking over the two empty boxes of cereal she had just guzzled her way through. The young eight-year-old had no idea what had come over her that morning. She woke up fine and dandy and wasn’t all that hungry until she had taken her first spoonful.

Her stomach then proceeded to let her know just how starved she really was and she was honestly surprised that her brother hadn’t heard it in his room upstairs. He hadn’t even noticed that she had finished off her box of cereal and was just starting on his own when he left for work. In the span of fifteen minutes, Allison had eaten two entire boxes of cereal, devoured a whole box of cookies, chugged down a whole gallon of milk, and drank several cups of orange juice.

And yet…

“I don’t feel full…” Allison worriedly looked down at her tummy, rubbing it as it grumbled. The young girl wondered if she was sick and, upon another rumbling growl, winced. She decided that yes she was ill and that she would have to follow her mother’s advice of feeding a cold and stuffing a fever.

Getting up from the table, Allison swooned slightly on her feet as her stomach sloshed with her extra large breakfast churning inside. She moaned at the strange sensation and placed both of her hands on her taut belly. Her stomach looked like she had swallowed a small melon and it certainly felt as heavy as one in her hands.

“Ohh… how come I don't feel full when my belly is so stuffed with food?” Allison groaned, closing her eyes as her hands moved lightly over her taut skin. A slight rumbling began in her belly, causing her body to start to tremble. She moaned again as her belly receded in her grasp, shrinking until it was only a slight swell instead of a large curve.

Yet the pressure, the tightness, hadn’t abated. If anything, it had grown to new levels and Allison felt it rising even higher until was eventually released in a long gassy belch. “UUUUUUURRRRRRRP!”

Her clothes tightened as her body swelled upwards, her borrowed t-shirt climbing up her stomach and her shorts rising above her knees. As she crept past five feet, the string along the waistband of her shorts untied itself, her stomach bulging slightly as the hem of her shirt rose enough to reveal her belly button. Her growth came to a halt as she crested six feet in all, her brothers’ clothes now fitting her like a second skin as she now stood several inches taller.

Her sleeves caved in to her grown arms and the seams along her thighs tore open, her flesh bulging through as the curve of her butt peaked over the waistband. Her underwear, the only article of clothing she was wearing that was her own, surrendered to her swollen hips with a loud snap that caused Allison to gasp softly.

Allison fell back onto her chair, the wood groaning loudly in protest, as she panted in the afterglow of her growth spurt and the gassy belch that she had unleashed throughout it. Her eyes opened in a lazy stare down towards her feet, watching her toes wriggle on the much smaller kitchen tile. She looked slowly about the room, taking in the change of perspective even when sitting down.

“Did I… really grow bigger?” Allison quietly murmured, the idea alone being more than enough to generate a strange but not unfamiliar sensation in her privates that she’s too young to really understand. It’s the same sensation she feels when she daydreams of her big brother and her doing things she’s seen and heard other couples do. Her eyes glazed over slightly as another, more familiar sensation began to make itself known to her.

Grumble…

“I’m hungry again…”
1552213233332111.title: A few minutes later, with Allison at home…

choices: Allison makes it out just in time!
Just wait it out, surely she can't get THAT big... Right?
15522132333321111.content:
A small part of Allison was worried, scared even, of what was happening to her. People don’t just get insanely hungry and devour enough food for their tummies to look like little bowling balls, nor do they grow a whole several inches taller after unleashing a massive belch. If they did, she’d have surely done more belching contests with her big brother because for what little part of Allison was afraid, a far larger part was cheering and leaping up and down with glee.

Allison was the tallest girl in her class, a fact that many a school bully tried to belittle her for to no avail. In point of fact, she had become something of a bully herself though she was never intentionally malicious about it. She just really liked looking down on her peers and rubbing it in their faces by reaching up for things they couldn’t even hope to touch. She adored stepping on and breaking things, a warm rush coursing through her on those few times she managed to get her foot down atop a toy vehicle or mock building.

Most of all though she loved, absolutely loved, playing with little dolls, especially the really small ones that fit in the palm of her hand. Many were the play dates she had with those little dolls, with most of them pretend versions of her friends, her would-be bullies, even the teachers and other adults, but for the one she played with the most, the one that was the smallest she had and was based on the one person she loved the most, her big brother.

Playing pretend with the dolls always left her with a tingly feeling in her privates but never as much as when she pretended it was her brother that she was clutching with one hand. Her cheeks would always flush red and the tingling would get so strong down there that Allison’s other hand had been drawing ever closer and closer to it.

A fierce grumble from her tummy interrupted her daydreaming and Allison swallowed on reflex, her eyes widening in surprise as she felt a small lump travel down her throat to land in her empty stomach. She glanced down at her hands in surprise, wondering just what they had grabbed for her to snack on before her stomach loosed another insistent gurgle.

“If I keep eating, I’ll get bigger and bigger…” She said to herself, looking worriedly around the kitchen before she shivered and grinned delightfully. “I’ll just go outside before my next growth spurt, then I won’t wreck the house!”

Left unsaid was the fact that other houses, particularly those of their neighbors whom Allison rather disliked for their general meanness, were fair game. Especially so considering that virtually no one in the neighborhood was home for spring break.

Allison got up from the chair, which groaned in relief causing her to giggle. She didn’t really feel heavier than she had before but she had certainly gained some weight and was going to gain a whole lot more. She walked passed the table completely ignorant of the fact that both her cereal bowl and several utensils were gone and that her tummy, though still quite small compared to earlier, was starting to bulge just a tiny bit outwards.

The six foot tall eight-year-old stood before the refrigerator with an eager smile and, with a lick of her lips, opened the door as wide as she could. She had to lean down and forward a bit, but that didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that this was because she was so much bigger than she had been mere minutes ago. Her smile grew even wider at that thought.

Not even stopping to consider her vast array of choices present before her, Allison knelt down in front of the fridge and started eating everything that lay within. At first, she was careful with how she ate, taking the time to open a packet of cheese and eating it one slice at a time. Her tummy’s impatient rumbling and her earlier daydream together enticed her to speed up and soon the kitchen floor was a small sty of debris with nary a crumb of food left in the fridge or the cabinets.

Small in that while a few thoroughly licked clean cups of yogurt and pudding littered the ground, there were few packets or empty boxes. Only tiny bits and pieces of plastic and cardboard, all bearing bite marks, littered the floor in front of Allison.

She alternated between them, the fridge and the cabinets, accidentally pulling one loose on its hinges with her eagerness to eat what treats lay within. It didn’t even occur to Allison that much of what lay in the cabinets was unprepared foodstuffs like powdered mash potatoes, tomato paste, or uncooked noodles, she ate them and most of their packaging all the same, sometimes all at once to get a semblance of a full meal.

Despite her hunger and her eagerness to grow, Allison did take some time to play with her food. Antics that brought a guffaw from her brother and a disapproving look from their parents on more than one occasion. She opened a jar of pickles with ease, bowing to an imaginary audience before scarfing them down. She stuffed her mouth full with grapes, her cheeks bulging, before she swallowed them down stems and all. Eventually though, Allison had emptied the contents of the kitchen down to a lone bottle of soda.

Allison sat back on the heels of her feet as she chugged down the bottle. Though she was enjoying the taste of the bubbly drink, something she normally wasn’t allowed to have that often, Allison was more focused on the feeling of it pouring into her stomach, feeling her tummy bulge outwards with every gulp.

After guzzling the last drop she tossed it aside and wiped her mouth clean with the back of her hand. She looked down at her belly, which sat like a large bowling ball over her torn and straining shorts. Despite emptying out the fridge and cabinets of their contents and leaving barely any scraps behind in her gluttony, Allison did not feel the tiniest bit full but the familiar pressure was there much more than before.

“Oh…” She cradled her swollen stomach in her hands and hiccupped. “Oh man…”

Her stomach rumbled, a faint trembling growing outwards that made her quiver where she knelt before it slowly started to recede in her hands and the pressure inside it rose to match it immensely, earning a startled groan of pain from Allison. Yet even with a glimmer of tears in her eyes, Allison was smiling broadly with delight because she knew that soon, she was going to unleash a massive burp and following that burp would come an equally large growth spurt.

“And mommy isn’t here to lecture me on not burping in the kitchen,” said Allison. Her eyes widened with sudden realization and she said a word that she heard her brother use once before as she rose up to her full six foot stature. “I’ve got to get outside!”
15522132333321111.title: “If I keep eating, I’ll get bigger..."

choices: Score, the house is completely empty! Of people anyway!
Whoa! That-- That came from the house down the street!
155221323333211111.content:
Allison hopped to her feet and ran as fast as she could out the kitchen and down the hall to the door. She got there in record time, her longer legs covering more distance. Unfortunately for the enlarged eight year old, her heightened perspective did not help her in spotting her shoes that she had kicked haphazardly onto the floor. Her enlarged foot landed on one, squashing it flat beneath her soles and she stumbled shoulder first into the door. Unable to handle the sudden impact of a six-foot tall eight-year-old girl, the door snapped clean off its hinges falling flat onto the ground and letting Allison spill out onto the front yard.

The blonde haired girl rolled onto her back and lay there stunned for a moment, wide eyes blinking up at the sky before she started to smile. A small giggle escaped her before she started laughing outright. “Oh that was so coouuuuuuuuuuUUURRRRRRRP!”

The belch was louder than her last one and sent nearby birds away onto the wind fast as their little wings could carry them. Allison blushed slightly in embarrassment but there was no hiding the near rapturous smile on her face as she began to grow.

Her borrowed shorts were the first to succumb to her increasing girth, her swelling thighs causing them to rip along the sides with the rest being buried beneath the swelling hills of her ballooning butt. Her brother’s t-shirt was next to go though it did not go without a fight. The sleeves easily ripped free from her shoulders but the rest was refusing to budge and Allison was soon finding it hard to breath with how tight the collar was around her neck, never mind how tightly the shirt squeezed around her chest. A deep gasp for air was all it took to have the shirt exploding off her in a tatter of cloth, leaving Allison completely nude.

All too soon, her growth spurt came to an end, leaving Allison several feet taller than she had been before breakfast. From the soles of her feet to the top of her blonde head, Allison was now all of ten feet and a few sparse inches tall.

The amazonian eight-year old lay there, basking in the afterglow of her growth spurt, smiling almost drunkenly as she closed her eyes with a soft sigh. One hand tentatively making motions towards her crotch while the other found itself busy brushing aside linger pieces of clothing. Her nudity didn’t bother her in the slightest because she knew that she was too big for regular clothes.

“Oh…” She cooed, her fingers just barely touching upon her special place when her stomach rumbled loud enough that her whole body trembled, startling her out of her euphoric reverie.

“Whoa, I’m starved…” She sat up and pushed herself up to her feet, looking about her yard and the surrounding houses. Allison had eaten everything remotely edible in her house, which meant that it would be up to the neighbors to quench her enlarging appetite.

Actually… Allison thought to herself with a devious smile as her eyes fell upon the house next door, Wendy Barnes’s house should have more than enough food for me…

Wendy was a blonde, thirteen-year-old neighbor of Allison’s that would sometimes babysit her whenever her brother was unable to. Contrary to most of her other neighbors, Allison actually liked Wendy, who was one of the few girls that didn’t lecture her on being a tomboy. However, it was Wendy’s older sister, Vanessa, that Allison truly disliked above all others for three very important reasons.

One, the girl was far taller than Allison and even her brother, though being as old as him that made sense but didn’t endear the older girl to her any. Second, even when her parents said it was okay, Vanessa never let Wendy or Allison play in the pool, many times barring them from the house altogether as she threw another wild, food-filled party. Three, and most important of all, according to Wendy, Vanessa had taken her brother’s v-card.

Allison had no idea what a v-card was but given how much she treasured her own trading cards, it had to be very important, especially when her brother forbade her from asking their parents about it, saying they would through a worse fit than when he bought her a shiny Charizard card.

Allison easily stepped over the fence separating her house from Billy’s and paused. She giggled and proceeded to step back over the fence and over it once more before her eyes fell upon the house in question. Like many other houses in Olympia Heights, it was an opulent work of art and while not the biggest it came pretty close but Allison’s gaze was upon the pool.

It never looked so inviting with a deep blue tiling and a faint hint of steam rising from the surface of the water. Allison laughed to herself as she walked around the pool and realized that she could sit down in the deep end and still easily rest her arms on the pool’s edge. She wondered how far her legs would stretch out across it and how much more she’d need to eat before she was big enough for her feet to rest on the other end of the pool.

Her stomach grumbled again and she grimaced, the water of the pool quivering to the trembling of her hunger.
