15531.content:
Cheers to cinto ... his request that I bring back my little Queen

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Seventeen year old James could not believe his bad luck, one moment he was resting on his father's yacht near a strange island, and now he had been kidnapped by a bunch of primitive looking people.

"Who are you?? where are you taking me??" he screamed as he was dragged into the village and then towards a big wall that separated the village from the rest of the island.

He tried to fight them but they were just too many and he could do nothing to stop them as they took them to a strange looking platform on the other side of the wall and tied his arms and legs in the structure.

James noticed how quickly the natives left him alone once he was tied and then he heard the noise of drums coming from the top of the wall, he looked up and saw that many villagers were looking down at him in expectation.

"What the hell is going on here" he wondered, but soon his thought were interrupted as he noticed a movement on the trees of the jungle, as if a big animal was coming towards him.

Fear began to overwhelm him as he waited for whatever creature might come out of the jungle
"What the??" he said as the "creature" came into view.

There stood a giant girl, she looked younger than James probably 11 or 12 years old. She wore a Loincloth that seemed to be made of leopard skin that resembled a sort of primitive bikini. Had long black hair and very tanned skin.

Konga stared down at her new "toy" in wonder. Never before had she seen anything as beautiful as him. His blond hair, pale skin made her desire him above anything else. Occasionally she would steal one or two natives to play a little, even if she always returned them back to their villages, but now she tempted to keep this one. She looked up and banged her chest as she roared to the villagers, to show them who was the queen of the island, she wasn't cruel to them, and even protected them from the monsters, but still she liked to be feared a little. Then she turned her attention to her toy and smiled
15531.title: Konga

choices: ...decided it was time to pick him up
155312.content:
As James gaped up at her... terror, astonishment, shock and curiosity warred for dominance in his consciousness. He’d had enough time to realize that the natives had climbed a flight of more than twenty steps. It meant he was easily the equivalent of a story high. And yet, he was still looking up at her waist. She had to bigger than James’ house. He craned his neck back to finally reaching the towering face. The pleasant expression on the quite young face eased his terror, slightly… very slightly.

That was when Konga looked into his eyes, threw her head back and roared.

What were little more than love taps to the colossal girl, pounded in James’ ears was like a thunderstorm to him. At least it settled his emotional turmoil. The sandy-haired boy yelled in terror. He pulled on his arms and legs.

The islanders were long used to offering reluctant Gifts to their Queen. Konga had been part of their lives for centuries. The altar had been steadily improved and now flawlessly held Konga’s gifts until she was ready to collect them. And, as easily as they were held, the Queen had but to flip what, to the islanders, was a heavy lever as if it were a light switch when she was ready and the bonds would automatically loosen. In response to the Queen’s roar they chanted her name “Konga Konga Konga!!” to bless the gift. It pleased the islanders that their Queen resembled them.

“HELPPPP!!! MEEE!!!” James screamed, all the while desperately trying to protect his ears from the deafening roar.

Konga delighted at the chanting of her name. She loved hearing all the little voices of her many toys. She panted a little from the exertion and smiled at the line of villagers on the wall. Then, she looked down at the struggling captive. Her youthful, Pacific features returned to the earlier expression of wonder. He was so exotic and rare. Konga knew there were more than a thousand of the little people that all had a similar skin tone to hers. For a moment, Konga’s features crinkled in anger at the thought they had hidden him from her. But, then again lost herself in fascination at the pale offering. Knowing that he was firmly bound, Konga bent slowly and began extending her left hand.

“UH-HUH!! NO!!” yelled James, fearfully as the dark-skinned giant moved toward him. A loud crack startled him and made him look away from her face. What he saw was even more alarming. A giant hand was approaching. James wailed pitifully “HELPPPP!!! MEEE!!! PLEEEEEEEEEEEASEEEEEEE!!!”

The only answer from the wall came in the form of more fevered chanting “Konga Konga Konga Konga Konga!!” It was with reluctance that the chief agreed to Gifting the outsider. And many feared the pale-face might be evil and would anger the Queen. Many had feared the worst when the Queen looked angry. But, the return of her smile relieved everyone. The islanders looked on eagerly as Queen Konga bent over the Gift. Whatever the cause of the Queen’s earlier anger, all could tell she was pleased.

Konga cooed at her frantically struggling new toy. As usual, he was spread eagle to make her visual inspection easy. Konga appreciated the islanders for their cleverness. She could barely wait to examine him for any other differences between him and the other islanders. His skin and hair were both so much lighter. And, now that she was much closer, Konga could tell he was dressed quite differently from the others. She placed her right hand on the platform, very near the release switch and got to her knees.

The natives stopped their chanting in hushed awe. The Queen had never done that in living memory. Those on the wall gasped in surprise. The Queen almost always just grabbed a Gift off the Altar and walked off. Naturally, he or she would turn up days later, relatively unharmed. But since it was taboo to discuss what happened while the Gift was with the Queen, no one but the Gift ever knew what happened. This was more than the tribe had ever seen.

“Please, m-m-miss …l-lemme g-g-go.” stuttered James “I p-pr-promise I’ll n-n-never t-t-tell anyone!” As the dark-skinned hand got closer to him, James fell into a panicked babbling. Punctuated by continued futile efforts to free himself. A part of his brain informed him that the giant fingers were nearly the size of his whole arm. He felt the irrational urge to cut that part right from his head.

Konga leaned over further, she changed her approach and brushed the back of her fingers down the front of her new toy. Another surprise, first she established this one as a boy. She didn’t favor girl toys over boy toys. They were both fun. The surprise was that he seemed to have more than one layer of clothes on. She had never seen that before. And the pants were of a rougher material than she was used to. She was very curious and decided to brush at them again.

James cringed as the Hand roamed over him. His hair was mussed, his legs and arms pinched and stroked. Finally, after what seemed a lifetime…but was really only minutes… the Hand withdrew. He sighed in relief that he hadn’t been harmed. The giant smiled at him and spoke. Unfortunately he could not understand. He shook his head helplessly. Because of his father, he knew a little Hawaiian, and this was similar. But, about the same way English and German were.

She studied him closely and then
155312.title: She is just like the villagers. They are southe...

1553122.content:
Konga’s smile only broadened. She was more surprised than ever by this pale-skinned toy. Naturally, he was scared of her, and she drank that up. But none of her other toys would look right at her. She pinched the release switch that would loosen his bonds between finger and thumb. It was time to take him. “I’m gonna have so much fun with you.” She said with a tiny giggle “I think I’ll have to tell Mumba that you’ll be staying with me forever.”

“OH! Thank you so much Ma’am!!” exclaimed James. He saw that the giant girl was going to throw the switch that held his bonds. “Thank you Thank you Thank you! You’ll never see me again! I just need a boat!” And, that was when the Hand came back, wrapped around James and lifted him off the platform.

Konga was just beginning understand some of the meaning of the strange words he spoke. Why this pale-faced, yellow haired toy thought he was leaving, Konga did not understand “You’re not going anywhere, but home with me.” She said, playfully “And, the first thing I need to know is if that skin color is all over you.”

“Umm... I really don’t know…umhh…what you’re s-saying. But…ahhh…” James stammered “Err…miss…I…that is …can walk on my own. Put me down, please.” He glanced over the clutching fingers and saw the ground as quite a distance below. Scared, he wrapped his arms around the fingers that encircled his waist.

The tribe had watched in amazement as The Queen took her time with the Gift. When She finally stood, glowing with a delighted grin, the spectators on the wall roared their approval. Something unexpected occurred yet again. It seemed this ceremony was a truly blessed occasion. The Queen, carrying her Gift, strolled over to the wall. The cheering faded and was replaced by wonder and more than a bit of fear.

“Hello, Mumba.” Konga greeted the High Priest who was standing in front of the massive gong that rang out to call her. She had often played with him, he had been a lot of fun after the first time she pulled him off the platform. Konga wondered if that was why he became High Priest. But she would always forget to ask whenever she happened to carry him off. And, certainly, no one would have objected if she did now. But, she didn’t. She did playfully flick the oversized hat he was wearing. “It won’t cause trouble if I kept this one, would it?”

The High Priest bowed and replied “My Queen you do us too much honor. The Gift pleases you, then?”

James couldn’t follow really, but one word caught his attention --- it sounded like… Mohai… the Hawaiian word for sacrifice --- He panicked twisting violently in the girl’s grip and kicking his feet.

Konga looked down at her new toy in amusement. She wouldn’t giggle in front of so many, so she covered her mouth with her free hand until it passed, then added the hand to her grip imprisoning the boy’s arms. “I must admit, I was somewhat annoyed that you never offered him to me before. He is unique.” She replied “However, I forgive you. So, will the people not miss his work?

Deferentially, Mumba replied “My Queen, the greatest work we can perform is pleasing you. In any way. But, if I may … he is an Outsider … an intruder … Some wanted him destroyed for corrupting our land. But, the chief, in his wisdom ruled that you should judge. May I ask, My Queen, are you pleased?”

“Mumba, you will tell the chief he has done well.” Konga ordered “You will offer me any more of these Outsiders who come to my island.” She gave the gong a tap that nearly ripped it off its base, then she turned away.

Half-way through the conversation, James realized that none of the natives would help him. In fact it was their fault in the first place. But it wasn’t until the giant girl walked past that platform he’d been strapped to that he lost hope

The High Priest yelled a celebratory cheer. Two massively muscled men swung long, heavy hammers that rang the gong not quite as loudly as the Queen just had and the villagers began the party. Not only had they rid themselves of an Outsider, but in doing so, had pleased their Queen.

Twist and bend as he might, James could not see the village for the huge form blocking his view. But, in a very short time, the sounds of drumbeating faded to nothing and he was alone with a giant girl who thought of him as a Mohai. The whole thing overwhelmed him. Despite being a strapping 17-year old man, as he called himself, he fainted.

“Oh well.” Konga complained, disappointed “I was going to play with you on the way home. But, I guess I’ll enjoy myself more if it’s daylight and you’re wide awake.”

Home for the giant preteen was
1553122.title: Sacrificed

15531222.content:
“Maybe it was just as well that it’s nighttime.” Konga sighed wistfully as she thumped through the forest of trees that barely reached her chin. She could feel the slight weight of her exotic new toy and couldn’t help petting him. What drew the most attention from her fingers was the curiously straight hair. Although, she did occasionally rub the odd-feeling pants. She lifted the limp form to her face and added “Yea, don’t think I could help myself from undressing you if I could see what I was doing. But, it’s more fun when they’re awake.”

James partially woke from his faint when he heard talking. His clouded brain couldn’t process what was being said. Nor, could he quite open his eyes. He was just beginning to focus when there was a sudden rush of air and something struck the back of his head.

“Oh my!” exclaimed Konga as what to her were tiny twigs. She noticed that one had smacked her new toy. She’d noticed that he seemed to be waking up, then that happened. She reached into her bikini top, touched a control, and walked through the blue portal that appeared. Konga set him down on the hardwood surface and flicked on the light. She turned on a handheld scanner, and was relieved that he was unharmed.

Suddenly a voice called out “After hours young lady!”

“Just getting a drink of water, Daddy!” Konga called out with a touch of worry. For here, Konga wasn’t a Queen, or even a queen. Here, she was a girl whose science project had some unexpected side effects, and a big secret. She giggled “Actually, a little secret. Right, my precious toy?”

Again, came the bellow “NOW!! DON’T MAKE ME COME UP THERE!!”

“YESSIR!” Konga yelled back. Satisfied that he wasn’t really hurt, she turned off the whirring scanner and the desklamp. Using a penlight, with its much fainter glow, she gently slid the yellow-haired, pale boy onto her hand and carried him over to where she kept the long line of toys she’d temporarily held. Mostly for their own safety. but sometimes to prevent escapes.

James stirred briefly, still unconscious but chilled; he shivered and rolled over.

“Awwwww. He’s just adorable.” Konga cooed as she moved her other hand into position. It was somewhat awkward, so she set the penlight down, wrapped one hand around him, lifted the lid of her former fishtank and put him in. After setting her toy down on the well padded floor, Konga laid her left hand on him and said “I so can’t wait for tomorrow. I’m gonna have so much fun.”

Instinctively, James clutched at the warmth and curled into a ball.

“And you were such a fighter.” Konga giggled. If it wasn’t for her father, she might have left her fingers trapped in his little embrace. As it was, though, she gently freed herself, allowing her hand to roam his whole length. Her hand lingered on the curve of his hip, which were still covered by that odd material. She gave it an experimental, soft pinch and smiled.

James squirmed a bit, but didn't wake.

Konga felt her pulse and breath quicken as she continued her play. The firm little mound wasn't much bigger than her thumb, but somehow she lost track of time poking, petting and pinching it. She wasn’t used to the new sensations doing this seemed to cause, but really enjoyed them. The penlight flickered, and went out. Konga looked at it as if it betrayed her and withdrew her hand from the tank. In the feeble light that remained, Konga was able to replace the tank’s lid and set the mediscanner to wake her if something went wrong with her toy. Then, she crawled into bed and fell asleep with a big smile on her face.
15531222.title: Konga's bedroom

155312222.content:
Consider a world. Quite lovely from space. Seven continents spread across its face. Deep blue oceans. Wisps of white clouds hanging above it. It was identical to our Earth except for a few key differences. One was that it was in an ice age, so most of the people lived closer to the equator. This led to a difference among the inhabitants. They were all darker skinned than the Caucasians, or even Orientals, of our world. We home in on what Earthlings call Indonesia, but it is different. There are fewer and much larger islands.

Dropping to ground level, we race above jungle, farms, an assortment of houses, then the big buildings of the metropolis. Back out again, the pace slows zeroing in on a neighborhood, a street, a block, a single house. And finally the back bedroom of that house.

In the bedroom, a teenager with longish blond hair slept peacefully. As many teenagers do, he was sleeping in his clothes. He tossed and turned some, punched the pillow and rolled over. In that position he snored for a bit. Later, he was sprawled on his back. A combination of a snort and the sun hitting his eyes woke him. James sat up smacking his lips with morning breath. The glare blinded him as he tried to look around. “The hell kinda dream was that?” he cursed, shaking his head. “Ahh…water.”

Things weren’t quite as they appeared. For the owner of this room was still sleeping peacefully.

“Whazzat?” James gasped when a flashing blue light drew his attention. Something rather less than half his height was blinking. He half-stood and made for it rather quickly. This was a mistake as he crashed into an invisible wall. He rubbed his injured forehead and cursed “Aww! SHIT!”

The noise from his accident did nothing to stir Konga as she slept peacefully.

James fell back on the soft surface, shaking his head. In a few moments the cobwebs cleared and he stood up. This time, smacking his head on the ceiling above. “Stupid damn yacht! Thing’s too small!” he complained, then yelled out “DAD!! I HATE THIS FUCKING THING!!”

“Huhhnn! Mmm!” grunted the young girl, awakened by the sound of metal clanging. Konga started to speak, but noticed with some amusement that her toy was looking the other way and seemed to be trying to escape. She propped her head up under her hand and just watched. They didn’t often try so hard to get out. But, then again, he wasn’t one of the usual bunch. She repressed a giggle when the top bounced again.

James huffed and grunted with what must have been his tenth try. He was panting heavily. Taking a moment to rest, he took in his surroundings for the first time and his jaw dropped “Uhh.h.h..hh.” he stuttered as the scale of things began to register. “N-n-nooo! That w-w-was j-j-ust a d-dr-dream!”

“This is almost as good as last night.” Konga decided. She slid out of bed, took a couple of steps toward the fishtank and paused. She wanted him to see her coming.

James shook his head in denial “No! No! No! No! It was just a dream!” he declared again. He turned and saw her. He ran to the front of his prison and pressed his face to the glass. Then backed away in fear. He tumbled over something and backward crawled until he was pinned against the opposite wall.

“Coming to get’cha!” said Konga in a menacing tone. Her hands were out in front of her, like claws.

Not knowing what else to do, James grabbed the end of the blanket and threw it over his head. He just curled himself into a ball and shivered.

“HAHAHA!” chuckled Konga as she continued her approach. She removed the heavy encyclopedia from the tank’s mesh lid then took it off and set it on the floor. Then she reaches in and pets the covered boy with her fingers. She ran her fingertip over his tiny back, then dragged her fingernail back the other way. Next, she found his head and briefly pinched it between thumb and forefinger.

James cringed as he felt the touching. When he felt the pressure on his head, he freaked. With desperate strength, James twisted free. Blind, he got exactly nowhere as a heavy weight forced him flat on his back.

“That’s enough movement from you, toy.” Konga said, playfully. She pushed down on his little back with her thumb. It delighted her that he continued to squirm. With a casual flick, Konga tossed away the covering and grinned at the sight of the strange feeling material which still covered his lower half. She slid her fingers up and down the backs of his legs while he fought. Loving it, she commented “Not even the first ones I played with struggled this much.”

James kept his face buried as he kicked. But, the giant just kept touching him “HEY!! WHOAAA!!” he screamed in distress when, instead of the backs of his legs, a finger went between them. His hands pulled on the covers and he scrambled to his feet. “YOU’RE JUST A KID! LEMME GO!!”

“Sorry, little toy. I can’t understand you yet. But keep talking and my computer will do the rest.” said Konga. And, with that, reached for him.

James had nowhere to go. He just clenched his eyes shut as the hand closed on him. Nothing could prevent him from feeling fingers close around his waist. Nor, could he prevent his feet lifting off the soft surface of the padded fishtank.
155312222.title: Good Morning James

1553122222.content:
Konga’s smile grew as her fingers encircled his waist. That curious fabric of his pants made her skin tingle. His weight tugged lightly on her hand as she brought him out of the fishtank. It was one of her favorite sensations. Konga sighed in delight and licked her lips. “Such fine pale skin.” She praised. Bringing him close, Konga used a finger to gently move his little face from side to side.

“Hey!” protested James “Stop that! You overgrown kid!” The night before, when he stood on that platform, looking up at her James couldn’t have guessed her age. But in the light he saw she was definitely younger than him. He hoped he could get her to understand him, then James could easily get her to let him go. After all, he was older. He would have thought different if he could understand.

Konga brushed at the straight yellow hair on his little head. She mussed it all around. “None of my other boy toys had long hair.” She said “I might have to command it. I wonder if it’ll come in straight on them. My! You are such a little fighter! This just isn’t any fun. I’m used to talking to them.”

“Not! Stop that! And put me down!” demanded James. He’d been struggling futilely against the giant girl’s touching for some time and he was quite tired. He sighed in relief. Even better, she moved across the room sat at her desk and opened her hand. James steadied himself on the wooden surface, looked up at his captor and said “Right…good… now we’re getting somewhere.”

Konga pat him on the head, leaned over and flicked a few switches on her computer. She pulled something with green, blue and red flashing lights out of a slot and put it down between them. “Now, this is a Universal Translator.” She said, speaking slowly “It will help us understand each other. My name is Konga. What is yours?”

The gadget, that came up to James’ chest, emitted a buzz.

“That means it has no information to translate.” Konga explained she pressed a thumb to her chest and repeated “My name is Konga. What is yours?”

James, nervous, jumped back three steps when a finger touched his chest. He squeaked “HEY!”

“That was probably a just fear.” Konga said into the translator. It whirred for a moment then clicked. Again, she repeated “My name is Konga. What is your name?”

Without the danger of a giant finger, he was able to figure out what was going on “Ok, right, language lessons. I get it. My name is James.” Trying to show he was an equal, he held his right hand out for a handshake.

“Well, nice to meet you James. Sure, I’ll shake hands.” Konga replied. Although, as she reached out, she suddenly felt playful. Instead of taking his hand, she wrapped her fingers around his little body and bounced him up and down a few times. “And welcome to your new life as my toy.”

James pushed away as he was once again on solid ground…well solid desk, anyway. “Stop doing that!” he shouted.

“Now let’s try a few things.” Konga said. She got up and wandered around her room, grabbing this and that.

James identified a “Sock. Ball. Hat. Pen. Book.” And the Universal Translator recorded every input. It irritated him when the giant put what looked like a Barbie Doll, except for the dark color down beside him. James gave her a dirty look and complained “That isn’t funny!”

“None of the others talk back to me.” Konga commented with great surprise. “So, is there a word for all of these?” The Universal Translator paused a moment then passed on the question in the little boy’s language.

James was amazed by the gadget. In less than an hour they were actually beginning to talk to each other. He’d gotten somewhat distracted from his situation. “We call them toys.”

“What’s this called?” asked Konga. She pinched the shoulder of his shirt.

James yanked himself free and answered sharply “A shirt!”

“Turn around.” said Konga, she now remembered those odd feeling pants.

James looked up and demanded “Why?”

“Because I said so. And toys do what they’re told.” she shot back. Instead of waiting, Konga just seized him around the middle and effortlessly pushed him into her other hand.

Turned away from the giant girl, James watched the desk fall away beneath him. He was just high enough to see the top of the Universal Translator. He now cursed it “I hate that goddamned thing!”

“Naughty, naughty words” Konga said to his back. Lifting him right to her face, she noticed “Hmmmm, you have back pockets and they have a – W – on each.”

James kicked his feet wildly, which only elicited amused laughter from the giant girl.

Konga was just about to start tracing her finger over that very spot on his little rear when there was a knock on her door “Good Morning Daddy!” she called in a honeyed voice “Off to work!?”

“Yes dear!” the voice from the other side called back “---
1553122222.title: Language Lesson

15531222222.content:
"Enjoy your first day of summer, dear!"

Konga grinned mischievously and adjusted the Universal Translator so it would also make her language understandable to the boy in her grip. She usually didn’t let them understand. But, since he wasn’t going back, it didn’t matter “I will Dad!” she called out “Don’t worry about me! The robots are fine! And I picked up something real fun to play with yesterday!”

“Girls and their dolls!” laughter came back “Well, remember, no breaking them!”

Konga giggled. That could not have gone better “Bye Dad!”

“WHAT! HEY! HELP MISTER!!” screamed James.

Konga bounced her hand a bit so that he was facing her again “Sorry James, Dad don’t believe in toy people.” She said, swiping a finger across his chest.

“B-but b-b-breaking??” he asked fearfully.

Konga chuckled “Oh. Don’t worry, doesn’t happen as much as it used to and I can fix it easy.” With her free hand she popped something else out of her computer, showed it and replaced it.

“And that’s supposed to make me feel better?!” James snapped back. He needed to get control of this situation. “Now, how about you take me home?”

Other than a grin, she didn’t bother replying. Konga noticed something else, she brought him real close and studied his face intently “You are so-oooo pale!” she exclaimed “And…OH MY GOODNESS! Blue eyes!!!”

“Yeah! So!” James complained “And you think you can put me down!”

Konga laughed “Such a little squirmer! You know, all of the others had brown or black eyes like me.”

“Well, why don’t you get one of them then!” he shouted, twisting in her hand. He pushed futilely at the fingers around his waist.

“But you’re so much better, little James.” said Konga as she brushed the tip of her nose up and down his chest “First, you argue with me. And struggle a lot. I like that. Then, these lil’blue eyes! Awww!!! Never met anyone here with them! Heard about some once. Wait! Where’s my magnifying glass?”

The room spun wildly for James and finally stopped. He could barely breathe. And as he recovered he was looking up into a distorted eye that was way oversized, even for his new situation. He screamed “YEEEEEAAAAA!!! What’re you doing now!?!”

“Looking at your eyes.” Konga answered, awe-filled “Such a lovely shade, too. And I don’t have to worry about saying something stupid, because you’re not going back anyway.”

James panicked at that. Another new worry for him. He thrashed about, going nowhere.

“Oh yes, little toy.” She said in a way that was amusing for her, but knew was menacing for him “You’re mine forever. The other little ones, they think I’m a goddess or something. So I have to watch what I do or say. Can’t let them stop being scared. But, you, I got so many questions. And allllllllllll summer!”

The finger was back, pushing his shirt around on his chest “Well it’s hard to answer questions with you poking at me!” he complained.

“Well, like, your pants.” She said, ignoring the shout “I can tell they’re machine made. No machines on my toy island. And, I never felt anything like them. They’re nice.” She grinned and allowed her fingers to roam over his legs.

James bit his cheek as the giant girl explored. Thankfully she hadn’t touched him between his legs again. At least, not yet. He wasn’t scared for his life anymore. At least that one definition for Sacrifice was off. But, he didn’t really think he was much better off with her thinking of him as a toy. --- And darn, she’s cute, well for someone thirty, forty feet tall --- That annoying part of his brain commented.

“I wonder if we can make these kinds of pants.” Konga thought out loud as she unknowingly brushed his crotch “What are they called?”

“Jeans.” James answered tightly, gritting his teeth against the contact. What had been completely unintentional to her was a teasing torment to him.

She pinched the bottom of one pantleg a tugged a bit, giggling at his reaction “Jeans?? Like them. Wonder if we can make them. Someone would need a bit to try. I’ll have to take yours.”

“WHAT!?” James yelped “UH-UH! NO WAY!! SORRY!! WRONG NUMBER!!”

Konga slid her forefinger up the length of his little leg. She hooked it in the waistband and asked “You want to take them off? Or should I do it?”
15531222222.title: Konga's Curiosity

155312222222.content:
“Maybe you didn’t hear me!” James snapped “I said there is NO WAY that I am taking my pants off!!”

Konga tugged on the waistband. She found that it stretched a bit and thought that interesting. Her smile widened and she pushed her finger in deeper.

“That hurts!” James complained as when little give his pants had was taken up by the huge finger “Now come on! Get your hands off me!”

That protest completely amused Konga “You had your chance, Little James.” She said with a giggle “Gee these are pretty tough. Most of the time, clothes just fall apart for me.”

“Get your DAMN hands off me!” demanded James, yet again.

That word failed to translate, but Konga got the idea it was rude. She frowned and brought him close to her face. She shook her hand, rattling him around “It’s one thing to squirm around.” She scolded “But cursing is something else! I get paddled for it, so I guess I get to do the paddling. Daddy always says it hurts me more than it does you.”

“NOOOOOOO!!!!” James screamed as she flipped him over. The only good part of this was that her finger wasn’t in his waistband.

With two fingers, Konga swatted at the upturned little rear. Surprisingly, after a couple of screams, her toy didn’t react much. She turned him back around and asked “Didn’t hurt much, did it? Or are you acting?”

“Not really, no!” James grumbled.

Konga figured it out pretty quick “It’s the …you called them jeans.” She concluded “They protect your little fanny. Don’t worry, I’m not angry, but now get them off.”

“I said no! Now put me down!” he shouted.

She grinned at him “Don’t worry about it, I’ll figure out how to undress you. Let’s see…” She flipped him yet again and poked his little rear. To the front, yet again, she poked his front.

James was getting dizzy from the constant spinning around. Here he was a grown man; that thought produced a disgusted snort; and some girl was trying to figure out how to undress him. It would’ve been heaven except for the two points that 1. She looked a bit young & 2. He was sitting in her hand. The latest spin landed him face up and this time she poked between his legs. He protested indignantly “Don’t DO that!”

“Soooo that’s the weak spot!” she said, gleefully. She easily flicked his hands away as they attempted to cover up. “Well, you pale-faces are even more like us than I thought. Zipper, and a snap, piece of cake.”

Like any male, James was vulnerable to getting hard at the slightest provocation. A couple pokes of the giant finger, despite his fear, was plenty. He tried desperately to control his reaction, which caused him to blush, which only made it worse. “Alright! Alright! I’ll take’em off! Just gimme something else to wear!” he pleaded.

“I don’t think so” she replied “Now that I figured them out, I really don’t need your help. So, off they come.” With that, she pinned his little arms into her palm, studied the snap for a moment then tugged on the flap. Of course she didn’t really consider how much force was needed, and pulled too hard.

James heard and felt the rip and knew exactly what happened. He cried “HEY!! YOU RUINED EM!!” The snap popped right off his jeans and the zipper tore from the fabric.

“Ooops” Was Konga’s careless, and rather amused, response.

“Ooops? Ooops! Ooops!?!” he complained, twisting his body around trying to free his arms “Is that all you gotta say!?”

She shrugged “Nope. I also thank you for kicking your feet. Makes pulling off your jeans easy.”

“YAH!” he squealed, pinching his legs together. It was too late, He’d hardly managed to stop kicking when the pants were removed. “Give them back!!”

Although his waist and arms completely filled her hand, Konga had no trouble holding him and studying the pants. She had indeed torn them some. A metal strip dangled from the middle. “Well, I’ll find someone to study them later.” said Konga “Now back to my toy. Goodness! Your legs are even paler than your face!”

“Ok now, this is outta control!” James complained. He was half naked and really quite grateful he’d remembered to put on underwear this morning.

Konga pinched one churning leg between finger and thumb and smirked at him “Seems everything’s under control to me” she offered.

The giant girl’s next question all but panicked James.

“Another pair of pants. What is that called?” and she poked inquisitively at …

James was wearing
155312222222.title: James Objects

1553122222222.content:
Nervous at the closeness of the giant finger to his half hardon, James stuttered “B-b-b-briefs….y’know…un-un-underwear.”

“Mmm.” Konga replied as she considered the answer.

James pushed the finger away from his crotch and complained “You wanna put me on the ground while you’re thinking?”

“But if I put you down I couldn’t play with you.” She countered, sounding logical. She petted his little leg, then caught one foot and held it. Grinning, she gave it a gentle tug and twisted it this way and that careful not to actually hurt James. She’d been playing with little people since she was 6 and knew the limits, so his cries of being hurt just added to her amusement.

The giant girl was relentless. And James was worn out. The muscles of his right leg felt like jelly. At first, he strained to push when she pulled and pull when she pushed. After what felt like hours, but was merely minutes, the leg just obeyed her whims. Sounding very adult, if winded, he tried to scold her “Most people ask before touching someone!”

“You’re really like the first ones I found on that wonderful island.” Konga said, greatly amused “Except now I can really enjoy it! They struggled a lot at first. This is much more fun! Ok, James, let me ask you something. Do you have toys?”

He wasn’t sure where this was going, but talking was better. He answered “Well, sure.” He was relieved when she let go of his foot, but it did nothing for his peace of mind when she brought him practically eye to eye. Or, given the size difference; his face to her eye. He looked down at her dark fingers wrapped around his waist and over to the other hand that hovered entirely too close for comfort. Uncomfortable with the silence, and her looking smile, he added “Yeah, I have toys. Why?”

“Well, do you ask them before playing with them?” she asked.

James gave a confused look and grunted “Huh??”

“Okay, do you ask your toys if you can play with them?” she repeated, a bit slowly.

He looked annoyed and said “OF course not! That’s silly!”

With her free hand, she fiddled with his hair and added “It’s so smooth and soft. I’ve heard of yellow hair here. But, people like that live way to the north. I can’t believe how adorable you are!”

“STOP THAT!” he shouted, slapping at her fingers. It had finally clicked for him “AND I AM NOT A TOY!! I’M A PERSON!!”

Konga laughed, stood up and, still holding James, walked over to a rather dusty wood box “Let me show you something.” She flipped the lid, took something out and returned to her desk.

“Finally!” James was glad to be back on a solid surface. Even if to him it was twenty feet high.

Konga giggled as she watched him stumble around. She put a hand on the desk quite close to James, without touching. Her other hand, holding a doll, she brought into his sight and asked “You know what this is?”

“Y-y-yeah, a doll.” he stuttered, a little nervously and backed away. He spun around, saw her other hand which was too close. He backed up the other way and into the doll she just stood on the desk. It fell over. He stumbled and landed on it.

Konga found the whole performance hysterical. “Glad I’m filming!” she exclaimed “Oh little James! That was so cute! You gonna kiss her?” She almost picked him up, but changed her mind in favor of watching him struggle for himself.

“Yeah great!” he grumbled, glaring up at her.

She applauded a bit then said “See? A doll, a toy. And you’re the same size. So what’re you?”

“I’M BIGGER THAN THAT!” he protested. Then at the approach of her hand he yelped.

Instead of James, she picked up the doll and stood it beside him “Well, not by much.” She commented “Don’t play with Tuti much, Cause I got real little people to play with.”

“Th-this i-i-snt fun-ny anym-ore.” stammered James. He was scared and his heart was pounding. She was staring at him in a way that made him very nervous. Plus she was holding the doll and touching it all over. Illogically, he felt his penis stir between his legs. Very quietly he whispered to himself “Hope she doesn’t touch me like that.”

Konga kissed the doll’s chest, it had the same features, and roughly her same color. Then, she put it down and focused on her living one “See, I don’t need Tuti’s permission to play with her.” Said Konga “I don’t need yours. Come here, Jamesie toy.”

“Alright! Alright! Alright! Alright!” exclaimed James, he backed away as her hand approached “Just one thing, PLEASE!! Can’t I have some pants.” Subtly, he thought, he covered the growing bulge in his white cotton briefs.

Pausing momentarily, Konga replied “I’m sure there’s some doll clothes that’ll fit. But, I’ll put them on.”

“Don’t suppose I have a choice.” He mumbled. HE hadn’t meant for her to hear.

But, Konga did. “No, you don’t.” she replied as she picked him up. Holding him close, she asked “What are you trying to hide?” She pushed his hand away and pushed an inquisitive finger on the bulge.

That was when something interrupted. It was...
1553122222222.title: The Bulge

choices: .   put them on her desk, where they were reunited with James. *
.   sat on her bed and played with them. *
15531222222221.content:
“Thank you Oh Queen!” the High Priest bellowed back “Please accept these Gifts as tokens of our devotion!”

Konga favored him with a smile. All that a believer really needed. Then she struck a monstrous pose and roared. She pounded her fists on her chest. “AHH!!AHAH!!AHAH!!” she screamed, the thumping altering the sound of her voice.

“What’ll we doooo? Colonel! What’ll we doooo???” Mary whined.

The natives didn’t quite know what to do with two Outsiders. After securing the male, they finally decided after some debate, to simply wrap the girl’s arms around him and tie her wrists together. Then they fled as the gong began sounding and chanting started.

“It’ll be alright, Mary.” The military man assured the terrified girl “I’ll protect you.” He knew it was silly to say. Especially as the huge girl roared and looked down on him. He buried his own nervousness so as to keep her calm.

It didn’t really help. “She’s a monster!” wailed Mary “She’s gonna EAT US!!” And she used her limited freedom of movement to hide herself behind the larger body of Colonel Wilson.

“Wow! A little policeman!” Konga exclaimed, greatly pleased. He was dressed much like the policemen on her world. Countries didn’t really exist there, so there weren’t any armies. The old borders were for convenience and sports. Eagerly, she bent over the sacrificial altar, slid her fingers around his waist. But, she stopped when her fingers caught on something. Standing to her full height she walked around the altar.

Colonel Wilson let out a breath, slowly, so as not to worry his teenage charge. “See kiddo, we just might get out of this yet.” He offered. He didn’t quite believe it, nor was he exactly sure he wanted to. Only military discipline pushed his mind away from his ‘dark side’

“Sh-sh-sheee’sss l-l-looking a-at-t meee!!” Mary complained. She shuffled her feet, moving as best she could, until she could bury her face in the colonel’s chest.

Konga hid a giggle from the islanders “So they really hit the jackpot!” she exclaimed, crouching down “Red hair? Wow! Hmmmm… now how do I get you out of this?”

“Alright Mary, I have an idea. I can understand her, she’s speaking the same language as they do. Maybe I can reason with her.” Wilson said softly. The language wasn’t quite Hawaiian, but he could manage. He gazed up and said “Look, I’ll make you a deal. Let the girl go. And I’ll let you take me.”

Reaching around them both to flip the release switch, Konga laughed lightly and answered “Brave little man. Cute, too. Just wait til we get home.” With that, she freed him from the twin posts that held his arms and legs.

“Mary! Grab tight!” he ordered the teen, just as the bonds loosened. Unfortunately he didn’t get so much as a step before the solid structure of the altar fell away.

Konga hardly even noticed that her new toys even made an escape attempt. She simply closed both her hands around them and stood up.

Mary looked down and screamed. “PUT ME DOWN!!” Her feet were dangling off the ground as high as her bedroom window.

Of course, now that she had them, it was easy for Konga to separate them. All she did was slide the little redhead down the uniformed toy man’s body and they were apart. One in each hand, with the girl’s hands still tied, Konga held them high and roared for the islanders.

So similar in appearance to their Queen, the People were deeply impressed that she had magically separated the Gifts. They knew how fortunate they were to have Her protection. They cheered Her as She departed. The High Priest and the Chief wondered if more Outsiders would turn up.

“I said you could have me if you let the girl go!” Wilson yelled in his command voice.

Konga stopped walking and held him close to her face “Well I decided to keep both of you!” she said cheerily. “I guess I’m far enough from the villiage.”

And one second Colonel Wilson and Mary were surrounded by jungle. The next they were in a rather ordinary looking –- if gigantic -- bedroom.

Delighted with her new toys, Konga …
15531222222221.title: Colonel Toy ... err... Wilson

155312222222212.content:
James had mixed feelings about having been left alone. He’d known Colonel Wilson going back to when he was a Captain and the officer had taught him a lot about fighting and strategy. ‘Not thinking I can escape is a weakness’ he thought ‘But, then again where do I start? Bet the Colonel never thought of a fishtank as a prison. But, then, he’d never land here either.’

“---na go home!!” Mary pounded on the giant hand. Half of her sentence was lost in her own world.

Konga held the doll sized girl to her face and grinned “We are home. My home.” And, using the hand that held Colonel Wilson she gently probed her little stomach. The squeals amused her greatly.

“MARY!! OVER HERE!!” James screamed at the top of his lungs. He hammered his fists on the glass. But it was completely futile. At his scale, the glass was over a foot thick and it may as well be a mile from there to the giant girl’s bed. Even more alarming was when he realized that his girlfriend wasn’t her sole captive. Shocked, he cried out “COLONEL WILSON!!! NOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!”

With two to keep her attention, Konga allowed James to slip out of mind. She didn’t worry in the least that he might escape, so she didn’t even bother looking. She just sat on her bed. Switching focus, she noticed that the little man had on a hat. Still holding the girl, she flicked at his head, partially dislodging it.

“Careful!” Wilson demanded, swinging reflexively on the giant fingers. He righted his camouflage patterned cap.

Konga delighted at the action and de-capped the little man with another finger flick. Then she stroked his hair “Feels all rough, but soft” she observed.

“Look! Do whatever you want with me!” he said “But, send the girl back!!”

It was the second time he’d said that. Konga was deeply impressed “You’d be my hero, little man. If you weren’t a toy.” She said, then licked her lips “And what if I decided to eat you?”

Mary screamed in terror.

“I’ll get to you in a minute.” Konga said to the girl in her right hand. Then she pressed her nose into her little belly and added “Mmmmmmm. You smell good.” This was so much fun, Konga wondered why she’d never played with two of the islanders before.

Wilson gouged at the flesh of the giant thumb around his waist, gaining the giant’s attention “If that’s what you want, shall I take my clothes off for you? This stuff doesn't taste good.” he offered. As military, he hid his feelings completely, but after the words came out he felt a chill of fear run down his spine. But, something else too.

“No” replied Konga, playfully “If I want your clothes off, I’ll do it myself…Little man so brave…What makes her so special? She related?”

Again, Wilson had to suppress a reaction. ‘Wouldn’t mind it’ flashed through his brain, but he answered “No, but she is in my care.”

“The Colonel must have a plan.” James decided. He could see much of what was going on from his glass prison, which even magnified things some. What he saw next, just made his heart land in his stomach. The giant girl…
155312222222212.title: Konga's Bed

choices: Knowing she has no choice, Mary obeys
.   Konga decides she waited long enough
1553122222222122.content:
James could barely believe that the giant girl had casually tucked his hero and mentor under her leg. It was one thing for him to be helpless. But, The Colonel, he was NEVER helpless. James couldn’t hear any of what the giant was saying.

“Sneaky little man!” Konga scolded as he wriggled out from under her foot “And that tickles!”

Colonel Wilson was just beginning to get to his feet when something slammed into his back, knocking the breath out of his lungs. So fast, even his brain had trouble keeping up, he was slammed face down on the giant mattress and what felt like a steel girder landed on his back. He felt the weight and realized it was just the girl’s ankle. Where someone else might have given up, his sighing sound was the beginning of a recovery. In his military-trained mind, he already formed a dozen plans.

“Now, you, little girl.” said Konga. Pinning her new little man hardly took any of her attention, and about as much effort.

Due to the shift in the mattress, James could no longer see The Colonel. But with Mary in the giant’s left hand, he could see much of what was happening to his girlfriend. “MARYYYYYYYYY!!!!!!!!” he screamed, futilely.

“YOU PUT ME DOWN!!” screamed Mary at the top of her lungs. She kicked her legs and bucked her hips in a desperate effort to break free.

Konga wasn’t bothered in the least by her girl toy’s wriggling, any more than she was by the little man squirming under her ankle. In fact, she was rather amused by it. But, she did want to explore her, and couldn’t do that while she was wriggling like that. Now that both hands were free, she smoothed her right forefinger over her fascinating red hair and said “Easy there, I’m not gonna hurt ya. Just play with you a bit.”

That only panicked Mary more. She yanked at the fingers that encircled her waist with everything she had.

“OK, calm down!” Konga finally ordered, sharply. And she decided to force it by tightening her grip. The instant her captive squealed, Konga loosened her fingers. They went through several of these exchanges before she was still in Konga’s hand. Pleased, she asked “Now isn’t that better than wasting all that energy? Now, I’m Konga, what’s your name?”

Mary had a very sheltered life. Her parents owned the largest estate on the main island of Hawaii and hardly ever left it. One of their few travels was by yacht. On an earlier excursion, she’d met James. Slightly older, but far less experienced she fell for him instantly. Mary was more than prepared for a couple of days on her floating mansion. She wasn’t ready to be captured by a bunch of savages, and sacrificed to a giant girl. She looked up at the huge face and blubbered “M-Mary”

“Well, Mary, like I said, I’m not gonna hurt you.” Konga said with a mischievous grin “Play with you, yeah. But I’m not mean or nothing.”

The redhead looked away, nervously. No comfort there. All Mary saw were giant, dark, fingers wrapped around her waist “Please *sob* put me down!” she pleaded.

“That’d just leave you on my bed, little toy.” Konga replied.

Anger overcame fear, or the two got mixed up. Anyway, Mary slapped at the giant hand yet again. And, yelling back “I AM NOT A TOY!!”

“How come your chest didn’t bounce around when you do that?” asked Konga, deeply curious. “It happens with all the others.”

Ignoring the blood that began to pound in his ears at the remark, Colonel Wilson yelled “ALRIGHT THIS HAS GONE FAR ENOUGH! HEY GIRL YOU WANT A TOY!! USE ME!! NOT HER!!”

“Wait your turn, little man.” Konga giggled. With her free hand, she pinched his little kicking foot between thumb and forefinger and gave it a few playful tugs. Then returning to Mary, she curiously poked at the doll-girl’s chest. When the tiny mounds didn’t move like she was used to, she commented “They’re pretty big for your size. How come they don’t bounce?”

Mary was quite well built. She’d never answer the question, but she wore a 36c bra. And she was a petite 5’3”. Mary fought the giant fingers as they prodded her chest.

“Can’t tell anything like this.” Konga complained. It wasn’t that she didn’t like the way they moved around like solid balls under her fingers. Konga just didn’t like the mystery of how.

At first, James had been furious at seeing his girlfriend captured by the giant girl. He still was, deep down. But watching her getting touched, through his glass prison… he found it…well…interesting. Twice in the last couple of minutes he’d had to wipe drool from his chin and he began rubbing his growing hard-on against the glass. He was patient with his sheltered girlfriend, but he couldn’t help getting worked up watching the giant girl do what he’d only managed to just get to that point in the past month with Mary. He panted “Wonder …what she’ll …do next.”

“Take off your shirt.” ordered Konga.

Mary blushed and shook her head. Her effort, in reaction to the order was to protect her top. Her instinct backfired in that it just let her captor freely explore her breasts. She put her arms back up to block the giant fingers and pleaded “Nooooo and pleaaasseeeeee put me down!!”

“Toys don’t say no to their owners.” Konga countered, not angry at all. Rather she said it with an amused lilt. She was really enjoying how different these albinos differed from her usual toys. Their pale skin and different color hair was a delight. But the way they acted was what made it fun. She fought little Mary’s arms easily and probed some more before informing her “Either you take off your shirt, dollie, or I will.”

Colonel Wilson tried again to wriggle himself out from under the girl’s leg. He managed to get his hips loose before the legs shifted again and came down on his back. He grunted in frustration and slapped the mattress futilely.

Konga didn’t really care which way Mary decided. The momentary distraction caused by her little man’s escape attempt gave little Mary a break to rest. Konga brought the redhead right up to her face. In fact she let her nose bury itself in Mary’s yielding belly. From the unique position of looking up into her toy’s face, Konga asked “Well?”

“ <<gulp>>” Mary swallowed as if forcing her heart back down her throat “Err….ahh”
1553122222222122.title: Mary Dollie

15531222222221221.content:
“No freaking way!” exclaimed James. From his vantage point, he could see Mary’s shirt come off. It went flying, floated down, and landed on the floor below his fishtank prison. James was a torn by excitement (after 3 months he’d only once seen Mary topless) and a bit of jealousy.

For Mary, pulling her shirt off was an act of desperation. She was terrified of the giant. Couldn’t even think of Konga as a girl. As quickly as her shaking fingers allowed, the busomy redhead undid her shirt and, quiveringly, held it up to the monster. “H-he-h-here” Mary stammered “ju-ju-just d-d-don’t hur-hurt m-mm-me.”

“Sure, Paul, they’ll be fine with me!” Wilson cursed himself as he made another effort to free himself. This one seemed to be going slowly, but successfully. His training enabled him to control his breathing and move his body in ways few people could. While making his way out from under the girder that was just a girl’s leg, the military man gathered all of his sense of command and freed himself. He righted his uniform and struck an at attention pose, and attracted the girl’s attention with a “Harr—rrr--rummpff!”

And if Mary thought she satisfied the giant’s curiosity and helped her situation, she was about to be sorely disappointed.

After casting aside the girl’s little shirt, Konga’s face was split by a delighted grin. Her toy’s meek compliance made the dark girl’s heart skip a beat. Konga licked her lips and nodded “Well..lll.l..ll yeah… a bra would explain it. But, it’s the first time I’ve see one on a little --- Ain’t you sneaky, toy man!?”

“That is the main issue, young lady.” Lectured the self-confident soldier. Wilson crushed any emotion other than displaying the stern adult. And it was hard to ignore that, at his 6 foot & ½ inch height, he still had to look up at the seated girl. “We are people and you have no right to---”

Konga glared. She was hardly aware of her finger stopping within inches (Mary’s measurements) of the whimpering girl’s silk-encased chest. It was one thing for grown-ups her size to do that, but it was something else for him. Konga swept the little man off her bed and into her grip and gritted out “You’re not even close to being Daddy’s size!”

“Don’t hurt him! PLEASE!!” Mary called out, while Wilson just impassively looked up at the giant.

That moment really cooled Konga’s temper. She’d almost lost it and forgotten how helpless they really were. Also, despite that angry stare, she felt his little heart go pitter-patter under her thumb. Konga couldn’t help giggling. She could hardly do so with her other toys “I can feel your fear, little man!” she said menacingly “It’s very smart to fear me!”

“Never mind that.” Wilson argued “What you’ve done, young lady, is very serious. Where we come from it is called kidnapping. You--”

Konga giggled, cutting him off “Looks like doll-napping to me.”

“Now see here!” Wilson shouted in his ‘boot camp’ voice.

Konga didn’t pay him any mind “I’m really not used to having more than one to play with.” She thought out loud. And, with that she walked over to the fishtank, opened it and waved cutely, using the hand holding Wilson, “Hi little James!”

“HUH?? WHA??” Mary twisted around in the other hand, seeing her boyfriend “JIMMMYYYY!!”

“Wow!” Konga exclaimed, delightedly “You all know each other! I’m gonna have soooo much fun!!!”

James looked from one hand, to the giant girl’s grinning face, to the other. More than half befuddled, he yelled “PUT HER—HIM---THEM DOWN!!!”

“Sure, why not?” Konga answered, agreeably. And she dropped both the Colonel and Mary into the fishtank. She looked down at them with a contemplative smile and wondered aloud “Let’s see…I already checked out James…who should I play with next?? Ummmmm…
15531222222221221.title: Colonel in charge?

choices: .   "Now why are you so white, compared to my other toys?"
.   "Now why are your boobs so big, compared to my other toys?"
155312222222212212.content:
The reunited trio immediate fell into their roles. James gallantly threw a sheet around Mary, covering her shirtless state. Though, he did manage a quick peak, almost seeing nipple. His imagination took care of the rest. Mary accepted his hug gratefully, if bashfully.

“I think it is time for a little--” Wilson began. He’d interposed himself between the giant girl and his charges.

Konga giggled, greatly amused and interrupted “Hahaha…you said little!”

“Never mind that silliness!” snapped Wilson. If anything he was annoyed with himself “Now, I think we can settle this whole affair if you take us back where you found us.”

Laughing at the little man, Konga playfully reached into the fishtank to poke at him. To her total surprise, he’d pushed her finger aside. The deeply dark girl gaped down in astonishment. “How did you do that?!” she demanded, and “Let’s see you do it again!”

“Eich!” Wilson grunted as he shoved the approaching finger off to the left and again past him and his charges. A master of several martial arts, he reacted automatically to the threat. Wilson was successful a few more times. Most useful was Aikido, in which you used your opponent’s weight and motion against her. He got winded faster than he had against half a dozen opponents. He told his unit, the day any three of them could pin him he’d quit. But a couple minutes with the giant and he was panting. Wilson finally made a mistake. She was taking a swipe at his head. He ducked and pushed the arm-sized digit past his head. He barely had time to utter a weak “Uh-oh”

Mary, who cringed every time a giant finger got even remotely near her, screamed as the soldier collapsed under an avalanche of flesh.

“This is fun!” Konga exclaimed, quite delighted with her game. She was a bit winded too. But, unlike her little man, more of her energy was going into giggling. Every time he pushed her finger aside just encouraged her to repeat the attack. She noticed he was getting tired, so when he pushed her finger over his head, she just let her hand flop down. She laughed out loud at how he squirmed “Hehehe…that tickles!”

James pulled away from his girlfriend and angrily yelled “Let him up you monster!! COLONEL!!”

“Oh hush!” Konga said dismissively, she casually brushed him aside. With a smirk that just showed her teeth, she pinched the struggling man’s pant-leg between thumb and forefinger dangling him above James.

Red-faced from embarrassment and the blood rushing to his head, the soldier growled “Get back to your girlfriend! GO!”

“Hold it there, little boy?” the giant girl ordered. With her free hand, she blocked him from Mary.

Distressed, Mary whimpered “P-pl-uh-eezze!”

“Hmmmm” she said with interest, studying James “the bulge is back.”

The boy blushed handsomely and covered his obvious erection.

“I’ll get back to that later.” Konga said. Ignoring the weight of Colonel Wilson in one hand, she pushed James across the fishtank and then grabbed Mary. Next, she dropped Wilson, knowing the padding would provide a soft landing.

Wilson emitted an involuntary scream as he fell. But after landing unharmed he bounced to his feet and spun toward the giant girl. He followed her hand as it wrapped itself around the redhaired teen. “Come on, kiddo!” he yelled “On the arm!”

“RIGHT!” James bounced into action. He wasn’t sure why, but knew how to obey orders.

Konga watched their actions with equal parts of curiosity and amusement. She stopped with her arm half out of the tank and rattled it a bit. The one she’d de-panted lost his grip and landed with a soft thump in the tank. The one dressed in the odd-patterned clothes, she had to pull him off by again grabbing his leg. She lifted him, upside down, to her face, said “I’ll play with you in a bit.” After setting him down, she replaced the lid, set the thick book on it, waggled a finger at them, admonishing them to “Stay put!”

“HEY!” yelled James “BRING HER BACK!!” But he was talking to the giant girl’s back

Mary gazed up at the giant face in great alarm. She didn’t want to imagine what might happen to her. Some of the covering her boyfriend had wrapped around her remained, but the dark fingers around her hips did nothing to comfort her.
155312222222212212.title: A Tank Battle

choices: Konga holds up Mary, as she removes the bra
1553122222222122122.content:
James pounded on the glass and screamed. The heavy wall, which probably wouldn’t have yielded even if it weren’t gigantic, hardly produced a sound.

“Stand down soldier!” Wilson snapped in a tone that demanded obedience.

The boy had to look up slightly at his mentor. Though thanks to his exposure to the huge girl James felt he was looking at a midget. He threw himself against the glass and simply bounced, flopping on the cushioned floor of the tank. “Well!” he growled “Ain’t we gonna do something!?”

“What is the fifth rule I taught you?!” the colonel asked, sharply.

Glaring, almost resentfully, James shot back “Don’t panic in a crisis.”

“And the second?”

The boy automatically answered “Think before acting.”

“And what does that tell you about now?” asked Wilson. He offered a hand and effortlessly pulled the teen to his feet.
James sighed “That you need to know what happened since I got kidnapped.”

“More like snuck off the ship.” scolded Wilson, “But yes. And don’t go throwing yourself against that glass again. It’s as thick as your arm. Now, every detail, please?“

James swallowed, nervously, blushed and asked “Every…ulp…detail??”

“Anything!” the Colonel commanded, emphatically “Might help give us a way out.”

And while that discussion continued, Konga sat on her bed. With no real intent, she just happened to sit with her back to the tank holding her other toys. “I thought yellow hair was strange when I brought little James home.” she commented, excitedly “But I’ve never even met a red haired person. And now I’ve got one to play with!”

“Play??” whimpered Mary “I just wanna go home!” She tried to push away the finger that seemed determined to stroke her hair.

Konga giggled at the resistance. The ones that the young girl usually got obeyed because she was the queen. “I can really make you do anything I want, y’know.” she told the little girl as she twirled the red hair round and round.

“M-my n-n-ame i-is Mary.” she offered, hesitantly, looking up at the giant, almost black face. Her distress only increased when the monster smiled, revealing disturbingly large teeth. She fearfully asked “Yo-you’re not going t-to e-e ???

Konga laughed out loud, cutting off her squirming handful “I never hurt any of you toy people. HAHA! Well, not on purpose anyway. Eat you?? First, EWW!! That’d mean I’m a cannibal, well sorta. Plus, it’d be cruel and I don’t think you would taste that good anyway.”

<<Whew>> Mary exhaled explosively, relaxing in spite of still being in the giant’s grip.

Konga couldn’t help herself. She traced her lips with her tongue and, putting on mischievous tone suggested “I might take a lick or two. Ya know…just to see.”

“NOOOOOOOOOOO!!” Mary howled in a sudden panic. Her sudden wild thrashing around did nothing to loosen the fingers around her hips and legs. All it did do was throw off the …well from her perspective it was a sheet… that James covered her shirtless condition with. She froze, instantly scared, and more than a little bashful. She blushed all over.

Only the most severe blush was even noticeable among Konga’s race. It just never stood out against their dark skin. She knew what it was, but was fascinated by the pink coloration. She brought the pale little albino up for a closer inspection and stroked the soft, blotchy skin. It didn’t take long before she started exploring "Now why are your boobs so big? Compared to my other toys?"

“You don’t need to know about that?” countered Mary, as she pushed the giant finger away. Too bad for her, it was back in a flash and pushing at her breasts. She felt a slight comfort in that her bra was still on.

Almost as if she were reading her toy’s mind, while pinching and fiddling with substantial mounds, Konga decided “You’ll just have to take off the bra.”

“Uh-uh!” Mary refused, vehemently. She renewed her efforts to shove the dark, arm-sized, fingers away from her chest.

Some might have been angered, or at least irritated, at the fighting. But this was something new for Konga. For all the time she’d been bringing little people over, they were mostly obedient. After all she was the Queen. “If you don’t…little Mary” said Konga, menacingly. And emphasizing her intent with incoming fingers “I will.”

“Not happening!” Mary snapped. She managed to wrap her arms tightly about her chest.

Konga wasn’t bothered. She gave her little captive a playful poke in the belly and giggled at her reaction. Then, seeking a clasp to undo the silken garment, Konga swapped hands switching Mary back and forth. She ran her fingers along the strap across the redhead’s back. Then, pushed a finger into the small valley separating the curiously firm mounds that so roused her interest.


“What do you mean?!” James complained “That’s your great plan??? Patience!! What about Mary??” The boy had offered every detail, just as Wilson wanted, even the embarrassing stuff.

Where some would’ve sighed, the military man just moved on. “James James James the way out of this situation is minimal confrontation.” he explained “Under the circumstances, our best bet is wait until after dark and---”

“What – about --- Mary??” the angry teen demanded.

“We are in a fishtank” Wilson cut him off with infinite patience “The glass is thicker than your arm. The sharpest instrument we have is the ends of those pillowcases. That wire mesh above us is about 3” thick steel and even if we could cut it, would you care to have that book – it weighs about what a howitzer does – care to have that fall on us?”

James gave an angry look, but studied their prison with the teachings of his mentor “Ahh… no…” he admitted sheepishly “So what should we do now?”

“I think we should make you some pants.” The colonel decided “In case you’ve forgotten , when I got here you had been deprived of them.”

The boy blushed at the casual comment and said, hotly “She never saw jeans before. She said something about her father … I think… maybe they could make them.”

“That’s your story and you’re sticking to it … huh?” Wilson quipped, teasing his young friend. “Well, it’d be best for your modesty if you had something besides tighty whiteys.”

James shouted at him “COLONEL! YOU HAD A KNIFE ALL THIS TIME!!”

“You’d have me use it against someone 6 ½ times my size?” the soldier countered “Again, you’re not thinking. I doubt it would draw a drop of blood. And all it would lead to is losing it. Exactly how would I stop her taking it away? NO, this way I still have a useful tool.”

The boy kicked at the soft material in their glass prison and growled “Dammit! Sir why am I so stupid?!”

“You’re not, James.” He replied compassionately “In fact, for your age, I’ve taught you things most regular soldiers have to serve years to pick up. But we are in a real situation here. Stay calm, follow my lead, and the less we react to whatever she does the better off we’ll be.”

The boy gave a military salute and snapped “Yessir! Colonel, Sir!” then he gave an anxious look and said “Umm … sir … I think … err… She’s looking over here.”
1553122222222122122.title: Pinch Pinch Poke Poke

choices: Konga decides to play with … Mary
Konga decides to play with … James
15531222222221221221.content:
Mary felt great relief as, suddenly, the giant dark fingers stopped touching her. Fear kept her from asking why, she didn’t want to draw attention to herself. So Mary just sat there in the hand, nor despite her curiosity, did she question the girl as she got up and walked over to where her two friends were imprisoned.

“Umm…hide.” James gulped, panicked at the giantess’ approach. He backed into the far wall of their clear prison, then knelt and pulled up an end of the material and covered himself.

Wilson held himself still as she crossed her room. He noted the disheveled, partly undressed, but otherwise unharmed girl being carried.

“Where is…?” began Konga, as she noticed one of her toys was missing. In fact, it was exactly the one that had suddenly become highly interested in. Her worry only lasted a few seconds and turned to humor. She lifted the hand holding her girl toy up and told Mary, with a giggle, “Somehow he knew I wanted him. He’s so much fun. Tell me, do you know why he bulges between his legs?”

Mary, able to look her square in the eye for the first time, knew exactly what the giantess was asking about. But, shy and very inexperienced, she blushed turned away and mumbled “No. Please let me go.”

“Where’d James gooooooo?” asked Konga in a sing-song voice. The converted fishtank sat on a shelf that was slightly below her waist and the top was around shoulder height. She smiled broadly and greeted Wilson “Hi copper toy. Think you can find little James for me? I wanna play with him now.”

Wilson stood in a military ‘at ease’ posture and addressed her coolly “I am not a police officer. I am a s$@%$#r.”

Konga frowned as her translator still refused to do anything with some words her toys said. In this case, her world didn’t have nations, so no soldiers. But, regardless of his speech, her free hand easily removed the book from the top of the fishtank and she removed the wire-mesh roof to get at her two boys.

“And I would appreciate it, young lady” Wilson continued, refusing to allow himself to be intimidated by the display “if you would return us to where you found us. These two really must be getting home.”

Not bothering to reply, Konga reached into the tank and pushed him with a gentle nudge of her hand. It wasn’t that she wanted him anywhere. She was just amusing herself, and making a point. She liked the feel of his clothes, too. And maybe would study them later.

Wilson grunted with the effort of keeping his balance as the dark hand pushed him about his prison. He carefully kept his face impassive, not wanting the girl to know how her play was tiring him.

“Well, here ya go, toy girl.” Konga eventually said, even while she was toying with the little policeman. She used her middle finger against his chest to pin him in one corner then brought Mary in, settled her on the padded floor and released her.

Wilson watched as the dark hand freed its captive and moved around the tank. It really annoyed the soldier that this preteener could keep him helpless while not even looking at him. When he could move, part of his mind noting it was only because SHE let him, the Colonel rushed over to check on Mary. He shrugged off his uniform jacket “Here you go, dear. Wear this.”

“What’s the point?” she asked somberly “That giant will just take that off too.”

Konga caught the comment and grinned down at the little pair. She couldn’t help herself. Her right hand moved over them, one finger brushing the toy policeman and the next mussing, that unknown to her, head of long red hair. It was only a momentary distraction, however. Movement from that covered lump caught her eye.

“Maybe I can get to a corner.” James whispered to himself. And he slid to the glass, beginning to move forward. His girlfriend, he now knew, was free of the giantess’ grip. But he’d heard that she was now wanting ‘to play’ with him and …well…worried…that did not even come close to how he felt about that.

Out from under the attacking fingers, Mary spotted her covered boyfriend by chance. And exactly what was descending on him. She yelled “Watch out James!!”

“Bad toy!” Konga’s eyes flashed to the girl “I wanted it to be a surprise!” She didn’t really mind, though. As his little body squirmed under her palm.

It felt to James like a ton just landed on his back. If the giant wanted a surprise, she really shouldn’t be mad at Mary. His girlfriend’s warning hit his ears about a second before he had to grunt from the impact. James could guess what it was but he really didn’t want to. He just struggled to move until he was panting.

A burst of bravery overcame Mary as she charged and kicked the hand covering James “LET HIM UP YOU MONSTER!” she screamed.

“Hahahaha!” Konga laughed at her. The impacts of Mary’s tiny feet felt like taps on her skin. Her right hand swept in and took out her legs from behind, leaving the little girl sprawled on the floor. And before Mary could right herself, Konga pinched a foot between thumb and forefinger, and lifted her out of the tank to eye level. “I might have to punish you … later!”

Mary might have noticed there wasn’t much menace in that threat if she wasn’t scared out of her mind as she dangled from an alarming height.

“Don’t you dare hurt her!!” shouted Colonel Wilson. His fear for the girl overcoming his usual professionalism.

Konga laughed, bouncing the dangling Mary around quite a bit. Even if she had a firm hold on her foot. “Well, here you go then little man.” She didn’t quite drop her on him, but they fell in a tangle of arms and legs. Though, now that she thought about it, Konga had not finished exploring her girl toy. She caught hold the leg and again began lifting Mary. But, also at that moment, she felt James work himself out from under her hand.
15531222222221221221.title: Tanks Again

155312222222212212212.content:
James had barely managed to wriggle out from under what he knew was a giant hand when he heard a laugh. And again he was pinned

“Going somewhere Jamesey-toy?” asked Konga teasingly. Meanwhile listening to Mary’s yells to be put down. She wasn’t even quite holding the girl. “Boy I wish I had extra hands! So, who would you play with if you were me, little copper?”

Wilson gave up correcting her assumption he was a policeman, and in an effort to protect the teens offered “If you let them go, I will willingly let you play with me.”

“NO! Colonel!” came a muffled protest from James.

These new ones were full of such surprises! The dark-skinned young giantess loved them! She decided to test it a bit “Let me think about it, little man.” She answered. Then after a moment ordered “Brace yourself, I want to touch you a little. Don’t worry I won’t push you around like before.”

“Anything you want, if it will free the kids.” Wilson offered and added “It might be easier if you let Mary down, or take your hand off James.” He automatically repressed a shiver.

She ignored that, though. Instead she curled her fingers around the trapped boy, holding but not lifting him. And used the back of the hand that was holding Mary to rub up and down Wilson’s body. After a minute of stroking his side, Konga ordered him “Turn around so I can touch your back.”

“Yes ma’am.” He replied, wondering if the giant kid was considering his offer. Wilson decided to up the stakes a bit, leaning his body more into her hand.

Konga grinned as she felt more of the little man, asking him “Like that, do you?”

“Mmm..hmmm” he purred a bit. And it actually did feel good. Guessing her to be about the age of beginning puberty, he cast a flirtatious look upward and added “They’re just kids, you’ll enjoy me a lot more.” Wilson hoped that, if the giant girl was distracted with him, James would see an escape opportunity for himself and Mary.

After a couple passes Konga wanted to touch him even more, so she released the little girl’s foot and she ran her now empty hand up and over him. The backs of her fingers had trailed up his body. They lingered on his head, she gave them a bit of weight until she felt him trembling. And, grin turning a little naughty, she opened her fingers and eased them around his body. She let his arms come free and finally stopped when her grip circled his waist. And she just might have picked him up and taken him for a while, but that was when Mary freed James from her other hand.

“Shit!” Wilson cursed under his breath. He felt his feet come off the floor. It was even possible she could forget putting the lid back on. But, then the giant grip opened and he watched the girl’s attention turn to them.

Konga, smirked at them. It was a bit predatory. Her toy policeman had really tempted her. In the back of her mind, she wondered if he might have been up to something. But what… oh well, there was little James being helped to his feet by little Mary. What she’d enjoyed was ordering the man around, and she brought it to this. Waggling her index finger and telling James “Come here.”

“Err… hi miss, umm sorry I…uhh don’t remember your …ahh name.” he stammered as he tilted his head up to her face.

Konga smiled at him. She had, but it wasn’t important “That’s alright, toy, I’m not sure I told you. But, it’s Konga. Anyway, you’re ignoring my request. I said Come Here!” She put her right hand, thumb up in the fishtank, perhaps one of her feet from him. She could have simply grabbed him but this was fun. She liked the scared expressions on their little faces.

“Umm…I’m…thatis …not dressed.” He stammered more, pulling the floor’s covering around himself.

Konga had only caught a quick glimpse of his little body as Mary pulled him to his feet. But memory of her fun with him before made her want to speed things up. She grabbed the covering and yanked on it…hard. Not hard enough to throw them, but enough to rip it from James’ little hands. She didn’t want him too scared, so she didn’t mention his clearly exposed underwear.

“What about my offer?” Wilson asked, sharply. Trying to refocus her attention his way.

Not really considering that the Colonel might have as good a bulge, Konga gently pushed him back promising “I told you I’ll think about it.” Then smiled down, well mostly pleasantly at her yellow-haired toy “But, for now, James … come on… we’ll get you something to wear. Buuutt, you first …. Walk into my hand.”

“I … uhh… dunno.” He answered, nervously, holding up his hands and taking a couple steps back.

Mary put her arms around his waist protectively and yelled up at the giant girl “Leave him alone! Bully!!”

“Not like I’ve never held you before.” Konga pointed out, ignoring her. “And I didn’t hurt you? Did I?”

Hesitantly, James did step forward. The giant hand, so dark compared to his own skin, and especially his white t-shirt. He didn’t even want to think any lower… It sat there waiting for him. He cast his eyes up and saw an eagerness that made him shudder “Do you promise?” he asked “You’ll get me something …err clothes.”

“Well, if you don’t” she threatened “I can always---” And she left the sentence hanging. All she did was scrape a finger against his shin.
