“---You're a true frieeeeeeeend!!!” Hannah finished, holding the last note for a full minute. Breathlessly, she said “Thank you…At…lanta…you’ve been…a won…derful crowd…good night!!!”

The crowd kept applauding and chanting for more. But, Hannah was exhausted. Her manager came out, lifted her arms in a wave and guided her off the stage.

“Whew!” she fanned herself backstage. A roadie handed her a bottle of cold water. She dumped some of it over her head, tugged on her top and poured the rest down. The roadie handed her another bottle and she drank it. “Brrrr!!”

Her manager laughed “Well, what did you expect? Go change.”

“Yes Daddy” whispered Hannah, hiding her secret identity.

*********+

In Hannah’s dressing room, a weird purple light glowed. During that time, a teen screamed. But, with the concert going on, no one outside heard a thing. The light did its work of reducing the teen from over five feet to around 18 inches.

The concert ending didn’t help the shrunken teen’s situation. No one outside the dressing room heard the faint voice of the reduced victim. Banging on the door was also useless. With a last furious kick, the teen walked away from the impossibly huge door. That was when it sprung open.

*********+

Miley pushed open her dressing room door and walk in. All she wanted to do was collapse. She closed the door and tossed off her Hannah wig. Then she saw…it? She just stared at …it… in shock. It…looked like someone she knows. She took a step closer and, SURPRISE! It took a step back. She took another step forward, and in response …it… took two steps back.

This continued until …it… backed into a wall. Miley smiled and kneeled down. She hesitantly extended a hand and grinned widely “This is incredible!” she exclaimed “It really worked!! That’ll teach me to call Rico a liar! Come’re, now, let me hold you………”

Miley stood up, straightened her hair and pulled her rumpled shirt back into place “That’ll teach you.” She declared, giving the already slightly reduced Rico a harsh glare. “You warned me, Lily, thank you.”

“He was horrible to me.” Lily complained “He—he threw underwear at me. I got all tangled in it.”

Miley’s blood boiled “I’ll make him pay!” she growled vengefully.

“I wanna do it myself.” Lily countered in a tight voice. In her desire for payback, she forgot that she was walking across a bed, and that it had an end. The pint-sized blond fell right off the edge. “AAAHHH!”

Miley’s hands caught her as she fell “You should really be more careful, Lily.” More than a bit of affection crept into her expression.

“Gee…thanks…wasn’t watching” Lily huffed “That was kinda… stupid.”

Miley cuddled her shrunken friend to her cheek and said “No problem, Lils…I’ll always keep you safe.”

“Yeah.” Replied Lily “Look…Miles…Can ya ease up…y’know…On the handling.”

The singing sensation looked disappointed, she said “Ok…if that’s what you want.” She laid little Lily down on the bed.

“I’m **yawn** tired.” Lily said, then she pulled a corner of Rico’s Star Wars blanket over her body and curled into a ball. In moments she was snoring.

Miley carefully slid off the bed and walked over to the purple cloud. She made sure Rico could see her nasty face. Since he started out smaller, the shrinker worked faster on him. But, the black haired boy was still over two feet tall. Grinding a fist into an open palm, Miley declared “You’re gonna regret what you did to Lily.”

Rico’s field of vision was dominated by one very pissed off giant girl. “What about what you did to her?!?” he screamed back. Rather hoping to guilt his way out of trouble.

“Way wrong answer, shorty!” Miley replied. “Just you wait til you finish shrinking! Then you’ll really get what’s coming to you!!” Leaving Rico to contemplate his fate, Miley strutted over to the bed and gently laid on it. She ripped off another part of the blanket, rolled it into a pillow and tucked her shrunken friend’s head under it. Then, she gently stroked Lily’s tiny, curled up body with a single finger. Lily responded with a soft sigh.

About an hour later, Miley had stored up a fair degree of malice toward Rico. The purple light faded out and ,that same moment, Lily also awoke.

“You make me normal!” yelled Rico as soon as he was freed. “My father’s a big man! He’ll make you regret what you’ve done!!”

Miley knocked him over with a casual swipe of her foot and demanded “On your feet! I’m about the biggest thing in your world just now! So you do as I say!” With that, she snatched him off the floor.

“NO! Wait! Let’s be reasonable!” Rico whimpered. He was being threatened by a fist easily twice the size of his head.

“Hooolld oonn, Miley!” Lily said, still yawning. “W-what a-a-bout making m-me normal again.”

Miley shook her hand, rattling the shrunken boy “Well!” she demanded.

“HEY! That hurt!” Rico exclaimed.

Miley was quite unmerciful “Too bad.” She replied “I’ve got half a mind to tear you limb from limb.”

“Please! Don’t!” Lily yelled “Miley, you’re not a murderer!”

Rico’s very life was in the balance. The pop-star had hold of one leg and one arm. As of yet, he had only felt a slight stretching sensation. But he was scared, scared to death. He pleaded for mercy. And, apparently, he was heard, because he was dropped to the bed “Thank you, Thank you, Thank you, Thank you” he said to Lily as he scrambled to his feet. Then, up at Miley “You’re crazy!!”

“Don’t you know when to shut up!” Lily snapped at him. Rico was now ‘normal-sized’ to her, which meant she had a definite height advantage. She twisted her fists in his shirt and hissed in his ear “I just saved your life! Now, I want you to make me normal again!”

Rico pulled away, fell and scrambled as far as he could “I…I d-don’t kn-kn-know h-how!!” he cried.

“WHAT!?!?” both girls exclaimed simultaneously.
15532121221111222112.title: Rico's Little Scheme Backfires

choices: .   Lily is restored to her full five foot three
155321212211112221122.content:
Rico leaned over the edge of the bed and reached for the now shrunken Miley. “Aww! Nuts!” he complained when he didn’t quite capture her.

“Stop it, Rico!” shouted Miley. She began looking for an escape. The room, already larger than average thanks to the fact that Rico’s father was very rich, was now the size of a cathedral to her. She ran for all she was worth. From near the closet, Miley ran for the door.

Rico watched from the bed, without moving. One of his fingers stroked Lily’s leg absently.

Lily had learned two things in her dealings with Miley. First at 18 inches, you simply weren’t a match for a normal sized person. And second, you could let yourself get played with. Or, you could run until you were out of breath and still get played with. At least it was just her leg.

“Got ya, toots!” Rico declared. He pushed his bedroom door shut with his foot. “Ooops! Was that the sound of someone running into a door??”

Miley was dazed. She stumbled around but just as the cobwebs started to clear a hand closed around her body and she was lifted off her feet. The rush of air took her breath away. She squirmed against the boy’s fingers. “Let me go, Rico!” she demanded.

“You ever let go of your doll friend when she asked?” the not-quite-teen boy countered. He wasn’t saying it angrily, though. His voice had a highly amused tone to it. He stopped fingering Lily’s legs and flicked off shrunken Miley’s sandals. Rico was mostly a leg-man, so he enjoyed poking and stroking them. He had tuned out the protests and continued his probing. A grin formed on his face and he felt a stirring between his legs.

For Lily, standing there on Rico’s bed, it was a bizarre twisting of events. She had spent every waking moment of the last couple of days as a toy for giant Miley’s amusement. Even when Miley was dreaming, Lily had been her toy, in fact more so. To now see …HER… being played with was…well… Lily didn’t know what to call it, but it was interesting. She watched it with …interest.

“Rico! Put ME Down! And Stop Doing That! RICO!” Miley yelled. One of the boy’s huge fingers had just gone between her legs. She frantically pushed at it with both her feet and her hands. She had no way to protect herself against all those attacking fingers. Even now, with the minor victory of getting Rico away from her sensitive, just dampening, pussy; Fingers still touched her, she felt one beneath her, touching her ass. It made her uneasy, and what was worse with that it wasn’t even intentional. She shuddered at the thought of it exploring.

Lily, remembering her struggles in the former giantess’ grip, decided that it was worth a laugh or two. She found the payback entertaining. “Having fun, Miley-doll?”

“WHAT!” the mini-pop star snapped, glaring at her now equal-sized friend.

Rico laughed at the exchange between the two shrunken friends “HA! Miley-doll! I like it! Haha!!”

“Not funny Lily!” Miley growled.

Rico stopped toying with Miley and scooped Lily up with his free hand and brought them together. “Now, now” he said in a scolding tone “You’re friends and shouldn’t fight.”

“STAY OUT OF IT RICO!!!” they both yelled simultaneously.

The boy gave both shrunken girls a squeeze. He laughed when they both gave protesting squeaks. “Both of you behave!” he demanded. Then, feeling a surge of power and increasing lust, Rico told them “I want you to be friends again! In fact you should kiss and make up.”

“Not a chance!” Lily, from the right hand, exclaimed.

Not now being felt up by huge fingers, Miley on the other hand, was having different thoughts of her own --- lusty ones.

“Don’t think Miley-doll objects.” Rico commented. He cupped his hands together and pressed them together. Lily twisted and squirmed to avoid contact. Naturally, he noticed the reluctance, so he added “Come on…, Lily-doll,… play nice…. Remember your promise.”

Miley wasn’t much interested, all she knew was that she now had a willing, shirtless, Lily in her arms. She kissed her blond friend fully, and hotly on the lips. Miley slid one hand down and fondled Lily’s leather-skirted ass. Miley’s other hand slid upward and was soon filled by the soft cottony bra. After a couple of breath-stealing minutes, Miley sought out the bra clasp. She never got a chance.

“That was hot!” the sweaty, puffing Rico exclaimed

Lily, hair all ruffled and lips all red, looked up at Rico and said “You’ll make me bigger, right?”

“Rico always keeps his word!” he declared. He put Lily on his bed and picked up the shrinker. Then he twisted several knobs and pushed a couple of buttons. Aimed it at Lily and fired.

Lily saw the green light emerge from the shrinker. It hit her a split second later and all she could see was green coloring. But, she could see that things were beginning to change. This time, in the right direction. In only a few minutes, she had doubled in size. Of course, this only meant she was three feet tall.

The green growth ray faded and wavered then……
155321212211112221122.title: Keeping His Word

1553212122111122211221.content:
Rico covered his ears. The shout from giant Miley was like standing under a jet as it landed. After the roar faded, he yelled back “Well I’m sorry! I thought I had it worked out! Just a few adjustments!”

“You got a lot to answer for, buddy!” Lily exclaimed. She pushed Rico over. It actually felt good to be able to do that.

Rico rolled over and bounced to his feet. He’d been taking Aikido for almost a year. “Try that again, bitch!” he snarled.

“Watch your mouth twerp!” Lily snarled back and she swung.

This time, Rico wasn’t half dazed by Miley’s yell. He caught the blond’s wrist and twisted it.

“AHH!” Lily squealed in pain. Then squealed again as she was flipped over.

Miley had enjoyed the confrontation, but she hadn’t wanted either of the little cuties to get hurt. Since Lily was bigger, she expected that Lily would’ve won. Now Rico was behaving like a bully. She gave him a light swat across the back and he went flying. “That’s what you get for picking on Lily.” She declared.

“Uhh…thanks Miley” the shrunken blond said as she flapped her arm around.

Again fascinated by her doll-sized friend, the pop-star scooped Lily off the bed. “Is your arm alright?” she asked softly.

“Uh-huh.” Lily replied “He just twisted my wrist. It was a surprise, is all.”

Miley held Lily up to her face and lifted the hand Lily had been shaking to her lips and kissed it “I’m glad you’re not hurt.” She said in a silky voice.

“Wh-wh-at-t a-are you d-doing now?” asked Lily nervously. She watched as giant Miley licked her lips and sucked in her other arm. Lily made a disgusted face and moaned “Ewwww!!!”

Miley fought to keep down a laugh while flicking the little arm around with her tongue. She pressed Lily firmly against her lips so as to push the arm all the way in.

“God Miley!” complained the shrunk teen “This is just gross!!” Her arm, all the way to her shoulder had vanished between the huge lips. All Lily could do was tilt her head as far to the other side as possible so that at least the giant upper lip didn’t smother her. “Come on Miley! Lighten up!” she pleaded.

This had to be the most amusing thing Miley had come up with yet. It wasn’t particularly sexual in nature, just a fun game. And Lily’s protests added to the fun. What began to change Miley’s motivation was Lily’s constant twisting. The yellow mini-skirt caught on one of Miley’s fingers and she felt the back of Lily’s doll-sized leg.

“NONONONONO!!” Lily yelled when she felt the giant finger fondle her leg. But, the truth was she could really do much about it. She was fighting a battle on three fronts, minus her left arm which was trapped and now completely saliva covered. She could just imagine it looking all wrinkly.

Miley giggled at Lily-doll’s futile struggles and, turned on by her finger’s penetration of Lily’s skirt, she pushed it higher and grazed the firm little globes. She decided the skirt had to go. By this point, Miley had all but forgotten about the miniaturized Rico.

“Wow, that’s hot!” Rico exclaimed. He was enjoying the view from the bed of looking straight up Lily’s skirt. That was when, completely unawares, one of Miley’s feet swept the shrunken boy off the bed. Rico landed on the floor relatively unharmed due to the thick rug. He looked around in awe at the huge size of his room. His situation came down on him like a ton of bricks. He panicked and ran for the door.

Lily was desperate for any excuse to stop all the holding and fondling and licking. She spotted Rico heading for the bedroom door and yelled “Hey! Snap out of it!! Rico’s getting away!!!”

“No he’s not.” Replied Miley. Her head snapped around, seeking the little imp. Lily’s arms popped out of her mouth and her finger pulled away from Lily’s ass. Leaving only one hand to grip Lily, the other reached for Rico.

Seeing the approaching giant hand, Rico screamed in fear and doubled his pace. Fueled by adrenaline, he made it through the bedroom door and ran right into something. Dazed, he felt himself being taken into a set of hands and lifted off the floor. He couldn’t see straight.

“Well, hello there” Miley said, for lack of anything else to say. She had been caught in someone else’s house, which was bad in itself. But, explaining a couple of living dolls would be … difficult … At least it wasn’t one of Rico’s parents. It was one of his sisters.
1553212122111122211221.title: No Cure, Lily

15532121221111222112211.content:
The green growth ray restored Lily to her full five foot three. For about the first time in her life the sexy teen was the tallest person in the room. When combined with the fact that she was full sized again after 3 days of being doll-sized, Lily felt like a giantess.

“So, how do you feel?” the 12-year old boy asked.

Lily gave him a grin. She was very glad to be able to look down at him for a change “Well, Rico, you kept your promise. So I guess I owe you a little thanks .”

“Err…okay….” Rico said, nervously.

Lily walked right up to him and ran her fingers through his hair. “I really appreciate being normal-sized again.” She said. Then Lily tilted Rico’s face upward and kissed him on the lips.

“Hey ohhhh!” Rico exclaimed as the kiss ended.

Shrunken Miley, who’d been ignored reacted angrily “LILY!” she yelled “You can’t kiss Rico like that! He’s just a little boy!”

“Little?” asked Lily incredulously “Look in a mirror, lately?”

Miley looked up from her place on Rico’s bed at the two huge figures and backed away “Ahhh…err…” she stammered “Ok…everyone’s had their…fun…umm…how about…that is…err…growing me back.”

“Let’s not rush into anything.” Lily replied as she bounced herself onto the bed.

Miley dove out of the way of the incoming wall of flesh. “Careful!” she yelled.

“Well, well, how the tables have turned.” A more than just playfully dominant Lily observed. “Let’s check out the puny pop-star.”

Miley didn’t hear the words or the threatening undertone behind them. She was too fascinated to be scared. She walked over and touched her suddenly huge friend’s side. Then, before she could begin to enjoy it, she was lifted off the bed and into a set of hands. She squealed in protest “WHOOAAA!!”

“Hehe!” an amused Lily chuckled “So this is what it’s like holding a living doll. I could get used to this.”

Rico, eager to please, offered “I could shrink her more…if you want.” The boy sat on his bed, next to the pretty blond, and touched the shrunken brunette’s hair.

“Don’t touch me!” the 18-inch pop-star yelled, glaring nastily at the young boy.

In response, Rico laughed “Can’t stop me, toy girl.”

MIley punched and kicked at the huge, molesting fingers.

And, unaffected by Miley’s temper his fingers explored the little body. “Silk pajamas feel real soft.” He said, looking right into Lily’s face as he spoke. She didn’t seem to be aware of the fact that his left hand was on her knee.

“Turnabout’s fair play, Miley-doll.” Lily said. “Or should I call you Hannah-doll?”

Miley gave her now giant friend a harsh look and hissed “SHHHH!! Ix-nay on the Annah-Hay!”

“Think you’ve got bigger problems than that.” Lily replied to the pint sized girl in her hands.

MIley finally caught on to the possibility that Lily might be annoyed with her. “Ahh---Lils---you know we …that is ---uhhmmm…I w-w-was only p-pl-playing…right.”

“You made a plaything out of me!” said Lily in a harsh tone.

Miley looked up meekly and said “It was just a bit of fun, honest Lils.”

“So…any chance I could…err…get another kiss?” asked Rico. He had a starry-eyed look.

Lily made sure she had a firm one-handed grip around Miley’s waist and wrapped her arm over Rico’s shoulder “First kiss, huh, kiddo?”

“Yeah.” A bashful Rico replied.

“HEY! Remember me!?” Miley protested “Girl in the hand!”

“Guess that’s why you thought I couldn’t feel you fondling my knee…huh?” Lily said to him, ignoring Miley.

Miley glared at Rico, not caring about the size difference “You-you -keep your hands off my Lily!” she yelled.

“Aww…ain’t that the cutest thing.” Rico cooed “Think Miley-doll’s a little jealous.” Again, he toyed with Miley’s body.

Miley slapped the huge fingers that pawed her “Don’t call me that!” she ordered “And stop poking me!”

“Now, now, Miley-doll stop being so feisty.” Lily scolded her miniaturized friend “After all, it’s just a kiss.” With that, she leaned over and locked lips with the younger boy again. And she continued to ignore Miley’s protests.

Miley would’ve been furiously jealous if she weren’t so busy struggling against the fingers that kept tormenting her. She didn’t really mind being held by Lily, that is as long as she could get Lily friendly again. But Rico was another matter altogether. And there was the way he kept rubbing his thumb over her boobs. She wasn’t sure how long that went on, but she was relieved when it suddenly stopped. At least until she figured out why “LILS!” she screamed “RICO”S GOING FOR YOUR BOOBS!!”

“Slow down, there, sweetie.” Lily said, blocking Rico’s advance. “Just a bit too fast. I really should check in with my mother.”

Rico had delighted blurry look on his face. “Err…ok…You’re pretty amazing.”

“Not too bad yourself.” Lily replied. She ruffled his hair. “Look, you don’t mind if I take Miley-doll here home with me, do you? I’d kinda like to work her over…y’know.”

Still dazed, Rico replied “Nah, have fun. I can always zap someone else.”

“Great, thanks, hun. I’ll see you soon.” Lily replied. Then, she dumped Miley into the same bag Rico had carried her in and headed for home. The whole way home, she whistled a happy tune. She’d managed to get restored to full size, and a little payback on her now toy-size friend. Her walk home is……
15532121221111222112211.title: Hannah's Biggest Fan

choices: "Where have you been the last two days!!?" demanded her mother
155321212211112221122111.content:
Lily’s house was off the beach from Rico’s, between Miley’s house and school. The two high school girls usually met about half-way there. She made her way through the small park that was their usual meeting place. She could hear Miley’s squeaking protests. She sat down on a park bench and opened the bag. “Problem?” she asked sharply.

“Come on, Lils, lighten up.” Miley complained “Stop bouncing me around so much.”

Lily’s finger invaded the bag and poked the mini-popstar. “Hurts ,does it?” she asked in a cold tone. “Now maybe you get what I went through.”

“Awww! That’s not fair, Lily.” The shrunken girl whined. She rubbed her knee with one hand and her shoulder with the other.

Again, giving Miley a poke in the stomach, she accused “Then there was the way you stuck your tongue up my twat!”

“I didn’t do that!” Miley countered angrily. She didn’t like Lily’s hostile tone. But, after she said it, the idea got under her skin and a small smile grew on her face. “Although its not a bad idea.” She said wistfully. “Even had a dream about it.”

Lily slapped her leg. The vibration threw little Miley off. Only the bag saved her from a nasty landing on the pavement (Like falling out a 2nd story window on her scale) Instead she merely hit the bottom of the bag. “Miley!” the full-sized blond exclaimed “Are you alright?!”

“Yeah…I’m fine.” Miley grumbled. The fall had momentarily knocked the wind out of her. Miley righted herself and sighed “Ok Lily, I get it. You hate me.”

Lily face softened “I don’t hate you.” She said “I --- shit! Keep quiet!” She slapped the cover over and snapped the bag shut.

“Hey Truscott!” a female voice called.

Giant fingers had pushed Miley back into the beach bag. She squealed in outraged protest as she tumbled once again. The whole situation wasn’t working out at all like she’d hoped it would. She wanted to shout, but heard the hated voice and shut up.

“Wha’d’ya want, Joanie?” Lily sneered

The brown haired girl, who had been Lily’s enemy ever since they were five, plopped down on the bench beside her. “Been shopping?” she asked.

“None of your business, Palumbo!” Lily shot back.

Joanie gave an unfriendly smirk “No need to be rude.” She said, going for the bag.

“Hands off twit!” snarled a now angry Lily “Or so help me, I’ll slap you one!!”

After emitting an evil “Heh-Heh-Heh!” Joanie said “So testy. Oh well…no big deal…I’ll see ya round, Truscott.”

“Good riddance to bad rubbish!” Lily taunted Joanie’s departing back. She made sure that the brown-haired girl was well out of sight before reaching for the bag that contained Miley. She didn’t know that her nemesis hadn’t given up her quest. “You all right, Miles?”

The reduced pop-star squinted for a moment at the rush of light “Yeah.” She replied “Can’t imagine what she’d do to me.”

“I’ll keep that in mind if I ever need to threaten you.” Lily commented “Meanwhile, maybe I should get you home. I think I owe you some payback.”

Miley couldn’t help but be worried “Err…you’re not gonna hurt me? Are you, Lily??”

“You’ll just have to wait and see.” The blond replied ominously. Then she snapped the bag shut again and proceeded on her walk home.

Despite the implied threat, Miley felt a million times safer with Lily than she had the entire time she could hear Joanie’s voice. That girl was poison. And, she noticed that the bag wasn’t bouncing around nearly as much as it had the first time.

After the stopover in the park, Lily’s house was only about a five minute walk. She pushed the door open and …….
155321212211112221122111.title: Upset Lily

1553212122111122211221112.content:
Lily had to get up to her room without her mother seeing her. She already had a story worked out for her missing days. But, explaining Miley wasn’t so easy. And the only way to avoid that was getting to her room. Lily snuck around the outside of her house, peeking in windows. Finally satisfied, she opened the bag slightly “Payback time.” She announced to the shrunken Miley.

“Lily I---” the mini pop-star began, but was cut off when the bag snapped shut just as fast. Miley was getting worried. She wasn’t ready to consider that her friend might actually hurt her. But things definitely hadn’t turned out like she hoped they would. She pounded her fists on the fabric walls and yelled “COME ONNNNNNNN LILYYYYY!!! LET’S TALK!!!”

Lily, distracted by the sudden yelling, tripped over one of her own skateboards. She fell through the front door and thumped on the hardwood floor.

Heather Truscott had spent two sleepless nights not knowing where her daughter really was. She had managed to drift off briefly, huddled up on the couch. She was definitely going over the Stewart house first thing. A noise woke her and she rolled to the floor.

“Damn!” Lily exclaimed, rubbing her ass. And then “Ohh! Miley!! Are you alright?!?”

"Where have you been the last two days!!?" demanded her mother. “Are you alright? You’re grounded til you’re 40!”

Lily was stumped by the sudden implosion of her plan.

“Owwww!” a tiny voice moaned.

Lily’s Mom turned her head searchingly, commenting “That sounds like Miley’s voice. That girl has much explaining to do!”

“My ankle!” came from the bag.

Lily grabbed the bag containing Miley and said “Err…Mom…I’ll… uhhh…be right back.”

“Let’s see the bag.” Heather ordered her daughter, holding out her hand.

Lily’s eyes popped out “Umm…gotta goto the bathroom…back in a minute.” She said, trying to get around her.

“That wasn’t a request.” Heather said “Hand it over! NOW!”

Miley had fallen silent as soon as she realized what happened. Now, she desperately tried to pull apart the bottom of the bag. But, to her, the canvas was an inch thick. Quite impossible. Suddenly, she found herself looking up into a different set of giant eyes. All she could do look up, smile and say “Umm…Hi there, Mrs. Truscott.”

“Lily, can you explain why your best friend is the size of a doll?” asked Heather, her tone was so utterly calm as to be eerie. It was as if she saw a living, breathing toy person every day. But it was really shock.

Miley squeaked “EEEP!!” as the woman’s hand entered the bag. Before she could even begin to move, her waist was captured by grasping fingers. Miley yelped in protest as she was lifted out of the bag.

“Well its …aaaa…urrr….long story, Mom.” Replied Lily, she was highly nervous having been caught as she was “I…umm… don’t know where to begin.”

Holding the 18 inch girl up to her face for inspection, Heather said “At the beginning, of course.” And while she listened to Lily’s story, Heather examined the shrunken teen. She touched and prodded Miley with great fascination.

Miley didn’t like the woman’s explorations. Mrs. Truscott wasn’t touching her like a person at all. Miley was just being passed from one hand to the other. She felt like an object.

“Be silent!” Heather ordered the squirming little teen. Lily had just told her how she had been treated like a sex toy. It made Heather quite angry. She glared down at Miley and tightened her grip, growling “That wasn’t especially nice of you, girlie.”

Miley groaned as the fingers squeezed her stomach. She tried to free herself, but they were like steel. “Honest…Mrs. Truscott! I was…that is…it was only for fun! I woulda traded!!”

“What’s that?” asked Heather. “Do you really expect me to believe you would seriously have WANTED to trade places?”

Miley nodded “Uh-huh!”

“You are a very strange girl.” Lily’s mother commented. She flipped Miley upside down and just held her there, like that. She addressed her daughter saying “What do you say dear?”
Lily yawned and shrugged “Well, Mom… the truth is…I’m a bit tired.” She said “It’s really been a long couple of days. What I really need right now is a long nap.”

“That, I can believe sweetie.” Heather said, softly. “Well, the good news is I didn’t, and now don’t have to talk to your father.”

Lily nodded “Yeah, thank God for small favors.”

“That’s a really bad joke.” Heather sniggered.

Miley, with all the blood rushed to her head yelled “Hey! What about me! All this upside down stuff is murder!!”

“Oh…very well.” Heather said, impatiently.

Miley felt relief at being righted “Thank you.” She sighed.

“So…why don’t I keep an eye on your newly sized friend here, while you get some sleep.” Heather offered.

Nothing worried Miley more. “That’s alright…really…Mrs. Truscott.” She said “I’d much rather stay in Lily’s room.”

“Was I talking to you?” the woman asked, coldly.

Miley pouted at her friend and said “C’mon Lils…it could be a slumber party…just like always. Only this time we can share one bed. Like when we were kids.”

“Sure Mom…(yawnnn)…thanks…(yawn)…” Lily replied. She patted Miley on the head and added “Now you behave yourself and I’ll see you in a few hours.”

Heather kissed her daughter on the cheek and ruffled her hair affectionately “Off you go, then.” She said. “Well, now, what should I do with you for the next few hours?”

“Errr….” said Miley. She looked up into an intimidating face. “So…ahhh…what now?”
1553212122111122211221112.title: Miley and Lily's Mom

choices: Lily takes Miley into the shower
15532121221111222112211121.content:
Heather Truscott was among the most beautiful women in the neighborhood. The male of the species, from 13 through 80 followed her with their eyes. She had been an actress, and before that a supermodel and before that a child model. Now, though short of fifty, Heather was happily retired. The center of her life was her only daughter.

“Please Mrs. Truscott.” Miley pleaded “I was never gonna hurt Lily! It was just for fun!!” She wasn’t seeing a beautiful woman at the moment. She was feeling the clutch of a tight grip around her waist. Looking into the huge woman’s face, all Miley saw was danger.

Lily’s mother seethed with repressed fury. But, now that her daughter was in bed, Heather planned her revenge. “Two days not knowing where she was!” Heather growled angrily. She snarled at the 18-inch girl in her grip.

“I was just having fun!” Miley yelled back, struggling to loosen the fingers that were compressing her waist. But they were like steel.

Heather gave her an evil look and said “Well, now it’s my turn to have fun.” With that, she took Miley into the kitchen and dumped her on the counter. She brought out a knife and waved it menacingly at the little teen.

“Please…what’re gonna do?” Miley whimpered.

Heather ordered the little teen to “Roll over!”

“Uh-uh.” Miley cringed away fearfully. She froze when the cold steel touched her stomach.

All Heather said was “Now!”

“O-O-okay.” The defenseless girl stammered. Then, after obeying, the point of the blade slammed into the countertop right beside her head. She cried out in fear “AHHHH!!!”

Heather laughed maliciously and said “Now, off with your pants!”

“What?” a panicked Miley asked.

Using the knife, Heather slashed the shrunken girl’s pants open “And that is what you get for disobedience.”

“Hey!!” Miley complained. She spun around and stood up. There wasn’t even a mark on her backside. She looked up at Lily’s mother and sobbed “That was sc-scary. Pl-please b-be careful.”

Glaring down at the girl on the countertop, Heather simply said “Shirt and bra, too. Now!” She emphasized her advantage by directing the point of the knife at Miley again.

“Uh…uh…okay.” Miley whimpered. She pulled her shirt over her head and set it on the coffee maker that was shoulder height to her. Then, reluctantly and hesitantly, she popped the latch between her cups and her breasts sprung free. She then put her bra right on top of her shirt.

Heather barely looked at Miley and said “On the counter again. Face down.”

“Ahh…Mrs. Truscott---”

The knife swept in on the miniaturized girl, knocking her down and pinning her in place. “Now the first step is proper tenderization of the meat.” said Heather, reading from a book “Hmmm…the side of this knife should do.”

“Huh? Wha?” a panicked Miley questioned. She tried to move, but a pair of huge fingers pushed her back and pinned her to the counter. She cried helplessly as the steel repeatedly assaulted her exposed rear. Finally, after what could have been seconds or hours, it stopped.

While Lily’s tormentor suffered, Heather put her next scheme into effect “Let’s see…egg…milk…water…a dash of salt, and flour.” She went through her list, then said “Annnndd mix.”

“WH-what a-are y-you d-doing?” Miley asked.

It was the first time Heather acknowledged her “Getting dinner ready…of course. Thought we might have breaded cutlets.” She replied, then “Ah-ha! Knew I had bread crumbs!”

“Oh nice.” Miley said. The beating had exhausted her, so she really couldn’t raise any emotion. In very quick succession, she was scooped off the counter, dumped into a bowl, covered in sticky stuff and rolled in bread crumbs. The huge fingers pushed her around getting more and more of the stuff all over her body. She screamed in panic “NO WAY!!! NO HOW!!! SOMEONE HELLLPPP!!!”

Except for a wicked smile, Heather ignored the fearful shouts. She grabbed up the shrinkee in her hands and dumped her into a pan. “An hour at 350 should do it.” She said.

Miley fainted.

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-

Some time later Miley woke up. woke up! Woke Up! WOKE UP! She couldn’t see, and she was all sticky. But, obviously, she was still alive. And that was a huge win!

“You’re sure she’s alright?” a rather frantic Lily asked. She threw open the oven door.

Heather laughed lightly. “Of course, dear.” She replied “Miley might have a difficult time sitting for a day or two. But I didn’t do any permanent damage.”

“LILLLEEEEEEEE!!!” the 18-inch girl screamed. She struggled, and severely failed, to get to her feet. She slipped all the way to the back of the oven. She was totally scared. “Please get this stuff off me!!!”

Lily leaned over with a friendly smile and said “Come on, Miles, I’ll get you cleaned off.”

“Really?” Miley questioned, still scared.

Lily closed her hands around the quivering girl, lifted her away and stood “Up you come.” She said

“Just…please…” said Miley weakly “your Mom…keep her…away…Pleeease!”

Lily nodded and said “Sure, no problem. But she really was only trying to give you a good scare.”

“W.w.well i-it w-w-worked.” The shrunken girl stammered. Miley still didn’t really realize what a true mess she was. With bread crumbs stuck all over her body, as if she’d been rolling around in sand on the beach.

Part of Lily felt pleased that Miley had been so shocked by her Mom’s actions. But, she was also guilty about how far she took the torment. Lily took her shrunken friend up to the bathroom. Looking at the quite helpless girl in her hands, Lily began feeling rather interested in her. She wasn’t quite sure what to do….

“Not like you could anyway.” Said Lily in a calm, cool tone. She continued her inspection of her shrunken best friend’s rear, rather absently for a full minute, until she lifted Miley to her lips. All she did for a time was press her lips against the soft diminutive mounds. The ass cheeks were so silky and smooth.

Miley didn’t mind Lily’s fingers being wrapped around her. The giant lips on her rear felt a little like sandpaper, but really enjoyable. She continued tugging at the bra-cup, but Lily’s fingers on her shoulders still trapped it in place “Come on Lils!” she demanded, her voice forceful “I wanna see what’s going on!”

There were the occasional sucking and soft smacking sounds caused by the action. She now ignored the steamy water that was hitting her belly and running down her legs.

Miley repeated her complaint “I SAID! I GOT RIGHTS!!” Her feet lashed out again, this time she felt it connect with Lily’s chin. Satisfaction warred with fear in the shrunk pop-star. Then she was flipped between the giant hands --- the huge bra-cup she had been struggling with fell off--- and turned face up to look in Lily’s giant face. The green growth ray restored Lily to her full five foot three. For about the first time in her life the sexy teen was the tallest person in the room. When combined with the fact that she was full sized again after 3 days of being doll-sized, Lily felt like a giantess.

“So, how do you feel?” the 12-year old boy asked.

Lily gave him a grin. She was very glad to be able to look down at him for a change “Well, Rico, you kept your promise. So I guess I owe you a little thanks .”

“Err…okay….” Rico said, nervously.

Lily walked right up to him and ran her fingers through his hair. “I really appreciate being normal-sized again.” She said. Then Lily tilted Rico’s face upward and kissed him on the lips.

“Hey ohhhh!” Rico exclaimed as the kiss ended.

Shrunken Miley, who’d been ignored reacted angrily “LILY!” she yelled “You can’t kiss Rico like that! He’s just a little boy!”

“Little?” asked Lily incredulously “Look in a mirror, lately?”

Miley looked up from her place on Rico’s bed at the two huge figures and backed away “Ahhh…err…” she stammered “Ok…everyone’s had their…fun…umm…how about…that is…err…growing me back.”

“Let’s not rush into anything.” Lily replied as she bounced herself onto the bed.

Miley dove out of the way of the incoming wall of flesh. “Careful!” she yelled.

“Well, well, how the tables have turned.” A more than just playfully dominant Lily observed. “Let’s check out the puny pop-star.”

Miley didn’t hear the words or the threatening undertone behind them. She was too fascinated to be scared. She walked over and touched her suddenly huge friend’s side. Then, before she could begin to enjoy it, she was lifted off the bed and into a set of hands. She squealed in protest “WHOOAAA!!”

“Hehe!” an amused Lily chuckled “So this is what it’s like holding a living doll. I could get used to this.”

Rico, eager to please, offered “I could shrink her more…if you want.” The boy sat on his bed, next to the pretty blond, and touched the shrunken brunette’s hair.

“Don’t touch me!” the 18-inch pop-star yelled, glaring nastily at the young boy.

In response, Rico laughed “Can’t stop me, toy girl.”

MIley punched and kicked at the huge, molesting fingers.

And, unaffected by Miley’s temper his fingers explored the little body. “Silk pajamas feel real soft.” He said, looking right into Lily’s face as he spoke. She didn’t seem to be aware of the fact that his left hand was on her knee.

“Turnabout’s fair play, Miley-doll.” Lily said. “Or should I call you Hannah-doll?”

Miley gave her now giant friend a harsh look and hissed “SHHHH!! Ix-nay on the Annah-Hay!”

“Think you’ve got bigger problems than that.” Lily replied to the pint sized girl in her hands.

MIley finally caught on to the possibility that Lily might be annoyed with her. “Ahh---Lils---you know we …that is ---uhhmmm…I w-w-was only p-pl-playing…right.”

“You made a plaything out of me!” said Lily in a harsh tone.

Miley looked up meekly and said “It was just a bit of fun, honest Lils.”

“So…any chance I could…err…get another kiss?” asked Rico. He had a starry-eyed look.

Lily made sure she had a firm one-handed grip around Miley’s waist and wrapped her arm over Rico’s shoulder “First kiss, huh, kiddo?”

“Yeah.” A bashful Rico replied.

“HEY! Remember me!?” Miley protested “Girl in the hand!”

“Guess that’s why you thought I couldn’t feel you fondling my knee…huh?” Lily said to him, ignoring Miley.

Miley glared at Rico, not caring about the size difference “You-you -keep your hands off my Lily!” she yelled.

“Aww…ain’t that the cutest thing.” Rico cooed “Think Miley-doll’s a little jealous.” Again, he toyed with Miley’s body.

Miley slapped the huge fingers that pawed her “Don’t call me that!” she ordered “And stop poking me!”

“Now, now, Miley-doll stop being so feisty.” Lily scolded her miniaturized friend “After all, it’s just a kiss.” With that, she leaned over and locked lips with the younger boy again. And she continued to ignore Miley’s protests.

Miley would’ve been furiously jealous if she weren’t so busy struggling against the fingers that kept tormenting her. She didn’t really mind being held by Lily, that is as long as she could get Lily friendly again. But Rico was another matter altogether. And there was the way he kept rubbing his thumb over her boobs. She wasn’t sure how long that went on, but she was relieved when it suddenly stopped. At least until she figured out why “LILS!” she screamed “RICO”S GOING FOR YOUR BOOBS!!”

“Slow down, there, sweetie.” Lily said, blocking Rico’s advance. “Just a bit too fast. I really should check in with my mother.”

Rico had delighted blurry look on his face. “Err…ok…You’re pretty amazing.”

“Not too bad yourself.” Lily replied. She ruffled his hair. “Look, you don’t mind if I take Miley-doll here home with me, do you? I’d kinda like to work her over…y’know.”

Still dazed, Rico replied “Nah, have fun. I can always zap someone else.”

“Great, thanks, hun. I’ll see you soon.” Lily replied. Then, she dumped Miley into the same bag Rico had carried her in and headed for home. The whole way home, she whistled a happy tune. She’d managed to get restored to full size, and a little payback on her now toy-size friend. Her walk home is……

“Hold on for one second, dear.” said Mrs. Truscott “Let me find out who that is.”

Lily nodded and picked up Miley. She couldn’t help grinning as she felt her 18-inch friend’s slight weight (a few pounds ) “Just big enough for my hand.” she commented.

“Whooo!” Miley squealed as her feet left the table.

Lily gave her a mildly annoyed look and said “Oh stop complaining.”

“I’m not complaining.” the shrunken pop-star giggled. “This whole thing is fun…Well, mostly, anyway.”

Lily’s reaction to THAT was basically the same. She rolled her eyes and said “You’re just weird. Oh well, back to my room.”

“And what might we do there?” asked Miley. There was a mixture of playfulness and a hint of uneasiness in her tone.

Lily looked at the girl in her hand. Miley looked incredibly cute in the imitation leather mini-skirt. Her second hand came up haltingly, going for Miley’s legs. “Well.ll.l.l.l”

“Lily dear!” the blond’s mother called from the front door “It’s Mrs. Collins! We’ll be out on the porch!”

Momentarily startled, Lily flinched and called back “Sure Mom!” She had forgotten her previous (less than clean) thoughts. Instead she just curled her fingers around Miley’s upper legs and shifted her other hand higher on shrunken girl’s body.

“Come on Lils!” complained Miley. “Loosen up! You’re pinching my shoulders!”

Lily gave a half amused, half annoyed snort and said “Aw…you wimp!” But, she loosened up, anyway. Basically, little Miley’s back and head just rested in her palm. She quickly made her way through the living room and up the stairs to her room. Lily pushed her door open with her hip, then kicked it shut.

“So, what’re we gonna do?” asked Miley. She gave Lily a cute smile and a wink.

Lily rolled her eyes at the 18-inch pop-star, asking “Don’t you ever quit?”

“What?” was the innocent sounding retort.

“You know what.” Lily countered “Don’t you think of anything other than messing around?”

Daringly, Miley shot back “This coming from the girl that’s got her hands on my ass.”

“Not true, actually.” argued the normal sized girl with a playful smirk.

Looking less than brilliant, Miley asked “Err…huh?”

“Technically, its hand…as in one.” Lily lectured “And, it’s the other way round. Your little ass is in my hand.”

Miley’s jaw fell open. She made an effort to twist around. Clutching fingers restrained her. “Guess you’re right, Lily.” she said “Sooooo… since you got my little ass...”

“I’ll make you a …umm…little deal.” Lily offered “Ha…little deal…I funny. Anyway, you want me to ….ahh…plaayyy with you right?”

A tingle went through Miley’s body. The emphasis her giant friend had put on the key word made Miley scared and thrilled and nervous all at the same time. A little on the timid side, she nodded and replied “Sure.”

“One condition.”

Now, fear led the way as Miley replied “Err…Ok…I guess.”
“Nothing bad, Miley. I promise.” said Lily “All you have to do is beat me at checkers.”

Miley gave a curious, doubtful look and asked “That’s it? Why?”

“Dunno.” Lily answered “One thing…though…It’ll be a hoot to watch you pushing the checkers around.” Still holding Miley, she went to a bookcase and brought the board and pieces down. Then, she tossed the board on her bed and emptied the box. Lily hopped onto the bed and set Miley down amidst the pile of black and red checkers.

Sitting in a pile of pizza-sized (comparatively) Miley looked up at Lily’s face, who was just sitting there looking down at her. She crossed her arms stubbornly and asked “What? You expect me to do all the work?”

“I did my part.” Lily said, amused by the protest “I got the board and pieces down. You set’em up.”

Miley frowned up at her and observed “It’d be quicker if you did it.”

“True.” agreed Lily “but not as much fun to watch. So…get to it.”

The 18-inch celebrity scowled at her full-sized friend and grumbled “Oh….fine.” She stood up on the mountain of checkers and chewed on her thumb, wondering how she would get it done. Her musings were interrupted by a pair of fingers that swept in and spun her around. Her arms flailed about wildly trying to keep her balance, but she fell over.

“Oops!” Lily exclaimed, cheerfully “Watch out for attacking fingers!”

Miley rolled over quite smoothly and bounced to her feet. “That wasn’t very nice.” she commented, glaring up at Lily.

“It was fun, though.” Lily giggled. Then, coming at her mini-friend from behind, Lily’s other hand took Miley down and again she was flat on her back. Lily laughed out loud this time as Miley stood again. “Oh…(chuckle) …I’m sorry… (giggle)… Just couldn’t help …(haha)… myself. I won’t…(hehe) do it again.”

“Great.” Miley groused “Anyway…while you were …amusing… yourself, I figured out how to do this quick.” She proceeded to stack the giant checkers and then push stacks across the board. Row after row filled until the board was set.

Lily watched, impressed with Miley’s solution. She would’ve felt guilty if she’d interrupted the hard work. And, really, watching Miley push the checker stacks around was, in its own way, entertaining. “Hmm…” she grunted, with a pleased look “Not too bad, not too bad at all.”

“Why thank you.” Miley replied, not displeased with her efforts. The work had made her a little sweaty, she went to unbutton her Barbie-made top. She found it impossible to open the snap. She pulled it this way and that, no luck.

Lily laughed at the futile effort little Miley was making to undress. She told her shrunken friend “Now, maybe that’ll teach ya. I will undress you --- when I feel like it.”

“Any chance you feel like it now?” asked Miley, coyly. She thrust her hip to one side and pushed her chest out in a sexy pose.

Lily paused in thought, nibbling on a fingertip, then ….

…shook her head "Nah, checkers time. You can go first."

Miley frowned in disappointment. “Wouldn’t you rather--- play?” she asked.

“We are going to play…Checkers.” Lily replied forcefully. Her hand had twitched slightly. She actually DID want to, but she was going to do it on her own terms. “You can go first.”

Miley looked up at her and grumbled. She’d thought by now that Lily would’ve given in. As far as the 18-inch pop-star could tell, her friend wasn’t the least bit interested. So, she sighed and said “Ok.”

“Hmm…nice first move” commented the full-size blond. She reached forward, purposely picking a checker that was close to Miley and pushed it forward. She hid a smirk when little Miley tried to get closer. It was a bad attempt at being subtle.

Five moves, and ten minutes, later Miley sprung an impressive trap and triple-jumped Lily. “EEEeeee!!” she squealed happily and bounced up and down.

“Nice move.” commented Lily. She wasn’t surprised, or worried, by the move. A bit of fun was in order, though. Her hand swept in and pushed Miley over. She trapped the shrunken girl under her hand and dug her forefinger into the exposed side.

Miley wriggled and thrashed around under the giant hand “What’cha doing! That was a legal move!!” she protested. Miley laughed and screamed. Her every attempt to escape was met by constraining fingers. The hand held her to the bed like a seatbelt. Using her hands to push at it did no good.

“Resistance is Futile.” Lily quoted from Star Trek in a mechanical sounding voice. Lily laughed as Miley continued to twist around. She felt the little girl against her fingers, then as Miley shifted, the little leather-skirted ass ground itself into the joint between her thumb and forefinger. She stopped when she realized Miley was enjoying the motion. Lily lifted her hand and grinned down at the panting shrinkee.

The shrunk pop-star just laid there for a minute. Then, still breathing heavy, stood up “You …did that… just cause I …triple jumped …you!” she said, accusingly.

“Hehheh!” Lily laughed in response “No I didn’t, Miles. I did it to amuse myself. You were always bigger and used to pin me and tickle me silly. Now, you’re the little one. And ….(haha)… I can do it one handed.”

Miley crossed her arms over the coarse material of the Barbie top and asked “Then, why’d you stop?”

“Well.l.l.ll” Lily considered her answer and a slow smile appeared. She gave Miley a playful nudge with the back of her hand and answered “I guess it’s like this. Y’see…in part…I saw you were…umm…tired out. But, mostly, I stopped because I…well…it seemed you were enjoying it…err…more than I …ahh… was.”

Miley grunted “Hmpf!” and said “Don’t know what you’re talkin’bout.”

“O-Hoh!” Lily laughed “Is that so? Then just what was your little butt doing grinding itself in my palm? Huh?”

Miley smirked up at her and said “It was your imagination. Or…maybe…it’s what you WANTED me to be doing.”

“You think what you want.” replied Lily, in flat tones. “Back to the Checkers Game.”

Miley knew that tone in her friend. She wasn’t telling the truth…not the whole truth, at least “Whatever you say, sexy giant. That’s why you let me triple-jump you.”

“You’re just tall enough to jump to my knee.” Lily taunted her “And the game ain’t over yet.” Three moves later, she jumped six of Miley’s checkers in a single sweep and gaining a king in the process.

Miley looked on in shocked disbelief as it happened “Ahh…bu…how!” she stammered “You! Huh!”

“I knew that was coming!” Lily exclaimed, with a look of delight “GOTCHA!!”

Miley’s head sunk to her chest in defeat “Aww…shit!” she cursed.

“Poor baby!” laughed Lily “Guess that’s it then, huh.”

Miley frowned “Hell NO! Double or nothing!”

“What’ve you got to bet with?” scoffed Lily. “You’d be butt naked without my Barbie doll clothes.”

Miley looked up with an irritated expression and shot back “You know what I mean! Best two outta three!”

“Fine, why not.” Lily allowed. And four hours later, long after the sun had gone down and it was pitch black outside Lily’s window, the full sized blond acknowledged defeat at game #17. “You… (yawwwnnnn) …win.”

Miley stomped her foot on the mattress, a rather futile gesture. “Come on Lils!” she growled “Pay off!!”

“Sleeeeeepppeeeeeee!!” Lily stretched and yawned. She swung her legs onto the bed. The checkers were scattered on the floor. Lily reached for Miley, grabbed her around the thighs and blindly pulled one of the Barbie-blouse snaps apart. After that, though, her body just slumped over ---sound asleep.

As the full-size girl fell over, Little Miley was thrown around. When the bouncing around stopped, the hand holding her sprung open and she rolled out of the fingers, off the bed and onto the floor. “WHOOOOAAAA!!!” she yelled. It was quite a ride, but thanks to Miley’s size, she was big enough to land unharmed. Miley couldn’t get up right away and fell asleep on the thick rug.

And, hours later, Little Miley was woken up by a noise. Looking around, she saw it was still dark. Miley saw one of Lily’s hands hanging over the edge of the bed and began making a determined effort to climb up. That was when the bedroom door swung open.

“Well Well Well ---What have we here?” asked Heather Truscott. She usually checked on her daughter when she knew Lily would be asleep. “Either you’re trying to sneak off. Or…your owner decided you belonged on the floor…As I see it, you are being disobedient either way.”

Miley shivered in distress. Her last encounter with Lily’s Mom was horrifying to her. The last thing she wanted was another, especially with Lily out of the picture. Miley had only pulled part of her body onto the bed, so she had no opportunity to move as Heather’s hands closed around her and picked her up.

“Da-addd! Can’t you turn out lights!” Saint Sarah complained. At least, that was what most of the kids in school called the cute 15-year old girl with light brown hair. Sarah was kind to every creature she met, except for her fellow humans. In her opinion, they weren’t good to the environment.

Sarah’s father, Larry, had left the sink and shower in the bathroom dripping. As well as two lights burning. He was almost out the door when he heard his daughter’s voice. He replied carelessly “That’s what I have you for, sweetie.”

“And that clunker you drive!” Saint Sarah continued as if she didn’t hear. “It gets 13.4 miles to the gallon! All that carbon monoxide!!”

Larry got into said car, rolled down the window and started it up “This car --- young lady --- is a classic. It’s three times your age! See you when I get home.”

“I will find an environmentally friendly way to get around!” declared the tree hugging teen. As she entered her fenced backyard.

After escaping her best friend’s nasty brother, Lily fled the house, aiming for her own. But the five miles was fraught with hazard. And, much farther than she remembered. She heard laughing behind her and ducked through a hole in a wood fence. Watching carefully, she saw a trio of young girls maybe ten years old, pulling a dog along by a leash. She shivered “All I’d need, them finding me. Think they’re Rico’s sisters. BRrr!”

“Grass is growing well.” Sarah commented pleasantly “Maybe it can become a power source.”

The shrunken blonde spun at the sound of a closeby voice. In an instant she saw the danger in her approaching schoolmate. But the voices of the young girls were still too close. She gasped “Freeze!” It was a mistake.

“Yike!” the normal size girl squealed at the voice. But, looking around, no one else was there. Then Sarah naturally sought the source, and in the uncluttered yard, it was easy to locate. Against the fence was a small human figure. She walked up to it and looked down. She studied it briefly, from a couple angles, then crouched down and extended her hand saying “A doll of some kind. Wonder if a kid dropped it.” (recall the Glumdalclitch scene in 3WOG)

Having held herself still, Lily could do nothing but watch as the comparatively 20 foot girl bent over her. And she thought “Too late to run.” As fingers curled around her waist.

“Must be the most realistic doll I’ve ever seen.” Sarah commented as she lifted it and stood simultaneously. Briefly, the brown haired girl tiptoed to peer over her fence. Seeing no one, she slowly crossed her yard and entered her room. It was very large but most of it was given over to a table that held assorted lab equipment.

As her captress walked, devouring enormous distances, Lily concentrated on holding her face still. Having waited too long, the miniaturized blonde thought of how she had to continue to let the school oddball think she was a doll. Eventually, everyone puts a toy down to do other things. Lily would just have to hope Sarah got bored easily, thinking ‘Sweet innocent Sarah, not a purvvy bone in her body.’

“You are amazingly lifelike.” Said Sarah as she held the doll up. She smiled at it, admiringly. Touched her fingers to its face, adding “Such detail. Right down to nostrils, smooth cheeks. Don’t even feel like plastic. Lips… oooh… would you like me to kiss them, little doll? Don’t really need to ask, do I? You were in my yard, so that pretty much makes you mine.”

Lily endured being half smothered by lips that felt, to her, about like a basketball. ‘Only good part is at least she ain’t looking at me.” Thought Lily ‘Don’t have to worry about no blinking. *Yuck* Well at least she’s not slobbering all over me.’

“Well, my new little toy, you really are something.” Sarah chuckled in sheer delight with her find “You don’t FEEL like plastic. I wonder who lost you. And these clothes! They look so real. Tiny buttons, little zipper on your jeans and everything. WOW!”

Lily was now regretting her decision, she might have done better out in the open. But then again maybe not, at least Sarah didn’t know she was alive. Lily just had to endure whatever long enough and under no circumstances get found out for what she truly was.
