It was not long before they found what appeared to be a small trail. After a while, they reached the edge of the forest and saw the castle.

The baron of Weasley didn’t remember a time where there was so much activity in the castle as today. The crown prince was coming, and he wanted to make sure everything was ready.
“Perhaps the castle will regain some of its former glory” he thought. As it was located near the southern shores of Lilliput, the castle had been important in the past when there were wars against Blefescu. Many times it was sieged by the blefescuan troops in the past when Lilliput had been invaded by its southern neighbour. However there hadn’t been a war in over five hundred years. In these days of peace, there were no knights or soldiers guarding it. Only the Baron, his family and their personal servants lived there.
He was in his private chambers when he heard screams of terror from the outside. Ha ran to his window, and what he saw made him think that he was losing his mind. Three giant maidens, wearing revealing strange clothing, were approaching his castle. Although they looked human, their dark features were very strange. The baron grabbed his sword and ran out of the room.
“Hey..don’t run away” Winona called out playfully “We just want to play”. They all noticed that all the people that were out making some sort of preparations had run inside the castle as they noticed their presence.
The walls surrounding the castle presented no problem to them, as they passed above it and approached the main building.
Winona peered inside the widows and smiled as she saw the people cowering in fear at her sight.
The three giants spent a few moments inspecting the castle, marvelling at all their details. They stopped their inspection when a small feminine voice called out to them.
“Begone you evil fiends…Prince Edward is coming soon and he will impart his mighty justice upon you if you don’t leave”
Anne was the first that approached the small figure, which was standing in the balcony of one of the highest towers of the castle. It was a blond woman in her mid 20’s; she wore clothing that revealed her noble heritage. Despite the seriousness of the situation, the girl seemed more scandalized by the clothing the giants wore
”Shame on you for your indecent garments” she continued to the amusement of the giants, which now were staring at her “I can tell you have no respect of anything that is good and pure”
The three giants laughed at her words, which seemed to only made her angrier
“Laugh if you will, but you won’t be laughing once Prince William imparts his mighty justice upon you all”
Winona peered closer to the window and said “Well princess, we will just have to wait and see if prince charming can rescue you”
With that she reached out, in an attempt to grab her. The princess tried to back away into her room, but Winona was to fast
“Oh no, you don’t” She said as her fingers closed around the tiny body in a gentle by tight grip
1553311121.title: Castle

15533111212.content:
“Let me go, you ugly monster” the Baron’s daughter exclaimed to the amusement of Winona. Being an actress, she decided to play her role. She winked at her friends who understood what she had in mind.
She brought the princess close to her face, an evil smile on her face, and said with a threatening tone
“You are my prisoner now, princess…No one can save you now”
Isabel was intimidated by her, but still had some fighting spirit left
“You all will pay for your evil ways…Good always triumphs over evil.
Natalie, who was at Winona’s side, laughed evilly. She was about to reply, but then she hear a small voice coming from the entrance of the castle.
“Release my daughter” the tiny voice commanded.
The three girls watched an old man with long red hair, although touched by the greys of age. The man was holding a sword that had a resemblance to medieval European weapons.
Natalie went to her knees, an amused smile on her face, and said “You are a brave man, Baron…coming alone against the three of us”
She reached out, as if to grab him, but the baron surprised her as he evaded her hand and thrust the sword in a finger.
Natalie retreated her hand, surprised at his agility. However, she also noticed that she didn’t feel any pain at all. She stared at her finger and there was not a single scratch on her skin.
She smiled at him again and then reached out again. The baron attempted the same tactic, but this time she was ready. As he attacked her right hand, she used her left hand to surprise him.
Now trapped in her firm, but surprisingly gentle grip, the baron felt himself being lifted in the air. He made one last attempt to fight as he hit her skin with his sword, but to no avail.
“I will take that” she said as with her free hand she took the sword from him.
“Your little toys are useless against us” she said as she brought him in front of her face.
Natalie, Anne and Winona were good actresses, but the baron was no fool. Veteran of many wars in the north against the wild beast that threatened the kingdom from time to time, he had seen evil in more than one occasion. He knew that something wasn’t quite right on the giants’ behaviour. Unlike his daughter, that was still screaming curses to the giants, he was more of a practical man, and asked as calm as he could
“What is it that you want..giant”.
Natalie thought for a moment and then answered
“Tell the prince that we will be waiting for him at the shores of the lake”
With that she put him on the ground
“Here” she said as she handed back his sword.
The baron didn’t attempt to attack them; he knew it would be useless. He watched as the three giants left with his daughter. He was still shaken about the experience, but also confused.
“What in the gods name was that about?” he said to himself.
1 hour later at the castle.
“Giants you say?” Prince Edward asked
The baron looked a little disappointed as he watched the prince’s escort. He expected at least 100 men “although he doubted 100 men would stop the giants”, but the prince’s companions were only three “people” and not one of them looked like a knight.
“We need an army your majesty…I have never seen a creature as big as those giants, not even the northern dragons”.
The prince said with confidence
“We don’t need an army, Baron. With my three companions, I have slain dragons, trolls and other wild beast in my adventures in the wild lands of the north.
The Baron stared at his three companions; An elf, a dwarf and a Barbarian. Although a part of the island of Lilliput, the northern lands were not a part of the human kingdom in the southern part of the island.
“May I present you my friends, baron” the prince made the introductions
“Prince Legolas of the forested elven kingdom, Gimli son of gloin of the subterranean dwarven kingdom and Conan”
They
15533111212.title: The prince arrives

choices: They don't notice him at first
155331112121.content:
In the lake’s shore the three girls looked around for a while
“Where should we wait?” Anne asked to the others
Natalie was about to reply, then she saw something in the distance
“Hmm what is that??”
Winona answered “It looks like some sort of a..tower”
The Baron’s daughter, that surprisingly has been silent for a while, spoke
“That tower has been deserted for centuries, giant”
Winona smirked at her and said playfully “Oh, she speaks again…are you going to tell us again how evil we are, and how prince charming is going to slay us and rescue you”
Isabel’s face reddened, something which made Winona giggle.
“His name is Edward, Giant…And you will remember that name when you beg him to spare you”
Winona simply laughed at her, suddenly she stared at the tower and then at Isabel. A smile formed on her lips.
“Aren’t captured princess suppose to wait on isolated towers while dragons or giants guard her??”


Two hours later, the prince and his companions arrived at the lake. The baron didn’t give them a description of the three giants, so the prince expected them to be ugly brutes; he was after all influenced by chivalry tales of brave knights fighting all sorts of monsters.
They watched from the cover of the woods at the lake and it was not long before they saw them
“What in the gods name??” The prince said as he watched the “ugly” giants. If it weren’t for their size and their strange dark looks, they would have appeared as young maidens. The oldest of them didn’t look older than 16.
They also didn’t have an evil appearance; however the prince found their choice of clothing inappropriate.
Before they had seen them, the prince had wanted to attack right away, without taking precautions, as he had read in those chivalry books when he was a child.
His partners however restrained him, like they always did. More experienced in real combat, they had saved him more than once for his recklessness. The fact was that the dragons and trolls the prince had slain were mostly thanks to his companions.
Of his companions, Legolas and Gimli, as representatives of their own kingdoms, had been given the task to watch over the human prince when he was sent north by his father to renew the old alliance between the lilliputians, the elves and the dwarves. Conan, on the other hand, was hired as an escort to the prince. Thief, Warrior, mercenary, he roamed the wild lands of the north in search of adventure and gold, and the prince paid well.
Legolas advised “A direct confrontation is impossible..I have never seen a creature as big as them. We should wait for the cover of darkness”
However there was a glint in the prince’s eyes
“This is my chance to pass into history” he said with a fanatical tone “Glory will be mine and tales of my bravery will pass into legend”
With that, and before his companions could stop him, he charged with his sword raised in the air
155331112121.title: Charge

1553311121212.content:
“Wait, you idiot” the dwarf exclaimed but it was no use. “He stared at his companions and added “Always the same story. He still hasn’t learned anything…sometimes I just don’t understand humans”
Conan stared at him and said “Hey, you know I’m human, and my people don’t act the same way as the Lilliputians”
The elf added “Yes, the barbaric human tribes of the north have more common sense”
Conan then grabbed his sword and said “Ok, time to save him again…he pays well, but I’m getting tired of this”
The dwarf grabbed his axe and the elf readied his bow and then waited to see what would happen.
The girls were staring at the tower, teasing Isabel who was in a balcony in the highest part.
The tower was higher than the castle, so she was in their chest level. She stared up at their smiling faces and continued with her self-righteous exclamations.
As he reached them, the prince called out to them. His chivalry code forbade him to attack in surprise or in their backs. He wanted to beat them in a fair combat. He saw that the closest giant to him was the only one with long hair “It was other thing which he found odd, as women in his world wore long hair, and two of the giants didn’t”
For a moment Anne thought she hears a small voice. When she didn’t pay any attention, the voice called out, this time the three girls heard him
“Come here and face me, giants”
Anne stared down and saw a figure dressed in a rich blue uniform, and an equally blue cape. He had a sword in his right hand.
He also looked to be in his early 20’s but still with a boyish face; he had short blond hair and blue eyes, like most of his countrymen.
Anne went to her knees to take a closer look, an evil smile on her face as she was on “act mode”. Winona and Natalie reached her side but stood standing
“I am Prince Edward” he continued “And I have come to put an end to your evildoings…however and I am also merciful and just. Surrender now and I will spare you all”
Anne struggled hard to suppress a giggle. She found him adorable, and the fact that he was so obvious and really thought he could win, only made him look cuter. Her two friends were also having a hard time trying to keep menacing faces, and when he continued, Winona let escape a small laugh
“However, if you remain in you evil ways, preying on the innocent, kidnapping young maidens for who knows what dark intentions, then I will be forced to impart divine justice upon you…what say you?”
Anne wanted to grab and snuggle him, but kept her acting
“You are a fool, prince…coming alone to face us…after I eat you, we will devour the princess, and there is nothing you can do about it” she laughed evilly, but the prince didn’t seem scared
“Then thy doom is upon you, giant” he said and raised his sword again “You shall suffer my just wrath”
Anna reached out and pointed her index finger at him, he responded using his sword to attack the finger, as if it were another sword.
Anna’s friend watched in amusement as she sparred with the prince using her finger. They didn’t notice that two figures were approaching the tower with cautiousness, taking advantage of the distraction the prince was creating.
Conan had come up with that plan as they watched the three giants distracted. Gimli was sent to look for back up, because stealth and agility was required. The plan was to rescue the Baron’s daughter and lure the giants into the woods, where Conan and Legolas hoped it would be easier to rescue the prince. They knew that in an open field they stood no chance.
1553311121212.title: Prince charming to the rescue

choices: Conan appears, with the Baron's daughter
15533111212121.content:
“Be careful” Conan said “if the plan works they will be hunting you”
Legolas smiled and answered “Don’t worry for me…just enter into the tower and rescue her
The two companions separated, as Conan crept towards the tower, while Legolas went straight towards the giants. The elf still moved close to the woods edge, as he was not sure how fast they would be.
When he was sure of the right distance, he tensed his bow and called out
“Let him go”
He knew they heard him, because a few second later the two giants that were standing stared at him.
Anne was still distracted “playing” with the prince, but she sensed something was up with her friends.
For a moment she averted her focus off the prince and stared up at her friends. They had their eyes wide open, an expression of surprise and wonder on their faces
She stared to where her friends were looking and her eyes opened in surprise as she saw a “being”.
Despite being small, he was close enough that they could see his fair features. As actresses, they were accustomed to see very good looking people in their field of work, however all their male counterparts paled in comparison.
Elves, as all the other races knew, possessed a beauty beyond human measure. Immortal, they were the oldest and wisest race in all lilliputia.
For a moment, the girls were just to stunned to move.
“Hey giant…We have not finished our duel” The prince exclaimed, breaking the dream-like state in which they were.
Anne stared down at him, a smile on her face
“Sorry, prince… we will continue this later”
With that, and surprising the prince and, his two friends as well, she stood up and took off running towards the “being”
It didn’t take long before her two friends fallowed
“Hey” Winona exclaimed “I saw him first”
Legolas didn’t expect such a sudden reaction, but soon he reacted and ran towards the woods.

Edwards seemed surprised by this turn of events, but then he thought
“Of course…they must have been very scared of my marvellous display of the sword”
15533111212121.title: An elf

155331112121212.content:
The prince was about to follow them, but a heavy hand was planted firmly on his shoulder. He turned around a saw the grim face of the Barbarian. He then noticed that behind him stood Isabel
“My beloved” he exclaimed “Did they hurt you?”
“Not your majesty” she answered and stared at him dreamily “You were so brave fighting the giants all by yourself.
Conan simply rolled his eyes and then stared at the wood, his face showing a little worry
“We should move” he advised “The giants might return any time
On the woods Legolas was hiding in the trees, he could tell that these giants had never been in any forest, for they moved clumsily
His plan was to make them move further away into the woods, to give his companions time to leave the lake
He watched as the giants looked around confused
“Where did he go?” Winona asked “He couldn’t have run that fast?”
Legolas moved ahead and decided to show himself
Natalie spotted him “Look, he is on the trees…how did he climb so fast” Winona answered “I doubt we are dealing with a human being” she said, enchanted as She watched him standing over a branch effortlessly.
When he caught their attention, they all gasped as he jumped from the branch, which was at a considerable height for a human his size, and fell to the ground without making any noise. He smirked at them and then ran deeper into the woods
“Come and get me” he taunted
They went on with this game, stopping 1 hour later when he hadn’t shown up for a while
Winona said frustrated “I think Blondie has fooled us”
Natalie stared at her friends and asked “Should we go back to the lake??”, but Anne had another idea
“No…let’s go back to the Baron’s castle…It’s obvious Blondie came here to rescue the prince”
Her two friends seemed to agree.

Later on the castle, both Legolas and Conan listened with disbelief at the prince.
“The baron has left, his servants have left, Isabel has left…even the dogs has left to a secure location” Legolas said, his voice denoting his anger, “And you plan to stay here? When it’s probably the first place they will be looking for us”
The prince replied stubbornly
“A knight does not walk away from his battles”
Conan was about to punch the prince unconscious, but then they all heard the trees closer to the castle shake and then three giants figures came out of the forest.
“We well, what have we here?” Winona Said playfully “No more trees where you can hide, blondie”
“Look” said Natalie “A new toy” she said as she noticed a man with long brown hair, that was dressed as if he were in a Viking movie
“They came sooner than I thought they would” Legolas thought as he tensed his bow, although he doubted his arrows would do much of a damage.
“To the castle” Conan ordered. He and Legolas began to run but the prince remained where he was.
“You idiot” Legolas tried to run back, but Conan stoped him
“They will caught you if you go”
Both entered the castle and watched from one of the windows
“I must say I’m impressed by your bravery” the prince said “I thought you would run away after watching my skills with the sword”
The three girls looked at each other and giggled.
This time it was Natalie who went on her knees “Ok cutie, enough of this little game” with that she reached and grabbed him
“I will take that, thank you” she said as with her free hand she grabbed the sword from him
“Hey..give that back to me” the prince demanded.
She winked at her two friends and then rose to her full eight. Not paying attention to the prince, she stared at the castle and demanded with a threatening tone
“Come out this instant or I will eat your little prince”, with that she raised him above her head and opened her mouth
She felt a little bad as she noticed his face paling and he trembled a little. He still managed to keep defiant “You will not get away with this giant, somehow justice will prevail”
A moment passed and then the two small figures came out. They seemed doubtful for a moment, but didn’t back up when the two giants approached them and picked them up. Winona was holding Legolas and Anne was holding Conan.
The prince had closed his eyes as he waited for the worst, but then he felt something soft covering her face.
After she kissed him, he opened his eyes and saw the giant’s smiling face
“I’m sorry… I was just bluffing”
The prince asked, his face showing confusion “Why didn’t you finish me, giant…you beat me in fair combat”
She caressed him with her free hand and said “I’m not a monster, and don’t call me giant, cutie, my name is Natalie”
Meanwhile Winona was holding the prince close to her face, examining every little detail
“So soft” she whispered as with her hand she caressed his long blond hair. “She then noticed his pointy ears”
“W..what are you?” she asked
“My name is Legolas of the wooden realm, and I’m an elf”.
Anne on the other hand examined the man in his hand. He looked tougher than the other two, but was also an attractive man in a rough way. He also looked older than the other two, perhaps in his mid 30’s.
“Aren’t you afraid of me” she asked, her tone playful
Conan, still with a grim face, answered “No” he simply answered. He was a man of few words
The three girls sat together and put their three captives in the middle
155331112121212.title: Back at the castle

1553311121212121.content:
For a moment they stared at the others in silence, the girls smiling, while their captives had different reactions.
Prince Edward didn’t look scared at all, he still had a somewhat righteous attitude. Legolas was calm, but he felt a little uncomfortable at how oddly the giants were looking at him. He knew humans often felt intimidated by his kind, but these “humans” acted as if they have never seen an elf before.
Conan, who has lived many adventures, seemed calm but his mind was already working on an escape plan.
The silence was broken by Natalie
“My name is Natalie, and these are my friends Winona and Anne” she said and then reached out and put her fingers close to Legolas
“I only know Edward’s name” she continued as with her hand she traced a circle around Legolas, who flinched a little at her touch “What’s your name, blondie?” she asked playfully
“As I told…Lady Winona before, my name is Legolas”
This time Anne asked the same question that Winona asked before
“What are you?? You clearly are not a human being”
It was Winona who answered “He is an elf” she then blushed a little after giving him a quick glance.
“What about you? Cutie” Natalie turned her attention towards the fierce looking barbarian.
Conan stared of the three of them before he answered
“Conan of cimmeria” he simply answered.
“Conan” Anne repeated his name. Despite being actresses, the three of them were still in high school and were accustomed to seeing teen boys trying to impress them acting tough. Now they were seeing the real deal, no acting or trying to impress anyone.
Legolas seemed more refined, but he also had the appearance of a warrior.
“hmm” the prince cleared his throat to gain their attention. When they stared at him, he said
“I assume you had finally come to your senses and have decided to surrender to us” he said as if forgetting the previous event
The three girls contained their laughter for a moment and decided to wait and hear what he would do next
“Of course I will have to take you to my father…you don’t have to worry. You will be provided shelter, food” he stared at them and said “And appropriate clothing of course…what you wear is not proper for a lady, even if the ladies are giants”
Natalie couldn’t take it anymore; she winked at him and said “Why is that prince?? Don’t you like our clothes?, they are quite comfortable”
Before he could do anything, she reached out and grabbed him and brought him to her face
“Where we come from, prince, this is normal…people are not ashamed to show a little skin…perhaps you want to take a tour on that very body you want to cover” There was a glint of mischief in her eyes
The prince struggled in her hand and said “This is not proper”
Natalie winked at him
“Proper or not, I want to play”
With that she lowered him and put him in her bikini lace, between her breast
“Lady Natalie, We’ve only just met, this is most improper…I am engaged to lady Isabel” he said, his face going red
Natalie just giggled and the pushed her breast together, enjoying his struggling body.
Legolas had seen many things in his life, he was after all thousands of years all, however he know stared with his mouth wide open at this. He gulped hard as he watched the giant called Winona, which winked at him.
Finally Natalie released the prince from his bobby prison and brought him to her face again
“If we are your “prisoners”, then you’d better get used to this big body of mine”
“What are you doing…let him go” a familiar voice screamed in anger
They all turned and saw Isabel accompanied by Gimli, the baron and a numerous group of Knights
1553311121212121.title: Proper

15533111212121212.content:
Isabel’s face was red with anger; she had seen where that blasted giant had put her Edward.
Natalie watched with amusement as the girl separated from her companions and galloped towards her. Once she got closer, she dismounted and then attacked Natalie’s leg with her little fist.
Winona and Anne giggled as she watched the little girl attacking her friend with fury.
“Aww, are you jealous, cutie?” Natalie taunted. She barely could feel her tiny fist.
“NO” Isabel screamed with a broken voice, her attacking got weaker and her shoulder shock as if trying to contain a sob
Natalie felt bad for her, she reached out and her fingers gently wrapped the tiny body. Isabel struggled as she was raised towards the giant’s face.
Natalie could see tears on the blond’s fair face
“You really do love him, don’t you?” she asked softly
Isabel just nodded; she looked defeated as if she knew there was nothing she could do.
“I was just teasing him; you know…there is no reason for you to feel jealous”
Isabel seemed to calm a little, and Natalie decided to put her right next to the prince. As soon as she was on the ground, Isabel hugged the prince
Meanwhile, the giants turned their attention towards the newcomers: The baron and a “man” that had a long read beard and seemed to be much shorter than the rest, were leading a group of some 20 knights.
“Just 20 knights?, Baron” Anne asked teasingly “I thought you would bring an army to stop us”
“Do not fear, my friend” the prince added to the amusement of the girls “They have surrendered to me”
The Baron looked doubtful at him and then at the giant’s grinning faces
“Have they?” he asked, his voice denoting a little sarcasm
“I didn’t expect you to be here that quickly” the baron confessed to Anne, and then he stared at the prince and added
“We were going to bring more troops, but something grave has happened…Most of the kingdom southern army has been mobilized to the coast…apparently the blefescudians have come”
“What??” Legolas and the prince asked at the same time, Conan’s face didn’t change.
Winona asked confused
“Who are the Blefescudians?”
Legolas explained
“This world has two great continents; Lilliput in the north, and Blefescu in the south…In the past many terrible wars were fought between the two human kingdoms, blefescu always being the aggressor as they have always wanted to establish their dominion over this land, but it’s been 500 years since the last contact”
Anne asked
“Are there also elves in blefescu?”
“No” he replied “Unlike Lilliput that has three great kingdoms; humans in the south, Elves in the northern forest, and dwarves in the great mountains of the east, Blefescu is populated only by humans. Unlike here, blefescu also does not have the threat of evil creatures like orcs, trolls, and dragons”
The girls stared at each other and
15533111212121212.title: Invasion

155331112121212121.content:
The Baron looked worried at the giants, who were chatting among themselves, as if deciding something. He, like everyone else except for Prince Edward, knew that they were practically at their mercy.
He tensed when the giant stared at them, and asked
“So…what do you plan to do with us?”
Winona went to her knees to take a closer look at him and smiled
“We are going to help you” Winona announced, “after all, you are now our precious little dolls”
The prince flinched at this
“dolls?” he asked “Miss, I am afraid you are confusing the situation, but we will accept your help in crushing Blefescu’s armies”
“Hold on, prince” Winona replied “No one is going to be crushed or killed, but we will prevent a war”
She turned her attention to the Baron and said “So…show us where the invaders are”
Two hours later, Lilliput soldiers were watching in fear the strange ships of Blefescu’s navy. It had been 500 years since the last contact of the two kingdoms
From the distance the ships didn’t look medieval, but more like 18th or 19th century warships. In the distance they could see the holes for the cannons. The cannons had already been fired as a demonstration of their power, and lilliput’s army was on the verge of panic
Unlike Lilliput that hadn’t developed technologically and was stuck on a feudal level, blefescu had experienced a cultural and technological revolution 400 years ago. Unlike the Lilliputians that still relied on ancient traditions, Blefescuans relied mostly in science that allowed them to achieve a level of development similar to England at the period of the Napoleonic wars. Over the past 300 years, Blefescu’s navy had sailed the seas, discovering small island and expanding their empire.
On the HMS Victory, Flagship of the fleet, admiral Cutler Beckett and his two highest ranking officers were discussing their course of action
“It seems these Lilliputians had not advanced in the past 500 years, I wonder if they still believe in those fairytales of the past” The admiral said with a little disdain.
Vice admiral James Norrington, whose ship was the HMS Dauntless, said “Perhaps that’s the case, still we must be careful”
Rear admiral Christopher Brandon, whose ship was the HMS Interceptor, agreed “I have read the history of the past wars, and the lilliputians are not to be underestimated”
The admiral said “The king said he does not want a bloodshed, that an ultimatum must be given”
He looked at Norrington and said “You are the best diplomat on the fleet”
Later, a boat approached the shores carrying a white flag. While his men waited on the shore, Norrington was taken to the rear of Lilliput’s army, where the general and the high ranking officers directed the army. Norrington noted a forest not far from them, but didn’t pay to much attention
Negotiations began, James Norrington, being a direct man, said from the beginning that they expected the surrender of Lilliput
“We will fight to the end” Lilliput’s general had said “the gods will protect us”
Norrington was about to reply, but then he felt something coming from the forest, something big.
At first he saw a group of some 26 people. As they approached, he noticed 20 knights accompanied by a strange group. Three of them were dressed as members of the nobility, another, a tough looking men that seemed to come from the barbaric north, but it was the last two who caught his attention
“What the?” he thought. He remembered having heard of old tales about strange beings in Lilliput..Elves, dwarves, orcs, trolls, but he always considered to be child’s tales.
However he didn’t let himself be distracted; his interest was picked up again as the general of lilliput’s armies went to his knees and saluted a young man
“Prince Edward…this is an unexpected honour”
After the proper formalities, Norrington was introduced to him
Before Norrington could restart the talks, Baron Weasley said to him
“Viceadmiral, I want you to meet three new additions to Lilliput’s forces…perhaps they will convince you to leave peacefully”
He stared at the general one moment and said
“Tell your men that there is no reason to be afraid” then he turned to the forest and ade a signal, as if calling someone.
Norrington said nothing, but his eyes widened in fear and surprise as three gigantic figures stepped out of the forest and approached them. If he was surprised with the elf and dwarf, he now didn’t know what to think of this. He was a man of science and reason after all
At first there was panic in the lines of the army, but officers soon calmed them down.
Finally the three girls reached the spot where the small group was and sat down.
Anne noticed a man dressed in an elegant red coat that reminded her of the british uniforms she had seen on so many movies. He seemed from another historical era than the Lilliputians.
“Hi there cutie” she said lowering her head towards him and winking
Norrington felt really nervous but he maintained his calm appearance.
He tried to ignore the giants and was about to talk to the prince
“Hey is that a wig you are wearing?” Winona asked as she noticed him also.
“My God, he looks so handsome in his neat uniform” she thought
155331112121212121.title: Arrival

1553311121212121211.content:
“He nodded briefly to the giant girl, answering her question in silence, then turned his gaze towards the prince
“You highness, I think its very fortunate that you are here. Now these neg…”
He felt as something grabbed his body, and before he could do or say anything, he found himself being lifted off the ground.
He felt dizzy for a little while, but when his vision adjusted he was staring at the smiling face of one of the giants
“Hello there” Winona said
For a moment he felt a rush of panic, but his training soon took over and decided to find out who he was dealing with.
Norrington hadn’t paid to much attention at how they looked, only that they were giants, but now his mind worked hard to learn each small detail, to know his enemy
Firstly, as he took a quick glance at the other giants and then at the face of the giant holding him, he found odd their dark hair and skin tone; they were darker than any he had ever seen.
The three giants were wearing strange clothing which he found inappropriate, as they only covered their breast and sensitive parts.
“They look very young” he thought, “The oldest of them doesn’t look older than 16”
His thought were interrupted as the giant that was holding him spoke
“So, cutie…what’s your name??”
He bowed and said “My name is James Norrington, vice admiral of Blefescu’s southern fleet…and whom do I have the pleasure of speaking with?”
“My name is Winona Ryder, and these are my friends Natalie Potman and Anne Hathaway”
Norrington bowed again and said “I’m pleased to make your acquaintance, my fair ladies”
Winona blushed slightly. She loved period books and movies based on the 18th or 19th century. And this man with his uniform, the way he spoke, his manners, seemed as if he was from one of Jane austen’s books or Wuthering heights.
Natalie, who was at winona’s side, smiled and said coquettishly
“The pleasure is all ours, handsome” and winked at him
Norrington was surprised a little by the way she talked. In his rigid society ladies never spoke in such a direct manner
“I am fortunate to enjoy the company of such fine ladies” he said “But I’m afraid I must continue with my obligations as emissary of my king. Would you be so kind, lady Winona, to put me down so I can continue with my mission”
Winona smiled at him
“Certainly” she said “But don’t go to far, I may want to enjoy you company later”
She put him down and then he began to talk with the prince and Lilliput’s general
As the talk progressed, the prince seemed a little bit outraged by the king of blefescu’s message
The negotiations came to a point where there was no more advance, so Norrington was about to leave.
“I advise you to think this over, prince” He said “Nobody wants a war but be warned that any resistance is futile and will only prolong the inevitable”.
Before he went to his boat, he said
“I will return tomorrow morning to hear your answer”
The three giants didn’t participate on the discussion, as they were at the moment eating the food the prince had commanded to bring them. After they satisfy their appetites, they went to join their new “fiends”
Natalie sat, and feeling playful, reached out and grabbed Legolas
“So, handsome, how did the negotiations go?”
Legolas, trying to stay calm, answered “Not so good”
“Hey” asked Anne “Where is that handsome officer?”
When the others explained the situations, Winona giggled and said
“Well, in the morning I’m going to visit him to his ship”
1553311121212121211.title: Negotiations

15533111212121212112.content:
None of the girls really felt like playing after the news of a possible war came out. Anne, who was the most mature of the three ordered “All you little people, out. We need to talk.”

“What are we going to do?” asked Winona.

Natalie, who had a bit of a mean streak, said “Simple. We don’t let them. Their weapons can't hurt us. Step on a few soldiers, sink a couple of ships and they’ll stop.”

“I couldn’t do that.” Winona argued “Hurt that cute little Norrington guy? I’d rather kiss him.”

Natalie glared at her “I say we prove we’re in charge. Then you can play all you want.”

“That might be a bad idea.” Anne offered “I mean…we start that and we’ll have to fight them all. I don’t really want to do that.” And on that unsatisfactory note, they turned in.

The King of Blefescu had sent his second son, Prince Bradley, with new orders. If his admiral had not successfully negotiated Lilliput’s surrender by his arrival, the fleet was to attack.

“But, Highness” argued Vice-Admiral Norrington “your father did not have all the facts when he sent you.”

The Prince delicately removed a snuff-tin from his military jacket, removed a pinch and sniffed deeply before speaking “Such emotion has no place in our Grand Fleet, Admiral. Our job is merely to carry out our Sovereign’s orders. This bickering with Lilliput has cost us millions each and every year since ancient times.”

“Sire, of course we are aware of that” said Rear Admiral Brandon “My father and one of my uncles were killed in the Invasion of 2602. And my great-grandfather died when we last landed here in 2427. All we suggest is that you wait until morning. Meet, yourself, with the Lilliputians. If those discussions fail, then we can still attack.”

The Prince repeated his ritual and lectured “You all know the importance of discipline in any chain of command. Your King has given orders. It is left only for you to obey. We have spent twenty years building you this invincible fleet. It is only worth the expense if it intimidates the Lilliputians into submission, or used for their conquest. Failure of the former demands execution of the latter.”

“Sire, the stragegic situation has altered during our stay.” Norrington stated “There are three … well … giants … here. If we attack I do not know what they will do.”

Prince Bradley snorted “I have seen giants in the circus. Freaks of nature, but no threat. Most of them are obviously on stilts. One was really seven foot, four, but she was a sickly creature. Even the Princess could have taken her, and at twelve.”

“My Prince, these giants make at least five of those.” Norrington added “I, myself, was picked up by one. She held me high above the ground in her hand. Nothing I or my men could have done to stop her.”

Instead of the thoughtful consideration the military men were hoping for, Prince Bradley flew into a rage “MY FATHER’S EMISSARY ASSAULTED!!” he screeched “THAT DECIDES IT!! WE ATTACK!!! We are irrevocably committed to war! Gentlemen I leave it to you to select the time. Advise me.”

“Very well, Highness.” Norrington acknowledged “For the record I was not actually harmed during the incident. And, Highness, I do think you are rushing into this.”

The Prince glared at him and demanded “I trust your outburst is finished, Admiral.”

“4AM Highness” Rear Admiral Brandon offered “That is when we should strike.” To which the Prince responded with a careless wave of approval.

Anne, Winona and Natalie slept right through the opening barrages. Lilliputians, even the ones right outside their tent were thrown from their beds by the Earth-shaking explosions.

Only the party that first encountered the giant girls were brave enough to enter the tent. Gimli and Charming went for two of them. Legolas glared at his companions as he noted they left Winona for him. Nevertheless, Lilliput needed help. Only five ships had been in port when the Blefescudian fleet arrived, and two of them were in drydock. All were blown sky high in the first seconds. He approached her arm with great reluctance, it was the least troublesome part to him. He knew it would take considerable effort to wake her, so he punched it with all his force.

Winona hardly noticed. She didn’t even move.

A kick only led to a stubbed toe for the Elf. Bravely, he limped down to her hand. Which was more sensitive than an arm. It was laying palm down on the ground. He kicked at it like a kicker going for a field goal.

Winona emitted a small squeak and her hand bounced. It was now on its side.

“Yike!” Legolas exclaimed. He jumped back several feet and eyed it warily. After several seconds of no movement, he looked up in the direction of the giant face and growled “The things I do for my country.” He pulled his sword and approached it. Highly sensitive was the bit of flesh between thumb and forefinger. He stabbed downward as it was just below his waist.

Winona yelped in her sleep and her eyes flew open. She smacked her lips sleepily and yawned “Wha’happen?”

“You dropped your stupid hand on me!” Legolas complained. The instant he’d struck, her hand twitched and he was trapped under it. Granted, his legs were free, but that didn’t do him any good with his head sticking out from between two fingers. ”I’m a damned national hero! This is ridiculous!”

That was when she felt him. Winona looked down and giggled softly. She pushed the Elf’s little body around until he’d be upright, then curled her fingers under him and lifted “Good morning little man.” She said, amusedly “It’s still dark though. But, since you woke me so nicely I don’t mind. Thanks for getting in my hand.”

“There’s an emergency!” he yelled. Even managing to ignore the fingers that wanted to play with his ears. “We’re under attack!”

Winona stood and stepped out of the tent. She saw the fires. She leaned back in and yelled “WAKE UP!” And kicked each of her friends’ feet. Gimli and the Prince were each having even more trouble waking the giants than Legolas did.

“Uhh…one thing?” the Elf asked.

Winona winked at him and replied “What’s that, cutie?”

“Don’t tell the Dwarf?” he pleaded “About the hand thing?”

She giggled and said “Well, alright. But if I don’t, you’ll have to make sure I wake up with you there more often.”

Each holding their own little people, Natalie and Anne appeared. The three headed for the harbor. There they saw the Blefescudian Navy blowing everything to hell and back. Out of range of the canon, each set her Lilliputian down and waded into the water.
15533111212121212112.title: No Peace

155331112121212121122.content:
Before they entered into the waters, Natalie knelt in front of some Lilliputians soldiers and asked
“Has there anyone been killed?” her voice denoting anger
“Fortunately our lines were out of range of those terrible weapons, and our own ships had no crew as they fled when the blufescuan fleet approached” one soldier answered “unfortunately the port, as you can see, has been mostly destroyed”
Natalie nodded and went to join her friends; Anne looked worried at her
“Control your anger, Natalie. I still don’t want to kill any soldier or sailor” Natalie looked at her and answered
“I spoke those words in a moment of anger, but I know I could never bring myself to do that…don’t worry” her expression then turned serious and added
“Still, they need to be taught a lesson”
Winona, who was staring at the blefescuan fleet on the distance, added
“Silly little men with their toys…our own world and this world and men always act the same”
Natalie added just as she stepped into the water, followed closely by her friends
“Well, at least here we are going to make a difference and stop this stupid war”
On the HMS Victory, flagship of the fleet, Prince Bradley was on his personal quarters looking himself on a mirror as he dressed himself on some fancy clothing. As member of the aristocracy, he had little interest in military matters and let the course of the battle in the hands of the military professionals.
In fact he was more interested in the masked party that was going to be celebrated in a week than in the current events.
He was about to change to another set of clothing, when suddenly the firing of cannons stopped abruptly.
“So soon” he wondered, but then there was a knock at his door
The prince rolled his eyes in annoyance, for he had given specific instructions not to be disturbed
He opened the door and saw Admiral Beckett standing there, his face showing fear.
Before the prince could say anything, the admiral spoke
“Your highness, you better come out to the deck”
“Hey, they have stopped firing” Anne commented as they advanced towards the fleet
“I have counted 12 ships” Winona added “four on the left side of the harbour, four on the center and four and the right side”
Even though no general order has been given, the captain of each ship has ordered to cease fire when the “sea monsters” appeared.
At first the girls wanted to go to the different sections of the fleet, But Winona commented
“There is a ship on the center that looks bigger than the rest…we should go there first”
Anne added “Whoever is in command of the fleet must be there”
Prince Bradley entered the deck followed closely by the admiral. He saw Vice admiral Norrington that was looking over to the sea
“Vice admiral, what is the meaning of this?? Why have we..”
His first impulse was to scream like a girl and run back to his quarters, but he controlled himself. He remembered Norrington mentioning something about giants, but nothing in his wildest dreams prepared him for something like this.
Anne, being the oldest, decided to speak for them
“Who is in command of this fleet?” her voice boomed aggressively. She put her hands on her hips and waited
They didn’t have to wait to long for an answer as they all hear an arrogant voice
“How dare you come here and demand anything from us??” the prince said moving towards the front of the ship, which was just below Anne tights.
Anne stared down at him and laughed, which only made the prince angry
“And who the hell are you??” she asked with amusement “The fleet’s clown?? I supposed with all that make up you are wearing then you must be”.
The prince was so angry with this impertinent giant that he was at a loss for words. Viceadmiral Norrington went to his side and stared up at Anne
After bowing at her, he said
“Lady Anne, this is prince Bradley of the royal house of Blefescu”
Anne smiled at him and asked
“Why did you open fire?? I thought you were still negotiating with the Lilliputians”
However it was the prince who answered
“I gave that order, giant…and if the three of you don’t stand aside then I will order my men to open fire on you”
Anne leaned forward
“I dare you do that, little man” she taunted
The prince turned around and looked at his three officers
“Well, what are you waiting for?” he demanded “give the orders”
However Norrington, Beckett and Brandon seemed reluctant to follow his orders
When they didn’t move, the prince forgot the giants for a moment and approached aggressively at Norrington
“That is a direct order, vice admiral”
“Your highness, with all due respect, I will not risk the lives of my men in a fight that I seriously doubt we can win”
He stared at the giants and added “And they have not attacked us”
The prince was now really angry “How dare you question my decisions??” then he slapped him
The three girls could hear the whole conversation and they all gasped when the prince slapped the vice admiral
“DON’T YOU TOUCH HIM” Winona screamed as she took a step forward and stood at Anne’s side
155331112121212121122.title: The prince

1553311121212121211221.content:
The prince seemed unaffected and he stood defiant.
“I can do whatever I wish, and if my officers don’t obey my orders, then I will consider this a mutiny and I will have them hang for this…Them and any other that serves under my command and refuses to obey”
He said the last words looking back at his officers with a threatening look.
Winona couldn’t take this anymore and she raised her hand then brought the hand down like a hammer, missing him by very little.
The force was so strong that the entire ship shock; The prince, who was caught offguard, was sent flying and landed on his butt.
“upss” Winona giggled as her intention was to scare the arrogant prince.
The prince stood up and began to ran towards the first lines of soldiers, who haven’t heard the whole conversation.
“The monster have attacked us” he screamed “fight, fight for your lives”
“Wait a m..” Natalie tried to say, but the display of power and that one of the giants seemed to have attacked the prince without cause, seemed to affect the crew.
It all started as a soldier in the verge of panic shot his rifle, then it escalated
“Cease fire, cease fire” Norrington and Beckett screamed but their voices were dwarfed by the growing sounds of gunshots, fallowed then by the cannons.
Soon the other ships, that were waiting to see what was happening, began to fire as well.
“That little lying rat” Anne muttered to herself. She stared at her friends and said
“I am going to take the ships to the shore…I will handle those in the left side of the harbour”
Winona smiled and said “Poor little things, they thought I was attacking them” she stared at her two friends and said “Please be gentle, after all they don’t represent a threat to us”
Natalie smiled back at her and added, before she went to the ships on the right side of the harbour “Don’t worry, these cannon kinda tickle”.
Natalie approached the four ships and stood there, hands on her hips as her body received all the cannon fire
“Hello boys” she said playfully
They didn’t answer and continued firing
“This is all a misunderstanding” she said and continued to move towards the first ship
“Really, you are only wasting you ammunition” she continued and then grabbed the ship’s anchor and began to pull the first ship and approached the second.
Meanwhile, Anne approached the ships on the left side of the harbour. She still felt a little angry, but her expression softened as she approached the ships,
“Poor thing, serving under that bastard…they must be terrified of us” she thought as she stood next to the first ship
“Are you still going to fire at me?” she asked
When the barraged continued, she sighed
“Fine, but you are all coming with me” she said as she proceeded to grab the anchors of each ship.
Winona watched her friends go, not paying attention to the ships that were attacking her
“This is so cool” she said as she watched her friends capturing the little ships one by one.She felt powerful by the display and then turned her attention to the ship in front of her.
“Look” she addressed the soldiers and sailors on the deck as she pointed a finger towards her friends
“You are really wasting your time…we are going to take you to the shore, whether you like it or not”
Soon afterward the flagship stopped firing and soon the other three ships followed it example as they saw that all their efforts were in vain.
Winona smiled and then proceeded to grab the anchor of each ship
As she approached the shore, Natalie and Anne soon joined her; by then all the ships under their possession had stopped firing
“Nice catching uhh??” Natalie grinned at her friends
Anne said to winona “here, take this” then she handed her the anchors of her four ships
“What are you doing??” Winona asked as Anne went ahead
“I am going to talk with the Lilliputians…we don’t want to start a battle once the blefescuans leave their ships”
1553311121212121211221.title: Fishing

15533111212121212112212.content:
Anne left her friends behind and approached the shores; she could see that most of the Lilliputians were already there waiting for them, not afraid of the canons anymore.
A few hours ago they feared them, but now most of them were now cheering. There were a few exceptions like the Baron, Legolas, Gimli and Conan. The baron had previously commented his opinion to the elf and the barbarian
“I am not a fool like our dear prince” he confessed “The three of them have not yet said what are their intentions….and now that I have witnessed their power, let us hope they don’t try to take over all the kingdoms”
Legolas said “I don’t think their intentions are cruel, but it also worries me what they plan to do next”
Once Anne reached the shore, the prince, accompanied by his general and other high ranking officers, advanced. Anne went to her knees so she could hear them clearly.
“Bravo” the Prince greeted her “You have done Lilliput a great service” he stared at the sea and added
“Although I am confused as to why you haven’t sunk the ships yet”
What Anne said next made the baron and the prince companions more worried
“I don’t think you understand the situation, pumpkin” she said “Remember what my friend Winona told you before, we are not here to crush and kill lilliput’s enemies but to prevent a disgusting war that will only bring pain to both countries” then her tone grew more serious, commanding “And we will prevent that war, even if the rulers of both nations are opposed”
The prince seemed confused by her words
“B..but you s..surrendered to me, I thought you were on our side”
Anne giggled a little and answered
“We don’t have a side, cutie” she confessed.
As she was talking with the Lilliputians, her two friends were doing the same to the blefescuans.
“You will all leave the ships orderly and in peace once we drag them to the port“ Winona commanded
Natalie stared down at the three high ranking officers. Norrington had previously presented to them the admiral Beckett and rear admiral Brandon
“I trust you will keep your men in order”
The three men nodded as they knew they didn’t have a choice but to obey. Natalie noticed the fear in Norrington’s gaze and cooed “Hey, no reason to be afraid handsome”
“you don’t understand” Norrington replied “We should be fighting to the death, and in surrendering to you, we are disobeying the prince’s orders…We are in committing treason against the royal crown ”
Natalie’s face grew serious
“Listen to me, cutie…No one is going to harm any of you for what you did” she looked around and asked
“And by the way, where is that little prick?…I haven’t seen him since he started running like a scared little girl”
Admiral Beckett replied
“He went to his room since the “battle” and has not come out yet”
“Hasn’t he, how brave of him” Natalie said with a little sarcasm “Well, we still need him for the negotiations to begin, I s..”
She stopped when she heard the familiar irritating voice, as the prince came to the deck and made his way to stand at his officer’s side
“I was not hiding, giant” he said with contempt, looking at both giants with arrogance “I was in my room contemplating the different scenarios”.
His disdain was evident on his face as he added
“Of course barbarians such as yourselves, for only barbarians would wear that kind of clothing, wouldn’t understand the intricate process of my mental process…Yet sadly I have concluded that my officers were right at the beginning and I didn’t consider how your presence altered the strategic situation…Unfortunately there is nothing we can do against your brutish force”
Natalie controlled her anger at being called barbarian and brutish and said through her teeth
“So, that means you will talk with the Lilliputians?”
15533111212121212112212.title: No sides

155331112121212121122121.content:
The prince stared at her with a mix of shame and arrogance
“Unfortunately, I don’t have a choice, do I?”
Natalie smirked “No, you don’t”
At that moment, both Winona and Natalie heard Anne’s voice
“Bring the ships to the port, the Lilliputians have “agreed” to talk.
Natalie and Winona obeyed and started to drag the mighty fleet towards the port.
Winona grinned at her friend and said in a whisper
“I don’t know about you, but It feels great to be this powerful…did you ever imagine yourself dragging a whole fleet of miniature warships”
Natalie giggled
“Not just the fleet” she confessed “We are fricking giants on this world…imagine all the possibilities”
When Winona blushed, Natalie’s grin widened “You have thought about it, have you?”
“Yes, I have” the older teen confessed
Natalie winked at her and said “Well, this is even better than winning an Oscar”
Finally they reached the port, and with Anne’s help, they carefully positioned each ship in the different sections of the port, so the blefescuans could disembark.
With the help of each captain and his three admirals, the prince organized his troops and led the army in organized fashion.
“They look so cute marching” Anne giggled “I may keep a few”
The miniature army marched towards the awaiting Lilliputians until the prince raised his hand and they stopped
The prince advanced, accompanied by the three admirals to where Prince Edwards and his officers waited.
“So what do we do now?” Natalie asked her two friends. She yawned sleepily and added “It’s still early”
She, like her friends, wasn’t really interested in the boring talk of diplomats
“Do you think we will be needed?” Winona asked Anne
Anne denied with her head “Nah, after our little display I think they got the point that we won’t allow a war to start” she giggled a little and added
“After all they are more afraid of us than of their enemies”.
They moved towards the improvised tent Lilliput’s army built for them. As they were about to enter, Anne noticed that Gimli, Conan and Legolas were not far from them, and were talking among themselves.
She touched her friends with her elbows and then gestured them to watch at the small group.
Silently, the three girls made their to their “friends”
Conan was the first to notice them, as he interrupted Legolas and pointed at them
“Hello there” Natalie said cheerfully as she sat “I thought you were going to be with the prince?”
Legolas bowed to her and then explained
“The elves and the dwarves are allies of the human kingdom of Lilliput, yet these negotiations concern only Befescuans and Lilliputians”
After this there was an awkward moment of silence, which was broken by the dwarf
“I must say that we were all impressed at how you handled blefescu’s navy”
Anne blushed and said “Oh, that…it was nothing really…there was no real danger for us”
The dwarf laughed and said
“Well you did impress us all” He stared at Legolas and said “Even the pointy-eared elvish princeling said that he had never seen anything like it in all his long life”
Winona giggled “Is that so?” feeling playful, she reached out and grabbed Legolas, who, despite his fast reflexes, wasn’t waiting her reaction
“Don’t you think we all deserve a prize?” she said playfully and winked at him.
Anne stared at him with a strange look and asked
“Princeling?? Long life??….surely you are no older than 20?”
Legolas, who at the moment was trying his best to ignore Winona’s fingers, looked at her and said
“Yes, I am the son of the Elven king and in my life I have seen 3500 winters”
Winona almost dropped him when she heard him, but regained her control
Legolas sighed and explained “I supposed there are no elves where you come from…we are immortal and also the oldest race of this world…most of my kin have left to the lands of the gods across the western sea, and what remains is but a glimpse of our former glory…Only my father’s kingdom remains of the many elvish realms of the past, but our time here is ending and soon we will all take ship into the west”
They continued talking for about 30 minutes, asking Legolas, Gimli and Conan about their lives and adventures.
“Well” Legolas said a little bit nervous, you all must be tired, there will be more time to talk about us
Winona giggled and said
“But you still have not given me and my friends a reward for our help”
155331112121212121122121.title: A little history

1553311121212121211221211.content:
Legolas gulped down but tried to remain calm
“What sort of reward do you want, my lady?”
Winona giggled again
“Oh, I don’t know” she said as she caressed his hair with her free hand “I haven’t thought of that”
She stared at her two friends and asked
“What do you think girls??”
Natalie winked at Legolas and said
“Well, for starters what about a kiss to each of us”.
Legolas was about to reply, but when he least expected, Winona brought him to her lips and gave him a deep long kiss, her lips covering his head and part of his torso. Muffled laugher escaped her lips as she felt his little body struggling.
When she finally released him, Legolas protested
“Now my lady, that was c..”
He didn’t finish his sentence as Natalie snatched him into her hands and also brought him to her lips. Her kiss was also gentle but more fiercely and passionate than Winona’s
When the kiss broke, Legolas looked pleadingly at Anne, who so far has acted with more maturity than the others
“Give him to me” Anne said as she extended her hands towards Natalie.
Natalie looked down at Legolas in her hands and winked at him before she gave him to Anne.
“Thank you Lady Anne” he said “I appreciate that you are putting me down”
Anne giggled as she caressed him with her free hand. It was the first time that she had hold him and she was surprised at how soft his hair was
“And what of my kiss?” she asked innocently
“W..what?” Legolas said before his body was covered by her soft lips.
“Was that ok?” she asked softly and smiled at him after she broke the kiss
“I am not accustomed to this” Legolas confessed “Your customs are strange to us”
Anne giggled and for a moment felt tempted to take him back to the tent, but decided to put him o the ground.
Now, we are going to
1553311121212121211221211.title: three kisses

15533111212121212112212111.content:
The three girls entered the tent, and were about to lie down, but suddenly there was a flash of bright light
“What the hell is that?” Natalie asked with her eyes wide open
When the light faded, there stood a strange figure. It was the same size as the Lilliputians, 5 or 6 inches tall, but to the girls he resembled more those big headed aliens that were common in popular culture. With a head too big for his body, gray skin and big eyes. He was dressed in strange clothing that somehow resembled a jumpsuit
The girl’s shock was broken when the strange being saluted
“Greetings earthlings…I hope my visit to you is not much of a shock”
Instinctively, Winona reached her hand as if to touch him, but her hand just passed through him
“Do not waste your time, earthling, I’m a hologram”
Anne was the first to speak
“W..what are you?”
The being smiled and said
“Well, your kind calls us aliens or extraterrestrials”
Seeing their shocked expressions, he asked
“Why are you so shocked?? I’m not the first alien you have met, since you have been interacting with people from the planet Lilliputia”
“What??” asked the three girls in unison
The alien now seemed confused
“Where do you think you have been all this time?”
Anne answered
“Well, we thought we were in some sort of magical realm, like another dimension or something, but still on earth…we didn’t even consider the possibility that Lilliputia was a whole different planet”
Winona seemed confused
“Wait, if this is really another planet, then how come did we get here??” she stared at the alien suspiciously and asked
“Lilliputia is not that advanced, they don’t have the technology…did you bring us here?”
The alien denied with his head
“No we didn’t. What brought you here is one of the reasons we have been studying this planet and also earth”
The girls stared at each other, confusion written on their faces, then stared back at the alien and waited for him to continue
“We are explorers from another galaxy” he said “And we travel the universe in search for knowledge and to establish contact with other civilizations”
He looked at each girl and continued
“At first we didn’t pay much attention to this part of your galaxy, as the only two planets of this area with habitable conditions, Earth and Lilliputia, are still very primitive”
He waited to see their reaction
“I hope I have not offended you” he said
Anne denied with her head “No, not at all. Please continue”
The alien nodded and said
“As I was saying, our ship was passing through this area of the galaxy, and just as we were about to leave, we picked up a strange signals from both Earth and Liilliput, something that we have never seen in all the galaxies we have visited”
He took a moment to let the girls think of his words
“You see, the universe is governed by the laws of physics…Nothing, absolutely nothing escapes these laws, and yet our machines detected something that simply didn’t seem to be affected by the physical laws…We decided to stay and monitor both planets, and soon we found out that your race had a word for that unknown something…magic”
“Magic” Natalie asked with confusion
The alien continued
“My people, and all the civilizations we have visited, have never heard of things such as magic or the supernatural…those were completely unknown to us until we found your planets. We have been studying both planets for year, in hope to find out more…that is why I have come to contact you”
“Us” both Natalie and Winona asked, Anne said “Why us??”
The alien continued
“What brought you here was something very powerful…our machines detected it but could not tell exactly what it was, as this “magic” is not matter or energy but something beyond the physical universe. It has been the biggest display of this “force” we have seen since we have been monitoring…and it also changed your bodies in ways we simply can’t explain”
At this, the three girls reacted
“Wait, what??”
The alien explained
“I don’t know if you could feel it, but your bodies simply seem to be frozen in time. You are no longer aging…you see everything in the universe changes, that is the pattern of all things, yet your bodies are not…We have only seen that in those strange beings Lilliputians call elves. They simply defy all logic and we have never encountered immortal beings, and apparently also the three of you”
Winona asked with shock
“So you are saying we are now immortals”
The alien replied “Apparently so”
Anne, who was still having a difficult time digesting this, asked
“So you want to study us?? To take us to a lab”
The alien laughed and said
“Well, not exactly a lab…I just came here to make you an offer”
“What sort of an offer??” Natalie asked
The alien explained how they built a machine that would serve them in everything they would need.
“The machine has been designed to work with your brainwaves” he explained, so it will replicate everything you need..food, clothing, etc…It’s also big enough for you to live there and it has the capacity the take whatever form you desire”
Anne asked “How is that possible?”
The alien said
“In the subatomic level, matter is not solid…That machine can alter its molecules and subatomic particles to take whatever shape your mind desires…you don’t have to worry as how it works, all you have to do is voice control or mind control”
Anne asked with a little suspicious
“And what do you want in return??”
The alien confessed “The machine is filled with sensors, it will allow us to research more closely that “force” you have inside..don’t worry, you will not feel anything and will not affect you”
For a moment the girls talked among themselves
“Think about it” Winona asked “Where are we going to live or stay that is big enough..besides, if that really can’t rerplicate anything, we will live in luxury”
It wasn’t long, before Anne said
“We accept”
“Excellent” the alien said “The machine is floating outside your tent.. and it has been programmed to fallow you wherever you go, unless you order it to stay at a specific location…don’t worry about the Lilliputians reaction, as it has an invisible cloaking device”
Winona asked “But if its floating and also invisible, then how are we going to get inside?”
The alien answered
“Just commanded with your mind and it will energize you there”
“Energize” Winona asked
“Yes…in that process your body is transformed into energy and then, with the use of quantum physics, is automatically transported to another place and made matter again…of course you will not feel anything”
Winona grinned
“And you say it will take the shape of anything we desire?”

“We should go right away” Winona said and the other two seemed to agreed
“Wait” Natalie added “Shouldn’t we first think of the shape it will have”
The alien interrupted her “If I may…the ship does have an original form, however we have taken the liberty of searching the memory of the other and have already shaped it in the way of a building you call “mansion”. It already has all the commodities you might desire. Suggest you go first and see it and then decide each what you want to change”
The three girls seemed confused for a while
“The other?” Anne finally asked
The alien answered
“You were not the only one who was brought here from earth by that mysterious force; there was another in the same area. However she fell unconscious so we took her inside the ship. We are afraid of how she might react when she wakes up so we have given her a sedative..we hope you will explain the situation to her”
The three girls were surprised by the alien’s revelation
“I wonder who she is” asked Natalie
To both Winona and Natalie’s surprise, Anne, who was the owner of the yacht in which they were travelling, said
“I think I know who she might be…not two days ago I talked on radio with her and she was also in the same area as us”
She stared at the alien and asked
“Did you see in her mind her identity??”
When the alien nodded she asked again
“Is her name Phoebe Cates? a girl about my age”
The alien nodded again and Natalie exclaimed “Can you believe it”
Winona added “Well, at least she is a friend…I just hope she doesn’t freak out once we tell her”
Fallowing the alien’s indications, the three girls just wished with their minds to be transported to the ship, right next to Phoebe.
As they materialized, they were even more shocked as they saw their surroundings
“I..I know this place…this just looks like Phoebe’s room in her Beverly hills mansion”
The three girls gathered around the bed where Phoebe was soundly asleep.
After giving them a few instructions, showing them the replicator machines, their rooms the alien said.
“I must go now…go to Phoebe’s room for she is about to wake.
Minutes later, Phoebes opened her eyes lazily. She scratched her hands and tried to raise her upper torso, but felt a little bit weak and collapsed on her bed
“Easy there, Phoebe” she heard a familiar voice and her eyes snapped open again
“W..what??” she stared around and her surprise grew as she saw three familiar faces
“Anne, Natalie, Winona…what are you doing here In my y…” then she looked at her surroundings
“What the hell…this is my room”
Anne sat down on her bed and said
“We have a lot to tell you”
Half an hour later, Phoebe stared at her three friends as if they had lost their minds
“Is this some sort of a joke??”
Winona laughed and said
“Do you see that strange device just next to your bed??”
When Phoebe saw the device, she asked “What is that??”
Winona giggled and said approaching to the device
“Give me a cheeseburger and a soda and also make me a black gym short and a top.
Phoebe eyes widened when those thing appeared out of thin air.
Phoebe stared at her three friends and asked
“And you say we are giants on this planet” a small smile forming on her lips

“What the??” Phoebe said as she felt a tingling sensation all over her body and in the next second found herself in another place.

“I don’t know” Legolas confessed “I haven’t seen them come out of the tent, and something that big could not leave the tent without being undetec…”

Legolas was about to speak, but then a unknown voice exclaimed
“Oh my God, what is that??”
Before Legolas or the prince could react, two massive hands came and grabbed them gently. Soon they found themselves staring at an unknown face.
The expression on Phoebe’s face revealed her shock as she watched the little beings in her hands with her mouth wide open.
Winona giggled and said to her
“Easy there, Phoebe. Treat them gently”
Phoebe reacted and for a moment averted her gaze from the little beings and stared at her three friends
“Oh my God, you were telling the truth” then her gaze went back to them, now a smiled adorned her beautiful face.

Legolas, that so far managed to keep his cool, spoke to her

Phoebe blushed. She was beginning to notice how fair the being with pointy ears was. Edward wasn’t bad looking either”
Anne inclined her head a little and asked them both
“You were looking for us??”
The prince Edward spoke for the first time

Natalie pushed with her elbow

Finally she entered her room and approached her bed. She put both of them in her bed and then went backwards to the door and closed it

Neither men liked the sound of that

Legolas was uncomfortable but Norrington, who came from a more conservative society that resembled the same values of Victorian England, was for a moment at a loss of words.

Norrington struggled but that only humoured Winona. Despite how uncomfortable he felt about the situation, he was also surprised by the softness of her lips. Despite her size, the giant was kissing him gently and slowly

Finally, when she broke the kiss, she laughed as she saw his wet face and clothes. She winked at him and then lowered him on her belly button again.

On Anne’s room, Conan watched as the girl went to the room’s door and closed it. He had been in all sorts of adventures in his life, but nothing was as strange as this whole place.

Anne approached the bed and sat Indian style in front of the warrior; so far she had acted mature most of the time, but right now she wanted to play.

Despite some differences, the scale model basic tools were very similar to those Christopher Brandon was familiar with. He found out it was designed to be handled by just one man.

A she left, Gimli asked “Do you see any harbour or port in this lake, somewhere where we could land”

Brandon answered as he manoeuvred the ship through the waters, looking for a place whee he could anchor the ship, but all he could see were tall walls surrounding the “lake”

Five minutes later Phoebe returned, wearing a red bikini. “Did you miss me boys?” she asked teasingly as she slowly entered the pool
