155332.content:
Although similar to earth, planet Lilliputia had a few differences. It was mostly a sea world. Only two islands, both of roughly the same size as Australia in earth scale, were the only dry land.
The northern island was named Lilliput, while the southern Island was Blefescu.
As this planet was located a little further from its sun, there was no tropical weather on the planet, thus evolution had taken a slightly different road than earth. Most of the inhabitants of both island had Scandinavian features. Blond hair and blue eyes were mostly common, although there was also red headed people and a few light brown haired people.

Our heroines had arrived on the southern coast of Lilliput, as it summer in the northern hemisphere, the weather won’t be a problem as they are only in their bikinis.
The level of technology in this world is
155332.title: introductions 2

1553321.content:
The three teenage girls were up and coming Disney stars. The Company was secretly owned by aliens. Walt himself was still actually alive and well. It was tradition to let kids in on the secret by sending them to the homeworld on their first spacecraft just after their first successful movie of season of a show.

“Like riding a monorail” Selena Gomez said with a look of wonder.

Miley Cyrus agreed “No need for an engineer, pilot, anything. We just step in and it goes.”

The ship was equipped with a full-size refrigerator/freezer that was fully stocked. The journey usually took a few hours.

“Amazing!” Anna Sophia Robb exclaimed. She was the most scientifically inclined of the trio. “Seventy-two point three light years between lunch and dinner!”

A voice from a speaker said “Actually, girls, Jevlenese technology has been capable of this trip for over two hundred thousand years. We are steadily bringing Earth up to our standards. Please be seated for takeoff.”

“Yessir!” the trio replied, then giggled when they looked around and realized they were alone. They didn’t feel the slightest acceleration as the ship simply disappeared from the swamp outside Orlando. In a minute, they paused at The Moon, for no other reason than to show them the two worlds together.

The computer announced “Lightspeed achieved, and accelerating, passengers can move freely.” Hardly had the young celebrities unbuckled their belt another announcement “Now passing Saturn, velocity 200c.”

While Miley and Selena hit the fridge, Anna looked out the back window and gasped “Can hardly see the Sun!” And as she spoke, she lost sight of it altogether.

“Now at 75000c.” the computer announced a minute later.

Clothes obsessed Miley found a replicator that could produce nearly anything at will. The two older girls were soon busily ‘at work’ She laughed at one point and said “Hey, Anna, check it out! Stripper Barbie!”

“Cute” the younger blond girl replied, without much interest, and settled back to watch stars whiz by. Suddenly, a whole bunch of panels and buttons started flashing red.

Selena panicked and yelled “YOU’RE THE GENIUS! FIX IT!!”

“There’s no damn controls!!” Anna hollered back. “But look, it says <emergency landing site>”

The computer didn’t reply to any requests so Miley suggested “That sounds like a crash to me. Strap in.”

The crash, if it could be called that, was over a minute later. The three girls were completely unharmed. The scariest part was hitting water, but they wound up on a beach.

“Tough little ship.” Commented Anna “Everything still works. Just, no more Stripper Barbie, Ok Miley?”

The singer of the trio looked offended and replied “Fine! Well let’s open up.”

“Idiot!” Anna yelled in a panic “How do you know we can breathe the air?

The computer answered “Atmosphere within human tolerances.”

Miley stuck out her tongue, childishly and said “Let’s go. Damn! It’s hot out there!” she immediately tossed her clothes aside and went out in her red bikini.”

“Good thing, too!” Selena giggled. “You’re about waist deep!”

Anna reported “The ship says a homing is working.” And followed the two older girls to shore. We probably should stay close.

“Hey look what I found!” Miley called out from a bit of a distance. She was looking down at a carriage, studying it with great interest. The main thing about it was exactly that she was looking down on it. The carriage didn’t even reach her knees.

Selena shrugged and dismissed it “Some kid’s toy.”

“Looks like a pretty expensive one.” Anna offered “Realistic, I think some of those hinges might be gold.” She got down on her knees and looked in the driver’s side window. Then she crawled over it and looked into the passenger side. To her, the setup was backwards.

Possessively, Miley reached down with both hands, picked it up and declared “Mine! I saw it first!”

“Fine, whatever.” Both girls said dismissively. But they were both looking around for one of their own.

They heard the crack of gunfire and spun around. From what looked like a great distance, someone on a horse was galloping towards them. Sharing a look of alarm Selena and Anna froze. Miley didn’t care, she wanted to get her toy aboard.

“Something’s weird.” Selena said.

Anna nodded, noticing the same thing “IF that horse was really galloping that fast, it should be a lot closer by now.”

That wasn’t quite the case. And the rider realized it, first slowing then stopping his mount. The horse reacted as well, coming to a full stop and starting to back away. It reared up in panic, turned almost flying in the opposite direction.

“A toy?” asked Selena, not quite believing what she saw. If it was a man on a horse they were no bigger than her knees.

The uncontrollable horse, threw its rider and picked up more speed.

“Too realistic.” Anna replied. In an unspoken agreement with the TV star, she took off after them.

The man, dressed all in furs, was barely to his feet.

Selena dropped to her knees in the sand and grinned at him. A bit larger than the average doll, she thought “Well, hi there little man.” She looked up at Anna and added “Better hurry, yours is getting away. This one’s mine.”

“Hmpf!” Anna grunted, but catching a horse that size couldn’t be too hard. She sprinted off before it got too far ahead. She at least wanted something to play with.
1553321.title: Starcrusier Crash

15533212.content:
Anna Sophia Robb, only blond and youngest of a trio of young Disney Stars stranded on an unknown planet, was chasing after a horse the size of a newborn kitten. It was crazy, no human could keep up with a horse. Of course she’d never been off Earth before. She wasn’t thinking much, but after a couple minutes chase, she was only a couple steps behind the little creature. It made a sharp turn around a large, even for Sophia, bulge in the sand. “Aww nuts!” the young celebrity complained.

The horse made an incredibly sharp turn.

Anna stumbled over her own feet and landed in the soft sand. By the time she righted herself, it was galloping away.

“Monster! Giant! Flee My Lady!” came a string of voices.

The squeaky voices were right there. Anna sat up and grinned down at them “Hi there little people.”

“Charge!” on screamed, wielding his sword.

Anna was mildly alarmed. It was such a surprise that she didn’t react fast enough. He took a slice at her leg. But all Anna felt was a tingle. It didn’t draw so much as a drop of blood. It did draw a fine line on the smooth flesh of her leg, which quickly faded. She twisted around and said “Come here, little man.”

“My life for My Lady!” he screamed fanatically. But that didn’t stop a giant hand from sliding under his horse’s belly and lifting them both off the ground.

Anna giggled at the churning of the ‘mighty steed’s legs and brought them to her face “Red hair, hmmm.. neeto.” She looked at him, leaning her head from side to side for different views.

“At least finish me you beast!” he demanded, bravely. Though he clutched the neck of his horse in fear of a height he’d rarely been above the ground.

The woman leader of the group commanded “Free my man!” in a voice that expected obedience.

“Can’t you see I’m playing?” Anna asked, impatiently “Now hush!”

She split the air with a war cry, “Ayiyiiyiyiyiyi!!!!!” spun her sword over her head and charged. She flung her deadly metal circlet directly at the giant’s face.

“Heh” and grunted in amusement “she wants to play frizbee.” And after pinching it between thumb and finger, she slid it on commenting “Pretty ring!”

Furious at being mocked, the iron-clad woman lashed her horse and again cried “Ayiyiiyiyiyiyi!!!!!”

“Eeep!” Anna couldn’t help but squeak at the charging fury. But that was only instinct. The young blond girl watched as the charge continued. As the screaming woman got closer, Anna had to more and more look down. Anna felt less and less threatened as she approached. She finally leaned forward and scooped up this second little attacker as well. Both hands full, the young celebrity decided “May as well keep both.”

The little man in Anna’s left hand screamed “Put us down at once!”

“Quiet Odius!” the woman in her right yelled back. “While I figure a way out of this!”

Anna giggled a bit as she started back to the Interstellar Monorail and declared “You won’t. You’re mine. Boy this beats visiting the Disney World.”

“Perhaps a bit of gold will persuade you?” the woman suggested.

Anna shrugged, both her little captives had to hold on. “Nah…don’t think so.”

“You must want something.” The man added “Jewels, perhaps.”

Anna brought her hands closer together, the ring finger that now had the woman’s circlet was wiggled for him. She replied “Got one.” Then Anna realized something “Hey! I know you! Xena Warrior Princess!”

“Are you a god?” Odius wanted to know.

Anna thought about it and nodded “HMmm…Oh…sure…Three of us came down in our chariot to look around.”

“Then, yes” the little warrior woman said “Please, take us to our camp. And we will sacrifice to you.”

Anna laughed amusedly and replied “Oh, no Xena, I saw that episode. Somehow, your army will already have a trap set for me. I think I’ll take you back to my chariot first.” The whole way, she was followed closely by three others.

“Hey, Selena look!” shouted Miley a few minutes later. “The kid caught more!”

The TV star of the trio squealed in delight and could be seen running back to the ship, then toward the blond girl.

The three horsemen who were following Anna were shocked to see two more giant ‘gods’ They quickly set to turning their steeds in the opposite direction.
15533212.title: Anna's Surprise

155332121.content:
Both older girls, on seeing that Anna had not only caught two more little people, but also had more following her, immediately put away their own finds and chased off after the little men on horseback. This, naturally, was fine by Anna as that left her alone… for a while… with all of them. She wouldn’t know what to do with her hands.

Selena Gomez was a bit of a brat. Made great fun for her when she got to act it on Miley’s show. But that’s another story. Now, she’d gotten to one up her already by getting a man to play with, while all the singer had was a silly toy cart. A second little man would just throw her into a rage.

“YAH!!YAH!!!” the man yelled driving his horse harder and harder. He slapped the reins with ever greater ferocity. Next to Xena, he was probably the smartest in her army. He didn’t know if tossing armor aside would trip up the giant or not. But iron plates made for slow horses. When running, many would peek back to check the status of their pursuer. A smart warrior does no such thing.

The little man didn’t have much of a lead, but the horse was pretty strong. Selena kept pace for a bit. Then she got bored and sped up. Like with Anna, she could easily overtake it. Finally proving herself, she actually overran the galloping creature and dropped to her knees.

“WOAH THUNDER!!” the warrior bellowed. The horse and figured that out for itself, digging its hooves into the sand and skidding to a halt. This sent him flying off his saddle. Then struggled to its feet and started limping away.

Selena wasn’t the least bit interested in the horse. But, the little man flying through the air, she cupped her hands and he fell right into them. His arms and legs dangled freely then started churning as he realized his situation. She caught one arm and held it firmly “You must work out a lot” she said “You have nice big muscles.”

“My name, dear girl, is Virgil” he said charmingly. There wasn’t a female he couldn’t charm, except Xena. Give him an hour with any grown woman, he’d have her in bed within the hour. One like this, he’d have her blushing and obeying his every order in about the time the chase lasted.

Her cheeks did indeed redden. Boys her age were too young. And she’d noticed some of the stage hands sneaking quick glances. They wouldn’t dare, Disney was too protective. She replied “Nice to meet’cha, I’m Selena.”

“An honor, My Lady.” He said smoothly. He fought to ignore the feeling of upward movement. “Might I kiss thine hand?”

Selena giggled girlishly and replied “Certainly noble Virgil.”

“Painted nails are customary in your land?” he asked “The work is exquisite.”

She glanced at the nail he’d kissed and replied “It is called a stickon on my …err land.” She didn’t know if she should say she was from another planet.

“So far away it must be.” He said, cranking it up a notch “For surely such loveliness could not hide from Virgil forever.”

At this, she blushed brightly, stammered then came up with a response from a book “You have a honeyed tongue sir knight.”

“Bit of a scoundrel, truth be told, My Lady.” He admitted “A rightful king probably would not have me.”

Selena replied “Oh I don’t know, Virgil. I’ll have you.” Then she happened to realize how that might sound and she also noticed where he was looking. Bikinis don’t leave much to the imagination.

“Oh Lady Selena, you must think me awful.” He apologized dramatically “While your skin must certainly be lovely. I was actually admiring the charm upon your Ladyship’s neck. A diamond perhaps.” He knew perfectly well what it was, and while not that most precious of stones. It fired his greed to be in a land with gems almost the size of his head.
155332121.title: Controlling Selena

1553321212.content:
Miley Cyrus was the singer of the trio. The only one with a father just as famous. Yeah, she knew she got the part because of him, but now she owned it. She smirked as she followed the two horses. Anything a kid like Anna could chase down, she’d have no problem with. Plus, her singer’s ear was a huge advantage, ducking behind a rock or something wouldn’t do them any good.

“Faster Iolaus!” one yelled. He was Darius, another top Xena Lieutenant. On the world of Lilliputia Darius came from about the darkest race there was. He was called black among his people, but really it amounted to a few shades darker than Selena. He was among the more compassionate of the army, though in battle he was as fierce as their leader.

The youngest of the band was blond-haired, blue-eyed Iolaus. He was actually the son of the army’s former leader. Not really a full member yet, almost a mascot. His horse suddenly started limping, slowing drastically. He lashed the animal for greater speed. “Stupid horse!” he yelled.

“Stop that you little twit!” shouted Miley. The pop star loves horses. She never whipped hers when riding, and hated horseracing for that reason. And she quickly caught the injured horse. Then she swatted the mean little man, yelling “Off!”

It wasn’t like Iolaus had a choice. He simply went flying. Fortunately, the sandy beach was soft. Not that he was completely unhurt. He gagged for air for a couple of minutes.

“You poor thing.” Miley cooed to the little animal. She gently undid the saddle and tossed it away. Then the furious star turned an angry eye toward the fallen man.

Iolaus screamed as he was yanked off the ground by his right leg. He dangled there, a dozen feet in the air, upside down and was spun around until her face dominated his view. “Please let me go!” he begged.

“Oh! I’ll do that!” she answered, menacingly. And with that, dropped him into the sand between her legs. Miley might have been embarrassed if she thought about the fact that a male was in a quite intimate location, but she was too mad. She turned kindly attentions back to the horse and stroked its small body. Going underneath curiously, she found it to be female. She had the horse to her cheek and enjoyed gently playing with its little body “No one’s gonna whip you again.” She promised.

That was when Darius charged. He’d been quietly circling the giant and was in the best possible position to rush in, grab Iolaus and gallop away in a lightning strike. He merely lashed his reins in an effort to be as quiet as he could. Finally, he bellowed “IOLAUS NOW!!”

“No you don’t!” Miley declared, reacting instantly. Her captive had been clear of her feet and in the air as the second warrior reached out to pull him aboard. But, in the same movement, Miley blocked the jumped and pulled the would-be rescuer off his saddle. They fell together in a heap in the sand. Amused, she said “You stupid little dummies.”

The second horse, minus rider, galloped off free, except for the saddle still on it.

“Let us go!” Darius said, using his battlefield command voice.

Miley leaned forward and knocked him over with a sweep of her free hand. It was comical to watch him tumble over his fallen friend “Oops, tripped, little man.”

“You made your point.” The darker man said as he stood again “But perhaps we can negotiate. You may keep our horse in exchange for just leaving us here.”

Miley planted her free hand next to Darius and got to one knee “That’d be fair” she said “if you had a horse. This one is mine now. Care to try again.”

“Alright.” He gulped down a thrill of fear as her giant shadow covered him “Iolaus is important to my leader. If you free him, I will allow you to take me.”

Miley grinned a wicked little grin “I could do all kinds of things to you.” She pointed out “I could rip you in half. You could be a toy. I might even decide to eat you.”

“NOO!!!” yelled Iolaus.

The singer stood up and looked at the pair cowering between her feet. She bobbed her head back and forth as if trying to decide between them. When she did, she bent down and grabbed Darius by the collar. “Such a brave, little man” she said. Then, holding him, the same hand knocked over the horse-beater, pinned him to the ground. She got one finger hooked under his armor and stood up.

“We had a deal!” Darius protested.

Lifting that hand to her face, Miley told him “It’s no problem, I can carry both of you.” Horse in one hand, little soldiers dangling from the other, she headed back to the star cruiser.
1553321212.title: Animal Lover

15533212122.content:
Anna waded knee deep in the ocean. She opened the door to the damaged transport and had to set both her little captives inside so she could pull herself aboard. The first thing that happened was that Xena rolled to her feet and threw herself out the door. Anna looked down, admiring the perfect dive, then just scooped her up again. Offering an amused grin, she said “Read this in a book ‘I permitted that as a show of futility’ Don’t do it again.”

“Do you know who you are dealing with?!” the doll-sized warrior demanded

The blond youngster nodded, she was just old enough to remember first run episodes of Xena on TV. Rather late in the run. Plus there were always repeats. “Sure” acknowledged Anna “like I said before you’re Xena.”

“If you know my name…” Xena growled. She pulled at one of the fingers wrapped around her waist. It moved a little – maybe -- “… then you know! I am not someone you want as an enemy!”

Anna shrugged and put her back in the Monorail. This time, she added a push that made sure there wouldn’t be a repeat dive. She hauled herself aboard, and immediately had to deal with another escape attempt. She had already pushed the door button, but it was a reflex. Anna’s foot lashed out to trip him. To the warrior it was more like running into a wall. Then she pinned him under it and said “That’ll teach ya, little man!”

“Turn him loose!” yelled Xena. And, not even giving the giant a chance, she leapt into the air aiming a spinning kick as high as she could.

The attack connected about 3” below Anna’s knee. She actually winced, wondering if it would bruise. Then emitted a little giggle as something the trapped man did tickled her foot. Anna bent over and grabbed Xena off the floor, then pulled the man out from her under sole. She walked over to the counter and let them roll out of her hands.

“What do you want?” Odius demanded.

Anna grinned and commented “Pretty tough sounding from someone who just got stepped on.”

“I haven’t seen you do any magic, so you’re no god.” Xena concluded and she entered a fighting stance “A giant yes, but I’ve defeated giants before and I am done playing games with you.”

Smiling, now rather devilishly, Anna latched onto what the Warrior Princess just said and asked “Pla-aaay?” She reached for her.

“NO!” yelled Odius. He charged and pushed the giant arm. Which, unfortunately, left him almost exactly in her hand. He couldn’t help looking up and showing a bit of fear.

It was really the first time she focused on him. He was cute, she thought. And since he practically volunteered she figured Why not? And picked him up “Yeah…little man…play.”

“Don’t even think about it!” he panicked as she brought him to her face “I’m not a toy!!!”

Anna chuckled and bit and stroked his chest “My little man, you’re just full of good ideas.”

“That’s enough!” declared Xena “Ayiyiiyiyiyiyi!!!!!” and she struck again, kicking the giant girl right in her wrist.

Anna cried out as the pain traveled up her arm. Her hand went limp dropping the toy man on the counter “Bad Xena!” she scolded. She shook her numb hand trying to work out the pins and needles. With her good hand, Anna grabbed her and walked over to the replicator and ordered “Strips of tape! Three inches long. A dozen of them.”

“Release My Lady!” Odious yelled as the giant returned carrying his leader. He swung his heavy broadsword over his head, ready for battle.

Anna just rolled her eyes. Although it still tingled, she knocked him over with her free hand, snatched the sword away and tossed it aside. “Can’t have any fun with both of you fighting like this.” She complained “I’ll just hafta put one of you away.”
15533212122.title: A Little Trouble

155332121221.content:
Anna really had the most interest in Xena, after all, she was the star of the show. And a bit of a grudge about numbing her hand. Either Selena or Miley had created a simple cage to keep their captives in. It was a smooth metal box, about five feet across and chest high to the girls. This made it nearly four times the height of their little finds. Escape proof.

“There that is better.” Said Xena as the giant freed her “Now, I have further demands. You will release all my men. That carriage, we were coming to claim it.”

Anna ignored her. She bent over the cage and released the little man into it. Looking down she saw the other man, plus a horse imprisoned there. She watched their futile attempts for a moment and turned back. Walking up to the counter, Anna rested her hands on it and asked “What was that about demands?? Huh?”

“Requests if you like.” The Warrior Princess offered, still firmly “But, I. All my men. And our treasure. Will be leaving.” She did note that despite the height of the counter, the giant was still standing above her. The one advantage Xena felt she had was the giant was a young girl. Easily manipulated.

Anna shrugged and sounding very adult declared “Request denied.” She poked Xena in the chest staggering the little woman.

“It’s a fight you want. It’s a fight you get.” Growled Xena. All she had to do was sting the girl’s hands again like she did before.

Without another distraction, Anna was just playing with her. She pulled the targeted hand away and caught the mini-woman with a light slap to the head. She watched without fear as Xena wound up for another of her kicks. Then just as she lashed out, Anna swept in at took her little legs out from under her “Gotcha now!” she celebrated “First thing those boots have got to go.”

“NO!” shouted Xena. She spun around attempting to fight the giant hands. But it was just useless. She was bounced back and forth between them. Xena wasn’t even able to get a bit of balance, What made her furious was the childish laughter. She managed to get her feet under herself just for an instant and jumped into the air “Ayiyiiyiyiyiyi!!!!!” Xena screamed, easily doubling her height.

“Whoa!” the young celebrity exclaimed. She was quite surprised to find her hands suddenly empty. Although not surprised enough to react in time. Both hands jumped off the counter and caught the warrior woman, one around her knees the other caught her waist. Amused, Anna asked “Going somewhere?”

Xena twisted and fought, but her feet dangled freely and all her twisting got her was brush burns on her exposed middle. Surprising herself, she yielded “Alright, giant, what do you want to let me go?”

“Got everything I want right now, Xena doll.” Anna replied. It just slipped out before she realized it, but it made her laugh. “I like that, Xena doll. Anyway back to what I was doing.”

Xena found herself pinned to the counter. She wasn’t quite helpless, not yet, but she was quickly getting there. Something sticky just trapped her right arm on the smooth surface. She desperately, but futilely, tugged on the trapped extremity. Then giant fingers slid across her chest and pinned her other arm. Xena protested “Don’t do that!!”

“Hehheh. Didn’t mean to. Hehheh” Anna laughed “Hafta do it again though. Hehheh.” And with that she pressed her thumb against the struggling little woman and another strip of tape stuck Xena’s left arm to the counter. Anna knew she couldn’t use her hands since they were under the tape.

Giant fingers now slid down Xena’s legs. They were by far the most powerful part of her body. She grunted and groaned with the effort of keeping her feet off the smooth surface. But she just couldn’t …hold…ouuuuut. “You – have – no – right!”

“Sure I do.” Anna argued without any heat “You’re my doll. Now let’s push these legs apart.” And her fingers spread them until she saw a hint of discomfort on her captive’s face. Then she taped down one leg, plucked off a boot, then switched, and tossed the second boot to the floor somewhere.

Now without her weapons/footwear, and exhausted, Xena couldn’t fight anymore. Those strange sticky strips now held her spread-eagle. She watched the giant eyes inspect her body. Then a curious finger dragged up one leg and down the other. “Don’t do that!!”

“No back talk.” Anna scolded her, playfully. “And fighting will only wear you out.” Drawn to Xena’s heaving chest, the girl poked at her living doll there too. But, just as things were getting really interesting there was a noise. Anna, very annoyed, looked around for the interruption.
155332121221.title: Caged Odius

1553321212211.content:
Miley and Selena had run off in different directions as they chased the little people. Now they reunited within sight of their damaged transport. “Just one, huh?” the singer observed “That’s too bad. Got two, plus this cute little horse.”

“Already got that little coach with that gold.” Selena countered “Probably weighs two pounds or more. This is Virgil. Ain’t he handsome?”

Miley just shrugged. She held up the hand that held her captives and dangled them between herself and the TV star “Didn’t notice.” She admitted “Guess they’re alright. But they made me mad for whipping their horses. I managed to save this one. The other ran away.”

“You are horse obsessed.” Selena giggled. She stroked the animal’s back with a finger, then ran it down its little face and laughed when it nipped her. She studied Miley’s captives and said “Well, the one with long hair is ok. But not nearly as handsome as Virgil.”

The dark warrior smirked and bent his body over her fingers “I am honored My Lady.” He said in the same flirtatious tones he had been using.

“Heeheeheeheee!” Selena tittered. It was one thing for him to say things like that before. But now there were others around, it really embarrassed her “Stop it!”

Virgil knew he had her now. He gave her his look that had practically made women fall into bed with him. And, using the same technique, he wrapped his powerful arms around the fingers that circled his waist and squeezed. He again leaned over, this time kissing them and nipping at the girl’s flesh. And just like a woman his own size, he could sense the response as heat through her skin. This was even more noticeable in his current situation. “I cannot help myself!” he declared poetically “Such a grand vision of loveliness I have never beheld. Certainly not in such quantity. It is well you hold me, My Lady, for I should surely swoon!”

“Oh please!” Miley scoffed, rolling her eyes “How can so much bullshit come out of such a tiny mouth?”

Selena looked away from the man in her grip and at her friend “What do you mean?”

“Let’s keep walking.” The singer said, first. And they did “So anyway, he can’t really be serious. If we were his size, he’d just pat you on the head and call you a nice kid.”

Virgil interrupted saying “Forgive me for disagreeing, Lady. You are nearly as lovely, yourself as My Lady Selena. But, you are quite incorrect. Your mode of dress has made it obvious you are not children.”

“These!” Miley continued, ignoring her friend’s captive. She held hers high again and rattled them a bit “Aren’t men! They’re toys! Dolls! And I can’t believe you’re letting yourself get all worked up over something that’s not even as high as your knee.”

Poor Darius and Iolaus got banged up a bit from the shaking. Armor clashed and poked exposed flesh in places. It wasn’t anything life threatening, but there were definitely bruising impacts.

Miley heard the yelps and protests and laughed. She twisted her wrist around, brought them close and gave them an unsympathetic look “Stop complaining, you two.” The pop-star ordered “That’s nothing compared to the way you lashed your horses. Pooooor little thinnng. Shhhhhh…shhhhh.”

“Hmmmm” Selena wondered as she walked. She noted that the Stellar Monorail was in sight, adjusted her course some, then looked at Virgil. She peeked at her friend and observed how she was balancing the horse on her shoulder, cuddling it against her cheek. Then how Miley was casually swinging her other arm, that held her two little men. “Virgil, you don’t mind me holding you, do you?”

Sensing a troubling shift in the girl’s attitude, he rubbed the giant fingers and replied “OF course not, My Lady. Whatever pleases you.”

“Then why did you run away before?” she wanted to know.

That was a potential trap he realized. He couldn’t show or express any fear of her. “Lady Selena, consider please, would you not react the same way were you just walking about your home and a 30 foot giant appeared out of nowhere?” That way he tossed it back in her lap.

“Makes sense.” Selena admitted.

Miley again rolled her eyes and demanded “Still talking to toys?”

“We’re there.” Said Selena as they were at the water’s edge in front of the Monorail.
1553321212211.title: Warrior with Words

choices: Back to Miley Selena and Anna
15533212122111.content:
The Warrior Princess had led her raiding army to victory hundreds of times, even against the odds. By herself, Xena held her own against the God of War himself. Only his not tiring, she was convinced, kept her from winning. Yet here a child, granted a giant… but still a child … without much trouble, defeated and immobilized her.

“Tha’hell is that!?” complained Anna Sophia Robb. Having just taped the small woman to the counter, the young Disney movie starlet was looking forward to having some fun. The rapping on their damaged conveyance became insistent. “Oh! There you are.”

Horse loving Miley Cyrus glared up at her from the almost knee–deep water. She set the barely kitten-sized horse in the ship and callously flung her two captives across the floor nearly to the back of the ship. Accepting Anna’s hand, she pulled herself up and in. She asked “What’ve you been doing the last hour?”

“I’ll teach her to ignore me!” growled Xena, evilly. She pulled on the odd clear strip that held one wrist. To her frustration, it did not move. “I’ll tie that giant up like she did me! Then I’ll go to work! We’ll nail her tongue to muddy ground and pull her eyes out of her skull!!” Her left hand was useless because of how it was taped, but her right was free to activate a hidden weapon in her wristguard. It snapped up and poked through the tape.

Virgil saw an opportunity to escape Selena’s clutches while the Hispanic girl was distracted pulling herself into the huge white chariot. Plus, once in there he knew escape would be much more difficult. The dark-skinned warrior got to the knife that was sheathed at his neck. It was barely a weapon, even on his terms. But he brought it out and stuck it in the sensitive webbing between the giant’s thumb and finger. He shouted victoriously as the hand sprung open. “YEEHAA!”

“Yipe!” Selena squealed as she felt a pinch. Hardly noticing dropping her captive, she stuck the injured flesh in her mouth and sucked on it, whimpering a bit. After a minute she looked at it, finding no visible wound. Immediately she noticed Virgil missing and looked around.

Even before he surfaced, Virgil was swimming with all his might. Though his muscled body was not that of a swimmer his powerful arms and legs did an impressive job of covering distance. He felt he had a fair chance of escaping.

Selena spotted him with little effort. On her scale, the doll-man wasn’t getting as far away as he thought. Selena took less than 20 steps, actually passed him. Crouching down, she followed him with her eyes. As he passed right under her knees, she put a hand to her lips and giggled. Well before Virgil could get out of reach, she pinched his little butt and plucked him from the water. She brought him to her face and glared harshly, demanding “Going somewhere?”

*Cough*cough*gagg*gagh* Virgil swallowed water at the shock of being lifted from the ocean. He’d been sure he was getting away. He studied the young face, then faked another fit to give himself time to think. When he finally did, Virgil contritely said “My Lady Selena, you misunderstand. I was only swimming to keep from drowning.”

“Hmmm…” the starlet considered. The little dark man dangled from her fingers, helplessly and her expression softened. As she walked back to the disabled stellar monorail she commented “You swim pretty fast for your size.”

Virgil wanted to be righted, but did not want to antagonize the giant girl so still feeling the pinch of his undergarments he answered “A warrior, ma’am, gets into all types of situations. I might have drowned when you dropped me.”

“Yeah.” She replied, with a guilty expression “Umm.. sorry about that.”

Though physically uncomfortable, Virgil grinned “Apology accepted, oh Great One.” He replied silkily. A woman his size would have felt his chest rumble and fall into his bed.

“Let’s see what my friends are doing.” Selena decided. Still holding the charming little man, she climbed up and rejoined Anna and Miley.

On the home planet of Walt Disney, a pretty blond teenage girl sat in front of a quite large TV screen. She was watching a transmission from the planet where the trio crash landed. It was, she knew, a little delayed so the current display had Miley chasing down the two warriors on horseback. She was loving every minute of it. A gust of wind frazzled her hair. She snapped “Cut it out, Elias!” without looking around.

“But it’s fun.” The object of her ire retorted playfully. And repeated the action. From behind, it looked like the girl’s hair was a flower in the process of blooming. It fanned out in all directions.

Still refusing to take her eyes off the screen, the poor teasing victim snarled “Elias Walter Disney! You made me miss the best part!” Which was true. Before the hair flew in her face, the girl watched Miley sit in front of a horse. And by the time her hair settled, Miley was standing and walking off.

“Eh…seen it a hundred times.” The teenaged male voice laughed “You almost sound like my Mom. Hahaha! Almost. Except for the squeaky voice. Besides… I’d rather play …heh heh… with you.”

Two things at once happened to the lovely girl. As she heard the sentence, the big screen was abruptly lifted away. Taking her entertainment. She was about to spin around, following the TV that was more than half her size, but her movement was halted by a hand circling her waist and lifting her off the surface. Passing a mirror, she could see the boy; the TV, now showing Anna, in his left hand. And, she could still barely stand it, herself in his right. Fingers wrapped around her shapely hips. She cringed. “Pleasseee!” she begged “I wanna watch Miley!”

“Later!” the giant boy insisted, adding a squeeze to emphasize the point. He smirked at her.

Now, the girl was as worried for his idea of play as she was wanting to see the screen again. “Look … Elias …. Come on. Hey! Bring Miley here!!”

“You know that’s not allowed.” He replied “You went back to Earth right after your first trip. Remember? You had fun on The Munsters.”

The girl blushed then pouted “So not the point.” She argued lamely “I just wanna see how she does on this planet.”

“Come on little Emily.” Brad ordered “What have you got against Miley?”

She twisted around in the boy’s grip declaring “I am NOT little!!” *grunt*nnnn* “At home I got three inches on Cyrus! Plus I was a star first! The Hannah part shoulda been mine!”

“Hahaha! Jealousy on the set!” Elias laughed out loud. “And keep squirming like that. Dunno how someone so young figured knew I’d love her little ass rubbing my palm.”

Emily froze, then shouted angrily “I’m FOURTEEN! You’re only SIXTEEN! BIG DEAL!!”

Elias Disney just smirked. His free hand started to lightly touch the blond in his hand. A fingertip brushed her breasts. “That’s nice.” He commented, now smiling “The first time I saw you … those Spy Kids movies … I wanted to meet you. Then Dad told me I would. And that you’d fit in my hand… I couldn’t wait. Told Grandpop he had to hire you.”
15533212122111.title: On Another World

155332121221111.content:
Emily Osment was quite a popular celebrity. And some claimed she only got her career because of her brother. To that she’d retort cheerfully “Hell yes!” or “Jealous!” Landing the #2 spot in Hannah Montana was a solid career move. Disney almost never canceled shows. Plus there was the mysterious bonus she had to sign a secrecy clause to get, not even telling her parents. And her first trip, that one initially began as a disaster. But she returned home, safe and sound. Smiling through even the worst Hannah tapings, but never saying why. This trip…however… was very diff--- “Hey! Buddy!” Emily said sharply “Watch the fingers!”

“Sorry!” Elias exclaimed reflexively. And his fingers snapped open allowing the suddenly loud Emily to drop on his bed. But a grin quickly returned, dimpling his cheeks.

The blond starlet dusted herself off, unnecessarily, and glared at him “You should be. You don’t just go touching a person like that. And. And. And. Uhhh… what are you smiling at?”

“I just remembered” replied the boy, as he hitched his body closer to his captive “you’re also only 14 inches tall. I don’t have to listen to you. Not really.”

Emily’s glare turned to a pop-eyed expression of alarm. Then something caught the corner of her vision. She flinched away from a hand that was inching toward her. Emily stepped back but it continued to follow her. She glanced back to the giant’s face, seeing only a grin. “Come on, Elias.” She pleaded “I…I really—umm, that is…Br--”

“Watch out for the edge, little Emily.” The boy cautioned. Elias grinned at her as he closed in. His warning was entirely premature, the doll-sized celebrity wasn’t THAT close to the edge of his bed, yet. His queen bed had a lot of room on it. In fact, Emily was getting somewhat out of reach… Again. He used his legs to push closer.

The huge bed shook under Emily’s feet. Her arms flailed about “Ah---whoa! Ooof!” and she fell to her knees on the quaking surface.

“Thought you could dance better than that.” Elias quipped, chuckling at his own joke. He suddenly found the curve of Emily’s ass appealing. He extended his left forefinger and brushed a knuckle over it. “Sweet” he commented “Bet it’s even better out of them jeans.”

The teen star jolted straight up. Nearly overbalanced and comically overcorrected. But, somehow regained control. Emily was again facing an oncoming hand. Her eyes flicked fearfully between it and the giant, grinning face. Slowly backing up, and holding up her arms defensively, she said “Look, can’t we talk about this?”

“Sure.” He grinned down at her “You talk, I’ll play. Cute little body.”

Emily gaped at him. She couldn’t think of anyone who had ever made such a blunt remark to her. She blushed brightly, cheeks and ears almost on fire. “YEAH!” she protested. “WELL MAYBE! BUT IT’S MINE!!”

“Well that’s a bit mean.” Elias pouted “You should share. Umm… by the way, Lily … look out behind you.”

Her blond hair bouncing around, Emily shook her head “Aw no.” she scoffed “Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice --- YAHHH!!!” She had been caught from behind.

“Well, I did warn you.” The boy chuckled as his fingers closed around the doll-sized celebrity’s hips. He lifted Emily off his bed and at the same time, flipped around and into a sitting position. Elias was still laughing as he settled against the backboard “So how come a smart girl like you didn’t see that coming?”

Emily punched, quite ineffectually, at the fingers that wrapped around her. Kicking at the air was even more futile. “Let me go!” she demanded in an angry voice.

“Shhh! Not so loud!” he ordered. It was hardly a secret on Disney World that Earthlings were brought here. And at the rate of hundreds a day. But that did not mean a 16-year old boy wanted his parents catching him in the act with one.

Smart girl that she was, Emily caught on. She violently kicked and screamed. She thrashed about in her captor’s hand, yelling “HELP!! HELP!! LEMME GOOOOO!!! HELP!! HELP!!”

“Shuttup!” Elias commanded in a harsh whisper. He found himself needing both hands to control little Emily. And while she nearly worked herself loose, he easily overwhelmed her. But, he couldn’t stop her yelling. As an act of desperation he quite unceremoniously dumped his mini-celebrity, headfirst, into one of his pillowcases then trapped her between it and the other. Worriedly he commented “Hope no one heard you.”

Scant seconds later, the teen’s worst fear was realized. From outside came his mother’s voice “Elias! What’s going on in there?”

“Nothing Mom!” he called back, lying “Err… sorry … TV too loud!”

After a long pause, in which Elias thought he was safe, Mom replied “I’m coming in!”

“Ok! Sure! Just a sec!” said the boy, frantically. This could not be happening to him. He’d begun to get a hardon from handling Emily, and now he had to face his Mother! His face burned. He huffed and puffed a few times, patted the pillows imprisoning the little starlet and pulled on the doorknob. He smiled at her, offering a cheery “HIya! Mom!”

She frowned, countering “Hiya indeed. And do not tell me ‘nothing is going on’ TV, huh?” the woman walked over and touched it, noting “Not even warm. Care to try again?”

“Umm…err” stammered Elias. Hypersensitive, he heard his little captive’s faint yelling, and couldn’t imagine Mom not. But apparently, she couldn’t. “Just …that is… goofing off.”
155332121221111.title: Emily Osment on Disney World

1553321212211111.content:
An annoyed Talia Disney entered her son’s room and looked around. Arms folded across her chest, she observed “Well.lllll nothing seeeeems out of place.”

“I’M IN HERE!!!” screamed Emily. She violently, and futilely, assaulted her cushiony prison with feet and fists. On the plus side, it didn’t hurt. Negative… all either side did was absorb the effort. Quickly exhausted, the Disney starlet thumped her head against the soft walls.

Elias kept his face expressionless and answered “Sure, Mom… err, told ya.”

“Seeming and being are two different things, my son.” Talia countered. She walked between bed and dresser, running a hand across a bunch of books stacked there. “And your behavior indicates otherwise. Care to explain?”

Pulling his best ‘innocent’ look and voice Elias offered “Dunno wha’cha mean.”

“I highly doubt that.” she muttered, glancing around. Talia resumed walking around. The desk looked normal. She peaked under it, saw nothing odd.

The boy considered his Mother’s expression and said “See Mom. All’s quiet.”

“Seems so.” Replied Mom “Well, I suppose I’ll be going then, and Ouch! DAMmit! SHIT!” she’d stubbed her toe on the bedpost and proceeded to punch it in anger.

Elias couldn’t help the snort of laughter that escaped as his Mother cursed. Despite his humor, he rushed over to support her. “Sorry Mom, it’s funny.”

“I guess so.” Talia admitted with a sour laugh “And I also suppose I got a little carried away with my suspicions. But you must admit, you were acting awfully---YAHHHH!!!” Pain forgotten, Mother instincts kicking in Talia yanked her son away from his bed, pushed him behind her and seized the nearest heavy object she could lay hands on.

Unaware of the mortal danger she was in, Emily first squealed in surprise, then cheered as her prison rolled. She immediately began pulling herself free. Her lithe body served her well, only a little winded as Emily popped her head out into the light. The first thing she beheld as her eyes adjusted was a terrifying sight. High above her head loomed, in huge green and purple letters, TRIGONOMETRY! While a small voice in her head commented ‘Funny, considering that last math test.’ Emily screamed wildly “NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!”

“Mom! NO!” said Elias in a sharp tone. He threw himself across the bed, caught the textbook and took it from her. It was probably the first time in his life he’d done something like that. And, before that had a chance to sink in, came the realization that Emily was out in the open. He’d been caught red-handed “Oh” he muttered “shit shit shit shit shit shit!”

Completely thrown off her stride, Talia just gaped as the doll-sized girl stood up on her son’s bed. “Well!” she finally exclaimed “I suppose I was right, something IS going on. What, or rather WHO do we have here??”

“Please, Mom, this isn’t what it looks like.” Elias said, weakly

Emily, hoping for freedom stepped forward and introduced herself “Umm…hi ma’am… I’m Emily. Err… I’m from Earth and I’d just like to get back.”

“You look a bit familiar.” Talia commented, then ordered “Come closer.”

The starlet swallowed nervously. She felt completely exposed and vulnerable, but after all this was Emily’s goal. For someone in authority to see her plight and rescue her. So, hesitantly, she stepped forward, having also to walk around the giant pillow she had just escaped from. Though her long-sleeved t-shirt and jeans outfit covered her well, Emily felt very exposed looking up into the giant woman’s face “Hi, ma’am” she repeated, even more nervous as she was now standing in the darkness of her shadow. But she took the smile as a reassuring one “I’ve…err… had a great visit. But…umm…my Mom always worries when I’m away. Plus my brother’s graduating soon…ahhh…and---“

“You are rambling, child.” Talia interrupted. She stood over the 14” teen, stroking her chin, contemplating. Glanced over at her son and asked “Still looks familiar? Not the everyday Earthgirl, is she, Eli?”

The boy scratched his neck, gave a guilty look and admitted “Err… not exactly.”

“Yeah! That’s right!” shouted Emily, pouncing on the chance. She’d worked out that somehow they were all related to Walt Disney, so naturally, she had to be important to them “I’m a star! TV Show! HANNAH MONTANA!!!”

Elias, to Emily’s great satisfaction, blushed. But he then looked down at the girl standing on his bed and reached for her.

“HEY!” exclaimed Emily. Holding up her hands to ward off the huge hand, she stumbled back. Glanced over her shoulder at the giant mother, then back. Fingers were so close she imagined she could feel their heat. But, suddenly, a larger hand seized the boy’s wrist and pushed it away. Emily cheered, then jeered at her captor “Haha!”

Talia, still behind the doll-sized star, commented “Not really smart, doing that. He is five times your height.”

“I thought you were on my side.” Complained Emily. Then from behind, something curled over her shoulder. Emily tried to turn, but felt restrained as a red painted fingernail slid over her shoulder and down her front. It pinched her breast, but that was not Emily’s only concern. Her feet left the soft firmness of the bed, and she protested “HEY!”

Elias felt oddly confused by watching his Mother lift his little visitor off his bed. Then there was the sensation of being caught not just with a little Earthling, but a girl. And moments before he’d started undressing her. Was Mom now taking his toy away?

“Yes, I do recognize her.” Talia acknowledged as she turned the little dangling blond around. After studying Emily, she asked her son “Rather large, isn’t she?”

To which Elias shrugged bashfully and asked “Err.. Mom? What are you going to do?”

“Please take me home. Please take me home. Please take me home.” Mumbled Emily. She did not dare offend the giant boy, in case the Mother betrayed her.

“I do not want you staying up too late.” Talia answered, coolly. And extended the hand holding Emily toward him.

Emily gulped as the boy’s slowly broadening, smiling, face got closer.
1553321212211111.title: Mother Invasion

15533212122111111.content:
“Umm… don’t wanna be rude or nothing…” complained Emily “but my shoulder is kinda sore.”

The giant woman nodded at Emily, wrapped her free hand around the blonde’s waist and smirked “That better?”

“I was going for on the floor.” Snorted the starlet “And, preferably, in my bedroom. ON Earth. My dressing room would do though.”

Talia questioned her son “Elias, you are aware of the rules concerning Company employees? Especially the talent?”

“Most especially the talent!” exclaimed Emily with forceful authority.

The boy had to admit “Err…not entirely. That is…”

“A great many rules, of course.” Talia lectured “Common Company employees for example, we would have to pay disability and medical leave if the Earthling is injured. Celebrities, your little friend here for example, can’t miss any of her schedule. So we would have to find some suitable replacement until she healed.”

Emily only heard about half of the giant woman’s speech, because she was being rather carelessly explored by her captress. “HEY! CAREFUL!” the blonde protested as a finger compressed her chest.

“My aren’t you a squirmy little thing!” Talia commented amusedly. She lifted the little starlet from her son’s near grasp. She brushed Emily’s long hair and twirled it all around a single finger.

And just when she thought she was safe from the pervy boy, Emily was lowered and Elias’ fingers wrapped around her waist. She squeaked in protest “Eeep!!”

“Heh-heh-heh” Elias chuckled lightly. But in a way quite alarming to the girl in his grip. “Thanks Mom.”

Talia patted him affectionately on the head and reminded “Not too late, of course Eli.”

“What kind of rules are those!?” protested Emily. She twisted around and shot a look of betrayal at the giant woman. “Don’t you know what he wa--“ and she bit her word in two not wanting to give voice to his actions in the hope they would not be repeated.

Elias ignored her objection and merely replied “Night Mom.” And this time, after Mom left his room, he twisted the lock on his doorknob. He held Emily right up to his face, licked his lips and sighed “Wow! That was scary. Thought she was gonna take you a few times there. But guess she really can’t. I mean she could. But, after all, it’s been going on for—well--- forever really. Be kinda hypocritical, don’cha think? Though, Mom messing around like that… a bit creepy, huh?”

“Yeah, that’s just wrong.” Emily agreed instantly and enthusiastically. “It’s totally wrong to take advantage of someone just because of their size--” Abruptly she cut herself off as she realized the danger of finishing her sentence.

Of course, for all the good it did, she might as well have finished. Elias had done that quick analysis that most teenagers can do. His Mom left. He wasn’t punished. And Emily was still here in his room. His lips slowly formed something between a full-blown smile and a smirk “Now?” he began “What were we doing?”

“I was trying to keep you from touching me!” Emily snapped an angry reply which was additionally fueled by a finger toying with her hair.

Continuing to amuse himself, Elias absently pushed her long blond hair around her head “Be hard to stop touching you, Emily. After all, you’re sitting in my hand.”

“No duh! Captain Obvious!!” she mumbled “That’s not very funny!”

He laughed lightly “Hahaha. That’s your opinion. It’s funny to me.” Watching Emily fight with her blond hair was quite entertaining. Then, due to her twisting around and fighting, somehow her shirt rode up some exposing stomach flesh. Elias licked his lips and ran his free forefinger along the bare skin. As the fingertip tugged on the bottom of her shirt he singsonged “Lookiee I-yi-I gotttt!”

“NOOOO!!!” yelled Emily. And she yanked on her top, pushing it into her jeans. She did not like the smirk on her captor’s face. A demand died on her tongue as all she could do was yelp in protest as the whole world suddenly spun around.

Elias thought that funny, and laughed a bit. He tilted the hand holding the blond starlet, allowing her about Barbie-sized body to roll into his other hand. And curled his fingers around Emily again, although this time she was facing away from him. This, of course, meant that … “Nice little ass you got there, Emily.”

“WELL! HANDS OFF!” she ranted, kicking her legs and pounding her fists ineffectually on the upside down back of her captor’s hand. In fact, in her efforts, she more hurt her arms than accomplished anything.

The boy immediately caught one kicking foot, immobilizing the entire leg. In total control of the limb, he bent it gently pushing Emily’s foot to her ass. Grinning a grin she did not need to see, he felt the back of his finger contact the jeans covered mounds.

Emily’s free leg kicked wildly as she yelled furiously “I SAID HANDS OFF! THAT’S MY ASS!!!”

“Seems like it’s mine.” replied Elias in a playful tone “Well, mine in the I get to play with it sense. Nice and firm.” Then he started feeling strangely tired.

True, both of the startlet’s legs were free. But Emily took little comfort in that as limb-sized fingers poked, pinched and prodded her buttocks. She didn’t see anything wrong with the harmless playing she’d done during her first couple of trips, but this just wasn’t fair. Then her legs were pushed apart by a finger that went between them. She yelled “HELP!”

“Oh come on Emily <yawn> You did the same thing to little <Yawwwnnn> Damn why am I so ----“ the boy was getting incoherent. He stretched out on his bed.

The pretty blonde had been in a few situations with boys before. And being pushed onto one wasn’t all that scary. Having absolutely no control, as now was another matter. One, maybe two, boys had snuck their hands between her legs before but not a single giant finger. ‘At least it’s only through my jeans’ she thought. Small relief.

<Snort> <zzzzz> came from Elias.

“He fell asleep!” Emily complained “I think I’m insulted!”

The door opened and in came the boy’s Mother. “You’re more than welcome to stay here, if you like.” Talia offered.
15533212122111111.title: Questionable Ally

choices: See if you can return the favor."
Keep my promise and get you on your way."
155332121221111112.content:
“What happened to him?” Emily wanted to know.

The giant woman grinned “Aww…that’s precious! Plaything worried about her owner?”

“I am *grunt* NOT a pl … what you said!! NNNHMM!!” declared the teen as she struggled to free herself.

Talia took a few steps closer, now grinning down at the trapped blonde. She scratched her chin and commented “Looks like you have a bit of a problem dear.”

“Need all that oversized brain to figure that out?!” Emily grunted.

Glaring now, the giant woman replied “It is one thing, girl, for you to mouth off to Elias. Actually he probably enjoyed it, likes breaking down Earthie’s fight. Get too fresh and I might just break you!”

“Ulp…Sorry…err ma’am.” The celebrity’s lip quivered. Emily even stopped trying to get out the giant boy’s hand. “I’ll stay …umm… if that…is … you want.”

Talia laughed “So easily you forget, little Earthie. And I’m just here to help you. I assume you do want to go home?”

“Really?” asked Emily brightly. Then finally out of Elias’ hand, she added mistrustfully “How do I know you’ll --?”

A full blown belly laugh came from the giantess “Why you don’t have very much choice! A little explanation though. While our appearance is much like you humans, we have some different chemistry. All I did was pump a sleeping gas into the room. No affect on you because of what it is, but it sent Elias to dreamland.”

“If you were gonna..? Then why …uhh?” asked Emily, hesitantly. “HEY!”

The last squeak was due to Talia grabbing the doll-sized star off her son’s bed. “You see, that would have led to arguments, Elias pointing out that letting you go is rather hypocritical of me.”

“I’d like a say in getting grabbed!” Emily complained.

Her captress shrugged carelessly and retorted “Sure, and given how far you need to go, you might get there in a week. That is if you even knew where to go.” Talia brought her closer to her face and lightly stroked her leg from knee to hip.

“HEY!” Emily protested “I thought you were letting me go!”

The woman’s face assumed a playfully predatory smirk as her fingers roamed the teen’s body. Up one side, pushing the long blonde hair around and down the other side. “We’ll get to that.” she promised softly “I’d really planned to take you right to the port. Honestly. But you are just too cute. It really is your own fault. How can I not …hehheh … play.”

“Great!” snapped Emily angrily “First an oversexed boy! Now a lezzie! HELP!!” And despite holding her legs tightly together, which was pretty difficult while being carried, a finger eased between them and began rubbing.

Talia’s eyebrows knitted together in thought. That did not stop her probing, or walking out of Elias’s room “Ohhh yes.” She nodded “Your world is still working out the whole sexual orientation issue. In your terms, not really. And even if it did matter, who doesn’t mess around with Earthies? Males or females. And as for my son, doesn’t your dictionary have a teenaged boy pictured next to the word ‘oversexed’?”

“Hahahaha!” despite herself and situation, Emily laughed “No…hehe… but they ahh… should! Come on cut it out!” The girl tried to kick the probing finger away.

Now well down the hall to her own room, giant Talia worked her fingers. Different ones as often as possible. She quite enjoyed watching her captive squirm and twist. And tiny Earthling jeans felt incredibly soft to her touch. “Just what I’m going for little doll.” Talia told her “Boys don’t often think of the girl’s need. So,,,as you said… come on… plaything … Cummmmmmm!”

“DAmmit! STOPPIT!!” demanded the helpless girl. Her legs were weakening and couldn’t keep the giant fingers out. Worse, she was beginning to enjoy it. Worse still, Emily felt her panties getting wet. And worst of all the giant woman was smiling in a way that told Emily she knew it.

Talia kept at it, especially encouraged as the little blonde emitted a squeak of pleasure. It might have gone faster had she stripped Emily first. But the slow build up, was more entertaining for her. Talia kept grinding her fingers between the thrashing legs and was quite surprised when those legs wrapped around the probing digit and clamped down tightly. Talia shrugged amusedly and kept flicking. And again the giantess told her “Cum for me little plaything. Thaaaat’s it. Juuuuussttt a little moooore! Ooooh Ahhhh! Cum for Mummmmmiiiieee!”

“MMMM nnnn aaaaahhh rrrrrghh! AAAAA!” Emily’s vocalizations echoed in the giant woman’s huge linoleum bathroom. And being held more than 15 feet off the ground, her body pulsed and twitched every which way. Then she just laid there, limply in the palm of giant Talia’s hand. It disturbed her greatly to feel fingers fondling her ass but, for the moment. Emily was utterly drained.

Talia was gaping in amazement at what she’d witnessed “That such a tiny body should show that much … WOW! I’ll have to …
155332121221111112.title: Talia's Toy

1553321212211111122.content:
“As much as I am sure you enjoyed that, little one, Elias is just too young for that.” declared Talia “We’ll---”

Huffing and puffing, Emily looked up at the giantess and grumbled “You do know I’m younger than him.”

“Talking yourself into being kept there, plaything.” Mrs. Disney scolded her lightly “And you know perfectly well that girls mature before boys do.”

Annoyed, the starlet kicked at the giant hand and snapped “Stop calling me that!”

“Wonderful! Adorable and still spirited!” the woman complemented her “Maybe you should be a permanent heh-heh plaything!” And she laughed when Emily pouted at her “I suppose that’s enough fun. I’ll keep my promise and get you on your way."

The star gave such a sigh of relief and said gratefully “Thank you, ma’am.”

“One wonders if you would feel that way if you were stranded back on one of our show worlds.” Talia commented dryly, in reference to the fact that there Emily was the giant. “But… ahh… regardless. Away you go.” And now at the front door she gently lowered her little blonde burden to the floor.

Emily crossed her arms over her chest, looked up and demanded “I suppose you want me to open the door?”

“Funny.” Talia smirked down at her “Of course not. Just don’t leave that spot. I’m transporting you to the local spacedock. From there, you can easily find a monorail back to Earth.”

Emily took three steps protesting “Wait! I don’t want my at--“ she was cut off in mid word as her body dissolved. She rematerialized in a room the size of a stadium and gaped about “—oms scattered. Well, I seem in one piece. And I’m supposed to just figure this out for myself?”

“It was so funny!” a pair of boys passing by interrupted Emily’s thoughts. “We found this Earthgirl.”

His friend giggled “You like girls!!” They were maybe eight years old.

“DO NOT!!” shouted the first “So ANYWAY! I gave her to my baby brother and he stuffed her in his diaper!”

Emily waited until the pair vanished around the corner then, thanks to her athletic body, easily climbed on a console. It was, conveniently, in plain English. And had simple menu options. INCOMING OUTGOING PASSENGER LIST HUMANS EARTHLINGS. The starlet frowned at the last one “As if we aren’t people! Well well well isn’t this interesting?! Miley and crew are on their way back to Earth.”

“You know the rules, Elias.” Talia Disney was trying to calm her son’s temper “You have to give a Company employee, especially a star, the chance to go home.”

The 16 year old boy grumbled “But that’s silly Mom! There’s nothing to say someone else won’t find her! Them little kids almost got her!” Just as soon as his Mother sent Emily on her way, he’d awakened.

“Now now!” Mother comforted Son with humor “That little Earthie was too sharp for them. She got just a little time as a toy. The real test comes now, let’s see what she does when presented with some choices.”

With no idea she was being monitored, the Disney star was investigating the system and found a surprising control. “What’s this?” she wondered “1X, 2X, 3X, Full? They can control our height? Wonder if there’s reduction…Ahh! There it is!” And 2/3, ½, 1/3, 1/6, 1/12. Using her hand, instead of a finger, like with a panel her size Emily scrolled across.

“Mom, she doesn’t know!” Elias pointed out.

To which Talia replied “That’s an interesting point, Son. But what she does still tells a lot about her.”

“A full sized Miley, to them?” Emily wondered, thinking she’d only had the first season with her Hannah costar. “Don’t really know her that well. NAhhh… don’t trust her that much. Shrink her…. Hmmm *grin* That could be FUN! Arrrggh… better to get off this giant planet.”

Elias grinned delightedly as the Earthie expressed her thoughts. He was now sure he would get her in his hands again, and anxiously, he got out of his seat declaring “I’m going down there to get her now!” He blushed however as the action displayed visible evidence of his eagerness in the form of a hardon.

“I know you’re eager. Hahaha, obviously.” The Mother held her Son’s hand causing even more reddening in his face. Talia almost grazed his groin. “But I can override anything she does. How about we bring in Emily’s little friends at Earth normal size and see what she does?”

Emily had continued thinking out loud and come to the same conclusion as the giant woman “Just leave it alone, girl.” She told herself “Tempting as playing with Miley would be, we’ll both be safer back on Earth. Setting size to Earth normal. Destination, Hangar 51.”

When the Monorail carrying Selena Gomez Anna Sophia Robb and, of course, Miley Cyrus arrived at its destination, Emily Osment was just completing her programming of the craft’s return journey to Earth. She’d decided she would jump right in, hit the “GO” button and explain everything to the other girls on the way.
1553321212211111122.title: Getaway

choices: More Xena and Anna Sophia Robb
15533212122111111221.content:
Minutes before Emily’s escape from Elias’ bedroom Anna Sophia Robb was just beginning to explore the quite helpless Warrior Princess. That was when all the lights and dials on the Interstellar Monorail began glowing, spinning and beeping. She’d pinched a little boob between thumb and forefinger when a computerized voice announced “Repairs complete! Launch in two minutes!”

“Come on! Pull us in!” Selena and Miley both yelled in panicky tones.

“Damn!” the pretty blonde snapped. But nevertheless, spun away from her toy and rushed to the hatch. She nearly stepped on two a man and a horse. From there, she yanked first Selena then Miley through the hatch. She told them “I set up corrals to keep them under control in the back. Hurry!”

Selena praised her “Smart girl.”

“40…39” the computer continued as the starlets readied for liftoff. *Click* went Miley’s seatbelt although she continued to hold her captive horse. She petted its sleek body as the countdown went on. Sometimes its back, but not neglecting the soft belly.

Selena grinned at her and asked “Enjoying your pet?”

“What about you and your doll man?” countered Miley. She still did not like him, but her friend was having fun.

Selena glanced at the corner she’d dropped Virgil in and blushed a bit “He’s fun to talk to.” She replied “He says the sweetest things.”

“Three of them!” growled Xena as she analyzed the situation. She could not comprehend the strange ritual the giants were performing, but it distracted her captress, who while might have disarmed Xena of obvious weapons just hadn’t completed the job. Her last weapons were inside her leather forearm guards. Small, sharp blades snapped up. The strange bonds made moving her hands difficult, but not impossible. Her hands free, the Warrior Princess sat and quickly scanned her surroundings. Saw the enclosure trapping her men and favored steed, decided that would be her first move.

The countdown finished, there was a jerk, and the Monorail left the planet quickly reaching its previous speed. Anna stood and turned, surprised to see the foot tall woman on her feet “Escaped again!” the young blonde exclaimed “Computer! Electrical tape! Eight pieces, four inches long!”

“By all the gods!” the stunned Xena’s eyes bugged out at the sight of nothing but stars. Above, left, right, below. She understood flight, from birds, had even done so to a limited degree. “How high are we?”

Instead of angry, Anna was just amused to see the toy woman’s exposed back. She hushed her friends, briefly admired the view and simply picked her up. “Going somewhere?” she inquired, playfully “As for how high … you’re about four feet off the floor.”

“But where is the ground?” asked Xena, for once not concerned with giant fighting. She continued staring out the window, barely aware of being held “No clouds … just stars everywhere … my army.”

Young Miss Robb easily swapped hands to bring her face to face “Don’t know if you would understand the distance, Xena doll.” She lectured like a professor to a slightly backward pupil “But, if you can imagine, every grain of sand on that beach a mile long. Well, we’re even further than that from where I found you. Now, maybe you can tell me how you got free?”

“I think it’s obvious.” Said Selena “I watched Xena too. She’s got a knife somewhere.”

The Warrior Princess pounded uselessly on the fist that held her. Then swung on incoming fingers. They absorbed her hardest punch and stroked her hair. The giggling drove her into a rage. She kicked, twisted violently and punched at anything touching her. “BY ALL THE GODS!” she bellowed “PUT ME DOWN OR DIE!!!”

“I could help you find that knife.” Offered Selena “It’s probably---”

Anna pushed her hand away, interrupted “I’d rather do it.” She said with a grin. “Don’t worry, I’ll find it. I’ll look everywhere.”

“Think I’ll search the little men. Bet they’re sneaky too.” Selena replied. All of the raging fury affected neither teen in the least. The Wizard star grinned back, adding “Well, why don’t I …umm… check your work. When you’re done … of course. And you can… heheh… do the same.”

Anna was certain she knew what she missed before. The cuts in the tape she noticed were razor sharp and the hands had been pushed up, while the feet were pushed in. But, as her Texan friend pointed out, she had to be thorough. So while Selena went to search the men, Anna sat at the small table, squirming Xena in hand, and remembering the pleasing rear view, abruptly flipped her upside down.

Xena screamed in mindless fury at the treatment. In her violent, criminal, career the Warrior Princess had been captured, chained, tortured and even raped. “Come here.” Talia ordered and pointed to the spot right in front of her chair. Only a view outside the landing platform was on the living room’s big screen. She looked her son up and down, commenting “Good idea, the windbreaker.”

Elias blushed vividly as his mother worked the zipper. It was like she knew he’d just jerked off, but of course she couldn’t. he’d been quiet and in his room. “I realllly do not want someone else getting herrrrr!” he complained impatiently.

“Well.” She said, then paused. Grabbed both his hips and squeezed “Go to it. If you must.”

The contact was entirely too close for the boy’s comfort. Although his mother was middle aged by their people’s definition, she looked barely older than her highschool yearbook photo. “Sure, Mom!” he muttered. Extricated himself from her grip and went for the door “Love ya! BYE”

“Elias!” the tone commanded obedience. She smirked at him and, much to her son’s embarrassment “Have fun with them… don’t …ahhh… do anything I …heheh… wouldn’t!”

He fled yelling “MO---OOOOMMMMM!”

“There is not a single woman that would vote to convict me for that.” Talia giggled to herself. As he turned, she’d given Elias a flagrant butt squeeze.

When Elias gets to the platform he…
1553321212211111122111222.title: Emily Osment

choices: Emily continues, oblivious to his presence
15533212122111111221112222.content:
The teenage near-look-alike of the famous filmmaker paused. He wanted to play with his Earthie celebrity, but it was very exciting to watch Emily acting as a giantess even if she was just his toy. Elias tapped a panel on the wall and a blue field shimmered into existence that was slightly above his knees. Smirking, he whispered “Nowhere to go. Think I’ll just watch.”

“Look Emily, let’s be reasonable about this.” Offered Miley in a nervous tone. She slid herself as far as she could to the edge of the couch she was on, petting the little horse in her hands. She cooed “Eaaasy… sweetieeee… that’s not a monster. Sheees my frienddddd.”

Having completely forgotten about Elias, Emily smirked down at her Hannah costar “Watched you jerking off your little pet.” She commented in a playful tone “Think after I’m done with Barbie here, I’ll mess with you a bit.”

“My name IS NOT Barbie!!” AnnaSophia shouted “And PUT ME DOWN!!”

Emily shrugged and carelessly opened her hand, saying “Sure Barbie.”

“YAHHHH!!” screamed AnnaSophia as she clenched at the suddenly spread fingers. A churning leg caught on one and gave leverage, then thrusting, she almost threw herself right over.

Emily barely had to exert any effort. “Going somewhere, Barbie?” she asked sarcastically as she encircled the little blonde’s waist again. Then, grinning, brought her right to her face, pressed her lips into AnnaSophia’s face and answered her own question “Nope! You like being in my grip! Don’cha Barbie?”

“That tickles!” AnnaSophia complained as she fought, futilely. The giant’s rough lips teased her flesh and despite her protests, could not help giggling. Kicks only led to bruised knees when they impacted with a rock-hard chin and punches rebounded off giant cheeks.

Quite delighted, the giant blonde giggled “Wonder what you look like without that top.”

“DON’T YOU DARE!!!!” yelled AnnaSophia at the tops of her lungs. She kicked and punched and twisted around.

Selena, who’d been mostly quiet, protested “Come on Emily! Stop doing that! It’s not fair picking on someone smaller than you!”

“Now now, don’t be jealous.” Came amused scolding. After glancing at the squirming girl in her right hand, Emily stuck her left one in the box at her knees. Her fingers brushed at the Hispanic girl’s hair. When she dodged, Emily reached for her.

Selena squeaked “EEEP!!!” and ducked. When the hand pursued, she backed up. There isn’t very far to go, not even in one of those Interstellar Monorails. Soon her back was against the table which forced her to bend over. A knife was there, she closed her fist around it. Selena hissed “Touch me and I’ll kill her!”

“Look out, toy girl.” Emily warned, playfully. She saw, and knew, the knife was only plastic. “Better turn around before you get grabbed.” Her hand was already nearly around Selena’s body.

Angry at the ‘toy girl’ remark, Selena spun and swung her weapon. It was completely ineffective. The tip struck a fingernail that may as well have been an armor plate. That was when she learned the truth of her weapon. It was white and flimsy and the impact shattered it, sending painful vibrations through her arm. She cried “Owwwwowowow!”

“Sorry ‘bout that, toy girl” apologized the not very sorry Emily. Her grip still firm on AnnaSophia, she lifted Selena out of the box and held the second starlet to eye level.

AnnaSophia grunted “Some help you were!”

“Aww! SHADDUP!!” an angry Selena retorted.

Looking back and forth between her hands, Emily laughed at them, then took on a stern look “Shame on you two.” She declared “And you were fighting on the way here. AIn’t there something in our contracts about being nice to each other.”

“And put me down!!” came from the two doll-sized captives, barely a syllable apart.

Amused, the teenage giantess pointed out “Well Barbie on the plus side, for you, kinda hard to strip ya with both hands full. Hehehe … for now anyway.”

“That’s what she was gonna do!?” gasped Elias in a flurry of hormones.

Xena was enjoying the sight of her tormentors getting a turn of their own. But she knew better than to linger in a dangerous situation. It was obvious that her steed wasn’t returning, however this was not a time for regrets. She quietly made her way to the prison holding her men and whispered “Are you ready?”

“Of course, Mistress.” Came from within.

Talia had to admire the pluckiness of the tiny mites “So, kiddo, how you doing?” she refocused her monitor on Elias. First the boy’s face, then lower.

“No fighting you two!” Emily scolded the arguing starlets. “I warned you! Now shake hands!” At this she laughed and moved her hands together.

AnnaSophia immediately snapped “Hey! Too close!”

“Yeah! Careful!” added Selena.

The giant blonde frowned in thought, then smiled mischievously “Actually” she replied “you’re still too far apart. Get closer.” And she cautiously opened her fingers pushing her little toys together.

“ULP!” Elias swallowed, unable to restrain himself
15533212122111111221112222.title: The Giantess has fun

choices: See what's in store for Xena
155332121221112.content:
Back inside the ship, Selena held Virgil lightly to her chest, cradling the handsome little man easily atop her right forearm. She enjoyed the feel of his tiny weight against her skin.

"Uh, Miley," Anna said now, from the far side of the room, "those little guys you tossed over here? I think I saw them scurry under that bench against the wall."

"So?" said the pop star, sounding bored. "Where they gonna go? Besides," she said, continuing to stroke the miniature horse she had stood on her shoulder. "The shrimpy guys on this world are kind of lame. I wish there were some real men around here."

Selena laughed. "Oh, come on, Miley! Holding guys this small is really cool!" She gave Virgil a small squeeze with her arm. "I mean, little Virgil here is so cute and helpless, I just can't stand it!"

"Beg your pardon, dear lady," said the small man in her grasp, "but I would really rather that you didn't say-"

The pretty, dark-haired teen pressed Virgil slightly harder against her chest and looked seriously down at him. "What was that, Virgil? You'd rather I didn't say...what?" She raised her eyebrows, waiting.

Virgil, pinned tightly against Selena's chest, instinctively tried to move his arms, only to find himself hopeless trapped by the warm flesh of the young titaness. He managed a cavalier smile. "Um, nothing, my lady. Excuse me."

"You're excused." Selena nodded happily, as she eased her grip on the little man. She smiled to herself, starting to realize that she literally had the upper hand with this little guy, and that she should take charge a bit more in this relationship.

"Guys," Anna said, now on her knees in front of the bench and peering beneath, "can one of you come over and give me a hand here? I think I can catch one of them pretty easy, but they're running around like crazy under there."

Miley actually yawned, holding the tiny horse to her cheek. The horse, for it's part, had calmed down and seemed to actually be enjoying the attentions of the giant, human female. It nickered softly as it brushed it's side into Miley's soft cheek, then nuzzled it's own muzzle into the giant girl's nose, eliciting a giggle from it's huge captor.

Selena rolled her eyes. "Alright, Anna, I'm coming. Just let me put Virgil away first."

"M'lady?"

The smiling teen walked over to the enclosure and took up Virgil, sandwiching him between both her hands. She brought him up to her face, holding him close so that the two were nearly nose-to-nose. "I'm putting my toy man in the enclosure, so he can play with his little friends while I do some big girl stuff," Selena said, with an arch grin. "Any more questions, Virgil?"

"No, Lady Selena," Virgil said humbly as he was lowered into the pen. "No more questions."
