A moment later, Selena and Anna were on their knees and reaching under the bench, giggling wildly as they grappled for the scrambling little men. It took longer than it should have, with both girls mostly toying with their prey, pretending to grab them, then just batting them down at the last second. After a few hilarious minutes, the girls gave each other a silent nod, then each grabbed up one of the tiring little men.

"Whew!" said Anna, a little out of breath as she brought Darius up with her as she stood. She held him easily around the waist with one hand, ignoring his futile struggles. "That was fun. These little people are hilarious when they try to resist us." She held the tiny Darius up high above her head to emphasize her point.

"You dare not treat a general in this manner!" Darius screamed, beating his little fists against the giant fist.

Anna grinned. "Oh, I dare, alright. Right now, I dare to drop you in with your little soldiers, General. Bye, now." She dumped him unceremoniously into the pen.

Selena laughed. "They are fun, aren't they?" The Hispanic teen held the tiny blond man in a similar fashion, pausing to ruffle his wild hair playfully before she dropped him in the enclosure to join his comrades. "Now, then, what about that little Warrior Queen doll of yours, Anna? What plans do you have for her?"

Anna grinned, as she stepped over toward the Replicator. "Oh, I've got big plans for me and Xena, Selena. I just need to get dressed in a little different style for what I have in mind. While I change, go check out my little doll." The blond teen giggled. "I got her taped to the counter over there."

Selena laughed again. "Cool!"

"Um," said Miley, pointing to the floor below the counter, "don't look now, Anna, but I think your doll is trying to get away."

"Oh, for gosh sakes!" Anna exclaimed, standing at the Replicator console, "I should have known! The tv Xena has some kind of little knife in her wrist thingy. She must have cut her way out and got down to the floor somehow."

Both Miley and Selena had stepped over to the counter, standing in front of the tiny Warrior Queen.

"You want us to catch her for you, Anna?" asked Miley, as she cradled her horse in one hand and set it gently on the counter.

"Could you?" Anna was busy punching in data on the Replicator. "Thanks. Don't hurt her, though."

"Why, Anna, I wouldn't think of hurting your little doll," Miley said, grinning, as she and Selena knelt in front of the tiny woman. Then the pretty pop star added, under her breath, "not much, anyway."

Xena, frozen on the floor between the two, towering titans, didn't like the sound of that.
155332121221112.title: The Girls play with their Toys

choices: See what Xena and Selena do
1553321212211121.content:
Xena, now barefoot on the floor below the counter, stood in a defensive crouch as she glared up at the two giants. The young titans were on their knees in front of her, but they still towered many feet above the Warrior Princess. The situation, Xena decided, did not look promising.

"This is so cool!" Selena gushed, holding her hands down and apart, trying to anticipate the movements of the feisty little woman. She looked at her friend. "I don't know if she wants to fight us or try to get away! Make sure she doesn't sneak around on your side, Miley!"

The pop star stuck out her tongue and blew out a derisive raspberry. "Like she has any chance of getting away from us, dummy."

"I don't know, Miley," Selena said, taking a moment to look admiringly at the incredibly fit-looking tiny woman. "She's little, but I bet she's pretty tough, and fast."

Xena, in spite of herself, could not quite suppress a grim smile at the dark-haired giant's compliment.

"You think so?" said Miley.

"Sure."

"Hmm. Well, what if I did this?" Miley reached out a quick hand and threw a backhand slap at the miniature warrrior woman. Though her reflexes were usually cat-quick, Xena had been caught by surprise, and the huge hand hit her full in the chest, knocking her back into the wall. Xena hit with an echoing thud, banging the back of her head against the metal hull of the ship, then sliding to the floor in a boneless heap. The doll-sized figure lay very still.

Selena just gawked for a moment at the fallen little woman, then said, "Well, that's just great. I think you killed her." She cast an angry stare at her friend. "Dummy."

Miley tilted her head as she stared down at Xena, then shook her head. "Nah, don't think so. Look at the little boobs."

Selena leaned in for a closer look at the tiny warrior. And then she saw that Miley was right. Xena's tiny, but well-rounded chest was still rising slowly up and down inside the tight, black leather bustier. Though out cold, Anna's little doll was clearly still alive.

Selena frowned as she reached her hands down. "Well, you're lucky she's okay, Miley. We promised Anna we wouldn't hurt her."

Miley just rolled her eyes as she watched her friend gently scoop up the unconscious little warrior. "Yeah, yeah," she said, standing. Then she held up her hand, showing entwined index and middle fingers. "had my fingers crossed, though."

Selena shook her head, as she got herself in a crossed-legged position on the floor, and sat the tiny woman on her thigh. She placed a hand behind Xena's back to support her, letting the little body lean back a little so it wouldn't topple forward. Selena looked up at Miley. "It's lucky Anna's in the bedroom changing. She'd be mad if she knew you'd hurt her doll."

Miley snorted. "So what? I'm about as afraid of her as I am of these pathetic little so-called warriors."

"Oh, Miley," Selena said, looking down at Xena in her lap, "stop being so mean. These tiny little people are just the cutest things. Don't you just love the way they feel in your hands?" Selena lightly squeezed the hand she was using to cup Xena on her lap, pinching the tiny but incredibly firm arms between her fingers. She guided one of the little arms between her index and middle finger, rolling the supple limb across the pads pf her fingers, and delighting in the smooth firmness of Xen'a skin. She took the tiny hand gently between her own fingertips, squeezing lightly at the delicate little fingers.

Selena sighed. She hoped they would spend a lot more time on this little world.

Miley clucked her tongue. "You and Anna and your toys." She reached over Selena's head to the counter. "Me, I'm gonna play with my horse."

Selana laughed. "Right. And that pint-sized horse isn't a toy. Oh, hey, Miley? Do me a favor? Grab Xena's boots for me, would you. Right there by your your feet."

The pop star looked down and spotted the black leather boots on the floor, then reached down and scooped them up. She smirked as she looked at the tiny boots, snaking one onto her index finger and waggling it playfully. "I guess Anna was undressing her toy. Got to give her props for that."

Selena smirked back, reaching out her hand. "Yeah, right. Get that thing off your finger. You'll stretch it out."

After Miley had handed over the boots and wandered off cooing to her pet horse, Selena looked down at the still-unconscious tiny woman. She lifted up a miniature foot and pinched it between her fingers, examining it as she had the tiny hand. Then she ran her fingers up the taut calf and up to the delicate bump of the little knee. As Selena moved up higher on Xena's leg, she rotated her fingers around the firm flesh of the full little thigh, liking the feel of the tiny leg in her grasp. "So soft," she whispered to herself. "So tiny."

After a few minutes of light fondling, giving both lovely legs equal attention, Selena decided it was time to get those little boots back on. It was harder than she thought it would be, and then she realized that that was probably because the unconscious little woman couldn't point her toes to help out. After a few minutes, Selena managed to tug the knee-high boots back onto the Warrier Princess. She looked at the little woman lying back across her hand, suddenly thinking it a shame to cover up such pretty little legs.

Selena had just pinched the top of the right boot between her thumb and forefinger, when she felt a slight shudder run through the little body on her lap.

She looked at Xena's face just in time to see the tiny eye lids flutter open.
1553321212211121.title: Selena and Miley and Anna's Doll

choices: Anna and Xena go on an Adventure
15533212122111211.content:
Xena came to slowly. As conciousness returned, she found herself seated on a smooth, warm surface, with her back supported by something large and flat that seemed to move with her as she moved. The odd feel of the surfaces was strange and disorienting, and that feeling was only magnified by the dull throbbing she now felt at the back of her skull. It felt like she'd been felled by a battle ax.

"Oh, look who's awake."

Xena looked to the sound of the voice. She found she had to look up. Way up. Up past a huge bare midriff, and bra-covered chest, to the smiling face of a giant. Xena closed her eyes and put a hand to her aching head. This nightmare, it seemed, would never end. She was now seated in the lap of the dark-haired giant, propped on the gargantuan thigh like a rag doll.

"Are you alright?" Selena said, curling her fingers lightly around Xena.

The Warrior Princess glared up at the giant, wriggling a little against the giant fingers to test their hold on her. The grip was fairly loose, but Xena had a sense that the fingers would close much tighter, should she struggle. She pretended, for the time being, to settle comfortably inside the warm clasp of the giant hand, even lying back a little against the soft, warm fingers as she looked up at the giant.

"I am well enough, giant," Xena said casually, "I would be released now, please." The word 'please' tasted vile in her mouth, but she knew this situation called for a little gile. This giant, though physically imposing, was nevertheless little more than a child, and easily manipulated. Sometimes, Xena knew, talking yourself out of a situation was wiser than fighting your way out.

But the giant only laughed, enclosing Xena tighter within her huge fingers. "I like that, Xena. You're a funny little thing, you know that? 'I would be released now.' That's hilarious."

Xena began to seeth. "You mock me at your peril, child. You shall pay for such impertinence."

Selena laughed again. "Okay, okay. This has gone far enough. I want to show you something now, Xena. Here, check this out." And with that, Selena squeezed her fingers tighter around the little warrior princess, bringing the huge digits around so that the fingers met the thumb, and enclosed Xena completely around the middle. Xena sensed that the giant was still holding back a little, not using her full strength, but still the air was pushed almost entirely from her lungs. The lack of air only made the loud pounding inside her head get worse.

"There," said Selena, her grin replaced by a serious look. "Go ahead. Make me pay for my impertinence. Or better yet, just escape from my hand."

Xena returned the stare of the giant. Then she began to struggle against the huge fingers. She tried rolling her shoulders from side to side inside the warm embrace, trying to move her arms enough to slip her trapped hands between two of the fingers and pry at them to get them open. After a few minutes of this, sweating profusely and feeling her arm and back muscles burning with the strain, and still no closer to getting away, she tried a different approach.

Her legs, outside the grasp of the giant fingers and resting atop the huge thigh, were the strongest part of her, and they were free at the moment. With a nonchalance she did not feel (her heart was thumping wildly in her chest), Xena slowly walked her feet backwards up the smooth thigh, heel-walking her booted feet and calves back under her own thighs. She wondered briefly how her boots had gotten back on her legs, then tossed aside the thought and continued. When she had inched her feet back so that they were squeezed beneath her thighs, with the heels tucked tight against her buttocks, she took a deep breath then began a slow, steady upward push with the long, powerful muscles of her legs. She did this for a full minute, then two.

And still, the giant fingers didn't move so much as an inch.

Flushed and panting from exertion, her head pounding, Xena nodded in resignation. "Alright, giant. You have proved your point."

Selena nodded. "And what's my point?"

Xena eased her legs back down, letting out a deep breath as she stretched them back down the huge thigh, and lay back in the giant fingers' embrace. "I cannot best you. Your strength is far greater than mine."

"Good answer."

The huge fingers instantly relaxed, and in fact, released their grip entirely and moved out of Xena's view. She found herself seated atop the round curve of the smooth thigh, with nothing to hold her there. She rocked back at once, nearly losing her balance on the curved surface, now that the giant hand was no longer suppporting her. She put her hands down on the warm skin, steadying herself.

"Actually, Xena," Selena said, purposely speaking in a reasonable, non-condescending manner, "my main point was to show you that none of you little people is a match for someone my size." Selena grinned. "Not even the mighty Warrior Princess. Understand?"

"Yes," said Xena grudgingly, "I understand."

Selena laughed. "Don't be so grumpy. You'll have a much better time while you're staying with us if you'll just lighten up a bit. You need to do what we say, Xena. For example, when one of us wants to pick you up, don't fight. Just raise your little arms and let yourself be picked up. Things can be so much easier for you, honey."

Xena nodded, but inside she was seething. From her perch on the giant thigh she looked around the room, not immediately seeing any of the other giants. She was tensing the muscles of her legs for a quick jump off the giant leg, when she heard a thundering giggle.

"Oh," said Selena, smiling, "now you're going to try to get away? Go ahead. I guess you want to learn another lesson."

Xena slumped back on the thigh, sighing.

Selena laughed again. "I could feel your little muscles tensing, like you were getting ready to jump. I would have caught you easily, you know."

Xena just crossed her arms across her chest, looking like a sulking child.

"Well, guys. What do you think?"

Xena and Selena both looked across the room, and Miley, who had been sitting cross-legged inside the enclosure, playing with her horse, looked up, too. They all stared at Anna as she walked into the room.

"Well, " the pretty blond said again, "What do you think? Do you like it or not?"

None of the three women seemed able to say anything. They all just stared at Anna in her new outfit. The young teen wore a light brown skirt with a matching halter top, and a pair of calf-high leather boots. Around her waist, she wore a belt made up of a chain of silver medallions, and she had a slim leather band encircling each trim upper arm. Her honey-colored hair was styled into a two, combed sprays at the sides falling nearly to her shoulders, and cute, straight bangs in front. Anna also wore a wry smile.

Miley was the first to find her tongue. "Damn, Anna! You're the spitting image of Xena's sidekick! You're Gabrielle!"
15533212122111211.title: Selena and Xena have a Little Talk

155332121221112111.content:
"I've told you already, giant," said Xena, unable to suppress a smile, "you are mistaken. I do not know this...Gabrielle, was it?"

"Yeah," Anna replied sulkily, staring down at the little woman standing on the sand near her feet. The two were now alone outside the ship. "Gabrielle." Anna frowned, fingering at the hem of the new skirt. And I tried so hard to make the oufit come out just right, she thought glumly. "Are you sure you don't know her? Somebody dressed like me? Maybe under another name."

Xena placed her hands on her hips and grinned up at the giant girl. "I know and consort with warriors only, giant. That is not the garb of a warrior." The Warrior Princess uttered a bark of sharp laughter. "You are wrong in this, and now I know that you are surely no God."

"Never said I was, shrimpo," Anna said, as she placed a booted foot right next to the little woman. "But you had better mind you manners, just the same. Got it?"

Xena eyed the giant leg, the calf rising up beside her, higher than her own head. She took a slow step back out of the giant's shadow, then gave a slight bow to hide her still-smiling face. "Yes. I have it."

Anna stood there on the beach a few moments more, pouting. She'd thought it would be so cool to dress as Gabrielle, and go on an adventure with Xena. And now the smart-ass little warrior had gone and spoiled the whole thing. It just wasn't fair!

Anna then looked down at the very smug-looking Xena. And then she had a sudden thought. She grinned and dropped to her knees on the beach, the mere concussion of her weight in the sand knocking Xena onto her back. Before the Warrier Princess knew what was happening, Anna's huge hands swooped down and scooped her up off the sand.

"Unhand me, giant!" Xena yelled, as she struggled uselessly in the grip of the giant fingers. "I will not be treated like a this! I am not a toy!"

Anna shrugged. "Well, you kind of are, but forget that for now. You and I are going to be partners. Maybe there's no Xena and Gabrielle on this world, but there is a Xena and Anna. We're gonna have an adventure, just us girls!"

Xena stopped struggling. "An adventure? What on Earth are you talking about?"

Anna shrugged, getting to her her feet as she held Xena in both hands, cradling her below her chest. "You know, an adventure. We'll just head on down the trail and see what kind of trouble we can get into."

Xena stared up past the shelf of the giant's jaw and up to her sparkling blue eyes. "You're joking, surely."

Anna shook her head, grinning. "I'm not joking, and let's leave Shirley out of it."

"What?"

"Nothing. Okay, if you don't like my plan, you think of one, then." Anna chuckled, then shifted Xena so that she was supporting the little woman only under the left arm, then Anna stuck out her right arm and made a show of flexing her bicep. "Maybe there's something where you could use the help of a mighty giant?"

Xena opened her mouth to protest, then closed it. She then had a back-and-forth, internal argument with herself. After a full minute, she looked up into the giant face, sighing in resignation. "I do have a thought, giant. A situation where someone of your stature may prove...useful."

"Yay!" said Anna happily. "What is it? And where?"

Xena pointed off to the north. "Follow that path, there along that ridgeline, and just above the river. Our journey will take us through those mountains to the north. I'll explain on the way."

"Alright!" Anna said, stepping quickly away down the beach, and cradling Xena once again in both hands. "This is gonna be so awesome!"

"Yes," said Xena glumly, finding herself pressed tightly inside the warm prison of strong, giant fingers and the tent-like folds of the giant's tunic, her body bouncing up and down with each gigantic stride. "Awesome."
155332121221112111.title: Anna and Xena go on an Adventure

1553321212211121111.content:
"Giant," Xena hissed, "I am not a helpless infant, and I grow weary of being treated like one. Put me down now. I can walk this road as well as you."

Anna laughed. "Oh, don't be silly, Xena!" The giant girl lightly squeezed the fingers of her right hand - the ones cradling the little woman's legs. "Do you really think you could keep up with me? With these short little legs?"
Anna squeezed her fingers again, this time running a playful thumb inside the top of one little boot and teasingly exposing a delicate little knee. "They're pretty cute, and I'd love to see them in action while you run to keep up, but it would waste too much time."

The Warrior Princess slapped away the giant fingers from her boot, then she turned away and looked at the passing landscape. She saw that the girl's giant strides were sailing them along the trail at a dizzing rate, with the branches of the large, dark pines swooping past Xena's eyes in a hazy, green blur. The big trees, fifteen cubits tall at least, were only shoulder-high to the giant. The trail was a bit small for the young titan, and often she had to twist her body sideways between the trees, once snapping a huge banch to kindling with a casual swipe of one of her tree-trunk arms.

Xena nodded now, and rolled her shoulders within the confining grip of huge fingers that hugged her from her middle to her chest. She then looked up into the giant's face. "Very well, giant. But perhaps we can reach a compromise. May I ride your shoulder, then?" Xena gripped one of the huge digits in each of her hands. "Your fingers are strong and surprisingly soft, but the amazing strength in them does not lend my poor body much comfort."

It made Xena almost physically ill to pour such honey from her mouth, but she knew of no other way to escape the giant's grasp.

Anna stopped walking for a moment and stared down at Xena, seeming to consider the request. At last, she nodded. "Alright, but you'd better hold onto my hair while you ride. I don't want you to fall."

Xena agreed, was placed gently on the giant shoulder, and for the rest of the day was mostly out the giant's hands. She did have to endure the occasional pat on the head, or a cupping hand as the giant negotiated a particularly steep portion of the trail. The giant seemed to delight in touching her, and there was, of course, nothing that Xena could do stop it.

Xena bided her time, though, knowing that when the opportunity arose, she would find a way to best the giant. Until then, she knew she must play the role of the tiny mascot or pet.

Oh yes, Xena thought with grim satisfaction, someday the giant would pay.

-------------------------------

That night, after having traveled many leagues farther than Xena would have ever thought possible, they made camp. The two travelers sat at opposite sides of a roaring fire, the flames licking hungrily at a pyramid of dead trees that the giant had dragged on top of Xena's small, sensible cooking fire.

"Of course you know," Xena said snidely, "a blaze this size will be visible for many miles in every direction, sure to attract every brigand and beast in the forest."

Anna laughed, hugging her knees together and scooching closer to the fire. "Let them come. I don't think I'm all that scared of anyone or anything in this tiny little world." She flexed her bicep and kissed it, grinning broadly.

Xena just rolled her eyes, and went back to staring into the huge fire.

A few minutes later, Xena felt a hollow thudding in the ground where she sat, looking up in time to see the giant scooting around the fire, and settling down very close by. Xena had to stifle a thrill of fear at the closeness of the huge girl, then she faked a yawn. "Well, we'll want an early start in the morning. I've already made a bed for myself on those pine boughs over there. You should do the same, giant. Goodnight, then."

As Xena stood to leave, she felt a touch on her shoulder, turning to see a huge finger resting there. She looked up into a smiling, giant face.

"Oh, no, you don't, Xena," the giant said, her large blue eyes flashing with excitement. "Did you think I'd forgotten about examining my doll? Now, let's get these clothes off of you, shall we, little one?"
1553321212211121111.title: Anna and Xena Camp Out

15533212122111211111.content:
"Now, now, Xena," Anna said teasingly, holding Xena in one hand and grabbing at her skirt with the other, "don't try to fight me. I'm taking those cute little clothes off of you, and there's nothing you can do about it."

"Get your monstrous fingers away from me, giant!" Xena snarled, as she cocked back her fist. "Don't touch me, damn you!"

And with that bold utterance, the Warrior Princess threw a powerful, lightning-fast punch at the approaching giant fingers. The jolt of impact with Anna's finger sent a thunderbolt of pain up Xena's arm and into her shoulder, but she grinned in grim satisfaction. That blow, she knew, was surely enough to cause even the mighty giant a stinging jolt of pain, and give the titan pause in her casual toying with her captive.

But the punch did not have the desired effect. Anna merely laughed at the tiny smack of Xena's fist into the tip of her finger, as she caught the tiny fist between her thumb and forefinger, trapping the little hand easily. With only a litte pressure, Anna managed to pry open the tiny fingers and hold them up to her face, admiring the delicate perfection of the doll-sized hand.

Anna laughed again. "You have such cute little hands, Xena. What were you trying to do? Hit me or something?"

Xena looked wildly around. Her hand was hopelessly trapped, and the rest of her was secured tightly inside the giant's fist. She felt her legs dangling uselessly beneath the giant fingers. The situation seemed hopeless.

"Okay, Xena," Anna said now, "that's quite enough of that. Let's get those clothes off."

Things were getting desperate now, and Xena surprised even herself by saying, "Alright, giant, alright. I cannot fight you. I yield. But do not attempt to strip me. I fear you would tear my clothes should you try to undress me with those great, clumsy fingers of yours. Please set me down, and I will...I will take them off myself."

Anna pulled back her fingers, and tilted her head. "Really?"

Xena swallow heavily, then nodded.

A minute later, Xena was back on the ground near the fire. The giant lay stretched out on her belly in front of her, one hand cupping her own chin and the other extended a little forward near Xena, the giant fingers tappng the dirt as she looked down at the Warrior Princess. Xena stood frozen, her eyes drawn to the boot-clad feet of the giant, kicking idly in the air above.

"Get on with it already," said Anna impatiently.

Hating herself a little, but realizing she had no choice, Xena fell to a knee and worked at one of her boots. Once she had it off, she looked around briefly for somewhere to set it. Anna's hand swooped in close, palm-up, and Xena took the hint and placed the boot on the giant hand. Once she had done the same with her other shoe, she watched out of the corner of her eye as the giant brought her hand up to her face to study the boots. Xena was periperally aware of the giant's delighted giggle and wide grin, but she tried to shut out that image as she continued to silently undress herself.

Her wrist guards were soon off, and joining her boots in the giant hand. They were then followed by her skirt and top, leaving her standing before the giant in her one-piece undergarment - a soft, leather singlet covered her from her breasts down to just beneath her buttocks. The still-blazing fire behind her warmed her exposed flesh, but the night air chilled her down her front, on the side away from the fire and facing the giant. The gooseflesh on her arms and legs, she knew, was only partly caused by the coolness of the air.

Xena held out her bare arms. "I am stripped to my undergarment, giant. I have completed my part of the bargain."

Anna laughed. "Nice try, shorty." The young titan the reached a huge hand forward, extending the index finger. Xena watched, in frozen fascination, as the log-sized finger gently probed at the top of her garment, fingering it a moment before snaring the singlet's edge and tugging it down. Xena felt a sudden coolness across her chest, and looked down to find both of her breasts now fully exposed - bathed in moonlight under the avid stare of the giant."

"Mmmm," murmurred Anna, bringing the tip of her finger beneath one tiny, full tit. "So cute."

Anna bounced the grape-sized mound on her fingertip, liking the springy firmness of her doll's little boob. While continuing to play with Xena's left tit, Anna brought her thumb into play on the right one, rubbing across it's hard, pinpoint nipple with the ridges of her fingerprints. Xena, uncharacteristically immoble, watched in dread fascination as the giant fingers fondled her tits at will.

"Stop that," Xena heard herself say weakly. She knew she should be striking out at the intruding digits, make a fight of it, at least. But something - some deeply-buried self-preservation instinct, perhaps - told her to be still and take it. The giant, though impertinent, seemed to mean her no actual harm. Xena decided that the best course was to let the young titan have her way, a least for the time being.

Anna laughed again. "I don't think you really mean that. I think you like me playing with your little boobies, almost as much as I do."

Xena said nothing, as she continued to watch the giant fingers toy with her tits.

"I like you your legs, too," Anna said now, as she moved her fingers down below Xena's waist, taking one firm, well-muscled leg in her fisted fingers. "It's a shame that you keep them covered up in those boots all the time."

Xena endured the gentle stroking of her legs, first one and then the other. She could feel a hint of the awesome power within those terrible fingers, and could only count herself lucky that the giant chose to grip her legs as lightly as she was able to. Even so, the pressure on Xena's leg's made the muscles of her thighs and calves spasm wildly where the fingers gripped them. If the giant didn't stop soon, Xena knew, she would fall to the ground in a quivering heap.

But the giantess relented, pulling her hand away.

Xena looked up to find the giant staring down at her, grinning. "Good girl. Now..." Anna twirled her finger around in a circular motion. "...now, turn around, honey. I want to get a look at the flip side."

In a daze now, Xena meekly complied.

As Xena looked into the crackling flames of the bonfire, she felt a giant fingertip begin playing at the backs of her legs, tickling lightly at the backs of her knees and softly pressing into her long thighs. Soon, the finger rose to touch at the hem of her tiny garment, exposing her bare buttocks to the cool night air. Xena shivered as the probing finger poked lightly at her ass, playing with first one then the other butt cheek. She gritted her teeth as the finger continued to play, finally slipping between her cheeks, and causing her legs to push apart a little.

"Mmmm," said Anna again, "that feels nice in there, Xena. So nice and soft and warm. You're definitely the neatest doll I've ever had."

"Alright," Xena said, gasping a little, "that is enough, giant. That is...enough."

Anna clucked her tongue. "I don't think so, Xena. Not quite. And, by the way, stop calling me 'giant', will you? We're getting to know each other pretty good here, and I think we should be on a first name basis. My name is Anna."

"I said...," Xena panted, as the huge finger probed further between her legs, "...that is...enough." She took a deep breath. "Giant."

Anna clucked her tongue again. "Stubborn little thing, aren't you? I guess I just have to do this one more thing, then."

Then Xena first felt the finger slide along the tight slit between her legs, then actually saw the huge fingertip pushing into sight from beneath the hem of her undergarment. Just as her mind was digesting this new development, she felt the giant's thumb press up against her ass and begin to apply steady pressure there.

"Giant, what are you...?"

Anna grinned, then she squeezed her thumb and forefinger together, pinching Xena's tiny vagina in a vise-like grip.

Xena let out a high-pitched squeal, pivoting wildly around the tight clamp of the giant fingers in a frantic attempt to escape the tormenting digits. Or so Anna thought. To Anna, Xena's wild flailings and squeals seemed to indicate that the poor little thing was in extreme pain, fighting frantically to get away.

To Xena, her own feelings were a bit more complex and confused. Yes, she was trying to get away, for the giant was probing her in her most vulnerable place. On the other hand, though, the feel of the giant fingers squeezing at her in so intimate a way was incredible, like nothing she had ever experienced. She was even beginning to grind her ass back against the pinching fingers, when the pressure suddenly fell away. Xena tumbled to the ground in a heap, her muscles quivering and her breath coming in harsh,ragged bursts.

"Oh, Xena!" Anna said, worried, "I'm sorry. Did I hurt you? Did I squeeze you too hard?"

But Xena couldn't answer, not for several minutes.

In the meantime, a small voice called from the edge of the fire light. "Ho, giant! May I approach your fire?"

Anna turned to look at the new arrival. "Of course, you may," Anna said with a smile. "Come and sit with us, Gabrielle."
15533212122111211111.title: Xena Gets Examined

choices: Anna and Gabrielle get to know each other
155332121221112111111.content:
When Xena had fallen from Anna's hand, she had landed on the far side of the huge fire, so that she could not yet see the newcomer who had spoken to the giant. The Warrior Princess did not yet feel up to standing, but she did have enough energy to adjust her undergarment about herself so that she was at least somewhat dressed again. She burned with anger and embarrassment over the way the giant had just treated her, but her warrior's instincts overcame her emotions. She needed to find out who this intruder was, so she crept slowly on her hands and knees to the fire's edge, peering around to assess the situation.

Xena saw that the giant was now seated cross-legged on the ground, and before her, now just inside the circle of firelight, stood a young woman of nineteen or twenty. She was blonde, and wore simple garb consisting of tan leather boots, a matching skirt and top, with her waist ringed by a belt of silver medallions. Xena's mind was still a little fuzzy after her recent exertions, but after a moment, she understood what she was seeing. And the realization made her mouth drop open in astonishment.

The girl was a tiny, mirror image of the giant.

While trying to make sense of the situation, Xena just crouched behind the fire, waiting for her head to clear.

"How..." the small blonde girl said, craning her neck up to look into her counterpart's face, "...how do you know my name, giant?"

Anna smiled. "That's a little hard to explain, Gabrielle. Don't worry about that for now. Now, tell me, little one, why did you approach our fire? Weren't you afraid when you saw that I was a..." Anna giggled, "...a big, scary giant?"

Gabrielle returned a small, nervous smile. "I was a little scared, actually. Still am, I guess. It's just that I've never seen a real giant before, and I was...curious."

Anna nodded. "Well, I can understand that, I guess. Here, come closer and get a good look." Anna giggled again, and spread her arms wide. "Step right up! Check out the amazing giant!"

Gabrielle paused for just a moment, then stepped bravely forward, stopping near one of Anna's bare knees. The tiny blonde was on a level with Anna's crossed legs, and could have, had she dared, easily scrambled up over the crossed, tree-sized calves as though they were two large fallen logs blocking a forest trail, and settle down comfortably into the giant lap. She grinned inwardly at her absurd thought, and hoped the giant did not have the power to read minds.

Gabrielle took her time studying the giant, starting at the huge, boot-clad feet and working her way up. One of those boots, she decided with a chill of dread, could stomp a person flat, should the giant choose to step on him (or her!). And looking at the great, long legs, Gabrielle tried to calculate how tall the giant would be when standing, coming up with a rough guess of twenty, maybe twenty-five cubits. She would stand, Gabrielle thought, higher than most of the trees in the forest. And those mighty arms! They were impossibly long, yet smooth and supple-looking, and ending in long-fingered hands that now cupped the giant knees directly in front of Gabrielle. The fingers were large and thicker than a strong man's arms, and Gabrielle was sure the monstrous digits could easily snatch up a full-grown man (or woman!)

Gabrielle's storyteller's imagination was starting to get the best of her, and she was scaring herself a little. But she forced herself to continue her examination, finally looking up into the face of the giant. It was then that she felt some relief pass through her, for the giant had a comely, smiling face, and with her blond hair and smooth, lightly-tanned skin, Gabrielle saw that the giant and herself bore a close resemblance. They could have been sisters.

"You look like me," Gabrielle said absently, lost in gazing up at the giant.

Anna laughed. "That's impetinent, little one. You mean you look like like me."

"Oh, um, yes..." Gabrielle sputtered, "...that's what I meant. I cry your pardon, giant."

Anna laughed again, then held her hand out, palm-up, in behind Gabrielle. "I'm just kidding, Gabrielle. I'm not mad. Here, hop on. I want to get a closer look at you."

Gabrielle glanced around at the huge hand hovering behind her, seeing the long, thick fingers moving slightly as the giant was apparently attempting to keep her hand still. She looked back up at the giant. "Um, I'd really rather not, giant. If it's all the same to you."

Anna grinned. "Stop calling me 'giant', okay? My name's Anna."

Gabrielle nodded, gulping audibly. She noticed she was now trapped between the giant's knees and the still-hovering hand. "Um, alright. But I'd rather not be picked up. If that's okay."

Anna was still grinning, but she shook her head. "Nope. Get on, Gabrielle."

Then Gabrielle jumped up as she felt a light bumping at the backs of her knees, turning to see the edge of the giant hand bump her legs gently again. She looked up at the smiling giant and shrugged. "Well, since you put it that way."

Gabrielle backed up until the backs of her knees hit the smooth, thick edge of the hand, then sat herself down on the warm palm. The instant sensation she had was one of a radiating warmth coming up through the hand, the thick, but soft skin acting as a heated seat that cupped her own bottom and the backs of her thighs in a soft, gentle embrace. As she felt herself rise up into the air, her hands dropped instinctively to the edge of the palm to balance herself in the giant's hand. She found out almost immediately that she could easily maintain her balance by shifting her weight between her legs and her upper body, leaning subtly backwards and forwards as the hand rose, and mirroring the little fluctuations in the palm's level as the hand rose higher.

By the time she reached the level of the giant face, Gabrielle actually was starting to feel almost comfortable seated in the giant hand.

A white-toothed smile nearly as wide as Gabrielle's whole body opened up before her. "Well, hello there, Gabrielle," said the young giant.

Gabrielle grinned back, kicking her legs at the edge of the giant hand. She waved her own tiny hand. "Hello, Anna."

Down below, near the fire, Xena rolled her eyes. "Now there are two of them," she said glumly, "surely, I am cursed by the Gods."

Anna and Gabrielle turned, and said in unison, "Leave Shirley out of it."
155332121221112111111.title: Meet the real Gabrielle

1553321212211121111111.content:
Anna and Gabrielle shared their laugh at Xena's expense. The two blondes, it seemed, were kindred souls.

Anna grinned at the new friend she held in the palm of her hand. "I like that joke."

Gabrielle nodded. "It is one of my favorites, as well."

"Uh-huh. So why is it funny, Gabrielle?"

"Beg pardon, giant...er, Anna?"

The larger blonde narrowed her eyes. "Why is that joke funny?"

"Well," Gabrielle said, smiling nervously, "it's a kind of...play on words. You're using the word 'surely' in such a way, uh...it's a matter of context...uh..."

Anna smiled, as she got the answer she was looking for. "You don't know what it means, Gabrielle. You just heard me say it back at the ship. You've been following us, haven't you?"

At this, Xena barked out a raucous laugh. "Followed us? Are you feeble-minded, giant? We have covered many leagues this day. A man on a strong and hearty steed would have been hard put to keep pace with your strides. You think this..." Xena sneered at Gabrielle, "...this child could have kept up with us?"

"Good point, Xena," Anna said, pressing her face in a bit closer to Gabrielle. "So how did you follow us, Gabrielle?"

The doll-sized girl just looked into Anna's face blankly, and shrunk back a little in the giant hand.

Anna smirked. She lightly raised her hand up and down, bouncing Gabrielle so that her tiny thighs and bottom lifted off the giant palm each time Anna raised it. Anna was cupping her new little pet carefully in her hand each time Gabrielle dropped back down, but the motion was clearly frightening Gabrielle. "You know," Anna said, stopping the bouncing for a moment, "if somebody was holding my pretty little butt in the palm of her hand, I think I'd probably think twice about lying to her. Why do you think?"

Gabrielle nodded. She had placed a hand on each side of her in the big palm, steadying herself from all the bouncing. "Cry your pardon, giant...Anna. I was indeed following you."

"Impossible!"

Xena had come around to the near side of the fire, placing her hands on her bare hips as she looked up. "I know not this child's game, giant, but her words are lies."

Ignoring Xena's outburst, Anna looked at Gabrielle. "So how did you follow us, then? You don't seem to have a 'strong and hearty steed'."

"Yes, mighty one, I have no horse. I knew I had no chance to keep pace following you over land. There is a river that has, until now, run straight and true beside your path through these hills. The stream is fast along this stretch, and even cuts some distance off the winding path of this northern trail. I stole a raft to navigate it."

"Impossible," Xena said again, though this time she sounded less sure of herself. She knew that what the girl said about the nearby river was true, but she still could not believe that this mere slip of a girl could have done what she claimed.

Anna, though, looked thoughtfully into the tiny eyes staring earnestly into her own, then nodded. "I believe you, Gabrielle. So, why were you following us?"

"I thought to join you in your travels. I am, by trade, a bard, and it would be my great honor to chronicle your perilous and daring exploits in the lands of the forbidden North."

"By the gods!" Xena fumed, shaking her head angrily. "You are not only a liar, child, you are a silly fool! I have neither the desire nor the time to coddle a stripling like you on this journey. My deeds are legend, and do not need embellishment from a child's tongue."

Gabrielle turned around on Anna's palm, seeming to have forgotten that Xena was there. She looked down from her lofty perch, and stared at Xena quizzically. "Perhaps I wasn't clear. It is, of course, the giant's deeds that I wish to chronicle."

Xena stared daggers up at Gabrielle, too furious to speak.

Gabrielle looked back at Anna. "She seems angry, great one. Is she a person of importance? I assumed she was your servant."

The tiny Warrior Princess was gritting her teeth so hard, Anna almost thought she could hear them grinding.

Anna laughed, then reached out to pet Gabrielle's soft hair. "I think she thinks she's important, Gabrielle. And she's actually more of a pet than a servant."

Gabrielle nodded, starting a little at the giant fingertip stroking her hair, but not trying to fight the contact. "I see. Well, what say you, mighty Anna? May I join you on your great quest?"

"That depends," Anna said, drawing a finger down to stroke Gabrielle's downy-soft cheek, "do you mind - if I promise to be very gentle - if I play with you a little bit?"

Gabrielle paused, watching the huge finger continue to pet and stroke her face, it's thick yet soft skin sliding gently down her cheek, under her chin and up across the other cheek. The touch was nice, and gentle, and Gabrielle found that she didn't mind it a bit. Still, she said, "Do I have a choice?"

Anna stopped her stroking for a moment, and surprised even herself when she said, "Yes, of course you do, Gabrielle."

Gabrielle smiled, beckoning the finger back in a 'come here' motion.

"Well, I didn't get a choice," Xena muttered from below.
1553321212211121111111.title: Anna and Gabrielle get to know each other

15533212122111211111111.content:
"I like touching you little people. Your bodies are so soft and delicate."

Gabrielle watched in fascination as the giant's thumb and forefinger lightly grasped her arm, running up and down it in a smooth, sliding embrace, before gently pinching her tiny hand between the two, giant fingers. Gabrielle could sense the power in the huge digits, and was grateful that Anna seemed aware enough of her own strength to touch her with gentle restraint. Gabrielle looked up into Anna's preoccupied stare. "Pardon my question, mighty Anna. You are very gentle, and I have no right to complain at your handling of me. Still, you seem particularly fascinated with my smallness. Are you not, as a giant, accustomed to handling people?"

Anna laughed, bringing Gabrielle's little hand to her lips and giving it a soft kiss. "You're very inquisitive, aren't you, little Gabrielle? Actually I'm fairly new at picking up and playing with you little guys. You see, I come from a world where everyone is my size. In fact, there are many who are much larger than I."

Gabrielle gawked up into Anna's large, smiling face. "A world full of giants - as large as you, and even larger? Can such a thing be?"

"It can be and it is, Gabrielle."

The tiny blonde shook her head in wonder, barely noticing that her right leg was being grasped in a giant hand, and lifted in a gentle embrace. "Amazing," she said quietly. "I should like to see such a world."

Anna laughed as she toyed with Gabrielle's leg, running a thumb up the soft, leather boot and up over the delicate little kneecap. "Maybe I'll take you there someday, Gabrielle. I'd just love to show you off to all of my friends."

Gabrielle nodded again, awed at the thought. "I find that idea both frightening and thrilling. I should be honored to visit your world of giants, mighty Anna."

Anna chuckled, extending her fingers and giving Gabrielle's firm thigh a gentle squeeze. "Good. Now stop calling me 'mighty Anna', okay? I think we can all agree that I'm a mighty giant, and all around awesome. So, calling mighty all the time is kind of...what's the word...redundant?"

Gabrielle smiled, watching as her leg was squeezed and fondled in giant fingers. "Yes, I think that is the word. I will address you as Anna, if that is your wish. It doesn't feel quite respectful enough, but I will try to remember. Anna."

"Good." Anna let down Gabrielle's leg and leaned her face in close, pressing her lips in to completely cover Gabrielle's tiny face. Anna lingered for a moment, tasting at Gabrielle's little features with her lips and tongue. She sucked gently on the pert little nose, lapped the tip of her tongue at the tiny, yet full little lips, and brushed the curve of her upper lip delicately across the paper-thin flesh of Gabrielle's closed eyelids. "Mmm," cooed Anna as she pulled away, her lips making a soft smack! as they lifted from Gabrielle's face, "you taste so good, Gabrielle."

Before the giant lips retreated, Gabrielle darted her face forward and gave Anna's mouth a quick kiss in return. "Thanks. As do you...Anna."

"Silence! The both of you!" Xena shouted from below, having held her tongue as long as she was able. "By the gods, you're making me ill. I still do not see your game here, child, but I am not fooled. You seek to sway the giantess in your favor - to what ends I do not yet know. That last kiss on those monstrous lips was a lie, as was the ten minutes of giant arse-kissing that preceded it."

Both blonde girls turned to look down at Xena, with Anna being the first to find her tongue. Her huge face changed from a smile into a frown. "Did you just say I have a giant arse?"

Oh-oh, Xena thought, taking an involuntary step back.
15533212122111211111111.title: Anna's Playtime Continues

155332121221112111111111.content:
"I think you should do some of your own 'arse-kissing' Xena." The teenage girl's tone was that of an adult lecturing a small child. "Don't you agree, little Gabrielle?"

Sitting on a giant knee the bard could only nod "It must be as you command, Mighty .... sorry, I meant Anna."

"If you really feel the need, my full name is AnnaSophia." the starlet allowed. She sprung forward, one hand steadying Gabrielle, the other caught Xena by the hair and unceremoniously dragged the Warrior Princess back. Keeping the leg that was Gabrielle's perch still, she rolled her hips pished Xena under and rolled back.

Outraged and panicked, Xena kick and slapped at the mountain of flesh that landed on her body.

"Problem, Doll?" asked Anna with a wise-cracking smirk to Gabrielle.

Deferentially, the young woman said "Forgive my impudence, but you do not wish her actual harm?"

"Of course not." sighed Anna "But like any pet. Xena must learn obedience and discipline. I think that's enough. Just roll my 'giant arse' one last time... annnd OFFf!"

Utterly disheveled, armor all askew and breathing raggedly, Xena forced herself up "I apologize, Giant." she said, tightly.

"You, I think, need to call me Mighty Anna." the Disney starlet ordered "So... repeat."

Looking as if she would gag, Xena obeyed "I ... apologize, oh Mighty ... Anna."

"Much better Xena Doll." AnnaSophia complemented, knowing the Warrior Princess would not see it that way. Her hand bumped against the little form, gently, but enough to force Xena to move. Smirking, she repeated the gesture. And did it again, even harder. Xena was forced to take several steps to keep her feet. Then, addressing her friend, "Little Garbielle, did you not tell me you wished to touch my Xena Doll?"

Gabrielle gave a nervous look and replied "Please forgive me oh Great AnnaSophia. You may, perhaps consider ...ulp... Xena, as a p-p-"

"Pet? Toy?" supplied AnnaSophia with a smile. She encircled Xena's body with her hand, although did not pick her up. Her arm just rested on her leg, allow her hand to hang loosely

Gabrielle glanced down to see a boiling Xena, nodded back to the giant girl "Err...yes... but she could kick me to Tartaras and back in the proverbial blink of an eye."

"I want to watch you touching my Xena Doll." AnnaSophia said, a little forcefully. She turned the knee Gabrielle sat on, causing the blonde to lose her balance. Effortlessly caught the tumbling body, briefly held her to her face then set her on the ground. She smiled, mischeviously at the small blonde and nudged her closer adding "Go on. A lesson. Mom and Dad told me I need to share my toys more. And I'm teaching Xena Doll obedience. She WILL let you."
155332121221112111111111.title: Punasshed

1553321212211121111111112.content:
Xena swallowed her warrior pride and smiled up at the giant. There was little she could do “I shall obey, Mighty Anna.”

“Go on, Gabrielle.” repeated a grinning AnnaSophia. She enjoyed looking down at the pair as they stood in the half-circle of her gymnast trained legs. Remembering scenes from the show’s last couple of seasons, she added “Nothing wrong with a little experimenting.”

Swallowing nervously, the still teenage story-teller stammered “F-forgive m-m-me but I think it w-wise t-to re-remind you-”

“You said that already, my little friend.” AnnaSophia cut her off, verbally. Then, keeping her left hand around Xena, gently bumped Gabrielle with her right. Her smile broadened with each contact that brought the two ever closer. She stopped when the two doll-sized women were within inches and ran a finger up and down Gabrielle’s body reassuringly “You don’t have to be scared of her. Remember? She’s just a plaything.”

As Gabrielle’s deference had worked on AnnaSophia, making her more dominant, now the giant girl’s constant belittling of the Warrior Princess blended with the bard’s curiosity to convince her to take a step closer on her own. Xena towered almost head and shoulders over her, but she just wasn’t intimidating with giant fingers restraining her. She touched Xena’ lightly on the arm and offered “Y’know I’m just doing what I’m told.”

“Have a care, child.” Xena warned, though still smiling pleasantly “Your owner will not always be around to protect you.”

Gabrielle hissed in shock and alarm. The remark disturbed her on many levels. She just reacted, hauling back and ringingly slapped the warrior woman on the cheek. Even in the flickering light of AnnaSophia’s campfire a reddening handprint was obvious. “The Great AnnaSophia has named me friend and offered me the choice!”

“Why did you do that?” demanded the starlet. AnnaSophia wasn’t particularly angry, just surprised that her friend would slap her toy.

Xena taunted Gabrielle in a low whisper “As little as the giant thinks of me, you could not even put up the fight I did.”

“SHUT UP!” shouted the young redhead and her arm came back the other way, backhanding the warrior’s right cheek.

Xena only smirked, directing her remark upward “You would permit me to be abused? This is not how companions travel together.”

“She has a point, Gabrielle.” AnnaSophia acknowledged, then “I suggest you kiss and make up.” She smirked as both little women flushed red.

Xena was furious. No matter how she was humiliated this giant kept finding new devilish ways to make it worse. She still did not believe AnnaSophia was a goddess. But a demon? Maybe. One sent by Ares to test her. “No one touches me” she declared “without MY permission!”

“You forget me?” asked AnnaSophia. Both her tone and the fact she lifted Xena off the ground made it impossible. She held the warrior woman up to her face and grinned “Very cute.”

At least twice her height above the ground, Xena reluctantly rested her arms atop the hand that gripped her. It took pressure from her ribs. She buried her pride and tipped her head in as much of a bow as she physically could, then said “Apologies, Mighty Anna, of course traveling as we are it is necessary for you to ‘handle’ me. I could not hope to keep pace with you.”

“There’s that.” AnnaSophia acknowledged. Her fingers waggled, tangling with Xena’s legs “But, since you’re mine, I can touch you anytime I like. Anyway I want. And I don’t NEED your permissi--” The starlet’s last syllable was muffled by her pressing her toy into her face followed by a whole-face kiss.

It took all of Xena’s warrior discipline to not assault the giant’s head. But she already had battled to utter defeat. She endured it with nothing more than a twisting of her face to be able to breathe. When it was over, she demanded sarcastically “You enjoyed yourself, I trust?”

“Don’t sass me, Xena Doll?” AnnaSophia scolded her, using the nickname she knew the Warrior Princess loathed “Now, I hope you will offer little Gabrielle the same cooperation you showed me.”

Gabrielle watched in amazement as the bigger woman was effortlessly lifted, held and played with like a – a …well… “She’s just a toy to her.”

“Here ya go, little Gabrielle.” Said AnnaSophia as she set Xena back on the ground. And after lingering on her body, withdrew her fingers. It wasn’t like she could run away as she was surrounded on three sides by legs.

Gabrielle gulped at the angry expression on the taller woman. But awareness of the fact that a girl quite a bit younger than her just casually played with Xena lowered her opinion of the Warrior Princess. She curtseyed for the giant and said “By your command, AnnaSophia.”

“Remember my warning, child.” Xena threatened quietly.

The smaller woman found the larger one uncooperative. Gabrielle placed her hands on Xena’s shoulder and attempted to plant a kiss. The stony face hovered out of reach, even standing on her toes … even ballerina style. Xena was just too tall.

“Hahahaha.” AnnaSophia laughed at the difficulty her little friend was having. She wondered just how … or even if … she should help.
1553321212211121111111112.title: UnCooperative Xena

15533212122111211111111121.content:
Gabrielle placed both hands on Xena’s muscular shoulders and jumped. Again, the smaller woman missed her target. A repeat effort led to a third and fourth. Finally, she stomped her foot on the ground angrily. “Grrrr!!”

“Gee Gabi!” AnnaSophia exclaimed “You seem to be having a bit of a conundrum! Hahaha!”

The storyteller shot an angry look upward and snarled “How am I supposed to do what you want? She’s too tall!”

“Don’t get your skirt in a knot.” The starlet scolded her, more amused than angry at the outburst “We’ll figure something out. Right Xena?”

The Warrior Princess had to endure the youngster’s fingers touching everywhere. They went up and down her sides, fiddled her hair. The only comfort was that the limb-sized explorers seemed, generally, to not linger either on her breasts or between her legs. All the more, Xena believed this apparent girl was a demon sent by Ares. Behind a neutral expression she counted the seconds “When next we meet Oh God of War!” she swore silently “It is you who will pay! I shall hit you for each and every moment this creature touches me!”

“I have a great idea!” AnnaSophia finally decided a casual rubbing of Xena’s backside with her ring finger sparked a thought. Her left hand made a last pass down her living doll, and settled on the ground palm up. The blue eyes fixed on the other doll-sized Greek “It’s really simple little Gabrielle. Have a seat.”

The smallest of the threesome blinked in surprise and a flash of betrayal darkened the young woman’s face “F-forg-give m-me An-naSophia” stammered Gabrielle “Did I of-fend? I th-thought we were f-fr-iends.”

“Why we are, of course.” Replied AnnaSophia in a smooth voice. She gently brushed the backs of her left fingers along the little redhead’s body. And she couldn’t help grinning when Gabrielle had to move to keep her balance, ending up backing into the bend of her knee. “But, what does that have to do with you sitting in my hand?”

Xena just smiled at the ‘normal’ sized girl, letting her previous words have the desired effect.

More of the redhead’s deference came back “I apologize Oh Great One. It was just a shock. I crave pardon… that you realize… being told to sit on a hand. It is not a normal part of my day.”

“Any more than being able to hold someone in my hand… besides maybe a baby, that is,,, Is for me.” AnnaSophia acknowledged, nodding her head. A slightly displeased expression morphed into a broad smile. Her nearly perfect celebrity face began to show a sense of mischief, and she added “So, now we’re clear? Plop your little self down “

Xena smirked at Gabrielle and whispered “Notice how little time I’ve been OUT of her grip?” And it was true. Although currently not moving much AnnaSophia’s giant fingers were lightly circling one of the Warrior Princess’ legs.

“Ok, sure.” Gabrielle replied as she released a breath she did not know she was holding. She nervously studied the cushion of flesh. It looked more comfortable than anything made in her ancient world. But, despite the Giant’s kindness to her, the young woman was still uneasy “Can I ask … err… why?”

This barb Xena fired with a loud belly laugh “Go on foolish child! See how equal we really are! How do you put it? Deliver yourself into Her hands or such nonsense! It’s just like having a Basilisk hug you. Just as he prepares to force you down his throat!”

“Sush Doll!” the blonde girl ordered. And the hand that really wasn’t doing anything enforced Xena’s silence by pushing its index finger into her stomach with just enough force to elicit a squeak. She kept her hand invitingly open, and answered the red-head’s question “It’s a surprise. But, really, I want to feel your pretty little butt in my hand.”

That made Gabrielle swallow a lump in her throat and as she walked around the open hand, she gave the giant fingers a wider berth. Passing thumb, index and middle finger by easily her height. Both remarks weighed on her mind. It was suddenly a problem for her. She coughed nervously and cast her eyes to Giant AnnaSophia “I’m s-s-sorry. It’s just so big!”

“Y’know Gabi?” began the starlet with a playful lilt “Remember what you said earlier? I do … word for word … “You are very gentle, and I have no right to complain at your handling of me.” … You like being ‘handled’ – your word – don’t you little Gabrielle?”

From AnnaSophia’s giant face, Gabrielle’s eyes darted to the nearby hand. She saw it twitch and pulse, the little movements of the fingers which, her brain knew were the usual reflexes just magnified and a more than a little threatening. She shivered, but also could not help nodding in response to the giant’s question. She spun around and slowly backed until her legs just barely contacted the hand.
15533212122111211111111121.title: Gabrielle and the Hand

155332121221112111111112.content:
"What do you think, Gabreille?" asked Anna, as she looked down at a suddenly nervous-looking Xena. "Should I punish her for that insult?"

The doll-sized blonde looked down at Xena from the high perch of Anna's hand, narrowing in her eyes as she considered the question. "Well, she was very disrespectful to you, Anna. Such an insult to someone of your stature should not be tolerated."

Anna nodded. "So...punish her, then?"

Gabrielle looked back up at Anna, then back down to Xena, still thinking about it.

Xena, for her part, stood in a wary crouch, ready to attempt escape if the giant reached for her. She had made hurried mental calculations of her proximity to the giant, as well as the incredible span of Anna's log-sized arms, and she did not like her chances of success. Still, Xena grimly steeled herself to be ready for the giant's attack.

At last, Gabrielle shrugged. "On the other hand, one such as you - a towering goddess among lowly mortals - may deign to show mercy to such a tiny, insignificant creature."

Anna smiled a little at that, her large eyes shining in the firelight. "So...don't punish her?"

Gabrielle returned the smile, shook her head.

"Okay, then," Anna said, as she lowered Gabrielle carefully down, seating the little woman on her left knee, and fixing Xena with a serious stare. "You're off the hook this time, Xena Doll. Thanks to Gabrielle. Next time, I might not be so merciful. Understood?"

Xena stared up at Anna, her expression flat, neutral. She was seething inside, but was making every effort not to show it. Her teeth ground together a bit as she muttered, "Understood."

"Good, now be a good girl and hop up here on my other knee."

Xena just stared up at the giant.

Anna frowned, then patted her bare, right knee. She eyed Xena impatiently.

Words of protest came to Xena's lips, but she suppressed them before they were uttered. Xena knew there was no point in fighting the giant over this. She could resist, of course, for pride's sake, but in the end she knew she would be caught up in the giant hands and plopped down in the great lap like a helpless babe. Sighing inwardly, Xena stepped toward the giant.

Presently, she stood before Anna's huge, cross-legged form. The tree-like, leather-booted calf angled up in an gentle slope to the large, bare knee and Xena saw that she should be able to climb up it with little problem. She took first one tentative step onto the soft leather, hesitating as she felt a subtle shifting of the flesh beneath the boot. Steeling her courage, Xena stepped up onto the boot with both feet now, her arms spreading away naturally out to either side, balancing herself she walked slowly up the slight incline of Anna's calf.

As she stepped carefully off the boot and onto the giant's bare leg, Xena heard a rumbling giggle from above. Resisting the urge to look up - partly to retain her balance and partly because she did not want to see the giant laughing at her - Xena stepped to the top of the slightly yielding skin of Anna's calf, then carefully lowered herself down to sit awkwardly atop the giant knee. Covering the dais-like knee was a pad of thick, loose flesh that shifted and moved under Xena's backside, making it difficult to get comfortably still. Her feet scrabbled across the long, supple calf, trying to gain purchase.

This time the laugh came for directly across from her, at her level. Xena looked over to see Gabrielle, seated on the knee opposite and looking quite comfortable, in deed. The blonde girl, the mirror image of the giant, in garb and aspect, sat easily perched on Gabrielle's left knee, her legs stretched down along the curve of the giant calf, and crossed demurely at her ankles.

Stifling a curse, Xena arranged herself in much the same way, not feeling much more comfortable, but at least feeling reasonably confident that she wouldn't tumble down into the giant's crotch.

Anna smiled down at her two little dolls. "Awww, cute."

Gabrielle smiled, too.

Xena did not.

"Okay, then, Xena," said Anna said, "where exactly are we off to on this adventure of ours/"

Xena sighed. "I grow weary now, giant. Let us discuss this in the morning." Then she made a move to scoot down off Anna's knee.

"No, you don't," Anna said, laughing, as she wrapped her fingers around Xena's legs and guided the little Warrior Princess back up onto her knee. "I want to know where we're going, and I want to know now."

"Giant," Xena began, shaking her head wearily, "it has been a very long day, and I'd rather-"

Gabrielle blew out an impatient breath. "Why are being so stubborn about it? It is, after all, as clear as day where we are going."

It was Xena's turn to smile. "Oh? And where is that, child?"

Gabrielle rolled her eyes, and looked up at Anna. "This road has only one destination. It takes us through the perilous forests of the North, where lie the fabled lands of the race of people known as the Yensid. We go, mighty Anna," Gabrielle said, in ominous tones, "to the great, walled city at the end of the world. We go to Ma-jic-Ingdom."
155332121221112111111112.title: Anna gives Xena a break

choices: Now, for the rest of the plan ( and some butt salving)
1553321212211121111111121.content:
Xena stared across Anna's lap at Gabrielle. "You know of Ma-jic-Ingdom?"

"Of course," said Gabrielle with a negligent shrug. "For centuries, the bards among my people have told of the legend of the Yensid - a strange, paled-skinned people who hide themselves in a great city behind mighty walls that, it is said, the gods themselves cannot breach."

Anna laughed. She reached down and patted Gabrielle on the head. "See, Xena? She's a smart one. I bet she'll be really vaulable to us on our journey."

"Very good, child." Xena's eyes showed a grudging respect. "Now, you talk of your people. Who are they? From whence do you hail, girl?"

"My home is past the rolling hills to the south. A place called Potidaea."

"Potidaea?" The Warrior Princess let loose with a harsh bark of laughter. "Potidaea is your home?" Xena chuckled again. "Tell me, girl, what does your family do there? Do they herd goats? Or perhaps it is pigs you tend? What say you, girl? Do you hail from a proud clan of swineherds?"

Gabreille's comely face colored in anger. "My people have farmed the fertile fields of Potidaea for many generations," she said tightly, crossing her arms across her chest. "I have nothing but pride in my kin."

Xena grinned fiercely. "Oh, indeed, child, indeed. I'm sure you do." Xena slapped the side of Anna's knee and looked up into the giant girl's face. "Do you hear, giant? We assault the unbreachable walls of Ma-jic-Ingdom with all the powers and knowledge of a farmgirl from Potidaiea! Surely the gods themselves should quake in fear at such a mighty foe!"

"Oh, shut up," Gabrielle said sulkily.

"Stop being so mean, Xena," said Anna, reaching down to give Xena's arm a light fick of her finger.

"You misunderstand me, giant," said Xena, wincing a little, as even Anna's lightest blow sent a powerful jolt up Xena's arm and shoulder. "I am quite sure she will pull her weight. Who knows," the Warrior Princess said, smiling savagely, "along the way, we may require some knowledge on the little known aspects of manure."

"That's enough!" Anna cried, as one of her giant hands flashed down on Xena. "I told you to stop being mean to her!"

"Now, giant-"

"Shut up!" Anna growled, grasping Xena around the middle and flipping the doll-sized woman over her knee.

Xena fought furiously, punching at Anna's giant thigh with her hands and kicking at it with her bare feet, but it was all to no avail. The blows slapped at Anna's thick, soft skin like the pattering of a raindrops, causing Anna not the slightest discomfort. Anna smiled as she held Xena down on her little stomach with the flat of one hand, and watched the useless struggles of the pet woman against her bare leg. Xena's little body felt nice and warm against Anna's skin.

"Ahhh!" Xena cried, struggling furiously, "Let me go, damn you!"

Anna laughed evily. "Not only am I not gonna let you go, Xena doll," she said with a grin, as she pulled up the back of Xena's undergarment, exposing her pretty, rounded bottom, "I'm gonna spank that little butt til it's red as a beet!"

"Nooooo!"

Anna chuckled. "Yeeeeees!" She raised her hand to begin the stinging punishment.

"Wait, Anna!"

The giant blonde looked down at Gabrielle. The tiny girl was slipping down off Anna's knee, and onto the ground. She looked up at Anna. "Please don't do that, Anna."

Anna blinked down at the pretty little girl. "Why not?"

Gabrielle smiled up at her giant twin, then stepped up to the Anna's calf, climbed up onto it and walked up to the top of the boot, then sat down, straddling Anna's leg. She reached up and patted at the skin of Anna's shin, just below where Xena lay pinned. "I'm afraid you'll really hurt her if you do that Anna. You're very strong, you know."

"So, you don't think I should punish her?"

As Gabrielle continued to stroke Anna's leg gently, she shook her head.

Xena stopped her struggling long enough to turn to cast a glance at Gabrielle. "Thank you, child," Xena hissed, too softly for Anna to hear, "now tell this monster to release me at once!"

Acting as though she hadn't heard Xena, Gabrielle looked up at Anna and said, "I didn't exactly mean she shouldn't be punished."

"Huh?" said Anna, bewildered, "I thought you just said-"

"I said you shouldn't spank her Anna. That doesn't mean I can't do it."

"Wait," Xena said, twisting around atop Anna's knee. "What?"

"Hold her just like that, Anna," Gabrielle said, as she straigthened up on Anna's calf, rising up but with her knees still clamped down, like a rider standing up in the stirrups. "And keep that cute little behind uncovered, can you?"

Anna grinned, liking the sound of this new plan. "Anything you say, Gabrielle."

"You dare not!" Xena shouted, renewing her useless struggles under Anna's giant hand. "If you so much as touch me, farmgirl, I will slay the both of you!"

Gabrielle smiled up at Anna and raised up her small hand. She raised her eyebrows in question.

Anna giggled, nodding.

Gabrielle brought down her hand in a whistling arc, slapping Xena's bottom with a loud smack!, and leaving a crimsom handprint on Xena's smooth, firm flesh.

"Owww!" Xena howled. "Stop that! You dare not strike me in such- owww! Stop that! Stop it, fowl child!"

Gabrielle wound up for a third blow, then laid her flattened palm across Xena's backside again, caising the firm, fleshy globes to jiggle comically before snapping back into their fine, taut form .

"Owwwww! I said stop that! I will flay you alive when I get out of this? Owww!"

Gabrielle clucked her tongue. "You have a lot to learn about getting someone to stop spanking you."

"Potidean whore!"

"Wrong answer," Gabrielle said, with something like real regret. Then she continued to rain stinging slaps at Xena's reddening, helpless ass. The frantic wails of the Warrior Princess echoed around the circle of the big fire.

Anna laughed, reaching down to place a restraining finger between Gabrielle's slapping hand and Xena's crimson-colored ass cheeks. "Jeeze, Gabrielle, take it easy. I think you're hurting her worse than I would have."

Gabrielle grinned up at Anna, the color high in her cheeks and her breathing starting to get a little heavy. "You...you flatter me, Anna."

"Don't mention it. Seriously, though, I think she's had enough."

Gabrielle and Anna looked at Xena. The Warrior Princess lay panting on Anna's thigh, her arms and legs only weakly moving now, as she lay still pinned beneath Anna's hand. "You...you shall both pay for this...you...you will die at the point...of my...sword."

Anna laughed again, then pushed a finger down onto one firm, crimson little cheek, eliciting a shivering moan from her little warrior doll. "Yep, she's pretty tender down there. Damn, Gabrielle, I hope you never get mad a me."

Gabrielle rolled her eyes. "Anna, if I ever get mad at you, I hope I have the good sense to keep it to myself."

Anna smiled, then reached down to stroke gently at Gabrielle's cheek. "You're so funny and cute, Gabrielle. You don't have to worry. I'd never, ever hurt you, okay?"

"Thank you, Anna," Gabrielle said, nuzzling her cheek into Anna's stroking finger. She glanced at the still panting Xena. "What about her?"

Anna looked at Xena's tiny, crimson-colored bottom. "Her poor little butt is gonna be really sore. I wonder if we could find something to put on it. Some kind of ointment or something."

Gabrielle nodded, scooting herself down Anna's leg and down to the ground. "I think I have some salve in my satchel. Just a minute." Gabrielle walked over to the edge of the clearing and reached down to pick up a small leather bag with a carry strap. She brought it back to the fire. "This is made from a root found in the forests near my home. It will soothe her skin."

"That's good, " said Anna, as she ran a finger along the hem of Xena's undergarment, taking care to only lightly touch the glowing red globes with her fingertip.

"By the gods," Xena muttered, closing her eyes wearily. "What else must I endure this night."

Anna looked at the round, wooden container in Gabrielle's hand - the one that apparently contained the salve. She grinned. "I get to put that stuff on her, right?"
1553321212211121111111121.title: Xena Tells the Plan

choices: Continue with Anna, Xena, and Gabrielle.
15533212122111211111111211.content:
Xena was too weary to fight further.

The Warrior Princess lay meekly across Anna's thigh as the giant applied the salve to her tender backside. The giant finger seemed to linger longer than was necessary as it spread the wet, cold goo around on Xena's butt cheeks. The monstrous digit split her buttocks with ease, probing in relentlessly into her most intimate place and causing Xena's entire bodily to shudder wildly. Xena would have resisted were she able, but in a distant part of her mind she knew the shiver mirrored as much pleasure as pain. Her own, traitorous thighs clamped spasmodically around the probing finger, embracing the monstrous digit like a lover.

After a few moments of the giant's intimate teasing, Xena was tumbled onto her own, prepared bed of pine boughs. She drifted off to sleep, with twin gales of girlish laughter following her down into welcome oblivion.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

"By, the gods, it has taken little more than a day, and yet we now approach the very walls of Ma-jic-Ingdom!"

Gabrielle laughed. "Do you still doubt Anna's might, Xena? With her great strides, she can walk a lightening cavalry into the dust!"

Xena snorted. "Listen to you, child! You trumpet the deeds of your mistress as though she were a god! Then again, I suppose a farm girl from Potidaea would find most anything beyond her simple ken to be impressive."

"My simple ken? And what of you, Xena? You claim to be a great warrior, but I've seen no evidence of it. A lot of bold talk is all I've heard from you."

"Be careful, child," Xena growled, "anymore insolence from you and I will-"

"Enough," Anna put in, her voice amused but firm. She just loved it when her two little dolls argued over her. And now, with each of them riding one of her shoulders, as they had done through much of the day's walk, she really enjoyed the feel of their tiny weights and high-pitched, chattering voices as they sniped at each other around her face. She had learned, though, that she could only let them run on for so long, before re-enforcing her dominance.

"That's enough now, little ones. Xena, you know better than to threaten my Gabrielle. Or have you so soon forgotten how easily we can redden your tiny bottom?"

"I have not forgotten," Xena said sullenly, as she looked ahead at the thickening forest. "Cry pardon," she added quietly, turning away to hide her grimace.

Gabrielle's tinkling laughter sounded from Anna's other shoulder.

"And you," Anna said, turning to stare at the tiny blonde. "Don't provoke her. Remember, Xena's used to being in charge, and it bugs her that I'm the one calling the shots. Be easy on her, okay?"

Gabrielle grinned, swinging playfully on the armful of Anna's hair she was holding for balance, and giving the 'okay' sign with her tiny thumb and forefinger.

Anna couldn't help but grin back. Gabrielle had turned out to be a delightful little travelling companion. The night before, after Xena had been spanked and put to bed, Anna had begun to make another pine bough bed for Gabrielle next to Xena. The little blond, however, had had a different idea.

She had wanted to sleep with Anna. Anna had protested at first, pointing out that Gabrielle could be injured or even killed if Anna held her too tight or rolled over in her unknowing slumber. Gabrielle had argued that Anna's mothering instinct would take hold, and she would naturally cradle and protect Gabrielle, as she would an infant. In the end, Anna had relented, and Gabrielle had spent a safe and restful night cuddled in Anna's arms.

Anna looked at her blonde twin with affection. The tiny girl was looking up the trail, taking in the sprawling, wild country, her little eyes wide with wonder.

Anna just loved little Gabrielle. She was, in many ways, the polar opposite of stubborn little Xena. Gabrielle loved to be picked up, and held and cuddled. And her little body was every bit as curvy and nice as Xena's, though not quite as taut and muscled. Yes, Gabrielle was her soft, willing pet girl, and Anna didn't know if she would ever have the heart to let her go when this adventure was over. Truth to tell, Anna was hoping that Gabrielle would want to stay with her, even when they left this world.

"Hold, giant."

Anna was snapped out of her reverie, and stopped walking. "What?"

Xena pointed ahead, from her place on Anna's shoulder, a grim smile on her little face. "Just beyond those trees, the very tall ones." Xena leaned over to grin at Gabrielle. "Trees twice the height of your mighty Anna, I might add. The massive walls of Ma-jic-Ingdom lie behind them. Walls so mighty that I doubt even you, giant, can breach them."

Anna snorted, and started walking again, quickening her pace.

"Giant, don't be foolish-" Xena began, but stopped when Anna stopped walking long enough to turn to look at Xena, with a frown on her face and an eyebrow raised.
