The color drained out of the woman warrior's face. "Um...that is...may I suggest that we stop for the night, and, um, discuss our plan of attack?" Xena gulped nervously under Anna's withering stare. "If that is, um, acceptable to you, giant?"

Anna pretended to be mad for another moment, then smiled. "Okay, Xena doll. We'll make camp over there by that little stream. I'll find us something to eat first. Later, we can all, you know, settle in and get comfortable. You can both sleep with me tonight. How does that sound?"

"Awesome!" chirped Gabrielle, using one of Anna's own, much-used words.

"Yes," Xena muttered, with a good deal less enthusiasm, "awesome."
15533212122111211111111211.title: Xena and Gabby Hitch a Ride on Anna

155332121221112111111112111.content:
"Um, that is a pretty big wall."

Xena allowed herself a small smirk. Even the mighty giant, it seemed, was in awe of the great walls of Ma-jic-Ingdom.

"Perhaps," Xena said with a wry smile, "we should not attempt it, giant. There is no shame in admitting that even you, the mighty Anna, is no match for so great a wall."

Anna frowned, then slowly rose from her kneeling position just inside the screen of tall trees before the huge wall. She looked down at Xena and Gabrielle who stood near her feet. "That's not a very nice thing to say, Xena. Would you like to be punished again?"

The smile faded from Xena's face, and she dipped her head in a humble bow. "I meant no offense, giant. I merely point out the difficulty of the task at hand." The Warrior Princess pointed to the wall. "It is daunting, is it not?"

Anna turned to look at the wall again. She gave an involuntary, dry gulp!.

The wall reached entirely across the wide valley, neatly connecting with high, black peaks on either side, and effectively sealing off whatever lay beyond. The polished wood of the wall was built from the tall, broad-truncked trees from the surrounding forest, each log reaching well above even Anna's head. The logs had been carefully shaved and shaped so that they fitted seamlessly together to create a sheer, smooth face of slick, shiny wood. In the center, there was an immense, white gate that appeared to be inlaid with gold.

As Anna looked uncertainly at the wall, she felt a light tapping on her knee. She looked down to find Gabrielle smiling up at her, looking as happy and trusting as a child.

"Oh, you'll find a way, won't you, Anna?"

"Um, well..."

"If she can't," said a new voice, "we will."

All three young women looked around with a start.

But it was only Xena and Gabrielle who had to look up, and up.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------

Selena and Miley had secured all their tiny captives back at the ship, leaving them food and water before they left. They had dressed themselves in warrior garb similar to Anna's, though Selena wore a stylish looking red leather shirt and top, and MIley was sporting a light tan, two piece, bikini-like outfit that showed off her sleek, taut stomach. Now all three giants sat in a circle, with Xena and Gabrielle standing in the middle.

Xena, for her part, did not welcome the new additions to the quest. One giant, she mused, could prove useful, but three of them stomping about would surely only cause problems. Out of the corner of her eye, Xena saw Miley watching her with amusement. Xena refused to make eye contact, though she could clearly see the giant cuddling her beloved Argo in her lap, once again treating the mighty war steed like a little pet. It didn't help that the horse seemed to be enjoying the giant's tender attentions immensely.

"I like this new one," Selena said now. She had been eyeing Gabrielle for several moments, clearly fascinated with the less-than-foot-tall woman. Selena grinned at Anna. "Can I pick her up?"

Anna shrugged. "It's okay with me, Selena, but why don't you ask her. Her name's Gabrielle."

Xena fumed, quietly. None of the giants had ever asked for her permission to be picked up.

Selena smiled down at Gabrielle indulgently. "How about it, Gabrielle?" Selena extended her hand slowly, careful not to frighten the little woman. "May I?"

Miley rolled her eyes.

Gabrielle looked at Anna, then back up at Selena. She nodded.

Selena decided to take Gabrielle in two hands, though she could have lifted her easily with one, of course. She pinned Gabrielle between flattened palms, covering the little woman from just beneath her arms to her hips, then lifted her up to face level. Selena just held Gabrielle there a moment, turning her form side a bit to study the tiny perfect figure.

A smiled lit up the face of the dark-haired giant, and she cuddled Gabrielle gently against her chest, settling her snugly in as though the little woman were her baby. "Oh, my gosh!" Selena gushed, "isn't she just the cutest thing!"

Miley smirked. "Oh, Selena. You and your little toys." Then she went back to petting Argo, playing a little game where she enclosed his little head in her fist, then released it to gently rub at Argo's nose with her fingertips. Argo, for his part, was unperturbed as he lay cradled in the giant hands, seeming to even enjoy the relentless stroking and teasing of his mistress.

Before one the giants chose to include her in the cuddling, Xena spoke up. "Um, perhaps we should discuss the plan?"

"Yeah," Miley looked up from her petting. "Just what are we doing here again, shorty?"

Xena gritted her teeth. "As I said, giant, one of my generals, Thesius, journeyed to this land one year ago, and was not heard from again. He may have died at the hands of the Yensid. Or perhaps he yet remains alive, as their prisoner. If he lives, we shall free him. If he does not, then the Yensid shall pay dearly for his life."

Miley frowned. "All this way? For one man?"

Xena just stared up at the bikini-clad giant. "He was...a very important man."

Anna was looking closely at Xena. There was something in the way Xena had said that. In the way she'd said important.

She was trying to figure it out still, when Selena said, "I bet it's the gold."

Both Anna and Miley turned around, and said, at the same time, "What?"

"Didn't you see the gold in the gate?" Now Selena turned attention her to Gabrielle in her arms and gave the miniature woman a delicate poke in the belly, eliciting a delighted, high-pitched giggle from the little blonde. "Our little Xena there isn't after one of her soldiers. She just wants to plunder that city for it's gold. Don't you agree, my little Gabby? Say yes or I'll tickle you to death!" She gave the little woman two more teasing jabs with her fingertip.

"Yes!" giggled Gabrielle now, squirming atop Selena's supporting arm as the huge finger poked at her helpless, bare middle. "Yes, ha, ha, yes she just wants the gold!"

Miley smirked. "Yeah, that sounds about right."

Xena was shaking her head. "No, giant, that is not...well, perhaps you have a point. While we are there rescuing Thesius, some of the golden plunder of this great city may find its way into our pockets."

"I knew it!" crowed Selena, as she stopped tormenting Gabrielle for a moment. "She's only after the gold!"

Xena just stared up at Selena for a moment, then gave a low bow. "Perhaps there is some truth in what you say, giant."

"I knew it!" the dark-haired starlet said again.

Gabrielle, who had noticed she was no longer being tickled, reached up to grab Selena's finger in both hands and pressed it into her own belly.

Selena smiled and began tickling Gabrielle again. She paused a moment to bring the giggling minikin up to her face for a quick kiss, then settling into tickling at Gabrielle's little belly, then her legs and under her little arms, discovering all her many ticklish places.

As Selena continued to play with the wildly laughing, thrashing Gabrielle, and Miley kept playing with her little horse, Anna looked down at Xena.

The Warrior Princess was staring up at her with a look that seemed a bit too smug.
155332121221112111111112111.title: The Battle Nears, and Reinforcements Arrive

1553321212211121111111121111.content:
"I would have my horse now, giant."

"Oh would you now," said Miley, crossing her arms across her chest, leaving Argo lying like a kitten in her lap. "This is my horsey now, Xena Doll. Or did you forget that?"

Xena was infuriated at the effrontery of the giant girl, but she tried not to let it show. "Cry pardon, giant. I did not forget. Still, Argo is my battle steed, and I will need him in the fight to come."

Miley shrugged. "So call him to you then."

Xena eyed the giant warily. "Truly?"

"Sure."

The Warrior Princess grinned triumphantly, then gave out with a piercing whistle.

All five woman, both large and small, turned to look at Argo in Miley's lap.

The horse, who had been lying comfortably across Miley thighs, his rump supported on the right one while his front legs rested, bent easily at the knees, on her left, turned his head briefly at the sound of the whistle. His deep brown eyes searched, then seemed to locate Xena standing in the middle of the circle of giant teens. The eyes showed a brief flicker of interest, then looked away. Argo then settled his head in between his forelegs, like a puppy settling in for a nap, resting his muzzle on Miley's leg and giving the soft skin a few, slobbery licks.

Laughter echoed from all around the circle then, with Xena being the only on who didn't join in. The warrior woman sulked silently amid the co-mingled hilarity.

After a moment, as the laughter subsided, Miley said, grinning. "See, Xena Doll? My horsey now."

"Oh, come on, Miley," said Selena with a grin. The giant brunette had settled in to just petting Gabrielle, liking the feel of the soft, cuddly little woman in her hands. "Give her a break. Just let her borrow him for the battle."

Miley shrugged. "Okay, I guess. But I'm going to have to get Argo to warm up to her again."

"How you gonna do that?" asked Anna, curious.

"I'll show you." That said, Miley reached out a hand toward Xena. "I know just how to get the two of them to, you know, bond again."

Xena did not like the sound of that, but as giant fingers closed firmly around her waist, she realized she had little choice in the matter.

"I know Argo's gonna like this, Xena," Miley said with a smile, as she lifted Xena to her, "and I bet you will, too."
1553321212211121111111121111.title: Battle Plans (and girls and horses and stuff)

choices: Clean Up and Go to War
15533212122111211111111211111.content:
Before she knew what was happening, Xena found herself sat astride Argo, though curiously, she was perched on the war horse's chest instead of his back. The giant had placed the once-mighty steed on it's back in her lap, making Argo seem more like a pet kitten than a horse.

For Argo's part, he seemed unperturbed, lolling placidly in the fleshy cradle of his new owner's tree-sized thighs.

"Okay, Xena," came Miley's voice from above and behind her, "get to work."

"There is no time for games, giant. What would you have me do?"

The answer was a rumbling giggle that Xena felt as quaking vibrations from along the legs of the giant, up through Argo's body, and through to the insides of her own, clamped thighs. "Do I have to spell it out, genius? There's Argo's thing. I think you know what to do."

Xena's mouth dropped open. "Surely, you don't mean...?"

"Leave Shirley out of it!"

Gabrielle, still perched snugly in Selena's arms, was grinning happily at Xena, clearly enjoying the situation. The other two giants seemed equally interested, as they had both crowded in close to get a look at what was happening in Miley's lap.

"I...I refuse to do that, giant." Xena folded her arms across her chest. She knew she must present a foolish picture in her current situation, but she tried to salvage at least a little dignity.

Then she felt giant fingers close around her from behind, tightening around her chest in a vise-like grip. She struggled for a moment, but realized immediately that she could not hope to break free.

"Don't be stupid, little doll," said Miley, her voice low with menace. "You know I can make you do it. I can do anything I want with your little body. I can set you on top of his thing and slide you back and forth across it. Or maybe I'll flip you over and rub your face all over it. I bet Argo would love that."

Anna and Gabrielle looked shocked at that.

Argo, seemingly to recognize the sound of his name, nickered excitedly, expectant of more attention from his giant mistress.

Selena just grinned. "Miley, you've got such a dirty mind!"

The pop star laughed. "Yeah, I know." She turned her attention back to Xena. "How about it Xena Doll? My way or yours?"

"I...I will do it, giant." The words felt like bile in Xena's mouth, but she knew she had no choice.

The huge fingers released their grip, leaving Xena free to move astride Argo's chest. She looked down at the horse's underside, seeing Argo's penis, lolling like a soft, foot-long log across the flat of the great animal's belly. The member was not yet at it's full size, and it's current softness was clearly temporary. In fact, just now a gusting, warm breeze from above swirled around Xena and Argo, causing Argo's awakening member to twitch sideways across his belly, and begin to stiffen.

Miley's laughter gusted down on the mismatched little couple, just as her breath had a moment before. "There, I got him started for you, Xena."

Xena fumed quietly, trying to shut her tormentor's laughter, as well as that of the other giants as they joined in. She began to reach forward with her hands, hovering above Argo's growing member uncertainly. The thing was growing huge, becoming quite a handful.

Miley laughed again. "A lot for you to handle, huh, doll girl? Those little hands of your may be too small for the job. Argo's used to my big, strong fingers making him happy. Maybe you should use your nice little legs. They're not much bigger than my fingers."

Deciding that resistance was futile, Xena did as she was instructed. Bracing her hands back behind her near the front of Argo's chest, she slide her legs up the horse's sides and up onto his belly, lightly clamping Argo's throbbing penis between her knees and calves.

Immediately, Xena felt a wild shudder run through the powerful body beneath her. Then she felt a hot moist gust of air on the back of her neck, as Argo snorted mightily.

Anna giggled. "I think he likes it, Xena. Keep doing what you're doing."

"Yeah!" Selena gushed, leaning in closer so that Xena could feel her giant breath as well. "Make the little horsey happy!"

In spite of herself, Xena allowed herself a small, inner smile. The giants were indeed demeaning both Xena and her horse, but she had to admit that this was strangely exciting. She would never have done something like this on her own, but being compelled to do it by the mighty giant freed her somehow. She now almost relished the odd sort of control she now had of her horse, and she was warming to the idea of bringing him to full arousal.

"Aww, that's a good girl!" Miley cooed, as though she were doting on a small child. "You're doing great, Xena! Now, give him a little squeeze!!"

But Xena was way ahead of the young giant, as she herself had a much greater understanding of the male sex organ. She was already squeezing Argo's member between her legs, kneading it's stiffening length with her knees and calves, rolling her legs around it and squeezing at it with gentle persistence.

Argo was now snorting wildly, rolling his head from side to side and leaning his head forward to nip lightly at Xena's hair and shoulders. The bites were delicate - not much more than tender little nibbles, and Xena barely felt them. She continued her assault on her horse's dick, increasing the speed and force if her squeezing and delighting in the feel of rock-hard member as it grew between her legs.

"My God, look at that thing!" Anna cried, leaning in closer. "It's almost as big as my pinkie finger now!"

Selena laughed. "Yeah, Looks like it knows where it's going, too!"

It took a moment for the giant's words to register with Xena. She had begun to enjoy the feel of the mighty member between her legs, and her thoughts had began to get a bit fuzzy as her inner thighs began to tingle deliciously with her own arousal. Then she realized what the dark-haired giant meant. Argo's growing, stiffening penis had grown until it was now between Xena's thighs, it's swollen tip seeming to probe at the hem of Xena's skirt.

Xena immediately butt-scooted backward across Argo's chest, keeping the head of the huge penis at bay between her knees. She felt and heard the gusting laughter of the giants, and smiled herself as she realized the absurdity of her situation. She continued to squeeze and cuddle the hot, fleshy rod, feeling the dopey smile on her face still as Argo's penis rose slightly between her legs, now pointing at her from the perch of her own knee caps.

"Um, Xena," Gabrielle said, a warning in her voice, "I'd watch out if I were you. I think he's getting ready to-"

Xena had time to register the final stiffening of Argo's now-massive member atop her knees, and feel the super-charged bulge of pressure inside the fleshy cannon as it shot it's load.

The thick, white fluid shot out and up like a sideways volcano, spattering Xena's chest and face in a wet, warm blanket of goo.

The Warrior Princess was no longer smiling.
15533212122111211111111211111.title: More Horsey Business

155332121221112111111112111111.content:
"So," said Anna, as she looked at the massive wall, "why no guards?"

After watching the wall for over an hour, and seeing no sign of soldiers on its battlements, all five young women had moved out of the trees and into the open. Clearly, the lack of guards had puzzled all of them.

Xena said, "Perhaps the Yensid choose not to man the wall because it cannot be breached." The Warrior Princess sat astride Argo, struggling with him slightly as the horse seemed to not want to stray very far from Miley's feet.

Anna nodded. "That sounds like it could be right. I mean, look at that wall. Little people like you couldn't hope to get over it."

Xena fumed a bit over the comment, but judiciously decided to ignore it.

"Gabrielle," said Selena, placing her hands on her knees and looking down at the little blonde, "what do you think?"

Gabrielle narrowed her eyes, looking at the wall. "Xena could be right. It is a very formidable wall. Still, my guess is the Yensid have another form of defense behind the wall, something invaders aren't prepared for."

Selena beamed at her friends. "Isn't she a smart little thing?" She reached down and placed her hands around the tiny bard, and lifted her to her face. "Oooh, so cute and so smart! And how shall we get past this first obstacle, Gabrielle?"

"Well, since you ask, I suppose you should lift me up to the top, and I'll scramble over and unlock the gate."

Xena snorted. "That is ridiculous. We must use the strength of the giants to-"

"Try it, Selena," said Miley, "I think you might be tall enough to reach."

Xena rolled her eyes. "So you're going to listen to this foolish girl? She knows nothing about-"

"I think we got it." Selena had stepped right up to the wall, and was now holding Gabrielle in the palm of one hand. The small blonde sat on Selena's hand, with her legs dangling down between the giant teen's fingers. Selena raised her arm as high as she could, standing on tip-toe as she stretched her body to the fullest.

Gabrielle then quickly scrambled up first onto her knees and then carefully onto her feet. When she felt she had her balance, Gabrielle reached up and grabbed the top edge of the wall then lifted herself up and crawled adroitly over the top and out of sight.

A moment later, there was a long grating sound from the other side of the gate, and Gabrielle's small voice called out, "Alright, you can open the gate now."

Anna, Miley and Selena looked at each other, then stepped to the gate. The three giant teens each dug their fingers around the edge of the gate, and tugged at it for a moment, then stepped back as it swung smoothly open.

Gabrielle was standing on a narrow walkway on the inside of the gate, waving happily as she swung out with the gate. There was simple log bolt along the walkway, and Gabrielle had had no problem in throwing it back.

Selena laughed, then reached in and scooped Gabrielle into her arms, hugging the little woman to her. "Isn't she awesome! Come on guys! We're in!"

Anna and Miley laughed, too, then stepped in through the gate. Before going through, Miley looked back to find Xena hanging back atop Argo, pouting. She crossed her arms and stared daggers at her traveling companions.

Miley grinned, then gave out with a loud whistle.

Argo immediately charged at the gate, ignoring Xena's frantic efforts to rein him in. "Stop, Argo! Stop, I say!" But the battle horse charged on heedlessly through the gate, not stopping until he came to a skidding halt up against Miley's booted calf. The horse nuzzled at the smooth leather of the giant boot for a moment, then reared up on his hind legs to get himself farther up Miley's leg. Xena had to grab Argo's hairy mane to stay aboard, as the excited horse licked and nuzzled at the soft skin below Mley's knee.

Miley smiled as she leaned down and petted Argo, touching Xena's leg, too, as she did it. "See, Xena? Still my horsey." Miley stroked a slow finger down Xena's leg. "And maybe I'll keep you for my own, too."

Anna looked around quickly. "Not so fast, Miley. That's my Xena Doll you're fondling. What with Selena there getting attached to my little Gabrielle, I'm not going to give Xena up, too."

"Okay, okay," Miley said, standing back up and gently shooing Argo off her leg, "You can have her, Anna. I'll just keep my horsey." She sneered down at Xena. "Hear that, shorty? You're just borrowing him for now, got it?"

Xena gave a small nod, but grumbled to herself, "We shall see, giant."

"Hey, guys," Selena said now, "there's Gabrielle's second obstacle."

Everyone looked to where Selena pointed.

It was a vast swamp.

The greenish, moss-choked water stretched away from them in a vast, glittering sheet, it's oily surface alive with light from the slanting morning sun. The dull buzz of flies and the soft croak of frogs were loud in the stillness, and the damp stink of rotting vegetation filled the air. The fetid stretch of water seemed a mile wide, stretching away to...

"Ma-jic-Ingdom," breathed Xena in quiet wonder.

It was a crystal city, with spires and minarets rising to the skies. It was in the distance still, but it's grandeur was beyond question. It was, indeed a great city. And there was a hum of activity among the great buildings, as soldiers tiny with distance began to assemble, gathering and preparing for battle.

Preparing to repel the invaders.
155332121221112111111112111111.title: Over the Wall (Gabby Gets a Boost)

1553321212211121111111121111111.content:
Xena was the first to test the marshy waters. She coaxed Argo a few, tentative steps into the swamp, then reined him back quickly as the horse's forelegs sunk a foot into the sloppy muck.

Xena shook her head, as she rode back up the bank and hopped off Argo's back. "It is as I had feared. We cannot pass through. We shall have to find another way."

Anna rolled her eyes. "You give up pretty quick there, Xena Doll. Let me try."

The Warrior Princess smiled, and gave a theatrical wave of her hand. "As you wish, giant."

Miley laughed, as she settled down on the bank, cross-legged, and cooed softly to Argo - who trotted eagerly to her. "Xena thinks that mud's gonna suck you down, Anna, just like a big old dinosaur caught in a tar pit!"

Anna stuck out her tongue at Miley. "Yeah, I kinda doubt that. See?" With that, Anna stepped gingerly into the water, testing the footing with first one foot then the other. Her booted feet did sink a little into the greenish slime, but the sinking stopped, with the muck barely rising to her the tops of her toes.

The blonde starlet grinned smugly. "Told ya. Everything in this little toy world is harmless to us. Now let's get going."

Selena, still holding Gabrielle, stepped into the swamp next to Anna, finding the footing slippery but solid enough for walking. "Um, what about..." She pointed down at Xena on the shore.

"She'll have to be carried across, of course."

Xena stared daggers at Gabrielle, but when Anna leaned down above the Warrior Princess, she gave in, allowing herself to be picked up in two giant hands and tucked in close to Anna's chest.

Selena laughed, chucking Gabrielle playfully under the chin and eliciting a giggle. "Okay, I guess we're on our way, then. Miley, come on...oh, what the hell? Again?"

The teen singer had pulled Argo up into her lap, and once again had a hand beneath the little horse's belly. Argo was already shuddering in the hands of his mistress, as she continued fondling his penis. Miley looked up at her gawking friends. "What? My little horsey has to stay here all be himself, and I just wanted to make him happy before we go."

Anna blew out a disgusted breath. "Okay, whatever. Hurry up."

A few minutes later, the group started across the mucky water, leaving on the bank a wobbly-kneed, contented little horse.

As the young women slogged through the muddy water, they kept an eye on the far shoreline. There was a lot of activity over there, with hundreds, maybe thousands of small figures moving in a vast wave from the crystal city to the edge of the marsh. They moved with a clear, military precision, setting up some sort of defensive line at the water's edge.

The girls had crossed more than half the way across the water, when Anna began to notice something strange. The soldiers had initially appeared tiny with distance, but as the group neared the shore, there seemed to be some sort of optical illusion happening. Anna wondered if it had something to do with the shimmering light coming off the water - some sort of mirage or something.

Then, moments later, as they all stepped up onto the shore and met the army they would fight, all five women looked down in shock.

Anna was the first to find her tongue. "Holy crap! They're teeny!"

The Yensid had indeed assembled thousands of soldiers to face the invaders.

And each soldier stood roughly two inches tall.
1553321212211121111111121111111.title: Battle (Big vs Small)

choices: Anna, Miley and Selena Join the Battle
15533212122111211111111211111111.content:
"So," Anna said dryly, "these are the mighty Yensid warriors you've been warning us about, Xena?"

The Warrior Princess, who had been set down on her feet, along with Gabrielle, stared at the vast but tiny army. "Yes, well...I thought they'd be...bigger."

Selena laughed. "Just look at them! They're only as big as my pinkie finger!"

"Yeah," said MIley with a smile. She looked down at the tiny warriors, noting that they did seem well-armed, with swords and spears and shields. And they were so numerous that their army blanketed the wide plain between the city and the swamp. Still, they didn't even come up to Miley's ankles. "I wonder what they're planning to do."

Her answer was quick in coming, as the tiny hoard gave out with a wild, collective battle cry, and surged forward toward the girls.

"What in the world?" Anna said, amused, as the miniature army charged up, flashing swords and spears at the feet of her same-sized friends, as well as Xena and Gabrielle's.

The tiny, human flood washed around the boots of the big girls, stabbing and slashing at the thick leather, and scrambling up onto the giant toes and insteps. Anna, Miley and Selena just gawked down in amazement as the ferocious little warriors battled futilely at their feet.

Xena and Gabrielle, being much smaller, were a bit more affected by the frantic onslaught, as the passage of the tiny hoard was strong enough to buffet them, nearly knocking both women off balance. But Xena and Gabrielle each braced her feet widely, and were easily able to stand as the tiny men battled around their shins.

Gabrille looked at Xena. "So, what do we do here? How are we to fight these tiny things? It seems unfair, somehow."

Xena grinned savagely, as she watched the less-than-knee-high warriors slash ineffectually at her lower legs with their tiny swords and spears. "Foolish child! The advantage is ours, and we must seize it!" And with that, the Warrior Princess reared back and leaned down to give a powerful, back-handed slap at the little men that were battling at her legs.

A half dozen little men went flying, hurtling into a similar number of their countrymen, and knocking them to the ground.

Selena clapped her hands. "Nice going, Xena! Show those little guys who's boss!"

"Awe," Anna cooed, "don't hurt them, though."

Xena gave no sign that she heard either giant. She was in her own element now. She waded into the swarming little army, throwing alternating back hand slaps with each hand, shattering shields and spears and sending tiny soldiers flying. Amid the combined cries and shouts of the tiny army, Xena's howling war cry rose well above the din.

Xena smiled grimly as she fought.

Now she was having fun.

"Take it easy, Xena," Gabrielle said absently, as she knelt on one knee among the tiny throng surging around her. "They're tiny and helpless. Anna's right. Try not to hurt them."

"Quiet, child! If they cease this useless fighting, I shall stay my hand. Until then, they shall pay dearly for bearing weapons against us!"

Gabrielle shook her head, then turned back to the commotion around her own feet. Now that she held knelt down, the little soldiers were climbing up her legs, scrabbling for position up on her knee and thigh. There were a least a half dozen of them who had reached the perch so far.

Gabrielle turned to grin up at Selena. "This is amazing! They swarm up on me like little puppies or kittens! They are so cute!"

Selena laughed. "Yeah, they are, Gabrielle. Still, you'd better be careful. From up there on your knee, they might be able to stab those spears at your pretty little face."

Gabrielle blushed, then turned back to face her little attackers. As she turned her head, one of the little men thrust his spear at her, stabbing at her cheek.

"Whoah!" Gabrielle said, pulling back her head just in time to avoid the little spear. "Selena's right, I guess. I can't just have you little fellows stab me in the face, now can I?" With that, she slapped lightly at the spear-wielding culprit, sending him crashing among the soldiers on the ground.

Gabrielle giggled, as she easily batted away another of her tiny assailants. "Stop it, little ones! I don't want to have to hurt you!"

"Why not?" Xena yelled, as she stood amid a roiling mass of miniature men. She grasped one little soldier around the middle in her fist, shaking him wildly so that his sword and shield went flying. "They are doing their best to hurt us!

"Yes," the pretty bard said, softening her voice as she plucked a little soldier off her knee, seeing that this one was a little woman warrior, "but they can't hurt us, not really." Gabrielle cooed at the girl soldier who struggled in her fist. The feisty little woman kicked at her fingers as Gabrielle played a little with the tiny, bare legs. After spending a few moments turning the little woman this way and that, examining her tiny, exquisite form, Gabrielle gently set the woman back on her feet. "They're just so tiny and weak."

"Perhaps, girl," said Xena, as she gleefully slapped another half-dozen soldiers to the ground, "but cuddling your little pets like that will get us no closer to winning this fight!"

Gabrielle sighed. "Maybe you're riight."

Gabrielle gently swept the little soldiers off her lap, suppressing a laugh as they tumbled down to knock down a number of their compatriots. Gabrielle then leaned a bit down and forward and stretched her arms wide. "Okay, little ones," she said with a grin, "come and get me!"

After only a slight pause, several of the little soldiers rushed at Gabrielle, swords forward to slash at her lowered, exposed face. Just as they drew back to strike in unison, Gabrielle leaned back and at the same time moved her arms in to enclose the knee-high soldiers. Before the little men knew what was happening, they were all trapped within the fleshy circle of Gabrielle's arms, kicking and screaming as they were crushed against her chest and lifted into the air as Gabrielle stood up.

"Easy with them, Gabrielle," said Anna from above.

"Don't worry, Anna. I'll be very careful with these little darlings."

The 'little darlings' continued to flail and fight in Gabrielle's gentle embrace, clearly frustrated that their weapons were either crushed or pinned uselessly against the giant.

"What are you doing with them, then?" asked Miley.

"Well," said Gabrielle as she turned completely around with her load of struggling little men, and looked up at her giant friends. "In the Southern jungles, there is a type of snake that takes it's prey in its coils, and, slowly..." She paused as she began to gently squeeze the little men into her chest. "...the snake squeezes the little creature's body..."

Now the soldiers began shouting in earnest, calling out in pain and surprise as their little bodies were squeezed between Gabrielle's arms and chest.

"The little creatures panic," Gabrielle continued, as she kept applying more and more pressure, "bleating and squawking and expelling their air as they are squeezed."

The little men still shouted and struggled, getting weaker and weaker as they did.

"And pretty soon, all the air goes right out of their poor little lungs and they..."

And on cue, each little man, one by one, passed out, lolling limply in Gabrielle's embrace.

"Awesome," said Selena quietly.

"Yeah, cool," agreed Anna, "they're not dead, though, are they?"

Gabrielle chuckled, as she knelt down to set the heap of little soldiers gently on the ground. "They're alright, Anna. I promise. They will wake up in a little while, a little bruised, perhaps, but healthy enough."

Xena snorted, as she continued to wade into the tiny army, delightedly slapping aside a half-dozen tiny men with each, back-handed slap. "I still like my way better!"

Gabrielle rolled her eyes and turned back to the army still swarming around her legs. "How about it, little fellows? Ready to give up?"

In answer, the tiny hoard surged forward with new fury, slashing futilely at Gabrielle's legs. The blonde bard sighed. "I guess Xena's right. We will need to show you little people that it's useless to fight us.'

With that, Gabrielle leaned down and accepted more, willing little soldiers into her crushing embrace.

Selena laughed. "Our little girls are doing great. But maybe we need to, uh, step in and get this thing finished."

Anna nodded, looking down at the thronging soldiers stabbing uselessly at her own feet. All this while, she had been watching the exploits of Xena and Gabrielle, and had completely forgotten that she and her friends were also under attack by the tiny little warriors.

Anna jostled her foot slightly, causing several of the little men to go flying. She giggled. "Um, what did you have in mind, Selena?"

"Well," the dark-haired singer leaned down, reaching toward her own feet, "I have an idea..."

"Me, too," said Miley, lowering herself slowly into a cross-legged position, laughing as the two-inch-tall soldiers scurried out of the way of her huge, descending rear end. "This is gonna be fun."
15533212122111211111111211111111.title: The Girls vs the Tinies

choices: The Girls Visit the Crystal City
155332121221112111111112111111111.content:
Selena plunged her hand down into the fighting mass of tiny soldiers, and closed her fingers on a half dozen struggling little bodies.

The dark-haired girl brought her hand before her face, and giggled. "God, they feel so weird and squirmy in my fingers! They feel even softer than Gabrielle!"

Anna stepped over to look. "Your'e not gonna squeeze them like Gabrielle's doing, are you? I'm afraid it would kill them if you did it."

"Relax, Anna. I'm not going to kill them." Selena brought in her other hand and began poking and prodding at the soldiers struggling in her closed fist. It was mostly just little arms and legs sticking out from between her fingers, and Selena delighted in fiddling with the struggling little limbs, and hearing the little shouts and screams as she did it.

"What, then?"

Selena grinned. "Watch." She laughed as she saw one little soldier's head sticking out from between her middle and index fingers, and paused to ruffle his hair playfully with a fingertip. Then she turned her attention back to Anna, and her grin widened. "Check this out."

And with that, the Hispanic star spun around quickly, then gave a casually flip of her hand, tossing the flailing soldiers through the air.

"Nooo!" Anna screamed, lurching forward to try to catch the screaming little men out of the air. They fell just beyond her grasp, however, and dropped like stones. "Selena! How could you? That's..."

And then Anna understood, and breathed a sigh of relief.

Then she watched with Selena as the handful of little soldiers sailed out in a sweeping arc over the swamp, before plopping one by one into the slimy green water. Their tiny screams were cut short as each soldier made his own wet plunk! as he hit the water. Each of the little men came up sputtering and cursing, up to their necks in the fetid water, and clearly having trouble getting their footing in the muck on the bottom.

"See?" Selena said with a laugh, "I don't think those little dudes will be in the mood to fight anytime soon!"

"Damn, girl," said Anna, impressed. "That's not a bad idea. Mind if I try it?"

"Be my guest," Selena said, as she reached down to grab another handful of little soldiers.

Anna laughed and reached her hand down, too. She decided to start with the little group that was currently stabbing some spears at her boots She plucked up six or seven tiny men in her fist, and laughed again as she watched them struggle inside her fist. "You're right, Selena! They feel way cool!"

"Told ya." And now Selena had two handfuls of tiny soldiers. She threw both struggling knots of men into the air, laughing like a loon as they plunk-plunk-plunked! into the water.

Anna tossed her handful, watching with glee as they all splashed into the pond, and came back up sputtering and cursing. "Miley," she said, laughter bubbling from between her lips, "you have got to try this! It's so much..."

Anna's words trailed off. When she found her tongue again, she said, "Miley, what the hell are you doing?"

Miley was sitting cross-legged on the ground, letting the little soldiers slash and stab uselessly at her legs. But the young singer was paying those soldiers no mind. She turned to face Anna and Selena, with a big grin on her face. "I'm trying a different approach. See?" She held out both her hands to her friends.

There was a little soldier in each hand. They were on their backs, their upper bodies trapped between an index and a middle finger, while the thumb had speared between the struggling little legs, and was rubbing at their tiny crotches.

Selena rolled her eyes. "You must be kidding, Miley. That's how you're helping in the fight? You're poking at these little guy's thingies?"

Miley laughed, as she began to increase the speed of her rubbing. "Well, I just thought that when I did it it with Argo, it made him kind of happy and relaxed. I figure I'll just do the same with these little dudes. It'll take the fight right out of them."

"For God's sake, Miley," Anna said, as she tossed her own, screaming double-handful into the swamp, "that's going to take forever!"

MIley smiled, and shook her head. "No, it won't." She was looking down at the little men in her hand, and she already felt the familiar shuddering of their tiny bodies, as her giant thumbs had their way with their tiny penises. Then each tiny man gave a high-pitched squeak and lay panting and red-faced in her palm.

"See? I know how to do it so they get excited pretty quick," Miley said happily, as she tumbled the two spent little men to the ground, and quickly scooped up two more.

"I'm sure that's fun, Miley," Selena said, as she tossed more screaming little soldiers into the lake. Now she was leaning over, with her legs spread wide, and scooping up the handfuls of little soldiers and hiking them between her legs to splash into the swamp behind her. "But this is a little more efficient."

"I like my way better." Miley held her two, new captives between her fingers, and slowly inclined her hands so that they were very close to her face. She wanted the little men to see nothing but her face as she played with them. Her thumbs came in, probing between the wildly-kicking legs, and feeling for and finding the tiny, pulsing little rods beneath the thin layer of cloth of their uniform. Miley was delighted to find that the little things were already rock hard.

Miley laughed, as she continued to fondle the little men. "Don't embarrassed, little guys. My horsey likes my fingers, too."

After several minutes of 'battle', the tide began to turn. The little army was soon in full retreat, fleeing back to their crystal city in streaming, bedraggled bunches.

Selena, Anna, Gabrielle, and Xena all looked around in bewilderment. The sudden end to the battle had caught them by surprise, and it took them a moment to recognize their victory.

After a few moments, Anna spoke. "Well, okay. I guess we better go check out this crystal city. Xena, we'll see if we can find your guy. Maybe he's...Miley, why are you still playing with those little guys?"

Miley was fiddling with yet another pair of little men, and there was a straggling bunch of little soldiers who were lined up on top of her leg, from her ankle to her thigh.

"Give me a minute, can you guys?" She gave her friends a sheepish grin, and nodded at the little men on her leg. "There's a line."
155332121221112111111112111111111.title: Anna, Miley and Selena Join the Battle

choices: Meet the King (more fun for the girls)
1553321212211121111111121111111111.content:
When the girls entered the crystal city, it seemed to be utterly deserted. The group fanned out through the city, with the bigger girls peering into the upper floors of the buildings for any signs of the tiny inhabitants, while Xena and Gabrielle searched the lower floors and ground level.

Some of the buildings were high enough that the girls and to jump up a little to check the roofs. And Gabrielle and Xena sometimes had to get down on their knees to peer into the ground levels.

Gabrielle was the first to succeed. She walked back up the street beaming, stopping at the feet of Anna - who was still her favorite of the giants. Selena and Miley seemed very nice, as well, but Anna had been her first giant, and Gabrielle felt an odd mix of respect and affection for her.

"I found two of them," she said proudly.

Miley and Selena had gathered next to Anna, and all three giants were now peering down at Gabrielle. The tiny bard was holding two of the Yensid in her arms. It was a couple, a little man and woman. The man was cradled in the crook of her left arm, and the woman lay supported along her right. The tiny people were looking up, wide-eyed, clearly shocked at seeing giants even bigger than the one who had captured them.

Selena peered at the little people suspiciously. "Have you checked them for weapons?"

Gabrielle smiled down at her little people, then looked up at Selena. "Oh, they aren't soldiers, Selena. They're shop keepers. The little man is Atlan, and that's his wife, Geeta." She looked down at the little people again. "Atlan, Geeta, these are my friends, Anna, Miley and Selena."

The two little people were speechless at first. Their little eyes tracked up the massive bodies of the girls, craning their necks almost painfully to get a look at the, huge smiling faces.

"By the gods," Atlan said, awe in his tiny voice, "I have never seen creatures such as these. It is no wonder that our mighty army has been routed."

Miley frowned, leaning down a little to glare at the little man. "Who you calling creatures, shorty?"

"I...I meant no offense," the tiny man sputtered, burrowing at little into the crook of Gabrielle's arm.

Anna laughed. "Stop it, Miley! You're scaring them!"

Miley snorted. "What kind of man is scared of a girl. And what about his little girlfriend there? Doesn't she know how to talk?"

The little woman, a dark-haired beauty wearing a plain, peasant dress looked a question up at Gabrielle.

The bard smiled and nodded encouragingly.

Geeta looked at Miley, and there was not a bit of fear in her voice as she said, " Yes, young miss, I know how to talk. However, I thought it prudent not to speak until I was spoken to."

Miley nodded. "Good idea. But what's with the 'young miss' stuff? Doesn't sound very respectful to me."

The small women did her best to affect a bow as she lay in Gabrielle's arms. "Cry pardon. It is just that I am clearly older than you, so I thought it appropriate to address you that way."

"Oh you did, did you? Well, I don't think-"

"Can it, young miss," said Anna with a grin, turning her attention back to Gabrielle. "So, did you have a hard time catching them?"

Gabrielle shook her head. "Not at all. I was down on my knees, looking into the ground floors of the buildings, when I saw the two of them in their shop."

"They didn't try to run?" asked Selena.

Gabrielle smiled. "No. They were very good about things. I told them to stay there and not try to run, and they obeyed me. Then I just reached into the doorway and took them out." Gabrielle beamed down at the little people as though she were a proud parent. "They are very well-behaved."

"Actually," said Atlan with a nervous smile, "we were too terrified to move!"

"Speak for yourself," Geeta said patting Gabrielle's arm as smiled up at her. "It is not every day that one gets to meet a giant, and a beautiful one at that. Had Gabrielle not reached in to get us, I would have stepped willingly into her hands anyway." She then looked up at Anna, Selena and MIley. "And seeing you three, young titans renews my sense of wonder in the gods and their works, and I would not run from such wonders, even if staying to experience them were to cost me my life."

Atlan gawked at his wife in disbelief. "Have you lost your mind, woman?" he said.

"Shut up, shorty," Miley said with a laugh, as she knelt down and reached down to lay a gentle finger atop the tiny woman's head, and fluff at the soft, dark hair. "Your little wifey here is way tougher than you are. I like her."

"Enough of this!"

Everyone turned to look at Xena, who had stepped up next to Gabrielle. She had been listening nearby for the last few minutes, unnoticed by the others, and now she could no longer contain herself.

"We finally have a pair of these treacherous little creatures in our grasp!" Xena said angrily, pointing at Atlan and Geeta in Gabrielle's arms. "Now we must make them talk!" The Warrior Princess began to reach toward the little people. "If they need some persuasion, well then I-

"Shut your mouth, Xena."

Xena stared at Gabrielle, open-mouthed. "What? What did you say to me, girl?"

Gabrielle stared back at Xena, a calm lookoin her face. "I said, 'shut up.' You're not running things around here, Xena. I can't believe you don't understand that by now." She nodded up at the three titans, tipping a wink to Anna, who smiled. "So, Xena, I'm telling you to shut up. I'll talk to our new, little friends here, and I won't require any of your persuasion to get answers."

Xena was fuming, but as she felt herself suddenly enveloped in the shadows of the three giants hulking above her, she wisely complied with Gabrielle's orders, and 'shut her mouth'.

"Now then, little ones," Gabrielle said, as she looked down at the little people cradled in her arms, "has a man of my size been here? His name is..." Gabrielle looked to Xena.

"Thesius." Xena supplied sullenly.

Gabrielle nodded. "Thesius. Have you seen him?"

The tiny people exchanged a puzzled glance.

Then Geeta looked up and said, "Do you mean King Thesius?"
1553321212211121111111121111111111.title: The Girls Visit the Crystal City

choices: Little Kings and Littler Slave Girls to Play With
15533212122111211111111211111111111.content:
They were approaching the cluster of grand-looking buildings that Geeta called the Royal Residence. Xena and Gabrielle led the procession, with the larger girls trailing after, walking slowly to keep from stepping on the little women.

Anna couldn't help but notice how Gabrielle doted on her little couple. She still carried them cradled in her arms, talking quietly to them, and occasionally reaching down to pet one or the other of them. The little man, Atlan, seemed to merely tolerate the touching, but his wife Geeta smiled and laughed as she slapped playfully at Gabrielle's teasing fingers.

Anna liked that her little, toy woman was having so much fun with these new toys of her own.

"The king spends much time in his Royal Courtyard, there up ahead." Geeta was pointing to a line of crystal pillars that led up around the corner, at the center of the cluster of buildings.

"Well," said Selena, "would he be there now? I mean, he knows that his army was fighting us, doesn't he?"

"Perhaps," said Geeta, fending off Gabrielle's finger with a smirk, then continuing. "Still, he leaves the battles to his generals. Such mundane matters are of no concern to one such as he."

Xena rolled her eyes. "I believe I know this king of yours, little woman. I think I can guess the sort of matters that are of concern to him. He cares mostly about warming his bed with any harlot willing to put up with him."

Geeta smiled. "Perhaps you do know our great king."

They did find King Thesius in the Royal Courtyard. He was a broad-shouldered, dark-haired man, and he lay face-down upon a raised dais covered with hundreds if tiny, silken pillows. He was naked save for a sort of a loin cloth that had a patchwork look to it, as though it had been stitched together from many smaller pieces of cloth.

There were a dozen or so tiny, naked women massaging his heavily-muscled body, some of them using their hands to rub oil into his deeply-tanned skin, while others had apparently doused themselves in the oil, and were using their whole bodies to massage their master. Alabaster-skinned arms and legs writhed atop the 'giant' man, and tight bellies and springy little breasts worked their magic as well.

Geeta was the first to speak. "Um, cry pardon, your majesty."

The man shifted a little on his pillows and turned his head to the side, showing that his eyes were closed. "Yes," he mumbled into the pillows, sounding sleep-groggy, "what is it? Have you word of the battle?"

"Uh, well..."

"Yes, Thesius," Xena said with amusement, kneeling down on the stone courtyard floor. "We have word of the battle. You lost."

The man's eyes snapped open. Then he saw Xena kneeling next to him. He closed his eyes, and sighed, smiling a little. "I should have known it was you, Xena. Did you best my army on your own, or did you have help?"

Gabrielle knelt down on the other side of Thesius, then set Atlan and Geeta gently down. "I'm not sure she needed it, but she had help."

Thesius rolled his head lazily to the other side and opened his eyes. He gave out with a short laugh. "Ha! She looks like a farm girl playing dress up! So, the two of you, Xena and the farm girl, defeated my entire army!" Thesius laughed again, then put his head down and closed his eyes. "Perhaps I shall have to crush all my generals and appoint new ones!"

Meanwhile, from high above, Anna frowned at Miley and Selena, and mouthed What a jerk!

Miley and Selena nodded, then looked down to see what Gabrielle and Xena would do.

Thesius settled back into his pillows, then barked irritably, "You, slaves! I did not tell you to stop your work! Continue to service me, or you are the ones I shall crush!"

The little naked women had stopped their massaging when they saw the giants enter the courtyard, looking up in transfixed awe. The close proximity of Gabrielle and Xena was clearly making them nervous, but both of these giants were of the same scale as their king, so their mere size was not too much of a shock.

But the three, towering teens, who rose far above the columns framing the courtyard and even stood nearly as tall as the tallest buildings in the city, were truly terrifying. The slave girls could see that the giants seemed to be very young women, and were smiling down at them in a friendly and non-threatening manner. Still, their sheer size was daunting.

"You're not crushing anybody, little man," Miley said menacingly, as she casually reached down to scoop one of the scared little women up off Thesius' back. The little woman struggled wildly, but Miley ignored that and gently closed her fingers over the tiny creature, cooing to her comfortingly to try to calm her down.

"Little man!" Thesius said in a rage, as he rolled over, the remaining little slave girls flying off his body and falling, mostly unharamed onto the scattered bed of pillows. "Who dares address the king as-"

Thesius looked pass Xena and Gabrielle. Then he looked up and up, past three sets of giant boots, three pairs of well-shaped, tree-sized legs, and on up to three giant, smiling faces.

All three girls waggled their fingers in a playful wave down at the king.

"Me, little man," Miley said with a wide smile, as she knelt down, extending a giant hand. "I dare."
15533212122111211111111211111111111.title: Meet the King (more fun for the girls)

155332121221112111111112111111111111.content:
Though he was initially shocked at seeing the giant girls towering above him, Thesius quickly recovered his composure. He stood, put his hands on his hips, and tipped a wink at Xena. "So, your army is larger than I had thought, Xena. Still, they are little more than children, and-"

That was when Miley's hand came down in a sweeping arc, striking the arrogant little man with a backhand slap that sent him tumbling across the stones of the courtyard. He rolled to a stop, ending up flat on his back, unharmed save for a few scrapes on his elbows and knees.

Selena and Anna laughed.

"Good one, Miley," Anna said, kneeling down for a closer look at the sprawled-out, bewildered little man.

"Yeah," added Selena, "the little creep really deserved that!"

Miley nodded, as she looked at the little nude girl in her hand. "I know, right? What kind of jerk could be mean to these adorable little things?"

Selena knelt down next to Anna, looking at the other tiny women who were variously standing or sitting on the pile of pillows. The tiny beauties were looking around them with a mixture of fear and confusion, their little eyes shifting nervously from their fallen master, to the giant teens who surrounded them.

"They are cute, aren't they?" Selena placed both her cupped hands, palms-up in the middle of the sea of pillows, waggling her fingers slightly. "Okay, girls, climb on. I've got room here for all the rest of you."

The eleven remaining little women just gawked at the dark-haired giantess. They looked at each other for a few, nervous moments, then seemed to make a collective, unspoken decision. Each little woman began walking across toward the giant hands, their tiny, doll-like feet padding softly across the bed of pillows.

"Good girls," said Selena happily, as the little slave girls began to step up into her hand. "That's it, little ones. Now, sit down or kneel. I don't want anybody to fall off."

Anna peered down at the little harem in her Hispanic friend's hands. The two-inch-tall women were settling themselves comfortably in Selena's hands, looking around a bit nervously still, but seeming to understand that they now had masters.

"What are you going to do with them, Selena?"

"I haven't decided yet, Anna. I just know I'm not letting that little jerk anywhere near them anymore."

"A good idea, giant," Xena said, crossing her arms across her chest. "Thesius does not know how to properly treat a woman. A woman of any size."

"You say that now, Xena," Thesius said smugly, as he stood up, dusting himself off, and pulling himself up to his full height - which was a full head taller than even the statuesque Xena. "There was a time when your opinion of me was...different."

Xena snorted. "In my callow youth, perhaps. My taste in male companionship has since improved."

Thesius chuckled. "I see. And what of your current companions?" He waved a sweeping hand at the giant girls. "They clearly have some crude, brute strength, and are able to conquer the tiny, insignificant Yensid. But I do not see why they bother to bring you and the farm girl here. Are you their mascot? Or perhaps their pet?"

Xena ground her teeth in fury, partly at the bold effrontery of her former general, and partly because Thesius was disturbingly close to the mark. These giants had indeed being treating her with no more respect than would be accorded to a family pet. She wanted to vehemently deny Thesius' barb, but could find no words.

"Xena's the one in charge, little man."

Thesius (and everyone else) stared at Anna.

After a moment, the bold little man found his tongue. "Giant, surely you jest."

Xena was as shocked as any of them to hear those words from Anna, but made sure not to show it. She knew the blonde giant's comment was mostly meant as a taunt to Thesius, but Xena appreciated the effort, just the same. In spite of herself, Xena found herself feeling at least a little bit of affection toward her giant captress.

Xena felt a grin touch her lips. "She doesn't jest. And don't call her Shirley."

When Gabrielle, Miley and Selena all busted out laughing, Thesius just gawked. "What the devil does that-"

Xena ignored her former general, and looked up at the girls. "It is getting late. Let us find shelter here for the night."

"Good idea, Xena," said Selena, as she carefully brought the handful of little woman up to her face. "Any suggestions where? I mean, all these buildings are way little for us to sleep in."

Xena nodded. "Yes, giant, but the night will be warm, and outside accommodations will suit you all well enough. Why don't you stay in the courtyard? The king's dais will serve as little more than a pillow for your head, but you and your slaves should be quite comfortable here."

Selena smiled. "Thanks, Xena."

Xena returned the smile, and turned to Gabrielle. "And, you, girl. You should be able to find a bed in the Royal Residence. Perhaps you will sleep in the king's own bed chamber." And now Xena turned her satisfied grin on Thesius, pleased with the look of wide-eyed disbelief on his handsome face. She turned back to Gabrielle. "Perhaps your new, little friends there at your feet can help you with that?"

Atlan and Geeta looked around for a moment, a little stunned, seeming surprised to be included in the conversation. Geeta recovered fist, smiling and nodding up at Gabrielle.

'"All right," Xena nodded. "Now, as for the great king here..."

Thesius narrowed his eyes. "What?"

Xena tipped her head up at Miley. "You may not have noticed it, Thesius, but this giant has been watching you with great interest. I believe that tiny slave girl she holds is not the only pet she would like to cuddle this night."

Now the bold little man's eyes grew wide. "Now wait just a minute."

Miley laughed. "Xena, you are just full of good ideas today. Come here, little guy."

Xena turned away, and was only peripherally aware of Miley's huge hand coming down and grabbing Thesius around the middle and hauling him, kicking and shouting, into the air. Xena walked over, and stood near Anna's feet. Within a minute, Gabrielle and Miley had gone, and Selena had lay on her back in the courtyard, and was gently opening her hands to spill her naked little girls into a squirming, giggly mass on her belly

Anna looked down at Xena, and gave a 'follow me' gesture with her finger. Then Anna walked out of the courtyard, and around the corner into a stone alleyway, looking around once to make sure Xena was following. The giant blonde then got down on one knee, and looked narrowly down at Xena. "So, it seems like your're really getting into this 'in charge' deal, huh?"

Xena sighed, then gave a low bow, hating to debase herself once again before the young giant, but feeling she had no other choice. "Cry pardon, giant. I thought I was taking your cue. I thought you sought to play Thesius for the fool. I was trying only to play my part."

Anna continued to stare down at Xena, but the blonde giant didn't seem angry. "Don't sweat it, shorty. You did good. I was trying to mess with that little jerk."

Xena let out an audible sigh. "Good. Then, if it is all right, I will find a place for myself for the night. Perhaps you should do the same."

Anna laughed. "That's funny, Xena. You set up all of my friends for a fun night, and you're just going to leave me by myself?"

Xena signed again, and when Anna's great hands came down to enclose her around her middle, she didn't struggle or fight in the least, even stepping on her own into Anna's gentle grasp.

She was, one again, a giant girl's toy.

What sustained her, though, was the thought of what kind of night Thesius would have.

Xena felt pathetic and helpless as she was cuddled up into the smothering warmth of Anna's chest, yet found she just could not help but smile.
155332121221112111111112111111111111.title: Little Kings and Littler Slave Girls to Play With

choices: See what Gabrielle and Her Little Friends are Doing
1553321212211121111111121111111111111.content:
"This is heaven," Selena said dreamily.

She had her eyes closed, and she lay with her head back on the pillows where the former king had once lolled. She had removed her boots, and had set her little women to work on her tired feet and legs. The massage was expertly done, and Selena's skin tingled deliciously - not only with the gentle touch of tiny, experienced hands, but with the warm, sensual contact of firm little thighs and tight, full breasts.

Selena opened her eyes. "You are doing great, girls." She reached down and plucked, at random, one of the tiny slave girls up off her thigh. She held the two-inch-tall girl lightly between her thumb and forefinger, covering the firm little body from just below the naked breasts to the tiny, dimpled knees.

She turned the tiny woman this way and that, inspecting her closely. "I've got to say, King Thesius had good taste in slave girls. You're all so cute!"

"Thank you, mistress," the tiny girl squeaked, not at all uncomfortable with being in a giant hand and hauled up before a huge, smiling face. In the past half hour or so, each of the little women had been in Selena's grasp, some more than once, and they had completely lost their fear of her. "We live to serve you, mighty Selena."

The other eleven tiny women looked up, and said in unison. "We live to serve you, mighty Selena."

"Cool," said Selena happily, bringing the little one in her hand in for a sloppy, wet kiss. She tasted the little face for a few moments, dabbing her tongue gently at the nose and cheeks, before playfully pushing her tongue tip past the soft little lips and filling up her girl's whole mouth.

When Selena pulled away, the slave girl was sputtering and coughing, and her tiny eyes were wide in shock.

Selena laughed, then leaned in for another quick, face-smothering kiss. Then, almost as an afterthought, she dropped her lips to the too-tempting little breasts, and sucked them into her mouth. She gave each, tiny melon a delicate lick, tasting at the pinhead-sized nipples, then biting down lightly on the fleshy little globes with the edges of her lips.

The girl was suddenly breathing very fast. Her breaths were tiny, but Selena could feel the little, warm puffs of air tickling softly against the skin above her lip. I could do this for days, thought Selena languidly, as she continued to play with her little girl's delicious tits.

I better not, though, she thought, as she reluctantly pulled her lips away from the warm, fleshy little mounds. Best not to play favorites. Selena smiled at the goggling little woman in her fingers. She adjusted her grip a bit, so that the girl's front was completely exposed, then she dipped her head in and gave a long lick of her tongue from the tip of the little one's toes to the top of her head.

When Selena set the little slave down on her thigh, the spent girl could only sprawl drunkenly across the smooth, brown skin. She lay there, eyes closed and panting, temporarily incapable of speech or movement.

"Rest for a bit, sweetie." Selena petted the quivering girl once with a gentle finger.

She hovered her hand over the other slave girls, moving it playfully back and forth as she decided who would be next.

Selena grinned happily down at her little girls. "See girls? I like to serve you a little bit, too. So, who's next?"

Eleven tiny hands shot immediately into the air.
1553321212211121111111121111111111111.title: Selena's Little Harem

choices: Thesius and Miley (and the little slave girl)
15533212122111211111111211111111111111.content:
"It is a grand bed chamber."

Geeta's voice was filled with awe. The room was very large by Yensid standards, with the ceiling being high enough that Gabrielle did not even have to stoop down at all. The furniture in the big room had been custom-built to fit a person of Gabrielle's own size, with each chair, table and bed clearly constructed of many tiny boards pieced together.

"Yes, it is," Gabrielle agreed, as she lay in the middle of King Thesius' bed, stretching out her arms and legs, and seeing that she occupied along the very middle of the huge bed. The soft, patchwork bed spread felt incredibly comfortable against the skin of her bare legs (she had removed her boots and tossed them carelessly on the stone floor. "Thank you for finding it for me, Geeta. Atlan."

"You are very welcome," answered Atlan the tiny man's voice coming, dismebodied, from down below the level of the mattress, sounding very small and insignificant in the big, echoing room. "Well, if you require nothing else, we really must be-"

Gabrielle suppressed a giggle, finding it funny to be carrying on a conversation with people less than a foot tall. "What's your hurry, little man? Why don't you and Geeta come up here for a minute. You have to feel this bed!"

"No, no," Atlan said quickly, "we really must-"

"Don't be rude, Atlan," Geeta said. Gabrielle heard tiny footsteps tapping across the floor and up to the edge of her bed. "Come on."

"Oh...very well."

Gabrielle saw small, tugging movements on the blanket's edge. The corners of her mouth curved up in a smile. "Do you guys need a boost up?"

As she said it, a small hand came into sight, grabbing the edge of the blanket. Geeta hauled herself up over the edge, then crawled up onto the bed. The pretty little woman beamed up at Gabrielle. "That is not necessary, thank you, Gabrielle."

A moment later, Atlan managed to crawl up onto the bed, as well.

The three talked for awhile, with Atlan and Geeta telling Gabrielle about their people, as well as the coming of the King Thesius. The king, it turned out, ruled with an iron fist, often treating his subjects cruelly if they disobeyed him or failed in any way to please him.

"Well," said Gabrielle, with an angry look on her face said, "that's over. My companions and I will make sure of that."

Gabrielle then told her new friends about herself and her traveling companions. The little people were suitable impressed with the groups exploits, which, though slightly exaggerated by the bard's literary license, were mostly true.

After a time, Gabrielle yawed. "Time to turn in."

"Good," said Atlan, "we will leave you now."

"No."

Atlan was walking to the edge of the big bed, his steps comically springy on the thick mattress. Her turned around. "What do you mean 'no'?"

Gabrielle gave the little man a sleepy smile. "I mean, no, you're not going, little fella. You're both spending the night with me."

"But..."

"Be quiet, Atlan," Geeta said, as she stepped toward Gabrielle, smiling. "We've been invited to stay. It would be rude not to accept."

"But..."

"Be quiet, Atlan," echoed Gabrielle.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---

Gabrielle had been dreadfully tired from the events of the day, and dropped off to sleep quickly. She had settled the little people in atop her own chest, and cupped them lightly with her enclosing hands. She'd bid them a fuzzy g'night, then feel into a softly snoring sleep.

Atlan, resigned to his fate, tried to settle in to sleep, prepared to endure this gentle captivity, at least long enough for the girl to fall into a deep enough sleep so that he and Geeta could slip away. As for sleep, he knew he would not get a wink.

After a time, he first felt Geeta's body snuggle in closer to him, and then her hands were working at the belt of his tunic The soft hands were already working at what lay beneath his tunic.

"What in the name of the gods are you up to, woman!" Atlan hissed, keeping his voice low."This is not the time!"

"Why not?" Geeta said quietly, her hands busy. "We are tucked in atop a beautiful, slumbering giantess. Let us make love, Atlan! We should not miss a chance at such a thing!"

Atlan pushed his randy wife aside. "Are you insane, Geeta! We will not do that!"

"Here, husband," Geeta said, changing tactics as she gently took Atlan's wrist, and laid his hand with hers on Gabrielle's breast. "Feel that. Just there."

Atlan tried to pull his hand away, but Geeta, though delicately built, was quite strong when she needed to be. Now, while his hand lay at the giant's breast, Atlan felt what his wife had wanted him to feel. There was a heavy, deep throbbing coming up through his palm, visibly shaking his hand slightly, as he watched in amazement.

It was Gabrielle's giant heartbeat.

"See," Geeta said, rolling onto her back and spreading out her arms and legs languidly. "You can feel it, all over your whole body. Isn't it...wonderful?"

In spite of himself, Atlan laid back just as his wife was doing. And he felt it. The deep, booming throb, coming from deep within the breast of the slumbering giantess. He felt the rhythmic beating subtly moving his body up and down on the breast of the giantess.

He looked over at his smiling wife, once again remembering how much he liked that smile. He also had a sudden recollection of the very fine, soft things which lay beneath her now rumpled and slightly hiked-up dress.

As he and Geeta rode the gentle, rolling tide of the giant heartbeat, Atlan felt his manhood beginning to stir against his leg.

"Perhaps..." he said, his breath catching in his throat, "...perhaps, if we are very quiet..."

---------------------------------------------------------------

Atlan lay in the firm embrace of Geeta's enclosing thighs, thrusting himself into her secret place with slow deliberate thrusts of his hips. Their hard, sliding movements against each other were violent, like animals in heat, but they made a conscious effort to transmit as little movement into the giant body as possible. It was a delicate balancing act, but they thought they were accomplishing it, even keeping their cries of ecstasy down to muffled little moans.

So, they were quite surprised when a booming, feminine giggle rolled down around them.

"I think you are beautiful too, Geeta," said Gabrielle happily, reaching a hand down toward the still-rutting little couple. "And you are right. We should not miss a chance at such a thing."
15533212122111211111111211111111111111.title: Gabrielle Doesn't want to Sleep Alone

155332121221112111111112111111111111111.content:
Miley had taken her two new slaves from the courtyard, and had found a grassy spot to sit down at an outer wall of the Royal Residence. Now, she was sitting, with her back against the wall, holding her open palm before her face.

"What is your name, tiny one?"

The miniature woman kneeling in Miley's hand was dark-haired and light-skinned, as were most of the Yensid, and she was also naked. She seemed to feel no real embarrassment for her nudity, yet she cowered a bit in the giant palm, unsure of the giant's intentions. "I am..." she faltered, her tiny voice timid. "...I am Tani, mistress. I live to serve you."

Miley grinned. "Cool."

"Hold your tongue, girl!" Thesius thundered. "You are bound to me, as are the rest of your puny ilk!"

Miley rolled her eyes. "Oh, like you're really in a position to say that, shorty. Have you noticed where you are?"

Thesius had noticed.

He was currently pinned beneath the back of Miley's ankle, pressed into the night-damp grass not only by the weight of one giant leg, but by two, as the giant had crossed her legs at the ankles. He had been struggling for several minutes, but soon realized he had no chance to escape.

"You shall regret this mightily, giant," Thesius growled, turning his head to the side, and spitting out some dirt and grass. "You cannot treat a king like this!"

The giant teen shrugged. "Silly man. You're not king anymore." She turned to the little woman in her hand. "Is he, Tani?"

The two-inch-tall girl gave a low bow. "No, mistress."

"Impudent girl! When I free myself, I shall-"

"Be quiet," Miley said, pushing down a little harder with her lower legs and squishing Thesius back down so that he got a new mouthful of grass. His furious diatribe was now muffled, almost inaudible.

"So, anyway," Miley said to Tani, "I saw this little jerk making you and your friends give him a massage. Is that all you did for him?"

Tani bowed her head. "No, mistress. We were also forced to...service him."

Miley nodded slowly. "You mean...?"

The tiny woman nodded. "Yes. It required many of us."

Miley smiled, then reached out and petted Tani lightly on the head. "Yeah, but I'll bet once you and your cute little friends got going, you had him shooting his load in no time!"

Tani allowed herself a smile. "God, though he may be, he is still a male, mistress."

"Tell me about it, girlfriend. Even my horse can't get enough of me playing with his thingy."

Tani's eyes grew wide, but she didn't even flinch as Miley's petting lowered to her naked chest. "You have a horse? That must surely be a grand creature to behold! Oh, mistress, I should like to see the creature that could bear you upon its back!"

Miley laughed. "Oh, I can't ride Argo, Tani. He is my pet, and much too small for me to ride. Although I suppose, to you and your tiny people, Argo would be quite a sight, indeed."

Tani nodded, leaning forward a little to increase contact with Miley's giant fingers, pushing her breasts into the curious, probing digits. "Yes, I would like to see him, mistress. As a slave, I am not allowed to ride, of course, but I do like horses."

"Really? Me, too. Are there any horses around here?"

"Yes. The Royal Stables are but a short distance from here, mistress."

"Cool," Miley said, let's go check out those little horses!"

Miley stood, curling her fingers around Tani protectively as she rose. The little woman instinctively placed her hands down to steady herself on the giant, moving palm, already getting used to be carried around by her new mistress.

"Um, mistress?" Tani said, pointing a finger downward. "What about him?"

Miley looked down at Thesius. The foot-tall man was now rolling over on his back, sputtering and spitting out more dirt and grass. Miley had completely forgotten about her other slave.

"Oh, yeah. Thanks, Tani." Miley frowned. "I really want to see those horses. What should I do with this little jerk in the mean time?"

"I have a suggestion, mistress."

Miley looked down to find her tiny girl grinning up at her.

"Bring him with us, mistress. I have an idea."
155332121221112111111112111111111111111.title: Thesius and Miley (and the little slave girl)

1553321212211121111111121111111111112.content:
Anna smirked as she cuddled Xena, just laying her arms across her chest. Then, smirk widening, she brought a hand to Xena and began fingering a leg. From armored shin and up under her leather skirt. After a minute or two, the blond girl’s other hand found its way to Xena’s breastplates and began touching there.

“Must you, Giant?” complained Xena.

Anna giggled, “Well, it’s not a must, Xena Doll. I just can’t help myself. You’re a better toy than I ever had, and OUCH!” She’d caught her thumb in the armor.

“Crave pardon, Mighty Anna.” The Warrior Princess pleaded, fearful despite herself of terrible punishment.

But after a moment of sucking her thumb AnnaSophia had both hands busily trying to remove her toy’s protective gear “No harm done, really.” She replied softly “Just pinched myself. If I’m… gonna have any fun tonight this stuff has got to go.”

“Giant! I beseech you!” Xena protested “It is my warrior’s garment! If undressed you must have me, then permit me to do so!”

AnnaSophia scowled, but allowed her toy to stand on her chest, cautioned “Well, I guess. But if you even think about running, remember I can grab you easily. In fact, keep your little self in contact with my fingers all the time.”

“Overgrown bitch!’ hissed Xena under her breath.

The young starlet heard exactly what the Warrior said, but demanded “What was that?”

“Yes Mistress!” answered Xena sharply, “As you command. Undressing.”

Yawning mightily, AnnaSophia watched as the shadowed silhouette moved in front of her eyes. Once it stopped moving, she ordered “Lie down, toy.”

“You know, Giant. I am a great warrior.” Xena stated in her most dangerous tones.

AnnaSophia briefly let fingers of both hands roam across the foot-tall warrior’s body, then grabbed her and stuffed her under her top. Then the young starlet pushed on the sides of her breasts and giggled as little naked feet kicked her belly. She chuckled “Great playtoy you mean.”

“Mnph! Grunt! <<mumble>>” Xena protested, kicked and punched at the smothering flesh. Her only comfort, imagining the fate of her former commander.

Thesius was indeed in for a difficult night. And the start was entirely his own fault. During the interruption of his pre-sleep ritual, he subtly armed himself. Chestplate, one full legplate and another kneepad, one shoulder-guard and steel encased both arms. All under his toga. He had just managed to locate his long-unused sword when that damnable woman had suggested “…slave girl she holds is not the only pet she would like to cuddle this night."

Thesius turned to Xena and had growled "Now wait just a minute." His temper had always been his weakness. For looking at his former underling enabled the giant girl to seize him about the middle. Never in the King’s long and mostly successful career had he become so instantly helpless. But he was now some thirty feet off the ground.

“Guess you’re mine.” Miley remarked. She curled three fingers of her left hand over her two-inch pet for safety and extended her index to investigate Thesius.

The King was right in the act of swinging his massive two-handed claymore. No average person of his size could possibly have swung it one-handed. But Thesius was a heavily muscled man. The only hint that he was beginning to age was small bits of grey in his hair, and the slightest hint of a bulge around his middle. He roared his battle cry “ARRR-ARRR-ARRR!!” And the blow landed.

“OWWW!!” yelled Miley. Her fingernail had acted as a shield against the assault. What might have taken a chunk of flesh, cracked the nail leaving a line of blood. “THAT HURT YOU LITTLE TWERP!”

Foolishly unintimidated Thesius demanded “Put me down girl! The great King Thesius--eeee!” This last squeal caused by the giant girl’s fingers compressing the plates of his cuirass into his torso.

“Bad little man!” growled Miley, although his expression made her loosen her grip. “But you need to know who’s boss. Ah! Just the thing!”

There was a long, rectangular, shallow pool of water in the Yensidi courtyard. Thesius squealed like a girl as he rolled out of the giant hand and hit with a SPLASH. He immediately struggled to surface. But he was flicked off his knees by a boulder sized toe. Then, through the crystal clean water he saw the whole giant foot come down. It landed crushingly on his chest, forcing out vital air he was quickly running out of. Before he expired, however, the Foot got under him and lifted his head out of the water, allowing him to breathe. Then before he was quite recovered, and with no warning, the support was yanked away. The weight did not come down again, but he had to struggle to the edge, still weighed down by his armor.

“Learned your lesson, I trust.” Miley toed the King over so he could look up into her face “Now behave yourself.”

Still panting, Thesius had to just watch as the Giant Hand slowly, gloatingly, came down and again took possession of him.
1553321212211121111111121111111111112.title: Thesius ‘ Night

info.brief_description: This is a size story, anything is possible, and almost anything goes.
info.description:
Now for the rules, no people under the age of 10. No weight gaining, no one word chapters(tell a story with your chapter), no piss, no poop.

I'm hoping to attract all those who added to the various incarnations of Giants, Giantess, Furs & Tiny Humans. Which are all gone.

They should be able to interact. What can a normal sized person really do with someone less than an inch? Want a giant as big as a skyscraper? Ok, give them someone 100 feet tall to play with. Has definite potential for multi-sized situations.
